hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Club convenience
desc: We booked a Club room for about a week here and it was really enjoyable. The breakfast spread was phenomenal. The Club package came with afternoon tea and canape hour and I have to say it was well worth it. Free flow of drinks and quite a nice spread for canape hour. I think most days we didnt end up eating dinner because we had eaten so much. If I were to be critical of one thing the pool is quite dated and not very child friendly. Tiles were peeling off and the pool goes from kids section to deep very quickly. The service was really good though.. Our flight was delayed so we arrived around 2am and they greeted us by name when we walked into the hotel. Must have been the last guests to check in but shows that staff are paying attention which mirrored the rest of our stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent location
desc: I was booked ther on busines several times. The rooms are functional, mid-size for Singapore and have quiet air conditioning. However the rooms facing Orchard road are quite noisy. The pool and the bar have a fantastic view over the city. On the overall the hotel needs a major renovation. The staf is very efficien and friendly.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay
desc: All the staff we came across (from housekeeping to Concierge and wait staff) were so friendly and helpful. A special shout out to Kenny (who checked us in) and Vino (in the Exec Lounge) – both exceeded our expectations in top service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Always a pleasure to be back!
desc: The Hilton is like “home” for me in Singapore. Service, cleanliness and amenities are spot on. Lots of options to eat in and around. The patisserie is like a sweet jewellery shop. Evening you are in business, you will have chance to spare some time and treat you with some shopping. I will be back soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Always takes an extra step for customer satisfaction
desc: Been to a few Hilton properties and this particular property was incredibly good as other properties too. Located in on of the worlds most expensive streets and really busy place.. though very calm and relaxing. The room was really comfortable and the view from the room was amazing. Took Great care about us when we were in there.. nice but dangerous pool with an awesome roof top.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Our fourth visit to Singapore
desc: We love Singapore and try to get there every couple of years. We have stayed at the Marriott Hotel, Grand Hyatt , Four Seasons, Marina Bay Sands and decided to stay in the CBD and booked at the Hilton Hotel for a period of 7 days. We stayed in a suite which was very comfortable and as a result had access to the Executive Lounge for breakfast, afternoon tea and canapes in the evening which was great and certainly would recommend. The room had stunning views and the service was exemplary. The staff in the Executive lounge were all excellent with smiles on their faces even though they were very busy most days. Location is in Orchard Road which is perfect for shopping and in close proximity of the many malls. We would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel to travelers.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A very average property but over priced
desc: I stayed for 1 night in Hilton Singapore for my transit travel from Manila to Delhi. The rooms are extremely basic both in terms of facilities & amenities and the size. On the positives, the property is close to lots of shopping malls and restaurants. Their breakfast buffet spread is great as well

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not my favourite Hilton
desc: As a Hilton Diamond member, I've stayed in many Hilton hotels. They's my go-to. Unfortunately this one is a little dated. The service is wonderful, but the rooms could use an upgrade. The lounge is lovely, and on the larger size for a hotel lounge which is great. While Orchard Road is a tourist destination in itself, I would not recommend staying here for a whole holiday. We were only here for a couple of days and while they were wonderful, we didn't really feel we were located in a holiday destination until we moved to our second hotel. If I'm here for business, I will stay in this hotel again. However I would not recommend it for a holiday.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old Friend Still a Joy!
desc: First stayed here in 1978 on my first Southeast Asia trip! Over the years over 20 stays! The penultimate stay was 1991. Makes it 27 years before this September! Some things are constant! Singapore itself, this great Hilton location, Shopping, the smiles of the staff!! 40 years of excellence!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great place
desc: As a family of 5, we had 2 adjoining rooms on the Exec level. Staff were very helpful and catered to the kids. Rooms were a good size for the area and the location is very good. Food was also to a high standard (when considering the cost).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable work stay
desc: I’ve been visiting Singapore once to twice a year now for work and I always stay here. The location is the best if you want to be within walking distance of great places to eat and hang out at after a long day of work. One thing I really like is the gym, nothing like having many different pieces of equipment to work out all the muscle groups. I will be back soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Continues to maintain standards
desc: This is my second review of the same hotel in about 3 years, which shows that I did come back. Giving it four stars once again. Not much change since the last time but I did see some small signs of tear and wear. Nonetheless, the rooms and public spaces were very clean, breakfast excellent (but could be very busy). I did have some more time to spend in their fitness center, which is very well equipped by hotel standards. I had dinner in the main steakhouse restaurant on the first floor and did not fancy it too much. Food was OK but very pricey. You really need to be desparate for a good steak to come here considering there are so many other great food options available within just a few steps from the hotel. Location is very good for shopping and within walking / running

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hotel for business travelers
desc: Stayed at this hotel during my recent visit for ITB, the location is just perfect and has ample no of dining options. The hotel perse does not have a 24*7 menu, so if Ur planning to check-in late be prepared to arrange your meal.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service and great food. Huge bridal suite as well.
desc: I held my wedding banquet with Hilton Singapore on Oct 2018. June, the sales manager is very experienced and patient in explaining to us the contract and also very accommodating with all of our requests. Wai Ling, the banquet manager is very patient in explaining the flow of the event and what we will be expecting on the actual day. she is also very kind to accomplished our desired decoration in the banquet hall as initially i have asked my groom men to do it. The IT guy of Hilton Singapore is a very friendly guy who ensure that even before the actual day, our video and audio run smoothly. The chef of Hilton Singapore who cooked for our wedding banquet, all of our guests praised that the food was very nice. During our food tasting, we have made some feedback on some of the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel and Facilities
desc: I wish to give my sincere review about our stay at the Hilton Hotel Singapore from the 22-25 November 2018. We were a group of 6 adults composing me, my two younger sisters, my parents and my youngest sister's fiancé. We were occupying rooms 813, 904 and 905 and based on my stay for the four days we were there I recommend Hilton Singapore as a comfortable luxury hotel. The rooms were very comfortable and quiet this gave us a very good night sleep after busy sightseeing in Singapore during the day. The room service was very good and always kept the rooms done and filled appropriately. The hotel lobby and restaurant was very appealing and the rooftop pool was a nice place to hangout although I wish it was an infinity pool if so it would have been much better. The hotel is

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Review of hilton
desc: pretty good. Service was excellent. Not a wide variety on the menu but it had a large variety of steaks. The family of 5 shared a 1.2kg Tomahawk steak The presentation with the flaming whiskey was an extravaganza on its own. The meat was cooked pretty well. Sides 1) truffle fries - had just the right amount of truffle and salt 2) leek infused risotto - the taste of the leek was a tad bit strong. Not to my liking

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Place to stay
desc: Hilton Singapore is located in Orchard Road, Singapore. Location is excellent and very close to major shopping complexes. The hotel has about 400 guest rooms. Their rooftop swimming pool is very attractive. They have a very good fitness center, treatment rooms, meeting rooms and business centers. Entrance of the Hotel is also very Good. Very neat and clean place, great rooms and ambiance with wonderful service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An awesome hotel
desc: The hotel made a short break an awesome one! The staff at the Executive lounge were warm, courteous and friendly. They remembered names and preferences even though the place was rather busy. The Chefs took care to support them with suggestions of dishes which met our special needs. Very flexible. The Front desk was very friendly and accommodating with suggestions for the best way to enjoy Singapore. The room was done just the way we wanted it and was very comfortable with all necessary amenities for a family. Last but not the least, the location was fantastic, at the heart of the the town. Special thanks to Chef Kazi, Chef Rajan and Gopinath from all of us!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Return Visit
desc: We checked in after 9:00 p.m. and were warmly greeted by Joshua Liu, the Duty Manager who had taken care of us on an earlier visit. Joshua escorted us to a spacious Exec Suite that would be our home for two nights. We opted for breakfast at Opus, the lobby restaurant, over the Exec Lounge. Opus offered more variety and the service was as attentive as that at the Exec Lounge. We even returned to Opus for a wonderful laksa lunch. During our one full day in Singapore, we rested up from our TPAC flight and spent the afternoon in the Exec Lounge where Sahrin, one of the Lounge attendants, gave us a brief history of Singapore. Please do look for Sahrin if you are interested in a history lesson. We also met the charming Cindy Liem, one of the hotel managers who came to chat with

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Was ok
desc: Stayed for 2 night. Nice location, nice bar on the ground floor. Slow check in and check out. Bad service beside the pool. A little overpriced for what you get. I enjoyed browsing the stores they had in the lobby

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice hotel, one small quibble
desc: Great customer service, hotel in pretty good condition. Only quibble was the musty smell in hallways and in my guest room - related to the excessive heat and humidity in Singapore which I am certain is an ongoing challenge. Outside my room, there was a drip from the AC unit, leaking through the ceiling in the hallway corridor, leaving a dark stain on the carpet outside my door. That was kind of unappealing.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Return Trip When the Hotel Staff Truly Distinguished Themselves
desc: My stay at the Singapore Hilton in August 2018 was so excellent that I decided to stay again during a November '18 return trip. Astoundingly, the ever-friendly Kalai at the hotel's very popular Opus Restaurant not only remembered me from my previous restaurant visit, he remembered what I had ordered for lunch. Wow. Obviously a seriously intelligent and totally customer-focused person! The Executive Lounge staff was superb once again. Special mention to Boo and Kenny, though every single staff member I dealt with was outstanding. A hotel's staff truly distinguishes itself in how they deal with a problem.There was a mechanical issue with my room on this stay. When I pointed it out at the front desk, manager Joshua and a colleague personally came to my room within 3 minutes to deal

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely Hotel and Excellent Location
desc: My first time to Singapore, and it was a very pleasant experience. Safe and clean city. The Hilton hotel is in an excellent location, easy to get to the subway, safe, comfortable, excellent staff. The hotel is located on Orchard Rd, right in the middle of downtown, shopping, very convenient, Starbucks just down the block, with tons of place to eat and have cocktail. I was traveling solo, and felt very safe during my stay. My check in process was very simple, the executive lounge is very nice and calming. The breakfast in the executive lounge was great. Room: Large, king size bed, excellent water pressure (you can adjust the water temp and pressure - very cool), and the room had a nespresso coffee machine (that was a real treat), with real china coffee cups (what a treat).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Outdated bathroom
desc: This does not seem like a 5 star hotel as the bathroom is very outdated. The shower is in the tub with a shower curtain. If shower curtain not placed properly, the entire bathroom gets wet. I would not expect this in a 5 star hotel. Really disappointed with the bathroom. Overall great location, easy access to transport and malls.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location but very average service
desc: Checked into 3 rooms (917,916,922) and the presidential suite during a wedding occasion on the 24/11. First impression was bad as there was no one at the door to help us unload our luggage and wedding accessories. When approached, the concierge (An Indian gentleman in vest) was not friendly. No welcome drinks whatsoever, we proceed to our rooms. Rooms are clean and the beddings are comfortable; although the fittings seems old. Love the TWG tea that they served. When we requested for 6 extra bottles of drinking water, we were told they can only send up 4. Hotel policy? I don’t know. Too tired to explain we had 3 rooms on the same level. The presidential suit is spacious and the coffee machine is particularly useful for a group of tired people. Breakfast, while taste is

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice spot!
desc: Here we stayed for a few nights. The hotel is the typical Hilton you can enter anywhere over the world. Standard is high, staff is friendly. We booked our room without preference for a shower. After checkin we entered the room and realized it had only a bath. For us older people not a safe way to shower. Back at the frontdesk the manager could not alter it that moment but promised it could be done next day. For this was my husbands birthday she offered to change the room and put our luggage in the new room. This was very nice, the new room was a renovated one and the walkin shower was very good. So thanks for the service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel with superb service
desc: Hotel is located in Orchard, which is very convenient for eateries, shopping, and transport. The staffs were professional and offers excellent service. I was here on business and the function rooms are great. The food spread in the Executive Lounge is a little bit disappointing for me as I have experienced much better in other hotels. Other than that, the hotel is excellent - Highly recommended!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good hotel, great location and price
desc: The hotel itself is fine- nothing too fancy, but nothing bad either. The service is quite outstanding here- as a HHonors member, I was given an early check-in, and late check out- both of which I wasn't entitled to, but was given. Other than that, nothing to really report- it's located right in the middle of everything, and the facilities are just what i'd expect from an Hilton hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service
desc: We stayed at the Hilton for 2 nights before a cruise. Our room was fantastic with a great view. Hotel reception didn't say whether we had been upgraded but it felt as though we had been. Like most other reviewers the hotel staff gave excellent service. The concierge was extremely helpful. The tiles around the outdoor pool were very slippery when wet, I'm sure they will do something about this. Location was central, no complaints from us.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: どこに行くにも便利がいい。It is convenient to go anywhere.
desc: 駅に近い。市内移動の拠点として便利。ショッピングモールも近い。朝食は品数が多種類ある。簡易式ウォシュレットがある。プールが広くていい。時期によって価格がかなり変動する。 Close to the station. Convenient as a base for city movement. The shopping mall is also near. Breakfast has many kinds of items. There is a simple type washlet. The pool may be large. Price varies considerably depending on the time.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Always a safe and good choice
desc: The Hilton Singapore’s friendly staff provides excellent and much-appreciated service. Indeed, I felt pampered by the attentive and well-trained staff. The rooms are excellent but the hotel is showing its age. The executive lounge can get crowded but it provides good food during the evenings. The hotel is well situated on Orchard Road.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mixed Emotions
desc: If you want to use public transportation - this is a great central location. Our room was very nice and the staff was great esp. the Executive Lounge staff of Boo, Kenny, Juliet and Amiya. However, the Christmas visitors to the Executive Lounge made for a very unpleasant experience - Hilton, in general, needs to remove loud and uncivilized (drunks and children without proper adult supervision) from their Executive Lounges. I understand that the staff tried to control the situation but security should just remove them. I really appreciated the singing from the staff on Christmas Eve - it was top notch and fun. The service at breakfast and the large pots of great tea were greatly appreciated. The pool is disappointing. As I said, mixed emotions but I'll go back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Never Failed!!!
desc: In loved with this hotel. Never failed to accommodate excellent services. Room and facility very good. Breakfast in executive lounge is amazing, food variety and services from staff amazing as well. Love the ambiance of executive lounge. Locations also reachable. Easy to find and access to MRT. Will stay and always in Hilton if visiting Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel and usual excellent Hilton Service.
desc: Always excellent service and value. Location was perfect and staff always attentive. I travel a lot and know that I can always count on my Hilton Honors program to give me what I need. I am often booked into other Hotels by my hosts, and Singapore has an amazing choice of hotels, but when I have a choice I keep on coming back to Hilton.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent location & Great attention to details
desc: My wife & I stayed stay at the Hilton Hotel Singapore for 2 different stays: post cruise stay before heading to KL & then overnite stay on Xmas day. We stayed at this Hilton 2 years ago & found the location very close to all the shopping & subway. The hotel has a rooftop pool that is a nice place to hangout after a long day. Some of the caulking of the tiles around the outdoor pool need some work though, I'm sure they will do something about this. We got up graded to the executive floor for the post cruise nite (it helps as Diamond status). The room was very comfortable and a huge balcony that overlooked Orchid Road. We did not upgraded to the executive floor for the return stay on Xmas day but the room is still good though facing the condo on the back side of the building.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Christmas at Hilton Singapore
desc: Our family stayed in Hilton Singapore Executive Room on December23 to 25 2018. Nice and clean hotel. Staff were friendly. On Dec 24 cocktails at executive lounge, food was special and good. Enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fabulous location, but dated hotel
desc: Fabulous location and wonderful staff, it’s just that the hotel is dated and really needs refurbishment. Beds extremely comfortable, but old school TV and facilities. Biggest issue was that the rooms have dividing doors to adjoining rooms with absolutely no sound deadening at all. My next door neighbour had company who agreed with him, A LOT, from about 1 - 2 am and then they got up at 4:30am to check out and leave at 5:30. Lots of crashing and banging around so very difficult to get any sleep. Other than the noises from next door and the corridor all night it’s a nice enough place to stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable stay. Helpful staff
desc: Stayed at Hilton, Singapore for 8 nights. my daughter got ill as we landed in Singapore but the hotel staff spared no efforts to prepare fresh and timely food for her for the whole stay. The executive lounge service was excellent. location is really good on orchard road and well connected to other parts of Singapore. Special thanks to the restaurant staff including Pradeep Rajan and Manickam for making special efforts for the timely baby food everyday. Breakfast spread can be improved.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 5 stars because of the staff
desc: I have never stayed in a place where I was treated so well. The staff are unbelievably friendly and nice.....I met a many staff in the elevator and they always made conversation which was nice. Unfortunately I fell really sick during my trip and the care and concern from the reception manager (I wish I had of got her name) was something I have never experienced before and the care I would only expect from being at home. I cannot speak more highly of her and staff like her make the choice to come back an easy choice. The rooftop swimming pool and bar was a fantastic. Rooms were ok.....fairly much a standard hotel room, something I would expect from a hotel room in the city. If you are not used to being in the city, I would suggest staying higher than the 8th floor as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay
desc: First time in Singapore. Check-in by the friendly and professional staff was very efficient. We were a little earlier than the standard check-in time so our room was not yet ready. A staff member escorted my wife and me to the executive lounge on the 22nd floor to relax until the room was ready. Being a member of Hilton Honors program, we were upgraded from a standard to executive room which entitled us to use the lounge . The lounge offered a mini version of the impressive breakfast buffet served up by at the lobby restaurant ,as well as wine and non alcoholic beverages all day long. The staff in the lounge was also very friendly and made sure we were comfortable. We were notified when the room was ready, which was close to the official check-in time. The room was on the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: The hotel is very nice and cozy. The staffs are all very friendly. It is located at a very strategic place for shopping and very convenient as it is near to MRT station. Overall very recommended hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel
desc: Great Hotel, this is my first time stay in this hotel and I strongly recommend it if you visit Singapore. Close to downtown shopping centers, restaurant and the food court in Ion shopping center is super.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good
desc: Stayed here for 1 night for family trip. As i stayed at Conrad before so i can't really compare apple to apple since both of the property have different style and different service. But overall, location was perfect located in the orchard area, good for shopping. Reception lady was good as well. Got a room upgrade as a gold member with the welcome letter. Buffet breakfast was good too.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A home away from home
desc: Outstanding staff, sensational location and top value for money. This could be because the building itself is a little dated. If you pay a little extra, the Exec Rooms give you access to the 22nd Floor Lounge where there is complimentary afternoon tea, continental breakfast plus early evening HAPPY hour. Room sizes are good, wi-fi is top notch and gives you 100 devices access in each room. I do not want to stay anywhere else in Singapore, honestly. 24F pool is also kidney bean shaped and user friendly, the Opus Restaurant breakfasts are also divine with fresh juices, great range of delights and a top omelette/egg dish chef. We stay here every time we visit Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent location and fantastic Hilton Honors benefits
desc: Stayed here for 6 nights in December. I paid for the stay by redeeming 200,000 Hilton Honors points. I reckon with the room upgrade and other benefits probably easily saved +US$2,500. I booked a standard room but was upgraded to an Executive King on the 21st floor. It was nice to receive an email a couple of days before we arrived stating on arrival we should ask the concierge to direct us to the Executive lounge for check-in. The room was very big, with a massive double king desk, nepresso coffee machine, fridge, desk, slippers and bath robes. My only minor issue was the bathroom was a bit dated (but clean). As a Diamond Honors member we had access to free breakfast in the Opus restaurant or the Executive lounge. We ate at the former every morning and the quality,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent
desc: First time at Hilton in Singapore and I must say very very good,as other reviews have said there isn’t a wow factor on arrival but the staff make up for that.We booked one of the refurbished rooms with a walk in shower and the room was a good size and clean with a decent bathroom. The room was serviced well each day and I could really fault very little. The stand out of this hotel has to be the executive lounge,the staff who run this are a credit to the hotel,friendly efficient and professional,nothing was any trouble and even though the weekend was extremely busy their smiles and can do attitude never faultered.This must be one of the best Hilton lounges we have ever used. Would we stay again,definitely.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Average stay
desc: Our family stayed in this hotel in Dec Christmas break. Although I requested adjoining room on higher level with additional payment couple of weeks before arrival, the rooms were not available. They downgrade our family rather upgrading. They changed my rate to higher one sone they cancel my initial booking. On my argument the manger gave me my previous rate and add breakfast for our 4 days stay. The hotel is central in location at orchard street. Breakfast every day was same no change at all. Rooms were small but clean. Staff is very courteous. I can stay here again only if good rooms will be provided

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very poor service. First answer is NO
desc: Was there 22-26 December. The location is fantastic. That is about it. The rooms are run down. Very hard to adjust water temperature settings. The extra bed was very very hard, when I called- the response was almost like- yes, the extra bed will be uncomfortable! Then I asked the front office to add a duvet which reluctantly they did. The quilt barely kept you warm...

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient location and decent quality.
desc: Good hotel, clean and good brekfast food. Not friendly staff especially the welcoming waitresses in the restaurant.I travelled for business with my daughter (9 years old) but was quite shocked at how unfriendly the staff were (besides the cleaning people).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Memorable Christmas
desc: Orchard might be a good decision for our family to experience Christmas and staying at this hotel was a good way to start the moment. The tree, the bakery shop, all add up to the Christmas ambience we needed.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location but needs updating
desc: This Hilton needs some updating and seems a little run down. There was mold in the shower and the shower water temperatures were hard to regulate. They need to put sound proof glass in the rooms facing the street, the traffic noise was very loud for a modern hotel. You cannot beat the location however since it is in the heart of Orchard Road and the staff and concierge service were very helpful and nice; I would stay again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay as always
desc: A great stay as always, staff were amazing, location great and we enjoyed the hotel amenities.Staying here as a Hilton Honours guest with executive lounge access truly made the experience seamless and enjoyable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good Business Stay
desc: I had been to Singapore for a Business trip. The location of the hotel is great, near to malls and markets. MTR station is also not too far away as well. Rooms are average with basic facilities intact. Bathrooms are ok with bath tubs attached. If you are a pure vegetarian you would struggle for food in Hilton. You have limited options in breakfast as well as lunch/dinner. There is also not much option outside as well in the nearby vicinity. You may have to travel about 2 KMs to reach Indian food destination or else to little india which is about 10 Kms away. The check in was smooth, the staff is courteous and always welcoming. However you can find better hotels in the same rate. For business needs the hotel is good.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect stay
desc: We arrived at the hotel very early in the morning after our cruise and we did not expect to be able to check-in until the afternoon. But a room was available and we were able to check-in early. The room was spacious and the service was excellent. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay at Hilton Singapore (Orchard Road) - Executive Suite
desc: We stayed in Hilton Singapore (Orchard Road) in December 2018 in an Executive Suite. Room - We were too early for our booking but were offered early check and complimentary breakfast for a nominal charge. Executive was spacious and clean. Executive Lounge - Food in executive lounge was very nice and the staff were also very nice. Overall we had a great time and happy to recommend the hotel to anybody wanting an executive suite.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location, good price and great staff
desc: The Hotel located at the central oh Singapore. You can find a conv store and mc donald just beside the hotel in case midnite starv. Over all we had a great and pleasant stay at Hilton Orchard Hotel. Keep up there

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location but in need of some maintainence
desc: Good location in orchard road. Forum the shopping mall to left has 24 hours Macdonalds and cheers and 7-11 to the right of the hotel. Needs maintainence, our doorframe was chipped and the door don’t seem to close properly. The bathroom was clean although it looks dated. No sanitary bag was provided. Toilet paper is situated in an awkward position under the sink. Our room was just next to the area probably where the cleaning stuffs were stored. We can hear banging on our walls in the day starting from morning.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location on Orchard Rd
desc: Great location if you're a shopper, or are traveling with a shopper. Definitely a bit dated, but you get 5 star service. Breakfast is especially well done, lots of options. Wifi was also relatively quick, so it's a decent business hotel also. If the price is right I'll stay here again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fab location on Orchard Rd, wonderful stay !!
desc: Had the best stay here - Paid for slight upgrade to the executive club and it was well worth it !! The service was fantastic if you want to be treated like royalty - thanks so much for your amazing service Sahrin, Claire and Julien .. you were fantastic at the executive club and your great experience showed !! We stayed here early Jan and Hilton Hotel - ticked all our boxes for great value for convenience, quality and mainly service - the Hilton brand that we all know and love. The service ... amazing - personal, friendly and traditional service at its best - just made our stay so much more enjoyable ! Great proximity to all the Orchard Road shops (especially our favourite ICON shopping centre, situated only 5-10 leisurely walk to/from hotel) and even though we were facing

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton’s Opus has the best steak and best service
desc: We visited Opus a few weeks ago. The Surf and Turf equivalent (Steak and live Lobster combo) has always been the best in town. Equally outstanding is the service , especially service staff Shafiee, Calister, and Peggy. They deserve a special mention for the attentiveness to guests and to every detail. Every visit to Opus is absolutely satisfying. Well done Opus team!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Adequate
desc: I stayed here for one night and was upgraded to a deluxe twin room. Room was smallish and furniture looks dated. The bathroom was really small with a sink , toilet and a small shower. There wasn't a bath which I would have expected in a deluxe Hilton room. The lounge was good, with a nice selection of drinks and food. Breakfast at opus was also good. Only let down by the size and facility of the bedroom.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic place
desc: I stayed here two nights ahead of a long trip, and it was a great place to start off my first trip to Southeast Asia. My room was comfortable and clean, located a place with plenty of restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance. I enjoyed the breakfast both mornings. I didn’t want the “Western” food, of which there was an excellent variety, and a waiter helpfully explained was everything was on the Asia side. I really liked trying new foods. The concierge and front desk people were polite, efficient, and seemed happy to be at work.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely hotel....good service
desc: Previously when I have stayed in Singapore i have stopped at the Conrad, this time I thought i would give the Hilton on Orchard a try....I wasn't disappointed. The room was superb, quiet and comfortable. The executive lounge was first class. The bar in the lobby had great service and drinks. All in all a pretty faultless stay. We will be back.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Ideal location excellent service.
desc: deal location walking distance to Orchard centre. Excellent service. Good sized rooms with large working space (desk etc). Executive lounge open for service all day with specific times breakfast , afternoon tea and early evening snacks.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient location and high standard
desc: Checked in two days for a business meeting. Stayed here over 15 years ago but the hotel shows no signs of aged or outdated. Room is good, clean and well provided. Had dinner and breakfast which were of good quality but be prepared to pay...

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Stay at Singapore
desc: It was okay. Room are small. Also, you can hear noises from outside. Lobby is clean and attractive. Breakfast is nice. Would recommend variety and rotation. All the days, it was the same. Location is excellent.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: ilton Singapore
desc: Service at this hotel was outstanding! The accommodations were superior as well. The Staff is helpful and very pleasant. I will definitely come back to this hotel when I am in Singapore for business. They made this trip easy and comfortable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Gem in the Heart of Singapore
desc: The hotel was amazing. We had a five day stay and we can’t thank the staff enough for how amazing they made our stay. We were on the 14th floor and our housekeeping staff was absolutely spectacular. Peggy from breakfast is such an amazing and wonderful person. I could not say enough nice things about her. Everyone from the housekeeping staff and the F&B staff were so wonderful, friendly and inviting.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Hilton of Distinction!!
desc: We had the honor of staying at the Singapore Hilton for six days in January, 2019. We came to your hotel from Boston in the USA. To say we were impressed with all aspects of the Singapore Hilton is an understatement! We cannot stop thinking about the incredible experience we had while we were guests at this hotel. The hotel is immaculate from one end to the next. All members of the staff that we came in contact with - were extremely warm, friendly, helpful, courteous and polite. We were greeted by name and with a smile throughout our stay. Our experience in the Executive Lounge was first-class. The breakfast team of servers were exceptional in all ways. The atmosphere in the lounge is welcoming, available throughout the day and spacious. The breakfast array of food is

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location - but
desc: Great location . However, being on Orchard Road very noisy. Being an old hotel no double glazing. Rooms have been upgraded and being an older hotel quite large. Big downturn was bathroom - tiny could barely get in there, no walk in shower and for those with a disabity or bad back or whatever very difficult getting into bath for shower. One major positive was rthe executive lounge - one of the best I have stayed in. Breakfast, afternoon tea and free flow alcoholic drinks from 5.30 - 7.30. The food available was excellent and one could have dinner in the evening there if you wished as plenty of food available. Considering the cost of booze in Singapore the availability of drinks make the staying on 5ge executive floor good value.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service and location
desc: It's been a long time since I stayed at a Hilton property that is so perfectly run. The staff is very attentive and helpful, amazingly so. The executive lounge in the hotel is incredible and the staff there is top notch. My room was very comfortable and housekeeping did a great job. You can't get any better than this property, I highly recommend it.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient and Comfort
desc: Stayed here last week for 4 nights. The staff is very friendly and great customer service. The rooms are very clean and beds are comfortable. the location is perfect close to all the shopping areas and also for the Bus and MRT.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wife's Birthday Celebration in Hilton Singapore
desc: Booked this room for my wife's birthday and stayed in the executive room. I am always looking forward to come back to Hilton Singapore , i agree the property may be abit old, but the overall experience with this hotel has never been better even compared to some so called more other premium hotels.So when we staycay, Hilton Singapore is always our top choice like a 2nd home in Singapore. Not regretting jumping from Le Club Accor for Hilton Honors after my wonderful stay in Hilton Singapore and BangkokSpecial Mention to Claire, Elizz, Executive Lounge Team and Housekeeping team, you guys have made this stay great. Looking forward to be back soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Location
desc: The location is good, in the center of Orchard Road, easy to go anywhere from this hotel by walking. Check in is easy with the friendly and helpful staff. All other service is average. The room is newly renovated, only the room, the bathroom is small and old. But clean and complete amenities. Breakfast is average, nothing special. Waiting taxi takes long time, more than 10 minutes.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel, Great Location!!!!
desc: From the moment I arrived I felt welcomed. I arrived earlier than the normal check in and luckily there was a room ready. I was offered to have bags brought up and by the time I got to the room they were there. Staff extremely friendly, breakfast buffet is very goods and it is a great location - walking distance of many restaurants and sites. Will definitely stay here again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing
desc: I had business meeting here and i must say that its a relaxing place to stay, had a quiet rooms fits on business meetings. Food was delicious and cozy restaurants that also good for family. My rooms has a great view. Thank you for your service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service
desc: Great hotel, fabulous staff really look after everyone very well. They are all extremely well trained and very polite, and helpful. The executive lounge is one of the best in the group, and they are very accommodating.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Dayroom
desc: We stayed only during the day whilst in between a morning flight from Langkawi and a flight leaving at midnight to Europe. We checked in at 2 pm and they stated that only can have the room until 6 pm, even though I am a Diamond member. For us this was worthless due to that we have to wait 6 hours at the airport.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service at perfect location
desc: very good location at center of Orchad st. great service at executive lounge and special thanks to Sahrin. he really make guests feel good like at home. food and drinks at lounge nice too all day around. For sure will come again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Noise/Poor Breakfast
desc: Be aware of several construction projects around the hotel. The pounding is non stop during the day. You cannot sleep or rest during the day. The Breakfast downstairs has gotten really bad. No heath codes are being used. Most everything is cold. The coffee is cold. Eggs cold not heated. What happened to this hotel?

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Consistent performer over the many years.
desc: Stayed at a suite with family for a night. This place may not be the most elegant of sorts but it’s location right along the main shopping strip at Orchard Road is one of the main reasons that people are coming back. The hardware is noticeably showing its wear and tear, but the people and service levels seem to be the outstanding factors that keep this place going from strength to strength. Special credit to Nuri who helped to check us in. Very well.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location
desc: Spent a night there with my wife. Great locationon Orchard Road. Nice room with a view of the street. The breakfast was good and the staff was friendly. A very good place to stay if you want to see Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel Experience
desc: Clean and comfortable rooms. Outstanding hotel staff. Especially the breakfast staff and executive lounge staff. The hotel's location is on Orchard Road is within walking distance to a variety of shopping malls and restaurants. Highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mixed feelings - great location, dated facilities, great manager and concierge, very sloppy housekeeping
desc: I stayed for 3 nights at the Hilton Singapore prior to a cruise and have very mixed feelings about my experience there. The managers and the concierge were excellent, but they had to be to make up for some very sloppy work by housekeeping and other odd experiences with staff. The location on the far end of Orchard Road was very convenient to restaurants and unlimited shopping and high end malls, but the hotel and its facilities are a bit dated. I arrived early evening and when I asked about available upgrades for HHonors Gold members, was told the hotel was full and the only available upgrade was to a room in a higher floor that has a Nespresso machine but on a smoking floor. The smoking floor was evident in the hallways but inside the room, it did not smell of smoke as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Had a wonderful time in our 3 nights stay at this hotel. From arrival to departure we were in good hands. The hotel is on one of best streets for shopping and dining. The front desk to bellhops to maids were all excellent. The only issue I had was the cost of their breakfast. It was too expensive.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: They Keep Ascending to a New Level of Excellence
desc: I have written previously about this hotel, at which I have stayed several times over many years, and did not think it would be necessary to write another review. But the staff at this property did such a superb job on my latest stay in February, which was for six nights, that I feel compelled to recognize them and to share with others what a gem this hotel is. Just when I think it would be impossible for the team members to do a better job than the last time, they surprise me by rising to a new level of excellence. This is a hotel that is defined by its staff members, who in my repeated experiences are uniformly superb. The hotel has a popular and busy restaurant with great buffets and menu items; a superb Executive Level with lounge; a good sized rooftop pool with a spacious

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: One of the Best Hotels I have ever stayed in
desc: Absolutely fabulous hotel. I was there for a business meeting and the events staff is top of the line and extremely attentive to every single detail and request. The food is delicious, with a solid mix of western food included in all the buffets. The rooms are large, spacious, and clean. Staff could not be friendlier, I have never encountered such kindness from staff in any hotel I've been to. 110% recommend to anyone traveling to Singapore, business or not! Great location, only 2 blocks from the nearest train station. Lots of restaurants and shops nearby, accessible to all major Singapore train stops. Great hotel. I hope to return for fun next time!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Brilliant Hotel
desc: We were a large group of 14 staying for 6 nights on the Executive floors of the hotel. Cannot praise the hotel and staff enough particularly Boo in the Executive Lounge. She is a delight and her enthusiasm should be bottled. Nothing was too much trouble and always with a brilliant smile. I should also mention Claire who made my birthday night special by finding a great restaurant for 14 people at short notice. I would highly recommend Hilton Singapore as the location is right in the heart of the shopping area with plenty of eating places within walking distance and the MRT easily accessible and very easy to make your way around on.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location, Great Service, Needs a Facelift
desc: The Hilton Singapore is situated in a great location on the iconic Orchard Road with shops, cafes and restaurants a short walk away. We experienced a great service from all staff members of the hotel. The room was spacious for a hotel room and the bed was comfortable, but the room itself and the bathroom are quite dated and in need of a facelift, the bathroom also had no fan extraction so the mirror and room would steam up after a shower for 10+ minutes after turning the shower off, however for the price the room this was fine. All in all, fine hotel to stay at in a great location with a good room in need of a facelift soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic staff and service
desc: The service provided by all staff at Hilton Singapore was outstanding, and everyone was so friendly, attentive and helpful if there were any questions. Room was immaculately made up each day, so a real credit to the housekeeping staff who also paid attention to how the blankets/pillows were and made up the bed accordingly which was a really thoughtful touch.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The staff keep it running like friendly clockwork
desc: We stayed for three nights at the Hilton using points. We were pleasantly surprised to learn that because we were gold level guests using points, we were given extra executive lounge and breakfast privileges. A small box of delicious chocolates was in our room--a fine way to begin our stay. We were allowed to check in 3 hours before official check-in time, and we occupied a nice clean and spacious room, 1402 with universal electrical plugs in the most convenient places and a floor-to ceiling, wall-to wall window with what looked like a rock garden-style ledge with some larger interesting individual large rocks in it. The bathroom had a bathtub-shower. We were staying right after Chinese New Year when many families stayed to visit relatives, and the staff took the extra

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great 8 day stay for the family
desc: Third Singapore trip, first time at Hilton Singapore to celebrate Chinese NY and my birthday. Diamond member. We received exceptional service from all staff from front desk, concierge, porters, house keeping, breakfast restaurant staff, and executive lounge staff. It was a very busy and at times chaotic and hectic (during breakfast time 8am onwards) and at the foyer with large amount of loud tourist groups. However, each staff were respectful and polite to everyone. They made our stay very memorable and most went out of their way to introduce themselves and offer assistance. The hotel is situated on the quieter side of Orchard Rd and is <5mins walking distance to ION Orchard MTR station. The room and facilities are slightly outdated and could do with a renovation. The

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: High Tea Buffet
desc: Different from most High Tea options in Singapore, Hilton Singapore has launched their new Saturday High Tea buffet (Adult SGD 48, Child SGD 24) last month! It’s still during lunch hours and not too heavy on the stomach. Think: . 1️⃣ 6metres long worth of D9 Artisanal Cakes 2️⃣ 6 live stations with local cuisine - Laksa, Satay, Parmesan Cheese Wheel Pasta, 3️⃣ Sushi, Pizza, Wagyu Beef Sliders 4️⃣ FREE FLOW TWG Tea (>10 selection) and coffee . ✏️ Insider Tips: “Pay 2, Dine 3” with two-day advance reservation for Citibank card members from now until March 31, 2019!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old and noisy
desc: The Hilton brand used to evoke a reputation of quality and prestige but this property does not live up to that standard, or any standard. The young hoodlums of the city use the Orchard Road, where the hotel is situated, to drag race their sports cars at all hours of the night. Add to that the paper-thin internal walls and you will easily find yourself being woken by late night revellers trying to access their rooms or the alarm call for other rooms waking you up in the morning! The curtains, carpets and fittings are old and stained, this really is a run-down relic. By all means try to use the new “digital key” to banish your key card but don’t be surprised at going up and down in the elevators a few times to the bemusement of fellow guests as your smartphone app is unable to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay in Singapore
desc: My wife and I visited Singapore for our wedding anniversary in February. I would personally like to thank Nuridayay Zainodin for all the assistance given with our booking and arranging the lovely flowers for my wife on arrival at the Hilton. Check in and check out were quick and efficient. From the time we checked in until we left we never encountered a problem at the Hilton. The staff always greeted you with a smile and a warm welcome any questions regarding the hotel or places to visit were always answered with the upmost sincerity. It was a pleasure to sit and relax in the downstairs bar some evenings and relax over a beer and cocktail. Breakfast in the Executive Lounge and downstairs always had a great variety of food available, although the Executive Lounge only had very

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent stay
desc: Great staff at reception and restaurant. House keeping staff very friendly. Good first impression in the lobby. Restaurant had a superior selection at breakfast and reservations were absolutely necessary in the evenings. Very nice room and views. Very pleased and would definitely stay again. Good management and staff training was clearly evident.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hotel in Orchard Road
desc: For our last few days in Singapore we decided to stay at Singapore Hilton. The pool on the rooftop had a great view and the executive lounge was pleasing. Close to one of the major shopping districts it was a good choice for our last few days here.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Sensational Service!
desc: First Class accommodation! Thanks to Peter Webster, Regional General Manager and his professional team of customer service ambassadors. Special mention to Peixuan, Clare and the team who work in the Executive Lounge. Look no further for a special experience! Hotel is close to Orchard MRT, so easy to navigate around a beautiful city. Be sure to take in Sentosa Island and visit Fort Siloso, free entry, learn about the history of Singapore, I learnt so much.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Typical Hilton experience on Orchard Road, Good for Shopping
desc: We booked an Executive Suite twice, these are located at the end of the corridors on each floor. Conveniently located on Orchard Road and close enough to walk to the ION mall if one chooses to. As most Hilton Hotels, this caters to the typical business traveller with express check-in and check out. Room service was above average delivered within 30-40 minutes. Staff are generally friendly and I'd certainly stay here again. Do note the hotel building is rather old, so there will be some run down sections such as toilets etc. It's a shame but Hilton really needs to do a complete renovation, especially of the Exec suites.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Short but good stay
desc: We stayed at the JW Marriott before and chose the Hilton for 1 night after returning from Kuala Lumpur. We were able to store one bag for 6 days at the concierge which was very helpful and a great service of the hotel. Thanks to Mr. Abdat. I also booked a late check out as our flight was departing at midnight. Arriving at the hotel we were escorted to the executive lounge for check in. My stored bag was taken care of, too. The executive room was a typical Hilton room. Modern design, comfy bed and good amenities. What was missing was a USB port at the bedside. Bathroom was quite small. What bothered me was the smell of mustiness in the room and and the whole 20th floor. I think it is because of the age of the building, the carpets and the general humidity. We really liked the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Service!
desc: My wife and I were highly impressed by the service and friendly approach provided by all of the staff in the executive wing and elsewhere in the hotel We will definitely be staying again, a great experience!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very central
desc: Very central hotel to shopping and Metro. Clean as you would expect from a Hilton Hotel. Only problem is getting a taxi in the morning, staff did not seem interested and we had to ask several times for them to ring us one as we needed to get to airport and were short of time due to wait. Breakfast was as expected, plenty of choices but could have done with extra person serving eggs and omelette so

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel in a Great Location
desc: The Hilton Singapore is an excellent hotel in a great location. The rooms were comfortable, clean and quiet. We opted to include the buffet breakfast with our package; this was a good decision. The buffet offered a very large array of choices including standard Western breakfast dishes, Chinese cuisine and other Asian cuisine. The buffet room is large and comfortable. The hotel staff was great; the concierge was very helpful suggesting restaurants, providing information on currency exchange and how to navigate the excellent Singapore subway system. The location on Orchard Road is very convenient to many restaurants, shopping malls and the rapid transit system. Although we did not require it, the hotel could provide a voltage converter to allow use of our 110 voltage electronics.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient Location, Excellent Service but Out of Date Room
desc: How you feel about HIlton Singapore will depend on your individual needs. For me, the location of Hilton Singapore is a big plus, as it is closed to Orchard Road. The MRT station, Ion Orchard and various major shopping malls are within walking distance. There are literally hundred of shops and food outlets for you to choose from. The subway station will take you over the city. In terms of service, every one from the receptionist to restaurant staff, and to the concierge were nothing by helpful and polite. They were clearly aiming to provide top notch service. Maybe they realize the shortcoming of the hotel, which was the underwhelming room. The room is nothing but outdated. The room size is okay but the decor is so old school. For a hotel in this caliber, I expect

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Classic property with good Diamond recognition
desc: I picked to do my first daycation at Hilton Singapore after already wasting 2 weeks into my Diamond challenge. Gah! Location - In a corner of the busy Orchard Road and a 8-min walk from Orchard MRT, the hotel is a old steward which has kind of withstood the time til now, thanks to it's strategic location on the infamous shopping belt. But I've also always thought its quite an aged property, altho recently refurbished. Good for shopaholics. Price - My day room was on a Saturday cost $161.84 ($137.50++) and valid from 9am - 6pm. which I didn't think was too unreasonable given that it includes lounge access for the day with afternoon tea and evening cocktails starting at 5:30pm which means I can still enjoy the cocktails and bites before checking out. Check In - The lady at the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I had my wedding at Hilton and it was the best choice I have made in my life. The catering sales manager Alvin Kee has done a great job to help make our wedding a success. The staff in Hilton was great in overall and we enjoy our hotel stay too!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 3-day Singapore City visit
desc: This was a very comfortable hotel after a long plane ride. The concierge service was very helpful; the front desk was equally helpful. The room was clean and spacious, but this hotel has not been remodeled in years. I had problems with the electricity and the room service was quick to fix the problem, The location is very convenient to Ion Shopping Mall and Orchard Road is full of shopping and Starbucks. The rooftop pool is convenient. The roof top bar was fun and the view from the top highlighted many of the tall buildings nearby. Enjoy a Singapore Sling in the roof top bar, but bring your wallet. Prices are high!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional Staff - Home Away From Home Experience
desc: Centrally located in the heart of Singapore and minutes away for just about anything. Staff is second to none with the warm welcoming smiles, eager to help attitude and quick to respond caring. If there are any special request, staging of materials and/or help with just about anything, then this is the place with unbeatable concierge service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent events team
desc: We hosted a complex conference + dinner for nearly 200pax with rapid turnaround between. The conferences/catering team looked after us very professionally despite plenty of last minute adjustments, and the event went off very well. The dinner was of very good quality. A crucial shipment of materials had become stuck at Customs, potentially a major issue for our event. However Anthony, Grace and the team went above and beyond, handling this stressful situation with good humour and resolving a problem that was not of their making. Other venues would probably have left me to fix it. I was able to relax knowing that they were on our side.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stay in the heart of the City
desc: We stayed at the Hilton in March. The stay was for 4 nights and we loved everything about our stay Hotel is located perfectly in the heart of the city, walking distance to all major shopping destinations and the MRT Staff was very friendly and accomadative to us. We were with our 2 year old and they were very helpful in all requests we made The weekday breakfast buffet is a bit crowded as there are a lot of business meetings happening at the venue. So if you are travelling on leisure, that's something to note We would definitely return to Hilton soon If you are a Hilton Honours member, you can arrange a lot the your room reference, pre arrival

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It’ far away from Hilton standards
desc: The location is very good and I guess that’s the only reason why I’m coming back the last couple times. The rooms are small and old and the rooms are not cleaned properly. The breakfast is for European standards very poor and slow sometimes I waited 10 min before I could place my order for my eggs.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore on orchard road is an awesome hotel!
desc: Hospitality was wonderful and is located in midst of the town where you could find all top brands showroom on orchard road. You got 7/11 stores just next to hotel. McDonald’s and coffee shop is also located Within 2 minutes walk. The rooms were luxurious. We stayed on the interconnected rooms.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly staff and nice location
desc: Enjoyed three wonderful nights on Hilton Singapore in a executive room. Nice to have breakfast and "dinner" in the lounge. A bit crowded in the evening and the food and drinks were closed of a bit early. Very friendly staff which allowed a early checkin and they also gave us a nice surprise to enjoy on our wedding day! Nice location on Orchard rd, close to restaurants and shopping!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic brunch option
desc: Lots and lots to choose from! 3 different types of oysters! Lots of seafood. Delicious cheese options. Yummy salads and tasty desserts! The roast option was a little lacklustre but the foie Gras was tasty!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay again
desc: This is very centrally located hotel, I lucky enough to be a diamond member of this hotel chain. I was given access to executive lounge which was great, and the staff were great and friendly. This is a very short walk to the malls and MRT station, and there are plenty of restaurants near by.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay
desc: Excellent hotel with beautiful amenities and great service. Excellent executive lounge that we enjoyed very much. Right in Singapore’s “Rodeo Drive” shopping area. Excellent workout area and very nice rooftop pool.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel
desc: This hotel is in the Orchard section and has lots of restaurants and upscale shopping nearby. Rooms are nice, beds are comfy, food is great and staff is excellent. Has. Gym and outside pool. Steam room and a couple of restaurants.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Guaranteed Peace Of Mind
desc: Hilton on Orchard Road is excellent for location. Excellent for service, cleanliness and quietness unlike other hotels I've stayed in the Orchard Road area. Staff are helpful. It's a hotel I always come back to.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great room - huge balcony on executive (21st) floor
desc: One night post cruise was a joy- executive floor is fantastic and has a huge balcony. One floor up to the fitness center and one more to the beautiful pool. Next time we will dine at the gorgeous restaurant here overlooking the city. Loved the buffet breakfast and give kudos to Razak who made our morning a delight. All staff were overly helpful and top notch professionals in hospitality. Thank you Hilton!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not to Hilton's usual standard
desc: Position great - perfect for subway connections. We tend to walk most places though and that was easy even though quite a long way from the main sites. Hotel is tired and requires updating. Furniture in lobby badly scratched and very sparse! Pool and decks need renewing - cracked tiles/dirty. Room ok but again not up to usual standard for the hotel chain. We complained and were told we could pay more to stay in an updated room! Really?

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: There on a business trip for a Sales Kick Off meeting. So conference was in the hotel. Great facilities, room and staff. Rooftop pool, bar and restaurant particularly good. Located on Orchard Road, this is a great place to explore Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Staff, Great Facility and Great Location
desc: From the moment Kamal the bellman opened our taxi door to the time three days later when we departed, the staff at the Hilton Singapore were so warm, friendly and accommodating we felt like we were part of a Hilton family. The staff quickly learned our names, what our preferences were and went above and beyond to handle any special needs. Three of our four bags were stuck in Hong Kong and were delivered later in the day. Kamal took care of the delivery and brought them to our room as soon as they arrived at the hotel. Joel Mathias, an up-and-coming management trainee, quickly checked our jet-lagged selves into our upgraded room. Joel went out of his way during our stay to find us and be sure we were happy (which we were) and all our needs were met. My wife was diagnosed last

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice well located hotel
desc: Lovely hotel, I enjoyed the breakfasts specially. The location is great and the rooms are a great size. The staff is very nice too and enjoyed my stay greatly. I did manage to get a massage and it was very nice too, with great working hours for people that has to be in the office all day

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: D9 cakery medicroe food fare
desc: Had lunch buffet at D9. Variety was Mostly Asian delights like curry noodle, chicken rice, stir fried dishes. Western/fusion cuisines include smoked salmon, mussels, Prawns, pasta, salads etc. Food execution wise was medicroe, was expecting much more from a 5star hotel on the belt of orchard road. Overall missable buffet, not worthwhile the money and calories to dine at.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Back again!
desc: Popped in last November for two nights and back again now for a few more nights. I have been coming here since the early 2000's and I still like the place. Its convenient for nice shopping, good food and sightseeing. Just a few miles down the road (very easy walk) is the Bay where you can see that funky hotel with the massive swimming pool on the top. The rooms at the Hilton are always super clean and tidy. The lounge on the 22nd floor serves the usual b/fast, afternoon tea and canapes/cocktails in the evening. my only bug bear is the need to use your room key in the elevator- bit difficult when you are holding things and before you know it, the lift is going in the opposite direction before your card is recognized! Regardless of the lift issues, I will be back....again and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location and People
desc: The staff were all very attentive and the hotel is in a great location. All of the amenities are also fantastic. Check in and check out were very quick and the staff was very helpful when needing a taxi.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An Excellent Respite
desc: Needed a layover before the next flight home. We were treated royally whole at the Hilton. Staff were courteous, responsive and supportive.? True customer focused experience. Room was spacious, well appointed and extremely comfortable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellence as Always!
desc: The staff at the Orchard Hilton is the reason you’ll keep coming back. From the front desk to the Concierge, the staff will go out of your way to assist you in anything you need. The hotel? Always clean rooms, comfy mattresses and wonderful linens. They have excellent food and drink at all of the restaurants! No better place to stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Sunday Brunch Again!
desc: Enjoyed our Sunday Brunch again tremendously! I started off with Lobsters and Oysters, beautiful salad, foie gras, king crab ravioli, wagyu don with truffle, raclatte cheese and fruits was all I could handle. Salivating at the truffle pizza and roast beef, curry crab and black pepper crayfish, I wish I had another stomach. Thank you Janice for accommodating our reservations and Peggy was perfect and made us feel so welcomed and comfortable! Cheers!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice and clean hotel
desc: Nice view with centralised location. Locate along the shopping belt of Orchard road. Easily accessible to any part of Singapore via public transport. MRT is within 5-10min walk. And of course, you have to pay a premium for such good hotel .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Location, staff, pool, food 🥘👍
desc: Back again for another short stay, and why not. Everything is top notch, with attention to detail. We had a power cut in our room, called up house keeping and had an engineer sort the issue out within minutes. We even received a small box of chocolates for our inconvenience. Many thanks to all the staff, from the Front Desk to Executive Lounge, not forgetting the Concierge.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Hotel I Have Ever Stayed In
desc: My husband and I are spending a week at the Hilton Singapore.....here from 03/16/2019 to 03/23/2019. The location is fantastic....right in the midst of the Orchard Road shopping district. We are also close to great restaurants. I was even close enough to the famous Singapore Botanic Gardens to be able to walk there one morning. Our hotel room is spacious and comfortable. We are on the 20th floor, and the views from the room are gorgeous. The bed is very comfortable.The staff are very friendly and helpful. The front deck and concierge were great, and helped us plan our week. We have access to the executive lounge, and they not only offer a fantastic breakfast, but also give us a great afternoon tea and after-work drinks. Can’t say enough good things about the Hilton

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Location and Service
desc: Great response from hotel staff to our inquiries prior to arrival and continued excellent service throughout our five-day stay. Boo in the Executive Lounge checked us in and ensured all our needs were met during our stay. Location on Orchard Road was great for shopping and access to the Metro (two blocks away). The Executive Lounge provided great options for breakfast and evening snacks, plus beverages throughout the day. Each of the hotel staff members we met were very helpful and provided excellent service to ensure our stay was "the best."

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not worthy quality of the food
desc: Not very good quality of the food in the lobby bar and room service. Os the quality that you can expect un every restaurant at the street but not in a Hilton Hotel. The breakfast could also be more enjoyable and with healthy alternatives.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent and comfort stay
desc: This Hilton is in the prime location in Singapore. The ground floor in a small shopping mall. The staff were very nice, polite and caring. The rooms were clean and as per shown in pictures. It is easily accessible via public transport and there are plenty of expensive and less expensive options of dinning including breakfast. Our room overlooked the Orchard Road and we loved our stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It's alright - but good location
desc: Dated hotel but they do try to maintain it - although there are plenty of hotels in SG for the same price but better? I think it depends on what style you like. - good breakfast - better gym than average hotels - great location nothing really bad / nothing stood out

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Quality service and good location
desc: A good choice when staying in Singapore. Rooms are spacious and beds comfortable. Desk a good size for working. My bathroom had a walk in shower and no tub which I prefer. Easy to walk to restaurants and shopping. Hotel will arrange cabs including pick up and drop off from airport. The executive lounge had staff that were very helpful. Diamond members can have breakfast there or in the hotel restaurant. Evening happy hour was okay. They closed down the drinks and food at 7:30 which seemed early especially for business travelers.. the fitness center is well equipped and generally not crowded.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent stay
desc: We found this hotel to be excellent value. The service was great, the room comfortable, well equipped and maintained. The location is busy and frequented by mostly tourists. Lots of restaurants nearby but we chose to eat in the hotel, where we enjoyed a lovely meal. We were very happy with our stay at this hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Top service, top quality
desc: All the trappings of a top quality hotel. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hilton Singapore. We stayed in the Executive Suite which was enormous and of the highest quality. The Executive Club was worth the bit extra for the afternoon tea and breakfast. Great location too. But the real stand out was the service. We want to call out Claire Chan for really looking after us and Elizz Looi for arranging a lovely treat for my wife’s birthday. You made a positive difference to our stay and you are a credit to the Hilton brand. Thank you so much for you professional service. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants great service and top quality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Great location on Orchard Road. It is in close proximity to the Orchard MRT stop and the Orchard and Scotts Road intersection where there are the various shopping malls/complexes, The room was a little smaller than I thought it would be but the hotel has been around for a while and I thought it was more than adequate. The room had Nespresso machine for making coffee and a cordless hot pot for boiling water. The fridge was not completely stocked and I made sure upon checkout that I was not charged for missing items. The bathroom contained both a walk in shower and separate bathtub. The service provided by the staff was up to par from what I expected at a Hilton. The staff was very friendly and helpful The Exec Lounge. had very enjoyable food and drinks and offered a very nice

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic Staff! Great Stay!
desc: We arrived in the evening after our final 17 hour flight and were greeted and checked in by Nuri, who was friendly, helpful, and efficient! So efficient that she even noticed that my travel companion's birthday was during our stay and surprised us with birthday cheesecake delivered to our room on the actual day! Nuri also checked us out at departure and every employee we met in between was also outstanding! Situah, the concierge, went out of his way to be helpful with anything we needed. Claire, who kept the Executive Lounge (which I heartily recommend) running like clockwork, always welcomed us with a smile and offers to help with any needs or questions. Sahrin took care of us with her welcoming smile in the Lounge on a daily basis, with the help of Saw and Vino. Our

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Terrific Experience Every Time
desc: I have stayed at this hotel numerous times, and have enjoyed a terrific experience each and every time. This review is late, for which I apologize. It's been a really hectic year. Instead of focusing on the hotel itself, or its great location, which many others reviewers have already admirably done, I would like to focus on what truly distinguishes this hotel: the team members. I spent five nights during this stay. Here are the names of some of the team members I dealt with, each of whom struck me as being truly exceptional: Natalie at the Front Desk (a highly efficient and super-gracious check in); Boo, the Executive Lounge Manager (truly outstanding; she truly cares about the guests); Rubiah and Raza at Opus Restaurant (whom I've gotten to know over the years; they are

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Still good
desc: I hadn't stayed for many years and used the Conrad mainly. The building hasn't changed, although some upgrade work obviously has been done.
