The rooms on the Exec Floor level are a bit too small still(that can only be changed by major reconstruction), but the combination of location and the service provided still does the job for the Hilton. The Hotel should consider a further change of the Exec Lounge. It has been expanded and the food and drinks on offer expanded a bit, but it is still way too small. That leads to an almost permanent overcrowding in particular for evening drinks and then it is way too loud and not always enjoyable, as some guests can't resist moving business meeting and/or calls to the Lounge. All of this would be less disturbing with more space. The

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The people make the place great!!!
desc: We arrived on a Friday evening totally exhausted from 22 hours of flying and were welcomed by Pavlina at the reception!! What a great feeling!!! Next morning, we were greeted and treated royally in the breakfast room by exceptional staff from wait staff to the chefs. What beautiful people! Still tired but felt really good.Razak tops the list with the other exceptional people, Jeff,Dorothy,Peggy,Vivien & some I don't have the names of but so great with providing top class hospitality. Concierge staff,Isman & Dass we have known since the early 70's. Must recognize the staff in the 22nd floor lounge, Vino,Elizz,Zeke,Sahrin,Vino & others. Thanks for your unique niceness.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional Experience
desc: We found the facilities, room, and especially the friendly and service-oriented staff to be exceptional. Location was great and one of the best Hilton hotels that we have stayed. Executive Lounge was outstanding, beverage and food selection excellent and the motivation, friendly, service-oriented staff outstanding.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very convenient
desc: I quite enjoyed my stay at the Hilton. It was quite easy to walk to a lot of the shopping centres and restaurants. Can’t remember what room I got but it was a standard one. Quite cozy. View wasn’t that great at all. The swimming pool and gym were really good. I quite enjoyed the gym and went there for the duration of my stay. It is also opened 24 hours and whenever I went I was either alone or 1-2 max people working out. So it was very convenient for me. Staff were very friendly at both times I spoke to them upon check in and check out. I guess the only thing I was disappointed by was the day before I was leaving although they tidied my room they didn’t refill the amenities which meant I was left without cream shower gel and some other stuff. Could have been a mistake or

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A bit dated and obsolete to qualify as a 5 stars hotel
desc: Overall, the structure (lobby, rooms, conference area, roof-top) looks a bit dated and obsolete to qualify as a 5 stars hotel. The staff is kind and efficient. Poor insonorization of the rooms (there were night road works and I had to require earplugs). Food (breakfast and lunch) ok

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: Stayed here for 3 days prior to a cruise. Everything went smoothly, hotel staff were friendly, helpful & courteous. Rooms were clean & comfortable without any issues. Enjoyed our stay there very much.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Another Great Hilton
desc: We recently spent two nights at the Hilton Singapore in an executive room. We arrived late but as with all Singaporean efficiency we were quickly checked in and in our room in no time. The rooms are adequate with everything you need and with the always amazingly comfortable bed. We used the main restaurant for breakfast, which had a very extensive selection catering to all. The executive lounge for evening canapes and cocktails was also very good, but this lounge was probably one of the busiest I have ever seen, but the staff ensured drinks, and food were always amply replenished with a smile. The executive lounge staff are all fantastic. The hotel is attached to a shopping mall, and is in a great spot on Orchard Rd, with shopping, bars and restaurants galore, it also has an

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Singapore visit
desc: My preferred hotel in Singapore. The executive lounge is among the best of Hilton's I visit across the globe. Team takes very good care of me and is very attentive. Restaurant is very good and the rooftop pool and bar is very nice.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice staff good location dated rooms
desc: Hotel is great but rooms are dated the staff are what make this hotel great friendly and helpful the executive lounge team are great one bonus is the rooms on exec floor have a balcony which is rare for singapore. The food spread for breakfast in lobby is good but not as good as Conrad. If you want to compromise on room for location on orchard road and actually an as good lounge experience as Conrad if not better this is a good choice.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Stay at Hilton Singapore
desc: Stayed at Hilton Singapore from April 11 through April 16, 2019. Staff in Executive Lounge was very helpful, and, overall, a very enjoyable stay. Location is excellent, close to Orchard MRT and close to shopping

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hilton!
desc: Very impressive to me and my daughters with its convenience and comfortable facilities.Both room service and receptionists are kind and enthusiastic. The traffic for both bus and MRT are very easy to every tourist attraction. My daughters ask me to promise that we will be back again next time. We all hope the next trip would be arranged soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location
desc: This is our second time staying at Hilton Hotel in Singapore. Rooms are decently sized. Very clean with great service from housekeeping and front office staff. Great breakfast at the Executive lounge and also the evening dinner service too. The location is fantastic. Many different malls and food choices. It’s close to an MRT station which is great. We will definitely be staying there again. I highly recommend this hotel to visitors.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent stay
desc: Excellent service personnel was very professional and personable. They even help me celebrate my birthday at breakfast with a cupcake. That maid my day be away from home for 3 weeks . Will never forget that great service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Standard hilton
desc: Very good hotel. Bedding of top quality. Rooms are ok. Staff is really nice. Location right on the orchard road. Breakfast excellent. I have had only one minor complaint. Sound insulation is mot very good. I was 8th floor and the traffic was noisy. Probably nothing can be done, however...

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location, warm staff but the hotel is outdated.
desc: The location is great, within talking distance to many malls and also MRT stops. The staff is also very efficient and warm. However, the property is pretty old, it’s definitelt about time to do some renovation, especially the bathroom.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location
desc: Very nice hotel but looking tired and needs a freshening up-certainly on floor 15. Staff were very busy as it was Easter but Concierge and door staff were absolutely fantastic and nothing was too much for them to do. I know it is a busy hotel but a little warmth or touch would have been nice especially as just had a great 6 days at the Hilton Bosphorous in Istanbul.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel with good service
desc: Located in one end of Orchard Road. Nice hotel with good service, a short walk to a subway station. The swimming pool area needs an update, but works and is still nice to use on the rooftop of the hotel. We had an executive room with access to the lounge, with great food services breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails (with tapas like food, almost a light dinner). One comment though on the executive lounge is that rules are that kids shall quiet, which we were told as our son (3years) was a bit restless on our day of arrival from Denmark, at a time where we was the only ones in the lounge. A few days later we experienced very loud and drunken adults which seems to be fine for the staff! We also tried the breakfast in the normal restaurant which was nice as well with a large

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Spent my anniversary here. Good stay
desc: I enjoyed my stay here. The staff were quite kind. I was very upset initially because despite being a Diamond card holder, I was told I won’t get my points or be granted access to the Lounge because I booked through a 3rd party. After much back and forth between myself and the manager we were given access to the lounge because it was our anniversary the next day. They gave us chocolates and wine and a nice card. We really didn’t stay in the hotel much. Spent a lot of time exploring Singapore but the few times spent there was enjoyable and comfortable. Spent 2 nights in total and would give it a 4 of 5 just because of the inconvenience of having to forgo our points and practically beg for lounge access. Other than that, it was okay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore
desc: A good quality hotel, centrally located on Orchard Rd. Nice size room with comfortable bed. Appreciated the free water and the coffee machine. Bathroom fine. A good working shower is always one of my key requirements, which was met. Nice selection of toiletries. Friendly and helpful staff. A 7 11 store conveniently located next door.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Underwhelming
desc: Even an old hotel can be fresh if the people have a service attitude. Unfortunately, the Hilton Singapore is tired and old. Service is lacklustre and lacks focus. Overall not worthy of the star rating.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Centrally located classic hotel
desc: Comfortable bed and room with a classic feel, especially that this is one of the older hotels along Orchard Road. Has never lost its charm though, since my last stay back in May 2000. Generous buffet breakfast offering. I just need to mention the location as it is literally close to the most interesting places in the Orchard Road area.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Another great stay at the Hilton Singapore
desc: I was back for work in Singapore and got a great rate on the Hilton which allowed me to stay there. Being a Diamond member you usually get get treated better though Boo and her team in the Lounge made me feel so welcome it was great to get there in the evening after a long day at work. The food and drinks in the Lounge are great and the staff very attentive. I got a room on the Executive floor which has a balcony which is one on the things I really long for when i stay at a hotel so I can sit out there in the evening and take in all the sounds of the night. they know I like ice in the evening so without fail a bucket was there every evening when I got back to the room. As I was there on the weekend I spent a little time at the pool which is small and intimate though being on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful stay
desc: This was our first trip to Singapore and we stayed a total of nine nights. Hotel location was great for access to shopping and to public transportation. Our room on floor 21 was nice and housekeeping did an excellent job keeping our room neat and clean; they even provided a very nice nightly turndown service. We were also provided with robes, slippers, daily bottled water and chocolates on the first night. Although we were on the executive floor, I know from staying at other properties, that these amenities are not always provided. I think where this hotel made the biggest impression on us was with service. From the front desk staff to the concierge and bellmen, everyone was friendly and helpful. The executive lounge was nice for our daily breakfast and for the cocktail

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice Hotel
desc: I have stayed in Hilton Singapore from 21-26 May 2019 alongwith my family consisting of my wife and a 5 year old kid. The hotel is a business hotel with lot of foreign tourist who come for business in Singapore. The hotel is situated on the most happening street of Singapore i.e Orchard Road. It is in close proximity to the Orchard MRT stop which is about 5 mins from the hotel and also very close to various shopping malls/complexes from the very basic essentials to the high end shopping. I had stayed in the premium room on the 19th floor which was spacious and the room had Nespresso machine for making coffee. Only surprising issue was the hotel restaurant shut by 10.30 pm. Further, the food ordered to the room was charged few SD as delivery charge which is over and above the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: Great location on Orchard Road near to many restaurants and shopping malls. It isn't too far from the Singapore Botanical Gardens. You can walk there in about 15 minutes. Rooms were comfortable, clean and quiet. We opted to include the buffet breakfast with our package. Excellent services, staffs are very friendly.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: So disappointed for the “Hilton Birthday”
desc: I was so surprised that today, on Hilton’s 100th birthday, the Hilton Singapore did nothing but put up some balloons! All over the world Hilton Hotels found ways to include their guests in a celebration but not here in Singapore. Such a missed opportunity!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: Great hotel in a great location. Air conditioning stopped working. The staff was extremely friendly and the food choices were abundant and delicious. Great location within numerous shopping malls and places to eat.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Executive Experience
desc: Executive Floor great experience. Room is large enough for a family with kids. Little balcony to enjoy the views of Singapore city. Nice clean pool area on the 24th floor near restaurant. Great service, and great checkout time flexibility for Hilton Honours members. Check-in and out very efficient. Leisurely breakfast is relaxing and calm. Great pleasant friendly staff - a must try or staycation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location
desc: We checked in after mid-night. The staff at the reception was very efficient. He made sure that we get a room closer to elevator as this is what I put in my member profile as preference. The room we get is spacious. Nothing fancy. Bed is soft. Bath room has a tub, you take shower in the tub - which is not my favourite. As it is on Orchard road, it is very central, many shopping mall and eateries around.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Place to Stay
desc: This location is one of the best. Everything is near by, just walking distance to great mall and shopping. Food is near by and great Singapore chicken fried rice. Very tasty. Bars are nearby. Great place for single people too

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: I fall in love with the bathroom
desc: My recent stay with a few hotels doesn’t deliver great experience with the bathroom. Here at Hilton Singapore I found no flaws in the bathroom especially about the water. The shower delivers good form of water with no leakage in anyway. All taps deliver good flow of water. The bath tub can be filled quickly. It can drain water quickly as well. The shower curtain can hold the water without letting even one drop of water flows out of the bath tub. The water temperature control is amazing. You can add just the water temperature up to 50°C (or may be higher). This provides you the Japanese onsen experience in the hotel. I think the water control sign on the taps are clear enough for the guest to not confused on adjusting the water temperature but the hotel pay even more attention on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore training venue
desc: I applaud all the staff of this hotel for sincerely helping out their guests especially those assigned in Opus. I feel their heartfelt concern in catering to my needs. They would individually ask their guests how they prefer a specific kind of dish. Keep the good work going.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Long term stay
desc: One of my best stays in an hotel. Given this was a long term stay, I was impressed with the services and hospitality of the entire staff. From the room cleaning services to the front desk staff every engagement was positive and helpful where my questions and any assistance I needed was immediately taken care of. Keep of the good work!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Outstanding service and facility, lives up to its 5star reputation
desc: Stayed here for several nights and it was excellent. So glad to have chosen this hotel. Service: excellent. From check in to Opus staff, everyone was helpful and efficient. Response to requests were always prompt. Check in and check out was quick, didn’t have to wait in queue for too long. Opus Grill staff are excellent, very professional and non-intrusive. Simple things like asking before whisking my plates away at this buffet breakfast, were much appreciated. The slight flaw was in housekeeping. The bath tub drain wasn’t cleaned well, but it was attended to promptly when requested. And they forgot to refill the tea and coffee one day. Room: excellent- spacious, clean, comfortable and new. Appreciated the good view of Orchard road from window. Good lighting. Plenty of

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Attended a wedding and booked a night stay
desc: A pleasant first time stay in Hilton hotel group. The room was spacious and clean. The mini bar was not working well, and the staff immediately replaced another one for us. Location is perfect at the beginning of orchard shopping belt. Walking distance to ion orchard, tangs, lido shaw centre etc. You can get a nice photo at the roof swimming pool. Breakfast buffet was average, i’d probably give it a miss if I were to stay here again. Overall, it was still a good experience.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location but old and tired hotel
desc: This is a great location being in Orchard Rd but rooms are tired. Found the check in attendant pleasant but found the pick a prize moment somewhat "tacky". We received an upgrade to a premier king room which was right next to the housekeeping access which made it noisy for us. Room was small and trying to use the hairdryer in the coffee tea making area was a nightmare. No mirror in main room. Would we stay again - perhaps after an upgrade

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent staff
desc: Clean room. Check in was so fast.. the booking was under my fiance name. He message the hotel that im coming and will be staying with him. I arrived late. Check in was so fast they just ask my passport copy handed me my card key after. Check out time is very flexible. Just let them know which time u want to check out. Staff are really excellent and accomodating. The best customer service i ever had with hilton. Give them extra raised.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Tremendous service, excellent restaurant, good location
desc: I stayed at this Hilton for seven nights during my first visit to Singapore. The staff was flawless in every way, making every part of my trip easier than it otherwise might have been. (Including a 3am visit to the emergency room, which they coordinated quickly and easily.) The restaurant is very good (if a bit expensive), and the location a half-block from the Orchard MRT was hard to beat. The rooms are, as others have pointed out, in need of a refresh, but all things considered, this is a great place to stay, and a reasonably good deal.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Unwelcoming Service
desc: Check in staff do not smile with long waiting during check in. Felt very unwelcoming. Definitely not making things right when feedback was given. Nice lobby though hotel room is slightly dated especially the air conditioning unit which blows quite loudly. However, there are signs of room refresh like the TV and table.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 2nd visit even better
desc: A repeat visit arriving Friday evening a looking forward to a relaxing weekend on a long visit to the region. I had difficulty walking due to a back problem and the quick thinking staff quickly suggested a number of things to help including giving me the a room closest to the lifts (no significant noise during the night so all good) and one with a walk-in shower as opposed to a bath.This may well have been an upgrade. I’m not sure. Great location for Orchard Rd shops and at the quieter end of Orchard Rd. I highly recommend working by the pool if like me you are not organised enough to get everything done during the working week.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Summer vacation in Singapore
desc: I brought my family to Singapore for the first time and they thouroughly enjoyed their stay at the Hilton Singapore. Our rooms were really nice and the location of the hotel along Orchard Road was close to restaurants and shopping malls. Orchard Road is a very walkable street. I would highly recommend the Hilton Singapore to anywone taking their vacation in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Central located hotel but needs an upgrade
desc: We booked into this hotel as we wanted a hotel which was central to the places we wanted to visit. However I do feel its a bit tired and dated and in need of a facelift. On arrival in our room we discovered we had an adjoining door and it was unlocked which surprised us. We locked the door which made a noise and heard our neighbour yell at us. This was then followed up by a call from the main desk as the neighbour next door complained, we explained that the adjoining door was left unlocked and we had to lock it. The suite itself was clean and spacious. We used the breakfast facilities upstairs (called the executive lounge I think) which was standard and we did notice children handling pastries with their fingers and not the tongs provided so we didn't eat these. There are

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: “ GREAT SERVICE “
desc: It was our fourth visit to the hotel. First to begin with the the wonderful service given to us by the hotel. Especially The great service given by Eugenie(at the reservations) & zaki (at the concierge). Euginie was the first reason for us come to the hotel. After that the service given to us by Zaki & his team made us so homely. Zaki gave us a great service during all our four stays. He was so friendly and helpful. He is a great concierge. And Euginie was also so helpful and great. But there is a main concern on food. The breakfast should be improved a lot. Mainly the spread doesn’t change much daily. The Executive lounge was wonderful. Had a great experience. And the staff was great. The location of the hotel is great. Since it is in the Orchard

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location but becoming really dated.
desc: My visit to the Hilton Singapore gave me a lot of mixed feelings. As much as I would like to love this hotel, the bottom line of the stay, which is the room itself, sort of failed me due to its age. The staff and service was probably the best part about this property. Checking in and out was fast and efficient. In-room service was quick. The room I stayed in however, felt extremely dated. The sense of space is there of-course. The room is much larger than what I have become quite used to with today’s modern hotels. However, I find particular problem with the styling, the television and the desk and chair, all of which were dated and did not feel comfortable after a few hours of usage. The bathroom was also in need of renovation. Would I come back? This is a good question. I

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Easily accessible, friendly service staff especially those in the breakfast!
desc: Being away from my home country, Hilton Singapore made me feel warm and cozy. I especially appreciate the smiles of the staff at the Breakfast area; their service is on point. My room was, well, standard, everything I expected to rest in after a day's full work is there.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Hilton by far!
desc: Our visit to Singapore after the Royal Caribbean cruise. We had an extra day and stayed for the beauty and sites in Singapore. The hotel provided a great place to stay and excellent references of things to do!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel with excellent location
desc: My family was visiting me in Singapore from the States. They booked several rooms at the Hilton on Orchard. They consistently reported that the Hilton staff (especially the housekeeping, Jason @Opus Bar, concierge, and reception desk) were very helpful and friendly. I deeply appreciate the efforts made by each hotel staff in making my family feel welcomed and enjoy Singapore. Thank you.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Well located on orchard road
desc: Quite an americanised hotel. In fact if you are from the land of the great - then you will probably like it. And I guess you will be happy that McDonald’s and Gard Rick cafe are nearby. But for those who want experience the real Singapore, there are some great local restaurants around. Hotel was great except for one fact. We were sold a tour to the night safari. It was far too rushed and it would have been the same price if we had just got our own taxi there rather than join a big bus tour.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing hotel
desc: Beautifully appointed hotel in the centre. Easy to get to from the airport. Staff were so helpful and accommodating, even when I arrived at 10am for a 3pm check in. Couldn’t have done more to help. Rooms were perfect too. Another classic Hilton

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worst ever hilton
desc: From check in to entering the hotel room, I was doubtful that I was really inside a Hilton hotel. The lobby is very dated. Same goes to the room. Only partial refurbishment had been done for the room and with very lousy quality material. No separate switches for the lights and lamp. There’s only one master switch. Either u turn all on or off. I believe this hotel is way too complacent and thinks that with its superb orchard location they can get away with refurbishment. To make thing worse, the house keeping will only tidy up ur room when u leave the ‘tidy up” sign on the door. Until this moment of writing the review I still don’t believe this Hilton Singapore is really a Hilton hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: just an average hotel
desc: We had booked Hilton basically because as a hotel brand it's a name in itself.. we were to reach the hotel at 8am so I had called up the hotel to request for an early check in. My husband is Hilton Honour s member but to our surprise they said we would have to pay for an extra night to check in early.. Fair enough..the only thing they gave us was a free bed for our child who is 3 yrs old. we checked in at 8:30am and the bed had torn bedsheets..I immediately told them to change the bedsheet, at first they were not convinced but after showing them they changed it. Next we ordered for room service..to which again we were told we had to pay $6 extra as delivery charge.. I didnt quite get that.. I have stayed in hilton hotels in many places all over the place but never have they

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Location is Best part about this hotel.
desc: Decent at best and in need of renovation. I stayed at the Executive suite and the room was okay...not of the usual Hilton standard. Checkin was smooth but I was surprised that the second additional bed which was supposed to be in place before my checkin was not there. By means was mine an early checkin and it was approximately 5pm when i reached the hotel. Overall the staff are friendly and helpful but the aura of the hotel and the rooms can be better.Considering the kind of money they charge things can be a little bit better. Breakfast spread is also decent...okay but not excellent. I am sure the management can try a little bit more to get the overall levels up. I a nutshell I wasn't disappointed but things weren't good enough to really please us as well.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stay at Singapore Hilton-Orchard Road
desc: Excellent stay and services provided by the hotel. Hotel staff and Guest Services provided quality support. Location of the hotel near the Orchard MRT was a bonus. Meal services during breakfast was excellent with wide range menu available.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A review that is Long Long overdue
desc: Coming to Hilton Orchard is like coming to our 2nd home. We are so familiar with the place, people and surroundings. If I recall, our most recent stay (14 to 16 Jun) was probably our 10th stay here over the last couple of years, so this review is way way overdue and much deserving. We like to make mention of 2 of your employees managing the Club Lounge, specifically Ms Boo Pei Xuan, Mr Kenny Lee. They have always taken good care of our needs and made us feel at home every single time we stayed at Hilton Orchard. Little gestures and pleasant conversations go a long way, and both of them has impressed us, our parents, our children, and our friends. Thank you Hilton, Pei Xuan, and Kenny, for your wonderful hospitality, not once, not twice, but every single time we stayed with

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent hotel for teamwork
desc: I have experienced really good service during period of almost three weeks. Breakfast is a good start of the day, after a good night’s sleep. Laundry service is smooth. It is an excellent hotel to stay at for work and teamwork in Singapore. Recommend the executive rooms at each floor’s end, as team hubs!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic Staff
desc: Stay here a few times. Always have a wonderful impression. This review will only add a few things on this stay. Check-in is as fast as it can get, rooms upgrade a bit, even lovely reception extend complimentary extra bed for this stay as we were with kids. Lounge Staff rated on the best in the world, BF as nice as always. Check out flawlessly with a very helpful bell desk team. Will stay here again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Team
desc: It's been a year since the last stay but almost whole club lounge team still in tact. Including the new team members, all are still passionate and eager to serve with passion and smiles. The club lounge Manager: Pei Xuan together with staff: Claire, Hannah, Sahrin, Zeke, Mohd Ali, Kenny Lee, Vino and Saw provided great service being friendly, accommodating and helpful. Certainly an asset to the organisation. Not forgetting housekeeper Sandy Liu. Centrally located in the city, it is easily accessible to public transport, many and varied F & B outlets, shopping malls, etc which there is everything for all ages. I am sure I will be back.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very nice hotel
desc: I would have given this hotel a 5 star rating if it wasn’t for the check in personnel stating they could not provide Hilton honor points since this was booked through Expedia ( I am a diamond club member). Other Hilton’s, it did not make a difference...only here Anyway, the play is very nice and affordable for Singapore.. the rooms are clean and the staff is customer focused. There is quite a selection of food at the breakfast buffet. The only suggestion (beside the comment at the front desk) is to replace the furniture in the Lounge since it is tired and worn

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Needs updating
desc: You can certainly feel the age of this hotel. It's in a good location if you like shopping and not far from the Botanic Gardens. I went for a massage and it's not really a "spa" its more like a few treatment rooms.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing service, helpful staff
desc: I'm a Hilton Honours gold member - and before i checked in i contacted staff to see if possible room upgrade could be given, and they were able to confirm that it was possible even before i arrived at the hotel. Got upgraded from premium room to executive level room. So that was a nice start. When i arrived i had a 2 year old child with me, and the staff offered a soft toy to the kid. That was an unexpected but kind gesture. Throughout the stay - the staff were always helpful - i texted them on the app, made calls to ask quesitons - and they were always patient and couldn't do enough for you. Staff at the executive lounge were also helpful - given that i have a child, they brought me a baby chair and were very friendly to the kid. Bed was comfortable. The only thing was

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel
desc: This hotel was ok. It was a nice property conveniently located off of Orchard. The rooms were a bit small, dated, and the amenities were lacking. It compared to a Hilton back in the USA and not the Hilton standard I’ve come to expect all over Asia. I’m diamond so I had access to the executive lounge. It was nice and spacious and I never had a problem finding a seat. Breakfast downstairs was quite extensive and one of the hosts (Juan, I think) was particularly attentive. It was greatly appreciated.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Shopping district hotel
desc: This was our 3rd stop in our 3 weeks holiday. The location of the hotel is in the center where you can find many shopping malls. The hotel had a reservation at the pool so we didn’t use it (although they gave alternative option) very nice executive lounge (on our last day they moved it as well due to renovations) Very good concierge team very helpful. We had dinner once in the meat restaurant which I find delicious

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The place to be in the heart of the city with very top services and 5 stars luxury hotel
desc: The hotel has an excellent geographic situation in the very heart of the city (Orchard Road, shopping centers and few miles to every place by taxi or metro) No noise around the room, luxury entrance & lobby and private shoppes inside The rooftop pool is big enough and great ambiance near a fancy restaurant 24h opening sport center is provided at the same floor The cosy breakfast offers large choices of fresh continental, japanese, chinese and Indian food The whole staff gave a top level service and efficiency : from the housekeepers kindness and attentions to the concierge wise advices and patience and even the taxi hellers and luggages help : all was really great Excellent place to be in Singapore center for executives and families

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service,
desc: Good location, excellent service, clean rooms, very good breakfast, very helpfull staf, did recieve a room upgrade, lounge access was great, very good snacks and drinks, room are somewhat old and need refurbishment

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The warm staff of Hilton Singapore
desc: I was quite impressed by the warmth, professionalism and kindness of the Hotel staff led by Natalie Ng the Duty Manager who ensure that our 21 rooms and check-in process was seamless. She was supported by an excellent Concierge Team which included Situah, Zaki, and others. I can't forget the very lovable Cindy in Housekeeping and Jennifer who handled our Thai and Singapore Meeting Rooms. In all, our team of 27 had a pleasant Retreat as a result of the level of professionalism the hotel extended to us. The share knowledge of the Concierge Team was incredible. 👍🏽

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service but hotel needs refurbishment
desc: This is the oldest Hilton I've been to and you can notice it as soon as you enter the hotel. There's peeling on the lift consoles and the you get a vibe that it's really been here for quite a time. The room also has an old type of TV and doesn't feature any smart connections. Service though was great. Breakfast service always is impeccable and the staff showed great concern for my kids, going to great lengths to ensure they enjoyed their meals.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent staff and hotel
desc: This hotel is amazing! Every employee we encountered was so helpful and accommodating. Rooms are nice and they have good air conditioning. The executive lounge has great food and Sahrin and Kenny were impeccable hosts for us. The location is in shopping Mecca and close walk to the MTA. The only thing I would change is the pool closes at 8pm but no big deal as everything else is wonderful!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing - Better options available along Orchard Road
desc: Overall rating is average due to post stay customer service interactions. Length of stay 5 nights Location - Excellent Food and Beverage Customer Service - Excellent Daily housekeeping - Average - Toiletries were not replenished daily Attention to detail to email in pre-arrival - Average (Can't distinguish Mr and Miss/Ms) Room furnishing - Needs major overhaul - Especially if its an executive room. Dirty patch on wall, worn out carpet, dated facilities such as no smart TV. Air Con leaked on the third night, exhaust fan in bathroom close to non existent - probably as it was clogged full of dust. Bedding - could do with a refresh - pillow was smelling of someone else's sweat on first night The pre arrival, online customer service and housekeeping teams let the rest of the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent stay with fantastic service
desc: I stayed here for 2 nights ( 21st to 23rd July). I got a personalised pre arrival email which was greatly appreciated. I booked transport from Changi airport via the Concierge and it worked like a dream, being met on arrival and then having bottles of water in the car ( great after a long flight) . I was welcomed by name by the concierge as soon as I walked in and escorted to the 22nd floor executive lounge to check in as a Diamond member. I was offered a drink ( choose a coke light) and despite it being 930pm after the evening snack service I was given 2 pieces of marble cake and 2 small dishes of mango pudding which filled the spot. The lounge staff were excellent and welcomed me back by name each time i used the lounge. All the food and drinks ( breakfast,.afternoon tea and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore
desc: The Hilton is situated in the heart of the city, easy walking to all the shopping centres, our room was on the 17th floor facing Orchard Rd, great view, breakfast was amazing, the staff very friendly, the pool needs upgrade, the gym is huge, we had very pleasant stay, looking forward to our next visit.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Ok'ish hotel with good service and staff
desc: This is my 2nd/3rd time staying at this hotel, with about 4-5 years apart from each stay and usually this is just for a night or two. This stay was a stay of 2 weeks. This hotel is what I would see as one of the grand dame in the hotel scene in Singapore as it was one of the first few luxury hotels in this city island. Location The hotel is located north of the famous shopping area of Orchard Road. Location is ideal especially if you are there for shopping as there are tons of shopping mall along this road. There is a MRT stop (Orchard) about 10 mins walk from the hotel - you will have to go through the malls to reach the station. From the airport by car, it will take about 20-25 mins in average traffic, and close to 40-45 mins during peak hours. Check In Before my

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient location, helpful and friendly staff
desc: I can't really compare this to any other hotels in Singapore since this is the only one I stayed at (I also stayed in a suite versus a room), but I can confidently say that: 1) The location is convenient since it is quite close to the MRT entrance (5-10 minute walk) 2) The amenitites (including the Executive Lounge) were very good. I had a full fridge and freezer in my room (which was great for prepping water bottles for traveling around town), a TV in the living room so as to not disturb folks in the bedroom, and the Executive Lounge was a great place to get my day started. 3) The service from all of the hotel staff was great, from the front desk to housekeeping and the Lounge staff. When we had an issue with a missing passport upon arrival, they definitely went above and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excited for our fifth consecutive stay at Hilton
desc: I’m a Hilton HH Gold member and love the brand. We always book Hilton wherever we go for vacation around the world. This time is our fifth anniversary and we are seeing our family as well after 7 long years. All coming together from different countries. I’m glad I choose Hilton because like always, their front desk and customer service has been very helpful from booking our room and managing our requests. Only disappointment is that I just check the Hotel website and the rooftop pool is not available due to work in progress. This was one of our most exciting part in this trip. I bet they will arrange something as mentioned on the website but just kinda disappointed that we were not told during the booking. Apart from that, we will have one of the best vacation ever. Arriving on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worst hotel I have ever stayed in Singapore
desc: I stayed here for 3 nights (July 27-30, 2019). I booked the rooms back in Nov 2018 on with the hotel and I request for 2 beds as I have 2 adults and 1 children staying in each room. When check-in the staff told me I can only have king size bed and the hotel in fully booked I cannot change the room nor add an extra bed in the room. It's ridiculous! It's truly hard to believe! The room is very old, there's not enough toiletry in the bathroom. Those they provide can only enough for 1 single use for 1 person. There's no tissue paper in the bedroom and they don't even provide any comb, shaver in the room. If it's a 3-star hotel I totally accept this but I am paying for a 5-star hotel fee! The only good is the janitors were very nice and they filled the toiletry very quickly and the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Renovated Classic
desc: The room was fairly standard, but the view was amazing. The breakfast but at the Executive Lounge and the main location was delicious. I only had “dinner” at the Executive Lounge and it was delicious and with a constant rotation of food though out the time. The Opus Bar staff were very friendly and accommodating. The Executive Lounge staff was also very helpful and friendly. I had somehow had thought it was a day earlier than it was and the staff helped me double check that I was wrong and I had another night at the hotel. They also told me about the light show at the Marina Bay. Some slight issues I had was the construction going on at the hotel, but thankfully most of the noise happened when I was not in the room. The construction had closed the hotel pool, but that had made

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Typical business visit made easy and comfortable
desc: Located easily with a couple of shopping arcades in the vicinity. MRT although at a little distance from the hotel. Friendly and helpful staff and amenities wise sits decently on the score card. Their bakery takes the cake though ;)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Inconveniences due to renovation
desc: This is a property that I come back to every once a while for a staycation but this was the most challenging stay I had. The hotel was still well-maintained but the property and rooms were definitely showing signs of aging wear and tear. Because of that, the place was undergoing quite a bit of renovation which was why we heard so much loud drilling and hammering in the afternoon from our rooms - renovations in the executive lounge was ongoing then. The more incredible part was that because the swimming pool was undergoing renovations as well, if we wanted to swim, we had to make arrangements with the concierge to take us to use the pool of a partner hotel (Orchard Hotel was cited) - very inconvenient arrangement. I appreciated the chocolates and wines in recognition of my

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Stay
desc: Hotel location is great, rooms are clean and hotel breakfast is great including executive team lounge staff very helpful. The chief concierge is excellent-Situah made sure every question was answered and any info. given to us was so helpful. He was excellent and helped our stay go so much better. This is a great place to stay-our family loved it.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Check in staff were friendly
desc: Check in was smooth and easy. The staff was nice to offer cold bottled water when we said it's too hot. The room was nice and clean. But getting house keeping service from phone was terrible. The phone was not picked up after many tries. Had to go down personally to the front desk. The breakfast buffet was just average. Seems like many of the hotels had lowered their food serving standards.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Dissapointing and Poor Value for Money
desc: We stayed in this hotel on business as a group of 3. The rooms that were offered as a corporate negotiated rate were dated and needed refurbishment. My colleague had to change room 3 times due to wallpaper falling off and poor smell in the room. We were told that there were newer rooms, but these were outside of our deal. This approach left us with feeling as a second class "valued guests". All three of us had different HHonours treat although had same status and length of stay, some offered coffee machines in room and treats, some had to ask for it and felt as it was a huge favour. Ridiculously overpriced food in Opus grill was poor quality (£100 steak felt rather boiled than grilled with bits sticking out) and the staff did not even bother to ask for quality of the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Decent hotel in Singapore
desc: Hilton Hotel is located in very nice location as it is around Orchard Road area where there are many shops and restaurants around. The staff are nice and helpful, however, I feel that the property is quite aging and looks old and it definitely need a facelift, otherwise, I feel the rate being charged is quite high for the quality I got

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Decent hotel
desc: Nice hotel on one of the ends of Orchard Road. Good to have Jamie's Italian right next to it! A number of renovations were going on in August 2019 so that was a damper. Standard room size but room service was way too slow and once did not even bother to provide.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Clean hotel with great service
desc: I spent a week at this hotel while traveling to Singapore for business. While I was warned that this is one of the older hotels in the city, I thought it was excellent. It is walking distance to the Botanic Garden. The rooms were spacious and looked recently renovated, except for maybe the bathroom which was an odd dark brown marble. The room was fresh and clean and the air conditioner kept the humidity out. The breakfast buffet was excellent, with a huge variety and friendly staff. Buffet opens at 6:30 and closes at 10:30 and the last hour gets quite busy so you may have to wait for a table. Room service was good, expensive but that’s to be expected. On my last day the hotel extended my checkout until 4, which was great as I had an evening flight. Would definitely stay here

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice Pleasant Stay
desc: Great service from the counter staff. Feels very welcoming even if it's just 1 night stay. There's a lucky draw for Hilton members and we got a free cheesecake which tastes out of the blue. Room 1217 was quiet and peaceful. The AC was cold and relaxing. The gym was big & 24/7 and seldom people utilized it. The swimming pool was under renovation during our stay so no comments on it. The location was just beside the Forum and opposite Delfi. Can find some food and snacks there. But if you want to find more food, you will have to walk a bit to the right to ION & Wisma or cross the road to Far East Plaza. The best thing is the quietness of the room despite the location in a busy orchard area. The least thing i guessed was it doesn't has a pen of it's own just a pencil in the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Third time back!
desc: I have visited Singapore three times over the last twenty years and have stayed at the Hilton on Orchard Road each time. The location is great and this time the stay was just as good as you would come to expect from Hilton. This stay was for four nights in two rooms both interconnected. Joshua checked us in on arrival and told us that the rooms we booked were on the 18th floor and were checked in very efficiently and smoothly. The rooms were nicely appointed and in Singapore as a tourist you don’t tend to stay in your room for much of the day. The air conditioning was super and there lots of good TV channels. Complimentary bottled drinking water is provided each day. The WiFi was effective and free if you are a member of their Honors program. Slippers, bathrobes and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Terrible
desc: Except the location. I don't see anything else from this hotel worth this price. Tons of better choices around the same area. The hotel ia understand renovation, pool closed and so as some restaurants but no one told me when I made reservation and they still charging the same price. Hotel is old and wall is thin, i can hear next room talking in early morning. I traveled alone for business but given me a twin beds bedroom until I called them to make a change, not to mentiond the phone in room didn't work and kept hanging up on me. Not the Hilton experience I had from other Hilton group hotels. Very disappointed

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worst hotel of my life
desc: Very rude staff. Manager, reception person. All are very rude dont know how to talk to there guests. Rooms are dirty even bed sheets are not change regularly. Bathroom towel are not change on regular basis. My first and last visit. Very terrible. Never recommend to any one specially with family.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel, excellent location and offered us a great and relaxing stay
desc: Both wife and I celebrating major birthday and anniversary milestones in 2019 and being Hilton HHonors members advised Hilton of same. Arrived pre advertised check-in time, no problem and at check-in advised of complimentary upgrade of room and Executive Lounge. Up to room and immediately the Hilton “Home” feel, similar to our previous stays (May 2019) in Hilton Sydney and Doubletree Hilton, Cairns with champagne on ice, towel art and rose petal decoration. Over the course of the next six days everywhere we went we were greeted with a smile by Hilton staff. Special thanks to Lounge and Driveway staff, who were always on hand, extremely helpful and forthcoming with answers to questions posed. At the end of our stay we requested a late, late check-out and again provided with a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: She’s a bit old, needs an upgrade, but provides exceptional service!
desc: My reservation was made for Executive level 22. Services for this standard of accommodation includes Executive Check-in. Following initial booking and a few days prior to arriving, I was asked to provide details of my time of arrival, which was approximately 1.00 a.m. It is not too much to say I was extremely disappointed when I had to stand around in the lobby for several minutes waiting to be checked in! And then when that was completed there was no one waiting to assist with my luggage! I ask: ”Why bother asking me when I was arriving?” Not a good start to my stay! The décor throughout most of the hotel is indicative of its age and the need for renovations. During my stay renovations were underway on levels 22 and 23 – the normal executive lounge and the hotel pool. This

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed here for one night and it was very good. The staff were helpful and made sure I ok and helped when asked for help. Great breakfast good choose. Would highly recommend this place. Clean and tidy rooms

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Rather dated but still comfortable
desc: Stayed with Hilton Singapore for 3 nights. Upon arrival, however, no assistance on my baggage, no bell-boys were seen. Had to lunge my 2 luggage on my own up the stairs (minor inconvenience, could improve perhaps). However, the front desk manager was warm and friendly, kudos to her. It's a bit of a disappointment though that somehow they would not upgrade me to a suite despite me being a Hilton Diamond member and there were suites available - the reason being some of their suites were undergoing a renovation. Requested for payment to confirm suite upgrade instead! How disappointing. Given premium room - despite it being refurbished I found some areas of the room still quite dated. Cabinet doors were squeaky, could not close fully. Room air-con wasn't at its best capability

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An aged hotel but still fine
desc: This was our second stay at the Hilton Singapore. As Diamond members we see quite a few properties in the Hilton stable and as far as this one goes, it is a reasonably solid offering, albeit that it is an aged property (built 1969, opened 1970) and although renovated (in part), the reality is that the age does show in parts. Think peeling wallpaper, knocked wood surrounds and just an absence of many things you just see in newer hotels like USB ports etc. My upgraded room was nice and somewhat renovated but you could still tell you were in a very old bathroom that had been subject to some makeover. Whilst there is life in the old girl yet the Hilton Singapore is not top of my list for first class offerings although it is still very pleasant. All in all the Hilton Singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: The Hilton undoubtedly has a great location locked down on Orchard Rd. Although the property dates back to the early 1970s, it's been updated nicely over the years. The rooms are comfortable. I'd call it modern and with clean lines rather than luxurious. The bathroom is small but functional. The bed is comfortable and the room WIFI is nice and strong. There are some bizarre things about the room: there's coffee but no coffee cups, there's no tea. But otherwise, it's a nice room. Breakfast is not included in the basic rate which I find incredibly irritating. Lower end hotels include breakfasts. Granted, this is a fancier breakfast but still. They could have coffee and danishes and fruit... The pool is currently out of commission but should be open by September 12, 2019. Staff

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice Hotel on Orchard Road
desc: We stayed here last year and we had high expectations. It was even better this year. Nice hotel in the heart of Singapore. Exellent breakfast, nice rooms and exellent lounge. A very special thanks to Claire, Boo, Nguyenuang Luan and Ethan Lauren Lim in the lounge. They make my stay. Slightly negative that the poolarea was under reparation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good convenient hotel
desc: Great hotel in a good location Breakfast service and quality could be a lot better Otherwise staff and standards were great as was the club lounge. Rooms were a good size and clean Would recommend this hotel

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A comfortable stay
desc: The hotel had a great location, friendly staff, comfortable setting and most importantly, great food. I surely will opt to stay here on my next trip and will also take the opportunity to try the executive lounge. Will be back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Wonderful stay at the Hilton Singapore. Friendly staff, very comfortable rooms and a great position on Orchard Road. Very good breakfast in the hotel dining room. We always break our trip to Europe from Australia in Singapore and after eight trips the Hilton is like a second home.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Slightly dated-looking on the outside, pleasant on the inside
desc: We stayed for two nights, and, despite the first impressions of the exterior of the hotel, we had a very pleasant stay. In particular, the staff were unfailingingly friendly and helpful. The recently refurbished pool on the roof is a very pleasant outdoor space (it perhaps helped that we had it to ourselves all morning!). We also enjoyed the spa treatments offered. Breakfast was excellent (better than the Marriott South Beach, at which we also stayed), with plenty of choice and regularly topped up. Location-wise, it's a short walk to the nearest MRT station in the rather cavernous ION mall nearby, and the rest of Orchard road is full of high and low end shopping, if that's your thing. There's no shortage of restaurants in the malls surrounding the hotel. The botanical gardens

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good centralised location, but...
desc: Stayed at this hotel for rugby tour and was had a generally satisfied stay, except accidentally "activating" large clusters of dust from top of TV cabinet by swinging a towel over my head. Try to suggest improvements online and that's why the nightmare starts (genuinely felt less than unimportant through engagements with Customers Service team).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good hotel at good location
desc: Stay frequently at this hotel because of location which is central and easy accessible. Hotel staff very helpful but breakfast a bit expensive and occasionally room is not cleaned properly. Thye have a good 24 hr Gym for workouts.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Anachronim
desc: Forget the digital key great idea, delivery useless and almost never-works in the elevator which means you’ve got to get your plastic one out anyway what’s the use Found some elevator is better than others but generally speaking don’t leave your room without that bit of plastic

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice Location
desc: Stayed there not too long ago with my partner, Can't complain as the service was great and the location was convenient. The staff was attentive and the breakfast has a good fee selections to pick from.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pleasant, comfortable and treated well and with courtesy by all staff members we had to deal with. A good experience.
desc: Room and amenities were all good and comfortable. Enjoyed a good night's sleep with no noise and interruption. We had a room on a high floor which we always prefer and were given one for our stay. Reception and Concierge staff were also very helpful and accommodating.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Heart of Singapore
desc: This is easily one of the best hotels in Singapore, if you care about location, value for money and service quality. Orchard Road is the beating heart of Singapore, bustling with shopping malls, restaurants and more. The Hilton Singapore is positioned perfectly to access all of these venues. Their room rates are so reasonable that we've invariably stayed in their premium rooms, which comes with access to the executive lounge and privileges. Staff are helpful beyond the call of duty -- 2am requests for medicine and blankets will be happily met! I strongly recommend this excellent hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Expensive but at the heart of the orchard
desc: The location was perfect for those who wants shopping. The hotel room and service was excellent. Though the pool was not available. The food for breakfast in the lobby was mediocare as there were not much of an options.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore
desc: I’ve given Hilton Singapore on Orchard five tries on my business trips and my views still remain the same. I wouldn’t recommend this hotel to anyone who’s traveling for pleasure or business unless the Conrad is booked.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice stay
desc: Nice hotel in a great location in Orchard road, about 5 min. walk to the MRT. The hotel is quiet, well mainted, has a nice Restaurant for breakfast or lunch (haven't tried the dinner), there is a great executive lounge with an impeccable team service. the only drawback is the rooftop pool, which in very small compared to the other hotels in the area. overall, very satisfied with my stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 3 day stay
desc: Location is good on Orchard rd and the room is a decent size. Multiple malls within walking distance with decent food courts/restaurants. However, the TV doesn't have HD and is maybe 720 but probably less. TV looks like it's from circa 2007 maybe. Bathroom looks dated as well but no complaints with the function.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service and a great team
desc: I've just stayed here 4 nights for a conference and have to rate this as the best Hilton I've stayed in. Highlights are the breakfast which is exceptional, the excellent service from all of the team who really look after their guests and the beautiful pool. Very fond of Jason behind the bar and all watches over by the hotel manager Walid.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Home away from Home
desc: Great location, consistent Hilton quality with a very personable and familiar staff. Staff recognizes me even after one year or more since last visit. Near everything - short walk to Botanical Gardens and hotel is on Orchard Road which is great for shopping and everything else!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Average service, OK Hotel
desc: Perfect location on Orchard Road. Rooms are teetering on the edge of tired. Great breakfast buffet with a wide range of choices. Open lobby makes it good for informal meetings. Only let down was the concierge. On one occasion I asked for fine dining options. He didnt even recommend his own hotel! (Which is where I ended up) He recommended the four seasons hotel and that was it. On the second occasion, I asked about the department stores, his advice was just to go outside, there was plenty of them. If you dont need a concierge service, then this hotel is fine for business.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good hotel and friendly staff
desc: Had an amazing time with the family. The location was great we walked everywhere to shop. Food was great and the staff was extremely friendly. They were very very helpful in assisting us with all our inquiries. Will be back

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Well positioned, great service
desc: My wife and I recently stayed at the Hilton during a 3 day conference. The hotel is well located on Orchard Road and is an easy stroll to many shops, restaurants and services. Catching cabs or Grabs is easy. The hotel breakfast is a real treat! Lots of choice in both Asian and Western varieties. The service is exceptional. The cafe offers amazing cakes and coffee. Well worth a try! The rooms in the hotel, while clean are a little tired. Particularly dislike having to shower while stepping into a bath. I believe the baths should be removed in place of showers. Sliding around a bath tub is not fun. However, we enjoyed our stay very much!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Location and Great Service
desc: Great hotel in a convenient location in Singapore main shopping district, conveniently located near a train station. Hotel is modern and well-maintained, great breakfast with good selection, executive lounge with a wonderful team.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location with a nice roof top pool
desc: I have organised conferences at this hotel for a number of years and it all works well. I l love the location of the hotel, easy access to public transport, shops, restaurants and the botanical gardens. Event space is good and the catering food is always delicious and plentiful. Really enjoy having a morning swim in the roof top pool.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Service
desc: The Hilton Singapore was excellent, one of the best hotels I've stayed, and I thoroughly have a delight during our stay. Because from the moment you arrive until the moment you leave, you will experience an outstanding service. I must say they run the hotel excellently, customer service first. The hotel is exemplary because the design is exquisite with a modern touch. The rooms were also great; it is cleaned perfectly every day, the wifi was always functioning well, and the breakfast was spectacular. I have no complaints, only praise this beautiful hotel and even more lovely staff because they are very kind, polite, and well mannered. Furthermore, the hotel is located along Orchard road center of Singapore's premier shopping district. It is an advantage because it made

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Location For Getting Around
desc: My wife and I stayed here for seven nights during a recent conference. The hotel is located along the famous Orchard Road in Singapore with both premium and budget shopping along the street adjacent to the hotel. There were no issues with neither check in nor check out which went very smoothly. Breakfast was good with many options including the special taste of Singapore dishes. While it seemed always busy at breakfast there was never a problem for seating since the tables were cleared and cleaned very quickly. We stayed on the 11th floor where Indra our room service attendant was very efficient always enquiring if there was anything else she could do to make our stay better. She was very friendly and helpful. Travel from this hotel was a breeze with the attendants providing

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel
desc: The hotel is great, the room is large and the bed really comfortable. It is in a street great for shopping, but have to take the underground train (the station is near by) to go to main tourist attractions.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect stay 👍🏻
desc: Perfect location , nearby amenities, easily accessible and friendly staff. We enjoyed our 8 days Long stay . They do need to work on their flushing system noise as it use to wake my husband or me up if any one of us was using the toilet 😂😂 Apart from that noisy flush , everything else was perfect and we will be back for sure

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice hotel on Orchard Road
desc: It’s about a 25-minute drive to the airport, but the hotel is in the heart of the city. Good for shopping and visits to the Hawker stands. The Hilton is in a busy shopping area, on the North end of Orchard Road. It’s an easy walk to shopping and to the subway. Plenty of restaurants and bars within easy walking distance. The older building is well-maintained and has an excellent staff that is very helpful. Our room on the 20th floor was large and quiet. During our three-night stay, we didn’t hear any noise from the hallways or from outside the hotel. The AC worked as expected and was not noisy. The in-room safe is a little too small for a 15-inch laptop. The bathroom needs a nightlight. We had a coffee maker, but no ice bucket. There is a small mini-bar in the room.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Right and comfy place next to orchard road.
desc: For whom who wants to spend the whole time near the orchard area, Hilton is the suit and right place to stay. apart from the iconic building, it is a walking distance to Orchard MRT station and the IonOrchard shopping centre.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Banquet
desc: We just had our wedding banquet in Hilton Singapore Grand Ballroom. The experience is excellent. I would like to specially Thank June, Senior Sales Manager whom have help us a lot in accommodating to our last min changes of the date due to personal issue. She has also gone the extra mile to arrange a hospitality room for my father who was not well. The team effort and excellent service have made our wedding a successful event, and giving us a peace of mind for our big day. In addition, the food is excellent and the portion is generous. We highly recommend Hilton for your stay and event.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Noisy flushing
desc: Make sure the bathroom is in order. Either flooding or terrible noise after flushing the loo. Apart from that, I still liking Hilton Orchard. The service is great, location superb and excellent fitness room.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location
desc: Had a great time in Singapore with my family. The hotel was situated at a great location. You can walk to most major malls in Orchard from the hotel. Staff was extremely helpful and friendly. First time here and it won't be the last.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice staff of Hilton
desc: The staffs were very nice and helpful: from reception to dining and housekeeping. However, we had bad experience from the noisy occupants of the next room. The room however is not to our expectations. The bed is hard. The room space is just okay. The food selection at breakfast is also okay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Delightful stay in Singapore!
desc: First time at this hotel and after staying at a different hotel the previous week I was happy to switch. An excellent hotel, full service and made the weekend work i had to do much more comfortable. Great location, rooms spacious and the bed ultra comfortable, crisp white linen and great bathroom products. Worked by the pool which was good but a little tortuous also - would rather have been in it! All up this was an excellent stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not worth it
desc: Expensive for old rooms and unfit bathrooms (shallow tubs, loe sink counters) Problem with parking attendant who made us pay for a reservation fee for taxi which we did not order. Sent complaint but no response. Do i guess yiu are valued as much as the grade of rooms you pay for.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: I’ve stayed at a few hotels in Singapore over the years (read my reviews) but I’ve settled on Hilton because it is, in my opinion, the best place to stay at. Perfect location- it’s on Orchard Road. I like just casually coming down and strolling up on Orchard. The hotel staff is excellent and always helpful. Rooms are ok - a bit old now but still good. Food options are great - especially the breakfast which has a great selection of international food. I’m back here next month! Highly recommend for Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: nice job
desc: staff were friendly, accommodating, and competent room was attractive, thouhg we had a balcony that we didn;t find too inviting bathroom clean and well-ventilated, toiletries the stand Crabree that I find overscented f&b were better than acceptable though not quite top rate.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect stay.
desc: Singapore is a fascinating place with enough to see and do to cover around 4-5 full days. This hotel is situated right in the middle of Orchard Road, the main shopping and restaurant area. The hotel is great with a rooftop pool, spa, fitness suite combining with one of the best breakfast buffets I’ve had. The staff are fantastic, nothing is too much trouble and so friendly they felt like family. However, the jewel in the crown are the executive rooms. Singapore is not a cheap place to eat and drink, but if you pay the extra you get access to the executive lounge which has its own check in desk. It is open all day for tea and coffee. Also they do a free afternoon tea with sandwiches and tray bakes. But the best part is in early evening, there is complimentary food and drink

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hotel Starting to Show it’s Age
desc: I’ve stayed at this location multiple times in the last 10 years. Service is as expected for a Hilton, the location is great if you want to be in the middle of all the action on Orchard Rd. However, the rooms are starting to look run down. I had stains on my ceiling, wallpaper was peeling off the walls and carpet was pulling from the floor near the bathroom. Given all the choices of hotels in the area I wouldn’t stay at this one again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very satisfactory stay
desc: Just stayed for 4 nights in Hilton Singapore and enjoyed every minutes there. The position of hotel is very good with easy excess to everywhere by MRT. Services were excellent and everyone was keen to help and my special thanks went to Kenny in the Executive Lounge. The room is spacious and clean. The bed is extra comfortable. I didn’t have breakfast in the executive lounge because it was simply too hard not to pay the returning visits to Opus in the lobby every morning and there were so many selections to choose from there. The high tea buffet on Saturday is also highly recommended in Opus. Evening cocktails and refreshments offered in the Executive Lounge were excellent. I will definitely stay there again when I return in the future.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Rude and Racist
desc: Worst Customer service ever from a hotel. Older gentleman who works in the Executive Lounge was on a number of occasions rude to me and my wife, didn’t like us because the colour of our skin. Put us completely off going to the Lounge. Broken tile in the swimming pool which our daughter cut open her foot on. We had pre paid in advance for our reservation but upon check in they asked for my credit card and charged me again for more money. Our stay was in July and still waiting for our refund and now it’s nearly November. Manager and Assistant Manager stopped replying to my emails about the refund, had to eventually get Hilton Guest Assistant Complaint Team involved and was advised by them the Manger would be in touch with me to sort this out but guess what they never bothered.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Extra Special Service
desc: We have just completed a two-night stay at the Hilton, which was excellent as you might expect. Nice swimming pool, spotless room and an excellent and great choice of buffet breakfast. Umbrellas freely offered for the frequent rain showers. Being a big chain, you might expect a slightly unpersonal level of service. However, I stupidly left my phone in a cab on the day before leaving. The Hilton helped me to track down the taxi company, who did not have any information then on my phone. The staff at the Hilton said they would follow up with the taxi company and when it was time for me to pick up my bags - the phone was at the reception desk. Thank you to the Hilton staff involved.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding anniversary treat.
desc: Chose Singapore as a break from the UK weather and the Hilton for it’s location at the top end of Orchard Road opposite the Royal Thai Embassy. Handy for shopping, eating and the MRT. Booked an executive room so access to the executive lounge was available. We celebrated our golden wedding anniversary during our stay and the day was made even more special because of the staff: housekeeping (swans made from towels and rose petals in the shape of a heart), the executive lounge team (hotel signature cheesecake and macaroons delivered to the room) and the Opus restaurant manager and his staff (a sponge cake covered in gold coloured chocolate) all did us proud. Mustn’t forget the rooftop pool, used it between 7 and 8 each morning and it was usually quiet.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Hotel Best Staff
desc: Always busy this place but consistency always great place to stay. stayed November this year, spot on. Best check in staff and concierge. Be back everytime in Singapore. Thanks Hilton Orchard Singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good Stay
desc: Overall I enjoyed my stay at this Hilton. Room was clean and comfortable. The electric tea pot was nice and I used it quite a bit. Location was great. Shops and restaurants were all within walking distance. The decor in the room was a little dated.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A calm oasis in the midst of the busy shopping district
desc: It is always a great pleasure to return to this hotel. The friendliness and professionalism of the staff is unique and one gets the definite impression that they are all working as a team. Whenever someone cannot answer a question, somebody else comes back within a couple of minutes with the answer.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Raising their bar
desc: It’s seven years since I reviewed this hotel and I visited again to find things that were good before have got better now. Rooms are still the same size, toward small, and I had a step-in bath/shower which I do not like but did discover that the hotel does have walk in showers. You simply need to request them, something I did not know to do. On this visit I was given an executive floor room with a balcony and that was a treat. It’s nothing huge but to be able to sit out in the evening was good and I’ll suffer he step-in if I can get this every visit! Service was good from the minute I arrived. Literally so as my taxi driver had brought me a slightly scenic route from the airport meaning I arrived to check in just as he happy hour in the lounge was closing. Not a problem –

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
