title: Always a pleasure
desc: The Singapore Hilton excells with its location .. step out and enjoy the immediate buzz and excitement of Orchard Road. Stay in and be pampered by friendly and personalized service. You leave wanting to return soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Solid City Centre Hotel
desc: Perfect location on Orchard Road. I picked up a great Hilton honours rate with included breakfast for 2 nights. Room was spacious and staff were friendly. Big breakfast spread although busy at peak times. So much to do in Singapore and this hotel is in the middle of everything.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good location, friendly staff.
desc: Love the hotel was there few months ago and last week, excellent location, all the workers are very helpful and friendly. Clean too. I met Sahrin the first time I was there. Very pleasant nice gentleman!!! Always made us welcome with excellent manner. So sweet of him to even extend the welcome by a nice song . Thank you Sahrin ( my friends and family loved your song in my Facebook)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Celebration Stay
desc: Booked Hilton Singapore as a Diamond member for a birthday celebration. After some initial hiccups, a grand experience was created for us, thanks to Walid for understanding the special occasion we were celebrating and arranging the fine touches for an extremely memorable experience which we will not forget. The family suite room was a good size, more importantly the dinner celebration at the in house Il Celo restaurant was much more the icing on the cake that made the experience grand. The customized menu created by Chef Sasa was amazing, the service in the restaurant was spectacular and the staff took notice of our interests and every single remark to tailor the dinner to a grand birthday celebration. We were a party of six, with adults and kid and everyone enjoyed the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceutive Lounge Manager
desc: I was back in singapore and again stayed at the Hilton Singapore. The manager of the Executive Lounge Boo Xuan made this trip extremely special for myself and a colleague who is retiring soon and this was probably his last trip to Singapore. Boo made everything so easy. She made the reservations and even brought gifts to my colleague. This is not really uncommon for her. She has made my stays at the Hilton wonderful for years. She assist me with reservations on each stay which is about 6 times a year. Her staff is equally amazing. Each morning when I go to the executive lounge for breakfast I am always greeted by my name. They already know I want a double latte. I feel special each time I am there. I travel all over the worl and nobody makes my stay more comfortable than

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stunning!
desc: The location is great, centrally located so it is easier for me to roam around. Great staff as you can always expect from the hilton family, comfortable rooms and awesome breakfast spread. Will be coming back for sure.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Everything clean & comfortable, great pool, staff excellent all around
desc: Perfect location on Orchard Road. Smooth & efficient c/in & c/o, late checkout no problem. Rooftop pool is great - long enough to do laps though rather narrow, quite clean, pool area well equipped. Happy to find my room had a bathtub for which I didn’t need to pay extra (hotels where I live, you do). The building itself is an older structure but the furnishings & carpet in my room looked new. Had the usual amenities. Air con, fridge, WiFi all worked well. It is attention to detail that makes Hilton staff exceptional: I had booked 5:00p.m. checkout, housekeeping came around noon to see if I needed fresh towels, supplies. Front desk booked an airport taxi for me and it was waiting right on time. Offered Hilton Honors upon check in, got benefits immediately. Only stayed 1 night

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A wonderful experience for newly wed.
desc: We held our wedding at Panorama room. It is fantastic and the staff are friendly and approachable, especially banquet manager in making the banquet a success. The overall experience is great and you will not regret choosing Hilton Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: good location
desc: Hotel is in city center, everywhere easy to walk. As a Singapore standard could be little bit renovated, furniture n stuff are old compared to the price you pay, we were expecting a bit more then that, besides all was good.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent hotel, fantastic service!
desc: Having stayed at Hilton Singapore with the whole family in July 2018, my wife and I returned this year to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary - and what a wonderful welcome and stay it has been! Without exception, all staff at this hotel offer wonderful, warm, first-class service. Housekeeping staff do a sensational job - including decorating your room with very special touches for celebrations like ours! Definitely a place to stay for special celebrations! The Executive Lounge is fantastic with excellent service and always great food. And, being here when the Christmas lights are up in the hotel and right around the city - especially beautiful along Orchard Road - is an added bonus. Thank you so much to Hilton Singapore - we will be back again soon!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly staff
desc: Greeted in the lobby by Anthony Wee this afternoon. He's the Director of Catering Sales, but was serving as an ambassador for the hotel by going above and beyond his role and assisting me to extend my stay, make a reservation for dinner at the hotel AND genuinely complimented me on my bowtie. Refreshing to come home after a business day to the likes of Anthony. Well done Hilton Singapore!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The new and redesigned Hilton
desc: I was lucky enough to be assigned a new refurbished room at a hotel I had visited so many times. I love the open design and the avant-garde concept. A big change. What has not changed is the dedication, professionalism, kindness and welcoming of Elize, Claire, Zeke, Sahrin and the staff of the executive lounge. What has not changed is Pavlina and her team who welcomes you and do everything to make our stay pleasurable. One addition to mention is Nath. The whole team can look up to her as she represents the embodiment of perfectionism. Thank you to all of you and my apologies to those I might have forgotten to mention. I am indebted to you all. Dr. Michel Bokhazi

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Most comfortable and high service quality
desc: Reception staff was very efficient and flexible. Housekeeper was diligent and made sure that our needs were met e.g. extra tissue and towels. Restaurant staff was attentive and very efficient. The executive lounge was spacious with quite a variety of food during cocktail time. Just rememer to bring USB adaptor, there is no USB ports in the room. However, the hotel can lend one to you.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location and fantastic staff
desc: Stayed for only a night and wished I could stay longer. Located strategically at Orchard Road and its within walking distance to public transportation. Definitely recommend for a business hotel. Food at their restaurants was good too. Best of all is the breakfast service. The food was good and the staff were excellent. Will definitely be back. Keep up the good work!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Below average hilton
desc: Pros Good location Gym with reasonable equipments Cons The entire hotel is very dated, even the “refurbished” rooms Bathroom was not very clean Swimming pool was not very clean and closes at 8pm Breakfast was below the par The room was small and a bit noisy if you are facing the main road Services were non existent Unless you want to do a lot of shopping in Singapore, I would recommend Conrad which is so much better for a small price difference

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fabulous
desc: As always the Hilton Singapore exceeds expectations. The staff are very customer focused, and flexible to customer demands. The executive lounge service is of the highest. Really loved our 2 night stay here as a gold member.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay
desc: Loved the location! Easy to move about and close to public transportation. Buffet breakfast was yummy and great variety too. Best of all is the staff...they were so friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and big. Tried the Japanese restaurant and it was good too. Will definitely be back with my family.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore
desc: When we arrived at Hilton Singapore from the U.K. we were extremely tired and just wanted our hotel room to crash in. Upon arrival and entering the lobby all we could say was wow. It was picture perfect and absolutely stunning. The check-in process was fairly quick after faffing for a credit card to hold a deposit (annoyingly we weren’t told this was needed otherwise we would have been organised- not the hotel’s fault but our travel agents!) Anyway, we were shown to our room by a porter. No way was this room suitable for anyone let alone an executive suite (with just breakfast) that we paid approximately £1800 for for the 6 nights (our total holiday cost was £3000 including flights). The room smelt musty, damp and was not spotlessly clean. I found dust, bare electrical cables on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very Questionable
desc: Our stay at this hotel was very... interesting. When we first arrived, we asked for an extra bed since there were 3 people. However, they said there would be a 70$ fee for just another bed. I have never encountered this before, and don't understand why they would charge so much. The room itself is average too. The walls are kind of peeling off and there is a musty smell and we can't open the windows for fresh air. It's nothing special and definitely needs renovation since it's kind of old and crusty at this point. The service was just ok too. One thing I noted was that they didn't thank me for being a gold member, which is a standard. It's a minor thing, but it is still something that they are supposed to always do. Overall, this was very very disappointing for the price they

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It Could Be Better
desc: It was a hassle to check into the hotel because there was a lot of confusion. The food was okay. The staff are generally helpful. The furnishings are a little old. However, the location is fantastic. It's close to the MRT and the shopping areas, thus making it very convenient.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Super pleasant stay at the Hilton Orchard Road in Singapore
desc: Rooms: we opted to stay in the room selection which included a balcony and access to the executive lounge. We have stayed here previously and again were pleased that we stayed at the Hilton. It must be said that the hotel has a knack for hiring excellent staff. For instance, Mr Sahrin, who works in the executive lounge was outstanding. He is extremely professional and his dedication shines through. He will go the extra mile to make sure your experience is pleasurable. Did I mention his linguistic skills which to date include fluency in French and English as well as local languages. We extend our personal gratitude to Sahrin for his invaluable assistance. If anything he is extremely customer focussed. Our stay was very pleasurable and tiny hiccups were dealt with on a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old style, needs a rethink plus more investment
desc: This is a Grand Hotel in the style of several decades ago. The external facade is dated, the rooms are in general in need of an upgrade (which is apparently happening slowly) and the hotel has the usual external portico and an avenue of designer shops at ground level. There are 24 floors with high speed lifts. Overall the experience we had was enjoyable and we hope to stay again. First the good stuff: The position close to one end of Orchard Road is great for shopping and getting around. Orchard MRT is close by, and if you want to be in this part of Singapore there are few better alternatives. The staff at the Hilton are from a variety of ethnicities, speak numerous languages are are uniformly excellent at what they do. If we had to single one out it would be Kenny at the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It is dated and the service indiferent but in a great location
desc: In its day it must have been one of nicest hotels in the area but now it looks and feels dated. We got an executive room and it was ok but for what we paid we had expected better. Way overpriced. The service was so so, one night it took us over half an hour to get a drink at the lobby bar until finally one of the managers got it for us. However the following day a nice doorman lent us his personal umbrella because all hotel umbrellas were out. The check in desk was efficient but it seemed like the staff was going out of their way to be unclear about any questions we asked. The Executive Lounge was unmemorable, the food selection in the evening was poor, they were trying to provide cheap meals, like some ugly noodle casserole and cheap cheese instead of nice appetizers.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: My daughter and I stsyed at this hotel while waiting for our return flight to California. The hotel is in a good location near shops and restaurants. The hotel staff is excellent. It was raining and the hotel loaned us Hilton umbrellas so we could go shopping. A money exchange is located next to the hotel. Breakfast was excellent.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Small Deluxe Room
desc: We have been upgraded by the hotel to a deluxe room - but the deluxe room was soooo small - with no fresh air to come into the room. No balcony or sliding door to open up. Otherwise, it was great. The two days we spent there was great, beause we had some outside activities.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not too much but just a stay!
desc: It is the end of Orchard road, and quite convenient to go shopping. This is an old hotel but renovate for the breakfast / buffet area. Some rooms are also reno. If just a simple stay, it is ok. The staff in front reception are usually friendly and will try to help you to reach your request. The lounge is good and the staff are very helpful to provide the service. Overall, if you are not a picky person and request the high quality, it is a choice.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: They could need a refresh
desc: We were 2 families staying at the hotel during Christmas and new years. They put us different floors even though we asked for at least on the same level but they could not. The reviews I read on TA saying that it was a bit outdated and old hotel, those were correct and I would go as far to say that it was more an 4 star rather than a 5 star hotel. Positive comments: located quite central on Orchard road, big and nice lobby. Big rooms (that is rare in Singapore) a swimming pool on top, spacious and well equipped gym. Negative comments: the hotel is quite old and I’m not saying that old is bad but these rooms needs some refurbishment, especially in the bathrooms (which had moisture damages in the ceiling that were covered just with paint. Even the pool area seemed a bit lost in

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Consistently Great Service
desc: Service is paramount in Singapore and nobody does it any better than the Hilton on Orchard Road. I have been sort of a regular at this hotel over the last 20 years and the level of customer service has been great. From Ali on the Exec Floor down to Magendra and Zaki at the concierge's desk. One of the many greeters like Das remember your name and welcome you back. After a long journey, it is nice to accept this kind of hospitality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staff
desc: We had 2 rooms for our family of four. The hotel was able to get us connecting rooms, which was very convenient and much appreciated. The hotel it self is an older property but the staff more than make up for it. Everyone from the front desk to room attendants were very pleasant and always willing to help. Convenient location, easy to get a taxi at the hotel. There are a lot of shopping malls and restaurants within walking distance.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: We had a great time and thoroughly enjoyed the Club Lounge!
desc: This was a great post Christmas stay and we very much liked our comfortable room on the 21st Floor. We spent a lot of time at the 22nd Floor level Club Lounge and thoroughly recommend it as a facility.The food at the cocktail and canapes session starting at 5.30 p.m. was superb-as was the service from some of the waiters. One person on the Club desk was a bit officious at breakfast time, but hat's an occupational hazard with these Clubs, and the kind workers inside the Lounge more than compensated for this slight annoyance. The rooftop swimming pool was superb and we whiled away many happy hours there despite the moody and changeable weather where dark clouds could suddenly mask the sun and muffle its warmth whilw wild winds whipped themselves up.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: We stayed at the Hilton on Orchard Street Singapore and absolutely loved the location. It was close to all shopping as well as the Metro which is a bonus. Service was good and the rooms were comfortable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good location but noisy in room
desc: We stayed in one of the recently refurbished rooms. Many reviews comment on the well overdue need for this refurbishment and it seems like more is on the cards. The new interior is nice and stylish, roomy for Singapore, large TV, USB plugs directly in the wall. Unfortunately not a lot of thought has been put into ergonomics and organising the light switches. Their placement seems totally random and inconvenient. The curtains also had a mind of their own. The refurbishment is mostly superficial though, so the lack of soundproofing and old noisy air conditioning is the same. Any and all sound from outside comes into the room. It sounded like there was a window permanently open in the room, only there wasn't. The AC is the loudest I've ever heard, it must be older than me. Our

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: Great location on Orchard Road near Wheelock and ION. Closer to everything. Other shopping malls and MRT. This is our second stay at this property. All amenities within walking distance Great dining options as well.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton came through for us
desc: We discovered on the way to Jakarta's Soekarno-Hatta airport that we would stay in Singapore for 24 hours before taking our next flight. In my cell phone, I had the apps of several hotel chains, and the one that delivered for last-minute bookings was the Hilton's. Only four hours before we arrived at the hotel I was able to use Hilton Honors points to choose and book a room. The reception staff was very welcoming, we were provided access to the 22nd floor lounge and our room was comfortable, clean, and convenient. The staff are keen to detect and address the slightest hint of guest disappointment, and we were surprised at how they anticipated our needs. They even tried to help us get a table at il cielo when tables were fully booked. As the concierge staff loaded our

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Need renovation
desc: Need renovation!! But it's great location just few minutes to orchard station. Friendly Front office staff and breakfast restaurant staff. But my room was connecting room and I could hear next door very well. Room was clean but it was old, really old. But still not too expensive if you think about location also breakfast was really good. Never been pool or other facilities but will be back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 6 night Christmas family stay
desc: excellent staff and location - very attentive even during one of the busiest times for them- ambience at the hotel was excellent as well -adding to the christmas spirit - located close to the shopping areas and MRT

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fabulous stay!!!!
desc: We have just finished staying a week at Hilton Singapore and it has been amazing!! The position on Orchard Rd is right in the middle of everything, close to loads of shopping and restaurants only a stroll away. What made our stay so special wasn’t just the beautiful room and great food and ambience, it was the staff!! Each and every staff member we encountered were so friendly and engaging and helpful. Big shout out and special mention goes to Joel in the breakfast room and Walid the Hotel Manager. Both perfect gentlemen and went out of their way to make our stay even more comfortable! We will definitely return!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Celebrating my partner's bday
desc: Another great stay with Hilton Singapore. We chose Hilton Singapore as the hotel to celebrate my partner's birthday. While my HH gold status didn't get me upgraded to an executive room this time round, I'd say the overall stay experience remains a positive one. Kudos to the house cleaning team who went an extra mile keeping my room clean and leaving me with a lovely note each day. The front office team also surprised us with a slice of cake and a red wine, which really brought a smile to my partner. I look forward to staying here again for my birthday next year. Cheers!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service!
desc: The hotel is great and the service is outstanding! Whenever I stay at this hotel, I feel like I am home. We are rather on the demanding side but the staff is always there for our needs. I would like to thank Peixuan Boo and Magendra Berdayah for taking good care of us and for making our stay more memorable for the exceptional service to us during our stay. We will definitely come back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An ideal retreat in the heart of Singapore
desc: This hotel is ideally located in the heart of Singapore , along Orchard Road. Very good value for money, Hilton Singapore is a true 5* hotel with excellent amenities such as : an outstanding Executive Lounge, super fitness facility and nice restaurants, But above all , the staff are all professional, helpful, dedicated and friendly which helps feeling quickly at home : a particular appreciation for all staff of the Executive Lounge. I definitely recommend this hotel to visitors in Singapore !

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Weekend staycation
desc: We celebrated our anniversary with a staycation at this hotel. The staff provided us with nice amenities to commemorate the special occasion. As Hilton members, we appreciated the upgrade to an executive room. Service at the lounge was good and we enjoyed the various food and beverage offerings there. Overall the hotel was clean, well-maintained and with good service staff. However, the rooms were dated, especially the toilets which had inefficient layouts.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton standards with room for improvement
desc: We stayed three nights at the hotel, which is nicely located on Orchard road and it was nice to enjoy the Christmas decorations on Orchard. It a typical Hilton hotel, no surprise there. However we had a room on the 18th floor , #1803, and the air conditioning was very noisy, too bad, seems to be AC technology of the last century. A real pain. On the other hand, the business lounge was excellent for both breakfast and diner. The pool on the top of the hotel is rather small, more decorative than anything else, good view but one cannot expect much swimming there. Overall good, a safe choice and we will go again any time, but do not expect any wow effect.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Leadership Training @ Hilton
desc: Went to Hilton Singapore for leadership training for coming 3 days. The meeting room is at 24th floor with great view of Orchard Rod area. The room was clean and neat. Aircon was cold as usual in hotels. Food and snacks were good and healthy. Small portions with fruits and juices.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Strategic location!
desc: Property is dated if compared with the other Hilton properties. However, thumbs up for the service standard especially F&B team at Opus. Friendly and helpful. Only thing is waiting time too long for the first day breakfast session. The line was too long around 15 minutes waiting for the table. Front office team kind enough to let me check in early & extended my check out time. Thanks for going extra mile for guests. Little advice for check out process: fasten the check out process, waited too long for check out due to some check in guest enquired much and waited for long time.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional stay
desc: This Hilton is nothing short of awesome. My "go to" choice when I'm in Singapore the entire staff, top to bottom - housekeeping, restaurant staff, Concierge and management - all made this another memorable and enjoyable stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Only good thing about this hotel is spacious room and accessible location. If you are looking for a hotel for family or couple to stay, definitely not recommended as this hotel seems focus on business guest. Reception don’t even bother to introduce about hotel facilities, breakfast location and transportation. Swimming pool just renovated but nothing is interesting.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very poor house keeping service.
desc: Very poor house keeping service. I put the service sign to clean the room and I went for 10 hours and I came back and the room was not cleaned!! When I called them they claimed that the privacy sign was on the door which was not correct!!! I also discovered that the house keeping they returned back the laundry in my cabinet while they are claiming that there was a privacy sign! This is the poorest service I saw in all my visits in Singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect hotel to be near awesome shopping!!!
desc: This HIlton always meets our needs. Everyone is treated like a VIP -- breakfast buffet is wonderful -- lots and lots of freshly made options-- Hot and cold. Asian and American. Executive lounge is very classy and strict dress code adds a little something! Hotel is at the end of Orchard. Hop On Hop off stops nearby -- Huge shopping centers are with in a block or two -- Don't miss the Night Safari and the Hawkers for dining..

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very tired
desc: No fault of the hotel services, however the management needs to consider a major renovation for this hotel being centrally located in the Orchard district. The price we paid does not justify the room condition you’re offering your brand loyal guest.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very Disappointing
desc: Based on an exceptional stay at the Hilton Singapore 15 odd years ago, and a number of pre-stay e-mails from the Hilton Singapore that seemed to convey hospitality commitment, I perhaps had too high expectations. I do not however think that being greeting with "Hello", or "Welcome to ..." is too much to expect from a hotel. The first thing reception at the Hilton Singapore said to me was: "I need your passport" (that was after one of may bags was left randomly at the front desk). I was asked if I had stayed at the hotel before (something a lot of Hilton's know these days), and when I responded with "no" (since my stay was so long ago), I was told about the Executive lounge (hours, dress code). Nothing else about other hotel facilities, where the lifts were (something I needed to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Warmth and professionalism - exceptional service and food
desc: The Hilton Singapore was so exceptionally welcoming and attentive that I sought out the management at a function and asked them how they trained their staff. Without exception they were warm and friendly and appeared to have all the time in the world to attend to my needs. I was very impressed.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: OVER PRICED MEDIOCRE HOTEL...
desc: Good location but hotel desperately needs a significant renovation...we were in a renovated room and it needed to be re-renovated. Interestingly, we were supposedly upgraded for being a Hilton Gold member...I can only imagine what the non-upgraded rooms were like...but then, what would you expect for $320 per night!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Short vacation
desc: A Nice hotel located in Orchard road . Friendly staffs from arrival and during my stay . Fast response when I needed some assistance . Really nice selection during breakfast time and foods are awesome . Look forward to come back again as I haven’t got change to experience another F&B outlets in the hotel .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Location, Great Service, Friendly & Well Maintained.Hotel
desc: Had a 2 night stay extended to 3 nights in a delightful, clean and comfortable room on the 18th floor. Firstly, I had no trouble in extending my stay by one night after calling the hotel reservation centre, where Eugenie helped me to do it at a suitable rate. Very friendly and respectful in their service. The breakfast and the ground floor area though busy was very efficient with all kinds of food and catering to vegetarians, health conscious, foodies, families, etc. Lots of salads, egg cooking station and best of all they cater to your request to the best of their ability. Our room was very well maintained and cleaned by Qiu Zhen and we were impressed by his respectful manners, service with a smile, and the professionalism to get our room clean & tidy and the amenities well

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Forget it - Times Up for this week property!!
desc: One of the oldest hotels on prime Orchard road Singapore and the only Hilton brand property. BUT, management seems to have turned into milking the cow against invest in its peoples, facilities and services. Attitude of front office staff (they are in capable but knows how to overcharge you), quality of breakfast (forget about what used to be a place for local and international food), house keeping, quality of rooms - all gone bad. When more than one thing is wrong it’s the leadership issue. This is one of the oldest buildings on orchard road and Hilton has not upgraded the property and people. Just collect money overcharging because Hilton brand still gets traffic in. But soon people are going to find out there are much better options in Singapore. I love Hilton brand and a 25

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent food and customer service
desc: The breakfast was to die for, I've stayed at many Hilton's around Australia but my experience here is very memorable. Joel Mathias was down to earth and displayed great customer service that was above and beyond

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wow visit!
desc: Started from check in to check out... everything was perfect! Room was clean with simple but nice deco. Front Desk executives were welcoming and concierge was helpful. Nothing to fault! Truly 5 stars.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I have stayed in this hotel for the past 10 years or so. Service quality have always exceeded my expectation. Staff at the Executive Lounge are friendly, helpful and attentive. Staff at the lobby restaurant are equally helpful, friendly and attentive. Location of this hotel is perfect. Just a few minutes walking distance to shopping area like ION, Ngee Ann City, Paragon, Takashimaya and the Orchard Station MRT which is pretty much what one would need to go everywhere in Singapore and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Welcoming and Warm Atmosphere
desc: Had a lovely breakfast and received a warm welcome from Joel Mathias. Amazing and interesting conversation, excellent customer service and hospitality skills! He has true Hilton spirit, I will be back

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Consistent good service. 5 star Hotel with good access to Malls and a cinema
desc: We did a staycay here as the hotel enjoys good access to shopping Malls for Christmas shopping. (lugging gifts back!) We booked the Executive room and was upgraded a tier to a larger room with balcony. The lounge access is useful to catch a breather. There’s tea time and cocktail hour, where the latter’s spread makes up for a light dinner. The lounge and gym have been nicely renovated. The highlight is the good service from lobby to exec lounge, one of the best we encountered in our stays at Hilton properties. Kenny, whom we met at the exec lounge, is warm and helpful.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Jason’s Opus bar
desc: Without a doubt, Jason, of the Hilton Singapore’ Opus restaurant bar May very well be not of the best bartenders anyway, any place. The drinks were perfect! His service was spot on. Never saw the bottom of my glass. Great customer service!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good hospitality
desc: We stayed in Hilton recently and our experience was amazing. We were travelling with a kid and the staff at Hilton was very responsive and prompt, would like to make a special mention of Ms. Peggy who went out of the way to take care of my kids needs during breakfast.Thank you for a memorable stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect Location. Polished marble and polished service.
desc: A great stay. Lovely roof top pool and restaurant. Large fitness center. Perfect sized rooms. The Orchard Road location can't be beat and has been a mainstay there for a generation. I will be returning for certain.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: comfortable and clean
desc: nice location; comfortable and clean, with good breakfast, excellent concierge, close to high end shopping. felt very safe. organic restaurant on the site was exceptional. terrific gym for those who are serious about working out.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Land & Cruising in Singapore
desc: Stayed @Hilton Singapore prior & after our Celebrity Milleniunn Cruising to Vietnam. Hotel is perfect location to shopping, restaurants, and our daily needs to pharmacy. Front desk, concierge and great breakfast made our stay easy, convenient and relaxing. Find this hotel on your future stay in Singapore. MAnang Rose San Francisco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not worth the price
desc: My room was super dusty. I got rashes during my 3 day stay. Toilet was also clogged and flooded the floor. Good location but facilities need to be reviewed and improved. Not recommended if you would like to be near to Takashimaya area. It’s quite a distance to walk.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very disappointing!
desc: We paid extra to stay in an Executive Room just to listen to noise above from staff in high heels above. Air conditioning was loud and kept going on and off. I had booked for three people (me and 2 boys 14yo & 11yo) just to get 2 big single beds! Overall disappointed!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: WORTH A STAY WHEN IN SINGPORE
desc: From arrival until leaving we were made very welcome by all members of staff. Very good location on Orchard Road and excellent value. The hotel could do with some updating especially the bathrooms. Breakfast was a so so experience and the presentation and selection was adequate food quality was not wonderful but OK Overall a very good stay and would book again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Indulging experience
desc: The experience at the Hilton definitely lives up to its name. The location made it convenient to move around, the room was in pristine condition with comfortable beds and clean sheets and most importantly the breakfast spread, was generous enough to have me spoilt for choice. The staff were friendly, always with a smile on their face and the willingness to help. A truly indulging experience amidst my short time there.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Location..location..location
desc: Hotel is situated at a great location Orchard Road. Shopping and food haven for every tourist. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Very knowledgeable about Singapore.Wish I could have stayed longer. Will definitely come back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Poor facilities
desc: Stayed there 2 nights with family. Furniture look old, walls are thin. You can hear the housekeeping make their rounds, kids tearing down the corridors. Executive lounge service left much to be desired.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old hotel - but clean
desc: The hotel is old, so personally i think this place is too expensive for its standard. It was clean and the service was as expected from a Hilton hotel. The pool site was nice with lot of sun and also shadowed areas. However, there was no service there, or at least not the 2 hours we were laying there.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Well located hotel
desc: We stayed at the Singapore Hilton for 4 nights and thoroughly enjoyed our visit. Breakfast buffet is excellent. Executive lounge is very nice. Staff are polite and helpful. We appreciated the ease of access on Orchard Road.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: SO OLD --TACKY
desc: I have been many times to this hotel and truly believe the best thing Hilton can do is knock it down and rebuild. It is well past its best. Rooms are small and bathrooms are tiny with low-pressure water in the shower. Nice basic views from Exec Lounge--food and drink low quality. The site of this hotel must be worth an absolute fortune. There is nothing special other than its location.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Extended Stay due to Cruise Cancellation
desc: The star were great here - front desk, dining room (breakfast), concierge, housekeeping (a towel elephant with valentine eyes to go with our cards), and the amazing staff on the executive floor. Everyone was extremely helpful in all ways with always an eye to making our stay memorable. The only thing we noted is that our room were very humid on the executive floor and the furniture (chairs) in the dining area really needed to be replaced or reupholstered!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Dinner in the Grand Ballroom (Covid-19 situation)
desc: The dinner was held in the Hilton Grand Ballroom on the 22 Feb 2020. There were approximately 33 tables while the attendance at the dinner was about 90%. At the time, the Covid-19 was at its peak and thus the attendance was considered excellent. However the Hotel did contribute to the success of the occasion. The feedback from the guest were as follows: 1. that the hotel conducted temperature taking for all the guest as they entered the main hall. Each guest was then identified with colored stickers. 2. that the hotel provided sanitizers at the reception lobby / cocktail lounges prior to the entry into the main event hall. There were also sanitizers in the washrooms. 3. that the guest were individually served instead of the usual sharing of the main dishes (community dinners)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional hotel services.
desc: The Hilton Singapore hotel is without a doubt a hotel that continues, to deliver exceptional service. During my most recent stay. It was proven over and over again the exceptional service is 24 hrs 7D

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Short Break
desc: Situated on Orchard Road amongst seemingly endless shopping malls this is a perfect location for retail therapy. Also, well located for the National Botanical Gardens which are and absolute 'must see'.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Many Reasons This Is A Great Property
desc: I have visited Singapore every year for the past 15 years. Each visit I stay at this property. Location is great. All the shopping is within walking distance. The MRT is also within walking distance. The breakfast buffet is amaaaazing. But what I like most is the staff. Even so it is a year apart between visits, several of their staff recognize me right away. Vivian, who is the breakfast hostess, saw me the first morning and said, "Hi Mr. Jay. Welcome back." While the room rate is a bit costly during the week, you won't find another hotel in the Orchard Road area of equal quality for less $. Singapore housing is VERY expensive. I have been a Hilton elite member for many years, staying at many, many different properties. The Hilton Singapore remains one of my very favorites.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First Class Hotel
desc: The Hilton Singapore is first class and 5-star. From the moment you arrive until the moment you leave you will experience nothing less than perfection. They run a great hotel the way a hotel should be run, customer service first. The hotel is impeccably clean, rooms were great and the choices for meals was varied and available. The location is central to anything you need and it is worth the cab ride to wherever your business takes you in Singapore. My trip there have been nothing but great and if you are lucky enough to have Magendra as your concierge, you will always go back. He sets the gold standard for concierge service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellence in Everything They Do
desc: PEOPLE. The staff are a team. It appears as though nothing falls through the cracks. They have a can do attitude. They will find a way to accommodate you. Sometimes it may not be what you originally wanted, but the end product turns out to be better than your original request. FACILITIES. The building and rooms are well maintained, clean and functional. It seems someone makes sure your room is perfect BEFORE you take occupancy. LOCATION. The hotel is on Orchard Road and fairly close to the major malls. There is an MRT (subway) station about 9 to 16 minutes walking distance away. I would recommend you spend a little extra and get a room with Executive Lounge access. The Executive Lounge staff are hospitality professionals. They know how to make your stay as perfect as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old looking Building, but still a good Hilton to stay
desc: Stay was good. Room design was a little dated, with power socket face plates needing some attention. Bed was comfortable. Toilet was small, a lack of bath tub seems to lowers the overall lux feel. A bidet spray would be convenient add on. Only issue was AC was a tad on the noisy side. Breakfast was good. Dinner at the steakhouse was fantastic. Service is HILTON level, great!! Overall a good stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Beautiful Hotel!! Great Location!!
desc: Luxury and a great location!!! Near all the bus lines and shopping areas in walking distance. The staff is superb, and the award lounge is excellent. Thee pool is outdoors, but on the roof and has a lot of wind cover.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Personalised experience
desc: I have stayed in this hotel throughout the last 8 months and never get tired of this place. The hotel is under a very nice development - new renovated rooftop pool area - fantastic fitness area under continuous improvement with nice sauna facilities - nice bar and a fantastic restaurant with urban farming. What impress my most is though the personalised experience and treatment the hotel team provides me, my peers and even my family when we are in the hotel. As HH Diamond member I really appreciate the professional and personalised service the Executive team is providing, A thankful greetings to all Mr. Mohid, Kenny, Boo, Elizz Clare and .Sharin. Also a special thanks having Ann from Korea as internship - she has a wonderful approach an great potential. The Housekeeping

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great great hotel
desc: This hotel is amazing so lovely and clean. Great location with great shopping eating options around . The roof top pool is so great and the rooms clean and spacious . The staff make this hotel as well they are all so kind and sweet . Very efficient and very personal. This hotel is great .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Ok, but room for improvement
desc: The hotel is good located next to shopping opportunities. The staff is mostly friendly, but the hotel in general has aged. It is ok and functioning, but not totally up to date. It has a reasonable price and the rooms are spacious. The Gym is of good size and very good equipped.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Stay
desc: Had a great stay at the hotel. Love the tub and the facilities. The bathrobe and bedroom slippers were comfortable and the bed was comfortable too. The room service was great and front desk service was helpful

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Just about OK
desc: We booked a executive plus room with a balcony for three nights. Whilst checking in we were told the lounge would be shut for maintenance but we never saw any evidence of this , also no mention on the hotel website. No apology, nothing . We were then offered a upgrade , not complimentary but for SGP 80 per night . No thank you. The room was basic and had only one wardrobe , bathroom was very dated and the balcony was filthy and full of bird droppings, especially the handrails that you tend to lean on when taking in the views. The roof top pool was pleasant and very quite. Breakfast was ok & the staff were decent. The temporary lounge was ok for a couple of drinks, complimentary nibbles were very poor but the staff in the evening were polite and helpful. The hotel was very quite

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Sad
desc: I’ve stayed here many times, and have always appreciated the quality of service and detail to attention. My last stay though was one where everyone from client to staff had the implications of the Coronavirus hanging over them. From a staff point of view, jobs are at risk, and for this reason I came away sad, as every member were doing their duties and with the upmost professionalism. They are all a massive credit to the Hilton Group. Many thanks for making our stay as comfortable as you possibly could under these circumstances.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staff and location
desc: The whole staff from housekeeping on up went out of their way to be helpful. Joel and Kenny in particular were both charming and helpful. We mentioned we were celebrating our anniversary and Kenny had champagne and cake sent to the room. What a lovely touch. The location can’t be beat. Right in the heart of the restaurants and shopping and close to the metro. BTW if you want any tailoring done, my husband was very happy with Calgary Tailors in the Far East bldg next door. The rooms themselves are Scandinavian functional and while comfortable could use a bit of personality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent staycation for our wedding anniversary
desc: It was truly an experience at Hilton Singapore. We booked a deluxe room but when I asked the booking staff about accompanying kids, she by herself gave a complimentary upgrade to a family suite. The suite was really spacious, enough for kids to roam around, play and watch tv cartoons. The room was nicely decorated for anniversary and complimented with champagne and cake, made our day really really special.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: No " Grand Dame" anymore
desc: The time is up for this 50 year old hitel. Use to be one of the best, but it has faded away. They tried some upgrading, but even those rooms look inspirationless. Nothing fancy. Even their shopping gallery is poor. Some Rolex and Cartier watch shops, but deserted. After complaining of the state of our room. (We booked a Hilton King Executive with Club lounge access) we got the choice to stay in a exact same kind of room, but with a balcony. They offered us the family suite for an extra fee. Guys! Your hotel is empty because of the corona virus! Cherish every single guest you get and whatever you can to satisfy them! Yes, you gave us a cheesecake because we celebrated our son's birthday, you gave him a teddy bear and some macrons. But for the price we paid it was a huge let down.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing hospitality at Hilton Singapore
desc: We travelled with a small 8 month old baby for 4D3N during the covid-19 period. We were extremely happy to find that at the hotel reception as well as breakfast venue, there were hand sanitisers available. (One suggestion would be to place a hand sanitiser at the lift area as this is a heavy touch point area.) We would like single out Mr. Joel who was exceptionally hospitable and making sure that our stay was very comfortable. While we were there, he and the Hilton team (Tina, a tall gentlemen who was in charge of the breakfast venue, Claire, and others) was extremely attentive and this is very commendable. We would like to also point out the cleaning lady (from China?) that serviced our floor (7th). She always greeted us (super friendly!) whenever she saw us and did her job

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The first Hilton that fails in everyway!
desc: 1 Raised this concern to Diamond desk, yet I still don’t receive any follow up from them as promised. 2 Loyalty not being appreciated. 3 No welcome fruits being sent even though they said to send up soonest. 4 Executive lounge close without notify in app or email. 5 FOODS ARE NOT FRESH! Both at breakfast and lounge, looks nice but chicken smells awful. 6 Newly renovated suite? Come on don’t joke, it still looks old fashioned, dirty and stain, far behind than other Hilton overseas properties. 7 Higher management and staff communications are bad, I judge by they did not convey my messages clearly and i need to keep repeating. 8 Even the staff themselves also agree with me Hilton Singapore is not good. Will not recommend to anyone. Stay other plenty 5 stars to get better

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service excellence still exists
desc: Stayed at the property on our way to Hyderabad India. From checkin to checkout the service and professionalism by all staff was exceptional.Whilst the hotel is one of the most established properties in Singapore it has maintained its standard and we felt everything from the accommodation and restaurants were all top rate. A standout for us was Pavlina Fucikova who is one of the Front Office Managers , her warmth of character and her smiling and bubbly demeanour was welcoming and felt authentic. This is the result of clearly a dedicated and long serving employee of the hotel - congratulations to her especially and all the team - Thankyou for a very enjoyable stay, We will be back

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First stay
desc: The hotel is located in Orchard road which is great since that is the heart of shopping in Singapore. It is a five star hotel exclusive shops within its vicinity. I was initially given a room that had not been upgraded. I highly recommend not taking those but rather an upgraded and more modern room. Management were quick to change me since the older bathrooms leave much to be desired. Barring the above, the service was excellent. The WiFi was super, laundry service perfect and room decor typical of Hilton. I also had a great view of Orchard street. Keep up the great work Hilton Singapore team!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Steakcation
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Hilton. Kenny from the Front Desk was very friendly. It was also a nice gesture from him to extend club access to us. The Tomahawk steak we had at the Opus Bar & Grill was absolutely amazing. Although there was some miscommunication, Janice, F&B Sales Manager, was very hospitable and made sure our dinner went without a hitch after that.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Delicious food and drinks，nice service
desc: Got some food and drinks delivery arrangement for my birthday during Covid lockdown. Very delicious food and nice cocktails, also nice packed in bottles, which you can reuse for nice little flower later on. I would recommend Cold brew martini - nice choco aroma, my favorite Twisted Negroni - refreshing and nice Enjoyed and can’t wait to test it at their bar.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: pleasant stay, nice food and extraordinary service
desc: stayed and enjoyed in Hilton, Orchard road for 2 week. good location and view. received great hospitality, care and service. food is nice and plenty of options. thanks to front desk staff, they very helpful.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly and helpful front office staff (thanks to you, Kenny!)
desc: Just want to write this little note to thank Kenny at the reception, who had a nice, helpful attitude, easy-going yet service minded. I just needed help with a small matter, but i was still attended to with a professionalism. I also did my coronatine here in June, after coming back from EU. Thank you to your whole team for hosting us then (the food was tasty and the beds very comfy!).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Terrible food and dishonest duty manager
desc: Stayed here for 14 days due to SHN. The rooms were dated but functional. First night was terrible - they put me in a room facing the generator - which was terribly noisy. After complain, they were nice enough to shift me over to another room 720. Lower floor but at least I don’t have to deal with the noise. As the days go by, the food was really bad, especially their breakfast. It’s a joke and since their options were pretty much vegetarian or not, there wasn’t any options at all. As I am allergic to seafood, I can’t eat most of their meals - it’s mostly cold/Luke warm fish. Nevermind, life goes on. Refrigerator broke down, I can’t replace it, because they apparently can’t send a technician up, that’s fine. On the final day, they decided to charge me more for laundry. Above

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation -- Signs of ageing, looking forward to renovation
desc: I stayed in the King Hilton Premium Room on the 18th floor as a HH Gold member. I was given some chocolate pralines from D9 Cakery as a welcome amenity too. I was unable to get lounge access (exclusive to Diamond members and Executive room bookings). Room was the usual Hilton standard, nice comfy bed with a study/working table. Nice soft colours and wood were used around the room too. There were, however, signs of ageing around the room (e.g. ceiling, wall). Toilet was partially renovated (but small), had the shower+tub concept removed for a standing shower area instead. Swimming pool was small, probably considered big in 1980s, but in 2020, it is really small. Gym was a good size. Breakfast was at Opus Bar - there were choices of set meals and during my stay, it was

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Take your money and stay at the Marriott Tangs instead
desc: Stay at Hilton was so average. Property was old, benefits weak, and prices are not even that cheap. When you compare Hilton Singapore to Marriott Tangs (which is the flagship property of Marriott), the difference is so distinct. Only saving grace was that i got the demo room which was nice. As a titanium member of Marriott Bonvoy which is the equivalent of diamond at Hilton, I get: 1) Daily breakfast from 6.30-11am (vs Hilton 7-10.30am) 2) 4 hours of executive lounge service from 5.30pm-9.30pm, which does not require reservation. In addition the food served is similar to an ala carte buffet with a wide variety of food and can be considered a dinner replacement (vs Hilton need reservation, limited to 1hour and you get a specific set of hors d’oeurve) 3) Confirmed late checkout

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staycation
desc: We stayed at the Hilton for the foodie staycation and it was a wonderful experience. The rooms and facilities are spotless and the service could not have been more welcoming. Big thanks also to the room service and front desk team for the surprises made with regard to our engagement, you truly made us feel like royals.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Long Stay Hilton Singapore
desc: Being at this hotel for a long time now due to the covid pandemic, I take this opportunity to give my opinion on this hotel. Up to now the entire hotel staff are very professional and always attentive to the customer needs, since the beginning of my stay. The hygiene of this hotel concerning covid 19 is taken very seriously which gives the customer a feeling of well being and security. Regarding my room in particular, I have a suite which gives a very practical feeling of a small luminous apartment. Room cleaning is for me most of the time done by INDRA from housekeeping. She is very efficient and meticulous. Always listening to the customer to know if everything is going well. Well done INDRA, and Thank you so far to all the staff at Hilton Singapore for making my stay as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Totally Relaxing Stay at Hilton Singapore
desc: Looking for a perfect hotel for a short but unforgettable staycation is quite difficult especially that Singapore hosts a lot of big, beautiful, clean and luxurious hotels. Upon checking different hotels and online hotel booking sites I found a great deal at Hilton. I am a Hilton member when I first booked their hotel in Nusa Dua, Bali which I also gave an Excellent review here in Trip Advisor last Oct 2019. And 11 months forward I am writing another Excellent review for it this time in Singapore. Located along Orchard road, it is a prime spot for visitors of all kinds. Based in SG, I am looking for a change of scenery from my rented apartment and for one night only. Lucky I did select Hilton. Since I'm alone it is perfect for me. Starting with the location, just right off

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional service from the executive lounge team
desc: I did a quick weekend staycation at Hilton Singapore as part of my mattress run strategy to requalify for Diamond status for 2022. Compared to normal times, the staycation experience during the covid-19 period has undeniably been a watered down one. This is of no fault to the hotel, as we are currently in extraordinary times. For example, there is no room makeup in the morning (understandably to minimize human contact). Also, the breakfast buffet and evening canapes have been reduced to set meals. And water dispenser in the gym has also been removed. Nonetheless, the executive lounge experience has been nothing short of being amazing. The attentstive and affable staff went out of the way to deliver an exemplar evening cocktail experience, despite being massively shorthanded.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: We were very happy with our staycation because of the spaciousness of the room. I personally will definitely go back to Hilton again for more birthday staycation. Been telling my friends about Hilton too 😂 I want to thank you Walid Ouezini for the cakes from D9 Cakery. Didn’t expect to see 2 pieces as it was my grand niece birthday. So it was indeed a nice surprise to see the carrot cake too The carrot cake is really chock full of walnuts and grated carrots 🥕 . After eating it we actually bought 2 more pieces home to enjoy 🤭. Compliments to the Bakery Chef.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely stay.
desc: Stayed for a night at Hilton Singapore for our wedding anniversary. What can i say, top class and great room. I would like to highlight that nice japanese relationship manager Namiko is extremely helpful and certainly made our day awesome,,memorable and beautiful. Recommended at all times and thank you very much.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Poor Communication and Recognition of Diamond Members
desc: Having stayed at this property countless times and as a Hilton Diamond member, I was elated when this was the first Hilton property that opened up for staycation after the circuit breaker. However, due to Covid-19, I noticed many changes (mostly for the worse with limited attempts to make up for the lost experiences) that made the stay a far less memorable one compared to my previous stays, and it is also exacerbated by the lack of upfront communication about these changes. Firstly, while the lounge has 'reopened', it was not revealed till I asked about it that it is only open for 2 hours a day for evening cocktail (530 - 730pm, and booking has to be made for either 530pm or 630pm slot). This essentially means that there is no more all-day beverage in the lounge nor afternoon

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: For The Business Traveller
desc: Very conveniently located in the heart of Orchard Road, Hilton is literally a stone throw away from many of the famous shopping centres such as ION & Ngee Ann City and near the CBD of Singapore. Traditionally, Hilton is one of the old school names in the hospitality industry but more well known globally as a Business Traveller’s hotel rather than a luxury hotel. Similar to the likes of the Hilton chain globally, Hilton Singapore has everything a Business traveller would be looking for. Clean, comfy bed, in the heart of down town. Not exactly the biggest nor newest rooms we have stayed in, but the one thing Hilton has is consistency throughout the globe. All in all, if you are travelling for business, Hilton would probably be your ideal choice as you know what to expect. If

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hits and Misses
desc: Stayed in October utilising the Opus Steak-acation offer. When we booked, the Tomahawk was included in the selection. However it is now listed that top up is required. Explained to the staff when ordering and glad it was honoured. Dinner at Opus is definitely the highlight of the stay. Food was great (the flambé by the Chef for the Tomahawk, Foie Gras and even the bread!) and service was excellent, especially by Manickam (I hope I got his name right). It was an anniversary stay and was delighted that this was acknowledged by the Hotel, we had a nice card and a Hilton Lion to bring home. The room was fine. It is an older hotel, but at least it's clean. Other than at Opus, the service in the Hotel seems spotty. I'm sure the staff are trying their best but they seem to be

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 3D2N staycation
desc: Room: Spacious, big bed, TV with many channels selection. Service: Request for toiletries came without shampoo. Used cups and saucers not replaced, when housekeeping came in to replace toiletries. Btw, no housekeeping service during the 3D2N stay due to their COVID measures, only can replenish toiletries. Some staff' attitude towards guests could be improved (one woman staff questioned us in a condescending manner when we were in the lift going up to the pool if we had made an appointment, we just wanted to take a look and were not dressed to swim btw), while some are quite helpful (the night receptionist gave us some disposable chopsticks from their own pantry when our food delivery came without it). Breakfast: Multiple servings available. Taste ok, but expect something better

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Looking for a Staycation? Don't stay here
desc: Don't usually write poor reviews but my recent stay at the Hilton Singapore was highly unsatisfactory. As a Hilton Diamond I have some basic expectations and these were not met. 1. Benefits: I was denied entry to the executive lounge due to capacity restrictions. Priority is given to guests who check-in earlier than me, which is an absurd rule. Instead a bottle of wine and some snacks are sent to the room and no top-ups are allowed -- how does this make sense? 2. Room: No welcome gift. Executive rooms are advertised as having 50" TVs, but this is completely false (and acknowledged by the front office). The room itself is also extremely outdated and it's ironic that the Premium rooms (one category lower) are actually newer -- but no one tells you this. 3. When I requested

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice Place To Stay In Orchard
desc: I have a great experience stay in Hilton Singapore. The hotel staff were attentive and friendly. The dinner at Opus Bar and Grill was fantastic. This hotel is near to main shopping malls and eateries.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Absolutely clean
desc: Booked the HSBC 2 night staycation and had a lovely restful stay. The decor in the room and throughout the hotel is minimalist, a little retro in the bedroom with its 70s style bathroom but still sleek and co-ordinator. Loved the ergonomic working desk and chair which allows for comfortable working-from-hotel conditions. Amenities were musky Crabtree n Evelyn shower products which we enjoyed greatly. Instructions for shower hot and cold, pressure were clear and precise. There was a coffee machine which we didn't need to use as we enjoyed good coffee at breakfast. We noticed that like the decor, service was generally discreet and unobtrusive, swift check-ins and out with a minimum of fuss. A high point was the absolute cleanliness in the whole hotel, from rooms, gym and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: satisfied!
desc: Really satisfied and happy during my stay with Hilton Singapore. Smooth check-in procedure. The lady (i believe her name was Jamie), explained thoroughly throughout the check in process. The room was decorated as me and my partner are celebrating our anniversary. In the evening, we received a sparkling drink from the staff to celebrate our anniversary. The male malay staff (i’m sorry we didn’t get your name) had the courtesy to ask if we want alcohol or non-alcohol since we are Malay. Also, since we booked Executive Plus room, we were entitled for the evening cocktail. Again, we were greeted by a friendly gentleman (i’m sorry i didn’t get your name either) at the front desk of the lounge. He also asked out of respect for our choice of drinks since they serve alcohol. Overall our

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location - dealing with COVID
desc: As I live in Singapore, I have not stayed at Hilton before, but being Diamond HHonors, I know what to expect. So the service is skimpier with the expected loss of buffet breakfast and Executive Lounge offerings, which is more limited but the food was very good. The rooms (renovated) are OK, but nothing special. I did note a previous post said "NO USB CHARGING POINT IN ROOM!" which is not correct...there are 2 USB charging points on the clock radio.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation Honeymoon
desc: We stayed after our wedding weekend & the staff has been super helpful and friendly - from check-in to the room service. The room is spacious & the bathroom is adequately equipped as well. They gave us a later checkout timing which helps a lot. Thanks Hilton!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: NO USB CHARGING POINT IN ROOM!
desc: 👎room has no USB charging point. We brought along the cable but not the adapter. Checked at front desk and they have none. This is unacceptable. Given that we we stayed nearby, we drove home to pick up the adapter. 👎called front desk to ask for a bucket of ice and was told to scan the QR code to request at no charge. After the call and a long chat with Rayana, she told me that bucket of ice will only be provided with order of food/drink. Told her I needed ice for the complimentary bottled drink in the room. I was not planning to order any food/drink. As the conversation was going nowhere, I called up front desk and asked to speak to the manager. The male front desk staff asked if he could help and explained that it is the hotel policy which I found it to be totally

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Warmest and most friendly Hilton hotel ever
desc: I made a reservation for my sister, who had experienced a bad period of time at that time, and I asked politely Hilton SG in order to take care of my sister during the stay. Claire, who was communicating with me at that time on the phone, immediately told me that they could offer my sister free breakfast and free wifi as a goodwill gesture. I was even more surprised that they even upgraded the room for providing a more enjoyable stay. I really appreciate that. Furthermore, on the date of checking-in, my sister told me that their staff gave her a mascot of the Hilton SG lion and even a cake for her! I was totally surprised that they really helped to take care of my sister during the whole stay! I have to admit that this is the first time that I have ever experienced the most

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Reduced Hilton member benefits
desc: COVID-19 has reduced Hilton member benefits due to social distancing measures. The lounge is only open for 1hr in the evening for basic evening cocktails. The hotel has also ceased providing in-room ammenity benefit. One staff who stood out during our stay was Jasmine at the lounge and we would like to thank her for excellent service and positive attitude.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Clean and pleasant stay
desc: Brought my family for a staycation and was pleased with the level of cleanliness within the hotel. Service was great too! One point to note is the limited options at breakfast (understandably so in this climate). Will be back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing stay
desc: I just relocated to Singapore with my wife and 3 girls, and Hilton Singapore has been our home for our first 2 months in the country. We first served our SHN at the hotel and then stayed while we were looking for our new home. There are few words to describe how exceptional everyone has been at the hotel. I mean everyone !! The entire team went above and beyond to anticipate our needs and ensure we felt at home and special. From the housekeeping team, the room service team, the breakfast team, the bellmen, the front desk, the guest services, the Chefs, the maintenance team, the team at the entrance. There is nothing like coming back from a long day at the office and being greeted with smiles from everyone as soon as you enter the hotel. We also celebrated my daughter's birthday

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Staycation 🛋🛏
desc: We decided to celebrate my birthday here and our stay was perfect. Quite hesitated at first to have a staycation this time but upon seeing their CleanStay program, we are sure that our room is clean and disinfected. The bed was comfortable and we love the office chair which is perfect if you are wfh. The staff are great and quickly attended to our needs. We would definitely come back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not spectacular but services from some staff were great
desc: Booked two packages offered on KLOOK. One with rooftop dining at Il Cielo and the other for the Treasure of the sea high tea. The price tag of the rooftop dinner + room = $430 after taxes. The usual price of the set dinner is $138 per pax. Wine pairing of four glasses of 50ml to add $50 per pax. Food is great. Had the Italian set. But the Japanese set looks interesting too. The high tea was not bad.. not a fan of seafood but they were fresh. Room is quite a disaster to be honest. Old marble finishing. Brownish carpet. Needs a major overhaul. breakfast is ala carte and do expect it to be slow. needs to pre book. And 45 mins grace (thou i have not seen them chasing anyone who went beyond that - guess they realised that they were a tad slow) Some service staff were

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A little dated but their service standard must be commended!
desc: My family booked 2 rooms for 2 nights in the Hilton Singapore along Orchard Road last week. The hotel is ideally located in Orchard road and within walking distance to train station and malls. Check-in was smooth and we were greeted by the friendly staff, Namiko and were quickly attended to. Throughout the stay, we received personalised messages to check if we needed anything... The rooms were very clean and tidy. Both our rooms were facing the main road but we could hardly hear any noise. Bathroom was clean but the decoration was a little outdated. On day 2, we had breakfast in the hotel. I guess it was the school holidays and the hotel was packed and under-staff. However, the waiters and waitresses were trying all they can to see to our needs though they were required to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bday Staycations
desc: We had two staycays in Hilton. Both to celebrate our birthdays. As im an Honors member and am not able to travel out on special dates like how we used to, we decided to finally try locally. First stay’s first impression ... nothing what we expected. Prolly we got too pampered frm the other Hiltons we have stayed before that it didn quite meet our expectations here. Honestly, nothing of what i saw on their insta that actually convinced me how cool it will be to stay here. Little that i know .. most posts are usually of Influencers. Oh yess .. ive got my first hand experience. Here goes ... So what i loved about Hilton? Amidst the lack of service from some of the floor staffs esp on our first stay, i had a good safe assurance here in Hilton Sg for their room are cleaned and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional service, clean but dated rooms
desc: Celebrated my birthday here and couldn’t be happier with the service we received; Polished and prompt yet personable. Special mention to Walid who went out of his way to expedite our check-in process and being such a joy to chat with. While the rooms recently underwent a light refresh, there are still unmissable dated elements and finishes. However, rooms were clean which was most importantly. Rooftop pool enjoys exceptional sun for sun worshippers and the large gym sports brand new equipment. Location is perfect too being a short stroll from the heart of Orchard road, but slightly off such that it’s away from the crowds Excited for my next stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Staycation
desc: Just completed a 2 weeks staycation here. The hotel was well located at the quieter end of Orchard Road with the main shopping stretch just a few minutes walk away. Tanglin Mall was a comfortable 5-10 mins stroll in the other direction. The rooms were of a decent size, and i had no issue working from the room. I would strongly recommend paying the extra and getting the premium rooms with the rain showers. Kudos to the Opus bar team, especially Joel Matthias. It was truly a pleasure settling my meals with

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: great room great food great service
desc: recently stayed at the hilton and was so impressed with the location the service given by the staff the quality of the food the room the equipment at the gym thoroughly recommend to anyone travelling to Singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 2 night staycay
desc: Hilton Singapore location is perfect. Walking distance to all the shopping malls and makan places in Orchard Road. The room had a desk with a very comfortable ergonomic chair for wor-kation.....No complains on the Hilton bed. Exeutive lounge alcoholic beverages is limited to 1 type of red, white, prosecco and beer. Brekfast was alright.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Quite disappointed
desc: Disappointed with my check in yesterday. Got the rooms late, one at 4.30pm and the other at 5.30pm. When we finally got the room, housekeeping did a terrible rushed job. There was a huge stain on the carpet, which I’ve informed the counter twice who told me housekeeping will be coming up but no one came. There was also a room-service tray outside the room from the previous guests and that was not cleared even till late night. Extra pillows were dirty which is really appalling. Mentioned that one of the guest who is a new mum will be celebrating her birthday. No special arrangement aside from someone dropped off a slice of cheesecake, no candles no birthday sign. didn't even know it was for the birthday, just thought it was sent by mistake at first. staffs were not the warmest as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Still alright
desc: With international travel out of the way, the hotel was brimming with staycation guests immediately after it reopened. In light of the unique situation, I am rating it 4/5, otherwise, under normal circumstances, this stay was at best a 3/5. The main issue was that as the hotel was operating with a reduced team of staff, the hotel was clearly not equipped to handle the sudden influx of large crowds and cope with the additional COVID-19 measures required during this period. So there was a sizeable crowd and queue when I checked in at 3pm. I queued for about 30 minutes, took about 15 minutes for the checkin process (as there were 2 rooms involved), and waited another 20-30 minutes (we got 1 room earlier) for our rooms. I must compliment Xiu Chen, the front office executive who

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Dated hotel badly in need of refurbishment.
desc: Just completed a two night stay at the Hilton, my second in three months. I stayed in the Premium room during both my stays because I did not want the shower and tub combo in the other room types. There were cleanliness issues during both stays. My first stay had many fruit flies (some of them drowned in the ice bucket) and my second stay had stains all over the room. The rooms are also in a poor condition. The shower flooded the entire toilet during my first stay. There were also peeling wallpaper and cupboards that were barely hanging on to their hinges.
