The lift keycard scanner is not very responsive which resulted in me being stuck in the lift. The lift lobby at the guest room levels also looks like they were stuck in 1980. Parking is severely limited and the car

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Loved this grand old dame!!
desc: Booked the Hilton foodie staycation from 24 - 25 Nov with my family and I must say, everyone in the family was superbly satisfied with what Hilton has to offer. Granted that this hotel is past its prime and requires some renovation work, the staff at Hilton made up for it by providing impeccable services throughout our stay. Special shout out to Mr Kenny from the check in counter. You have made our stay unforgettable and we are looking forward to the next staycation at Hilton again. Ps. If you are a huge steak lover... u have got to try the tomahawk wagyu beef at opus!! Thumbs up!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation in Singapore!
desc: Hello Hilton! Would like to compliment all the staff including the housekeeping, reservation team and front desk for making my stay a very memorable one. From the front desk and reservation team, Ms Eugenie, and Mr Joshua has ensured that my reservation was intact and made special arrangments to upgrade my room, including preparing a birthday amenity to celebrate my girlfriend's birthday. This special touch to go the extra mile to make the stay here a pleasant one is indeed commendable. The housekeeping team, though always busy, tried their best to attend to our requests for extra towels,etc. and always keeping their beautiful smiles and warm hospitality. Kudos to the team and a big thank you!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Classic Hilton
desc: My experience had Hilton Singapore was extremely pleasant. When I first arrived at this centrally located hotel, I noticed that the decor and exterior of the building seemed a bit dated. However, it slowly grew on me and I realised why there was a queue to check-in soon after. The staff were polite and professional. I was swiftly checked into my room and the staff even made special arrangements for a birthday celebration that I requested for. My room was situated near the corner of the 17th floor, with magnificent views of the quieter side of Orchard Road. The room, albeit dated like the rest of the hotel, boasted an extremely comfortable king sized bed, with plenty of room for an additional bed and working spaces. The surrounding of the hotel was a great mix peace and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Staycation at Hilton Singapore for the first time due to Covid season. Being an Honors member, I been to few Hilton hotels in the ASEAN regions including Malaysia and Thailand. For the one in Singapore, it is my first time and it didn’t disappoint me. As the parking lot was limited, (we were almost told to park at the building beside with a one time exit ticket only) and there was a slight delay for checking in, we start to wonder if we made the right choice to choose Hilton Singapore. To our surprise, apart from the hiccups at the start, the entire 3D2N stay were actually very smooth. Throughout our entire stay, Staffs are polite and checked on our well-being during our breakfast and dinner at the Opus Grill. This time to time initiative make us feel very homely. The

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation at hilton
desc: The room is clean and well maintained. Service at Opus Bar & Grill is awesome. Special shout out to Manickam, Joel and Zawhan for their great service and attention. Keep up the good work guys! Will definitely come again!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Relaxed & Recharge
desc: Returned as Diamond member with warmth welcoming and efficient reception staff. Special mentioned to Kenny who recognized me when I was just in the Queue and his attentiveness at the Club Lounge. As usual enjoyed my stay overall. Just a small setback at the restaurant, Opus. Had lunch there and observed staff services was lacking and attentiveness. Great room as was upgraded to Executive Plus, thanks to Claire for this arrangement. Room super clean and spacious with a balcony.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stellar Service
desc: Stellar service from start to end. My family and I stayed at the Hilton under the Foodie Experience promotion, and it was nothing short of memorable. Check In: From the moment we were greeted at reception, we were greeted by Kenny (I hope I got his name right!) who assisted us with the check-in process and kindly offered us two connecting rooms upon their availability. Kenny also assisted us to make arrangements for the birthday boy (it was my father's birthday and Kenny had graciously prepared a surprise for him, but more on that later). The Rooms: We booked a King Deluxe and Twin Deluxe room, both of which were in pristine condition when we entered. Carpets were evidently vacuumed and clean and the beds were lined with crisp sheets. Props to the cleaning staff for going the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bad customer service
desc: Called in to cancel my steak-cation on 1 Nov because something came up on the date I booked and couldn't make it. Customer service on the call was bad, rudely told me the booking is non-cancellation even though I mentioned the email states otherwise. After checking she replied that she will allow cancellation on a one-time exception basis, told her the email specifically says I can cancel for free by 14 Nov, and all she told me was "so I cancel for you already what"... Very rude. Was planning to book another date in future, but no.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation in Orchard Road
desc: We took up the credit card promotion and stayed over weekends. The package was attractive and we were happy to get a free upgrade. The premium room at the 18th floor was very nice and we liked it. The breakfast was acceptable and we really enjoyed the service both from check-in and dining. The location is good and very close to all the places that we like.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Deepavali staycay - warm & welcoming
desc: Great location in Orchard Road. Efficient checkin. Good safety measures. Tasty food. Enjoyed our executive club staycay though we now have to pre-book our breakfast and drinks when we checked in. Only one hour for breakfast and drinks. Discovered there were no more of the buffet spread we used to enjoy. But the customer service teams at the breakfast and drinks at the lounge serving the set menu and top ups definitely made it lovely and enjoyable. Thank you to Kenny for his sunny & smiling greetings and Ann at breakfast at the allotted breakfast hour. Thanks to everyone for the smiles over the masks and lovely chats, Sharim, Jasmine, Boo and Claire for the welcoming & friendly service. We felt pampered while you kept us safe. Housekeeping did a good job. And our requests for

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An establishment that’s been around a long time
desc: Did a staycation at Hilton Singapore. It’s an old brand name in the hotel industry. Room rate was very affordable. Room was nice and spacious. Clean and bright. Comfortable bed. Staff was very busy with the high rate of occupancy. They were professional in carrying out their responsibilities but not extremely friendly. Understandable that safe measurement measures are in place and need to be strictly adhered to. The lift leading to the lobby was not in use. That means you have to drag your luggage up the side of the hotel to the main lobby. This was quite inconvenient. There is limited parking space in the basement car park. So even if they allow multiple exits and entries you are not assured of a parking lot when you return. That’s something to bear in mind. Rooms are cleaned

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Okay stay but a bit understaff
desc: Hotel was okay but can see that they are a bit understaffed. Perhaps management should looking into getting for staff especially given the busy season now. Service wise, staff was always polite and courtesy. Perhaps that was the reason they forgot to prepare a surprise for my wife's birthday despite confirmation. Service recovery was attempted but I did not grant their request to enter my room to tidy up. Much to my horror, when I returned to my room, they had prepared a surprise when I had explicitly told them not to. Not too sure why they staff had bothered to asked permission to enter my room for it since. Steakcation was a great idea, however the tomahawk I had had a bit too much fat, which meant the disk was a bit too jelak at the end. Surprisingly, the best pairing was

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Had a slight hiccup, service is impeccable
desc: Had stains on my pillowcase, within the hour, pillow cases were changed, service recovery with wine, came and chocolates were sent up. Rooms were switched. Agnes, the front desk assistant manager was very understanding and had great service! Hotel was near the main shopping belt, experience was fuss free!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: The hotel staff are remarkable. I actually didn’t expect to see a lot of people checking in on a Monday. But they all tried to give the same level of hospitality and assistance. I also want to acknowledge the lady front desk when I checked in. Her name is Hannah. I asked if I there’s a birthday upgrade and she politely told me she would check and she accommodated me. I appreciate the gesture. Even the staff who assisted me at the lift. The breakfast is now served as set but it’s okay still filling and I can say the hotel did try to uphold the clean and safety protocol overall. I never felt afraid to spend my staycation outside our home and glad I chose Hilton. Kudos and hopefully the hotel industry pick up soon

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Cancellation Request for Steak-cation
desc: Was required to call-in to cancel my Steak-cation as system was unable to support this request. Cancellation over phone was picked up by a friendly employee and it was done without much issue. Subsequently I had book similar stay in Dec 20.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: amazing service!
desc: all staff in the hotel extremely friendly and approachable! special mention to front desk Brandon who went the extra mile to deliver flowers to my room as per my request. also male indian concierge who assisted with my check-out despite not being his job scope. definitely returning again soon!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Everything that went wrong turned into a great experience
desc: It was a busy day checking in on 13th Dec. My wife and I had a problem with the booking problem at the front desk in which we were told we did not get the package intended, we had decided to cancel the stay. It was quite upsetting, with the kids with us and everything packed for the staycation. But I have to say, 2 people there helped turned this into a wonder experience for my family by turning our problem around to help us with the accommodation and booking with the restaurant. We enjoyed the stay, not to mention the great services offered by the hotel and restaurant staffs. I would give it 6 stars for the hospitality if there was any. Special thanks to Mr. Walid and Namiko (Sorry if I spelt your names wrong :P) Definitely enjoyable and a recommended place to stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Stayed under the gourmet staycation. Check-in was crazy as there are so many people there as it’s the school holidays now. Room was not ready even though i checked in at 3pm. The staff was nice enough to let us have a seat in their opus restaurant and serve us lemon tea and some matcha cake while waiting for the room. The bedroom is dated and in dire need of renovations. I got lounge access. Lounge is newly renovated and staff service there is good. But breakfast and food at the evening cocktails can be improved. The gym is well equipped and big and I am impressed. The pool on the other hand is very small. IL Cielo restaurant is good and worth trying.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mid week staycation at the Hilton
desc: My first time trying this hotel earlier this month for a mid week 1 night staycation. We got a very good rate of around $150 on trip.com without breakfast (but bizarrely enough including some cheesecake from the D9 Cakery). Checkin was crowded and took close to 20 mins including the waiting. Allocated a room facing the Orchard rd side not far from the lifts (despite requesting end of corridor). Room was in good condition and seemed recently renovated. Comfortable king size bed and a large flat screen tv (which unfortunately was positions such that it was impossible to insert a USB). Rain shower but no bath. Crabtree & Evelyn toiletries. Quite noisy: stomping from upstairs & slamming doors in corridor. Unreliable wifi: too slow for streaming so ended up using 4G. Small pool on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycay to refresh the soul!
desc: Alrighty! Me and wifey went for a staycay after months and months of crazy work!. Bought KLOOK voucher $288 for one night stay that comes with High Tea Set. And woah - LOBSTERS & OYSTERS. The room is old school but yet cozy. Comes with a tub which we had a LUSH bubble bath. All in all - HILTON 👍🏻

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome Stay
desc: Booked Hilton SG for a staycation for the wife’s birthday. Everything was smooth. Check in was at 3pm but since it was the Christmas weekend, we decided to queue early to avoid the crowd. Even so, there was already a crowd in the queue even at 2pm. One of the staff on duty spotted me fiddling the Hilton app and we got directed to advance our queue. And the whole check in process was less than 10 mins with the help from Kenny. He also gifted the Hilton plush toy to the birthday girl. We were given the 22nd floor and it has a nice view (sunrise in the morning from the balcony). Room condition was good and spacious. Toilet is equipped with the standard amenities plus a bathtub/shower. Bed was comfortable with the extra pillows in the cupboard. In room safe available. And due to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Tired-looking furnishings but a comfortable stay nonetheless
desc: This is a rather belated review of a staycation I took during the school holidays, partly as a sort of mileage run for Hilton Honors points. Arriving at the peak of check-in hour, I was in the queue at reception for about thirty minutes. But everyone appeared to be in a good mood and in no rush. When I got to the front of the line, the staff was friendly and got my booking sorted out fairly quickly. I had selected an executive king room that came with a rather large balcony. The bed was large and comfortable albeit a little lumpy. The bathroom was adequate although samll and not spectacular. Overall, a comfortable room although the furnishings were somewhat tired-looking and had seen better days. There were so-so views of Orchard Road from the rather large (exposed)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Steakcation was perfect!
desc: Had a staycation on Dec 16 and everything was great! Check in at noon was guaranteed and was a breeze. Thank you. We were given an upgraded room at level 19. The room was huge, basic and although we were informed it is refurbished, it still look kinda dated. But it was clean and spacious. Usage of pool must be pre-booked and we were unable to secure a booking at our preferred timing but it was ok as the pool was pretty small. We understood the hotel is doing its best to ensure safe distancing. We had our dinner pre booked at 7pm but the hotel. It was perfect! Service was so so good. I am so sorry i forgot the names of the waiters but they did so so well. I supposed he is the restaurant manager by the name of M, he was extremely detailed and accommodating. Nothing is too

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very dated
desc: Before booking my stay, of course i did my research. I’m aware that the hotel is quite old but was really surprised by how dated the room is. I guess i was still expecting an “old but still well maintained” sort of hotel stay since this is hilton. The room felt like your typical three stars hotel room, just bigger. Their tv is very old it doesnt even support HD. The only selling point i would say is just the location for tourists since it’s just a short stroll away from the busy street of orchard. The staffs are so nice tho!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not worth the staycation
desc: I wouldn’t recommend this hotel to Hilton members. We stayed on numerous occasions during 4Q 2020 and found the rooms to be dated and the hotel short-handed on manpower. On one stay, the entire vanity counter of the bathroom collapsed while there was a stale smell on another stay. These were rectified but there was no offer of service recovery. To be fair, the hotel did recognise its members with room upgrades, early check-in and late check-out as well as breakfast, but it is the extra service which was sorely lacking during COVID-19. The hotel seemed more keen to market itself with “influencers” rather than its loyal members.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Feel better by expecting less
desc: Overall, an average rating. Fully booked status had left a minority of staff stressed out, unable to cope with the influx of hotel guests. Stay was not booked with SG Rediscover voucher. Arrived early to process check in and room was ready by 3pm, which was great work. Check-in staff was impatient with handling queries despite the short line at 10AM. Chope is used for gym bookings, and stalled on Safari app — manager came around to resolve the issue. Requested for memory foam pillow due to neck problems, initially staff did not seem to be aware of this option, after numerous back and forth, it was resolved. Guests are encouraged to use the chat feature to contact front desk, which was met with delayed responses of up to 30 minutes. Fridge was totally non functional (bottle of

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Inconsistent service but recovered well
desc: Arrived to a very busy reception. Fortunately, there was a priority queue for Diamond members. (Off peak, the priority queue became one for all Hhonors members). As I had arrived early, the Premium rooms I had booked were not ready. Reception managed to find another two rooms for early check-in (11+am instead of 3pm). Unfortunately, they were non Premium rooms (unrenovated rooms on lower floors). Once this was pointed out, another set of my rooms were assigned. Although these were on the Executive floor (and so higher category than the Premium rooms I had booked), they were not renovated. I decided not to pursue this for a one night stay. The digital key app worked well, except for the elevators where at least 2 out of 4 could only work with a key card. The electric kettle

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Impressed with the service!
desc: Check in was a breeze and Brandon is friendly and efficient, even check with me if everything is ok in the evening.Room look and smell clean,lol. Did not manage to have dinner at opus but was touch that Joel the manager took the effort to call me and apologize (not his fault) on the unavailability of the timing I want. This is the service that cannot be replace digitally

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation with Hilton Singapore 11-13 Dec 20
desc: I must give good credit to you and your teams that makes our stay in your hotel an awesome and with good experience from 11-13 December 20 during this COVID period. The extra miles that your staff put in from the start we step into the hotel. The groups distancing are well managed and we have no issued at all from check-in to check-out, and it was all well control, really very impressive. Your staff contributions go beyonds our expectations and to accommodate our requests and that never fail us. We were surely come back for our future stay with Hilton Hotels in Singapore or other countries. Trust that we were recommend Hilton Hotel to our relatives and friends for the good gesture. I am really thankful and may your teams continue to stay healthy while serving and doing

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation 29/11-30-/11/20
desc: Check-in was smooth. The receptionist was quite snooty. But he’s not rude. Room was bright, clean & spacious. The housekeeping staff Fiona was very friendly & helpful. She attended to our requests promptly. Overall, had a great stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday 🥳 Trip
desc: Everything went great during our two nights stay. Only difference I guess was the COVID-19 restrictions. We’re so used to have food selections at the lounge for breakfast or cocktails. We were served instead and had to book a time slot for meals. Other downside was there was no bidet spray in our bathroom. So used to have this option in other hotels that we’ve forgotten to request for one. Service was excellent of course and they didn’t forget my birthday as usual and that’s why Hilton is the best! 👍🏼😊

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfort staycation
desc: Now covid, so stay in spore. Rm big, clean and comfortable. App for digital key problem., Thought can avoid queue. Kena stuck with long queue cos many spore checkin and as usual kiasu ask for many things. I If app ok, easy for everyone and no queue.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice room but old toilet
desc: The location was great and super central and the restaurant at the lobby was pretty decent. However the TV in the room was really slow, I wished it could play netflix but but it was a lot more ancient than that. The bathroom was quite old too

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Rather underwhelming...
desc: Stayed two times so far due to promotions, but my rates were not as good as the recent ones. Alright, first, the standard rooms are old and pretty small. The only big one is the suite. One of the room I stayed was the premium room for the upgraded shower (space again is pretty small..) Not sure if it's worth the additional amount to upgrade as I could get rain shower even from cheap boutique hotels (other staycations). Soundproofing is really bad, I could hear occupants from next door if they were conversing loudly and even heard their TV.. Nothing to shout about for the breakfast, rather basic, ranks low among the staycations I went recently. Same for the evening fare served at the executive lounge, kind of dismal.. However, service was pretty good though the team seem pretty

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A wonderful staycation at the Hilton! Will do it again!
desc: The Hilton is one of those brand names in the hotel industry with a long tradition that you know will always not disappoint. I have been to the Hilton for various events in the past, but never as a guest. This staycation would be my first time staying at this property, and, boy, it was a great experience. Now, its always good to know that the building has been around since 1970! So of course from the outside it looks dated and old fashioned compared to the other newer sparkling hotels. But once you get past the staid facade, that is where the magic begins. The property has gone through several rounds of renovation and upgrading, and the lobby is a shining example. The layout is spacious, bright and welcoming, unlike the property at my previous staycation. The check-in

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Consistent Great Service by Executive Lounge Manager
desc: Having stayed here at Hilton Singapore a couple of times since the hotel opened up, I’ve consistently received great service provided by Pei Xuan. Thanks for always keeping the service standard at its best!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: No longer a 5 star hotel..
desc: Booked the Steak-cation package this December with my boys, thinking Hilton is a 5-star hotel. But experience was really not what I had expected from a 5 star hotel. × Dirty (found accumulated dust near the head rest of the bed) x Staff who are not friendly or helpful (not all though). When checking in, it is protocol for the frontdesk staff to ask, "How may I help you?" and of course, I attempted to answer that question by saying, "I booked a room and would like to check in." Only, I didn't even get to complete my sentence since she decided to cut in and demand for my i/c. If she didn't want my answer, perhaps, don't ask the question. Just greet and politely ask for my identification. That would have been much better. Once, my boys and I were caught in a downpour. I was

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A good service given.
desc: Good day Hilton Hotel, I will like to take some time to praise this employer named Hannah for the excellent service. During my stay she had been giving me the best service she could from checking in to assist me in the issue I faced till she personally deliver the items I need which I enquire for my needs during my stay. The excellent service is greatly appreciated and is a great learning experience for the hotel staffs. Special request for this towel design deco for my hotel stay as well.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Enjoyable steak-cation!
desc: Having read prior reviews of the Hilton steakcation, we were not expecting much but as it turned out, the staycation exceeded our expectations and we look forward to returning should such an offer arise again. Pros: - Check-in process on a Sunday was smooth; the room was not ready yet when we arrived at 12 but the staff gave us a call at 130pm to let us know that it was ready - The breakfast - both American and Asian (the fish porridge) were tasty. There was free flow of coffee, pastries, fruits and muesli. - Despite the crowds, the staff remained polite and pleasant. - Yes, the room is dated. But the relatively lower price for a 5-star hotel along Orchard Road also reflects this. The bed was comfortable and we had a good night's rest. - I thought the steakcation deal of

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good standards
desc: Booked 2 months ago. Checking in was conducted with COVID-19 safe distancing measures. Ushered for drinks while waiting for check in. No long wait. Room was cleaned. Premises not overcrowded as they practised booking n implement safe distancing measures. We do see many families with young children but it’s not noisy at all. Breakfast, use of facilities all required booking via app. Efficient n helpful. Staff was cordial n attentive. Response for more toiletries do take a while. Room cleaning not done daily...which is manageable. We enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Poor check-in experience
desc: Had a 3d2n stay here with HSBC offer which was a good deal. This was the first time I stayed at Hilton, I usually frequent Marriott or IHG hotels as I used these chains for business travels. We reached the hotel at 3pm and it took a while to reach the front of the queue to be checked in. Room was not available then, so we were ushered to wait in Opus bar & grill restaurant, with drinks and cakes served. We were told to wait there for our room will be ready. 2h+ passed and the staff still have no clue when our room will be ready, and we had a dinner reservation somewhere else at 6pm. It was unacceptable that the hotel did not provide update nor any estimate on when our room will be ready. We could have spent the 2h+ somewhere else in Orchard than waiting at the restaurant. We

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good stay
desc: Check in was smooth, there is a waiting area for my family and they provided drinks while waiting. Room is spacious and clean and i love the working desk, my wife use that for her night class on fri. Staff was nice and friendly except for 1 at the dining area, i think she is a part timer because she is wearing different uniform. Breakfast needs more variety and i thought sat & sun they will have a slightly different menu. Overall it is still a nice place for a staycation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful steakcation!
desc: What an awesome experience! This is such a worthy deal! The service was impeccable. My wines are constantly refilled, the beef was so well cooked and the sauces are aplenty. Only wished more mustard choices. The room was also very very clean! Hot water didn’t had to wait and was almost instantaneous. I seriously recommend u to just stay here even for just one night ! Kudos to the team at Hilton and Opus!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 2 nighg stay
desc: Crowded at 3pm checkin, but snacks provided. Attentive and efficient staff. Free room wifi. Very limited free parking at basement. Room cleaning only on alternate days due Covid. Gym 90min limit. Pool 60min limit.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service was not bad but tv is an antique
desc: Booked the foodie staycation for a getaway in Singapore due to Covid. The room was alright with the basics and the service was good. But the TV is an antique so bring your other forms of entertainment.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: New year Staycation
desc: Book via klook for 2d1n (jan 1-2) hightea staycation for new year celebrations. Hightea was delicious with champagne. Although hotel room is aged, but hotel services was excellent. Will be gg for another steakcation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Met all my needs!
desc: I'm a Marriott / Starwood guy but they were sold out this week so we were booked at the Hilton. Totally blown away by the staff, breakfast and the lounge. I cannot say enough good things about this hotel — but I have to get to at least 200 characters. Whatever…

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Services
desc: Staycation at Hilton to celebrate our 6th years wedding anniversary. Sweet surprised from Opus restaurant with a cheesecake end our meal. Although the room look old, but it was kept very clean and neat. It surprised us with a lovely folded swan towel decor on the bed. Sweet thoughts from the Hilton. Good for a short break.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointment
desc: Stayed at Hilton for one night in January for a staycation. It's a old hotel but rooms are still in a good and well maintained condition. For the price that I paid and the location that it's in, I didn't have any complaints. But what upset and disappoint me was that I bought drinks back to the room and the fridge in the room wasn't cold so I asked for a bucket of ice. The reply I got was that I have to order in room dining and only then they will get the bucket of ice to be send together. If not I have to go down to their bar and get my own bucket of ice from the bar. I've stayed at many 5 star hotels in Singapore and this is the first time that I've heard of this. Truly a disappointment and will never stay here again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pleasantly pleased
desc: The check in process was rather efficient, I had nobody infront forming a queue maybe. Beds and pillows were abit soft to my liking. Room was spacious. Nice gesture on the hotel's part, sending messages checking on us after checking in. Dinner service at the Opus was nice, only gripe was a relatively darker corner of the restaurant which I was seated at, but in all it was still cosy.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing and relax staycation
desc: All staffs were tip-top at their services. Felt amazingly welcome from the time we checked in till checked out. Even have a message to ask about how is the room after we checked in. The dinner at Opus Bar & Grill was fantastic too! :))

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good staycation experience
desc: Hotel was good even though it is a bit old furnishing Service was excellent. Check in/out process was very smooth. We have been given $30 dining voucher as we booked through trip.com & 2 cheese cake voucher to be redeemed from D9 Cakery- It is really worth! The only thing we can complain was the water pressure for hand shower- abit too low & TV is abit too small. Overall it has been nice experience for our staycation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable and enjoyable
desc: I stayed at the Hilton Singapore (Orchard Road) as part of a short “staycation” in early January. I specifically picked the Singapore Hilton due to its proximity to Orchard Road and it’s associated shopping and dining areas. The hotel lived up to all my expectations! Right from the pre-stay emails confirming my arrival time, the check-in, the service in the bars and restaurants and the check-out, everything was conducted efficiently and politely, with what I felt is the right amount of friendliness balanced with professionalism. Although the hotel is an older building, the facilities and look of the property have been kept up-to-date, with good sized, tastefully decorated and comfortable rooms, equipped with all the technology and features you could reasonably expect, along

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: TLDR; Service and food shone through in this dated property.
desc: Service: 4/5 Room: 3/5 F&B: 4/5 Stayed at Hilton Singapore for 3D2N and here’s my review for it. The GOOD: Warm Hospitality - I received warm greetings at every touch point. During check-in, getting more mineral water, and even at the safe entry check-in. Nothing that truly warms the cockles of my heart, but it makes me feel welcomed nonetheless. In-room Dining - I don’t know why but I really expected the food to be tasteless, soggy and as unappetizing as in-room orders usually are. Imagine my surprised when flavours exploded in my mouth when I took a bite of the crab cake I ordered. Plenty of Pillows - Oooohhh 6 pillows in the room without even asking for it? That scores well with me! The NOT-SO-GOOD: An Old, Old Property - At a glance, you can really tell that the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A So-so stay..
desc: Location: In the heart of Orchard Road. A very good location if you want to feel like a expensive tourist. Or the revenge you always wanted to have by not going home and staying in Orchard instead. Good (expensive) food around. Extremely cosmopolitan with LV & Gucci feel. Lobby: A rustic retro feel which has been renovated. Check in was fast. there are ample seats for people to rest their feet, or for elderly who are waiting for their check in. Big lobby space to move around. Room: Pretty standard. One desk, one coffee reception area, one bathtub and a sink and a toilet bowl. Very standard items. Space wise, for a premium hotel, space is relatively good which you may refer to the picutures of other travellers. Air-con at 25 degrees celcius is very cold. Thumbs up. TV, small,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Deluxe Plus 👍👍👍👍👍
desc: Staycation at Hilton Singapore was Great! They have arranged Bday deco for my hubby and he was speechless when he saw the room. In the evening, they send a slice cake to the room. The staff were friendly and helpful. They sms me to ensure that we stay comfortably. And if we have any request which I find it's good communication. Kudos Hilton Singapore and keep it up.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Steakcation + 1 Additional Night Redemption Stay
desc: We stayed 2 nights: 1 night on New Year's day under the Steak-cation package (booked direct through Hilton) and stayed another night using AMEX Krisflyer voucher. This was my first time staying at Hilton Singapore although I've stayed at other Hilton properties while travelling for work in the past. I was really looking forward to this as it was birthday celebration and I was yearning for a good steak meal. Really wanted this to be a 5-star experience but we felt that the service could've been better - not that I've had any particularly bad experience but the whole experience felt a bit underwhelming. There were instances were service was excellent but there were also instances where we felt it could've been better. Perhaps we were expecting the service to make up for the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: By far the best hotel with outstanding staff
desc: Hilton's right smack in town and it's really accessible. Held our wedding banquet and stayed at the bridal suite last month, the room was very comfortable, clean and big ! Special thanks and a big, massive shout out to Anthony for all the coordination and planning, follow up and clear communication, and Alvin for going the extra mile to accommodate to our schedule, preparing and setting up of the conference room for our tea ceremony as we had last minute change of plans. Thank you both so much for ensuring our actual day plans and banquet to run smoothly. Truly appreciate you and your team for the best effort for running the show and doing an awesome job. To the best Cheesecake ever - Highly, highly, highly recommended the original and blueberry. It's simply the best. And to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Signs of dated renovated suite, Service is generally good
desc: I stayed at the newly renovated Family Suite in Hilton Singapore during my recent staycation. The suite has a massive floor area of 69m², occupying the corner of each floor. An elegant entryway greets the occupants of the Executive Suite as one steps into the suite. The entryway separates the living and the sleeping space in the suite. A marble top small wooden table is placed at the entryway, which is ideal for guests to place their keycard or place small items such as their masks. The addition of a single drawer in the wooden table by the entryway provides extra storage space for guests in the Family Suite at Hilton Singapore. A powder room is located next to the table in the entryway. This huge marble laid powder room serves as a guest toilet and is furnished with one toilet

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staff made up for all other shortcomings
desc: The staff is really this hotel’s best asset - if not for them, our stay would probably be much less enjoyable. We had a bad first impression as there was no access to the hotel from the carpark due to covid. We had to lug our luggage and two year old up the carpark slope to reach the front of the hotel - it’s both dangerous and tedious. Thankfully we met a nice valet who offered to help us with the luggage but we didn’t get any help during checkout. The hotel should place staff at the carpark to help with the luggage or set up an entry station at the lift lobby. Room was much better than expected and didn’t make me feel that it was very dated. However our air con leaked and front desk sent a technician up who pushed in a whole cart of tools and started vacuuming the air con

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service from staff
desc: Book a few rooms for my wedding and my wedding helpers to stay. We check in 1 day earlier and the reception, Kenny was very helpful and patience to assist us on our last minute request. And due to SDM, we have to walk from carpark to the lobby as the carpark lift lobby is close. Kenny was very thoughtful and give us a complimentary valet parking as a gift for our wedding which normally would charge extra, so that we can park our bridal car outside the main lobby and late check out as he knows that we will be tired after our wedding. The room is clean and quite spacious. We didn't mange to try their facilities but you will need to book before going. Location is nearby shopping area and easy to go around. Overall is a good and will stay again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: STIRCT 3 PAX policy (Guest + Visitors) + SPOT CHECKS + Small TV + Alternate Day check bedsheets
desc: Stayed 3D2N at Hilton Singapore. Would have given a higher rating if not for the hotel 3 PAX policy. 2 words to describe the staycation "out-dated" and "prompt service". The current policy is max 8 people gathering. But Hilton Singapore policy is 3 pax in the room (Guest + visitors, be it adults or kids). Guest have to sign the agreement form to acknowledge, during the check in. If you have 2 kids or you are bringing a domestic helper, please book another room, or book another hotel. On Day 1, I did not request for any room service. But their staff knocked onto my door in the evening to do a spot check. Secondly, the hotel only changes bed sheet on alternate days. Meaning to say once every 2 days. I got few freshly bite during day 2 morning when I woke up at 6am. I called the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Foodie staycation
desc: Superb service by Manekim (sorry if I spelt wrongly!) Enjoyed the meal very much and he even waived off something we ordered wrongly and even an additional dessert for a birthday celebration! Recommend

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hospitality was great
desc: It was a warm welcome by the hotel staffs, And really enjoyed my stay although is a bit old hotel but they keep up to their standards. It’s really recommended coz of cleanliness and honesty of staffs, I had an experience with them and it was really appreciated not forgetting front desk, housekeeping, security personnel and breakfast team all are great and a very big thank you to all of you from the bottom of my heart ❤️ Please keep up the good deeds always, will definitely visit back again 👌👍

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: We will definitely be back!
desc: The check in was fast and hassle free. Room was immaculate condition. Though there was no mini-bar due to Covid reason, coffee and tea were ample. Sufficient mineral water was provided. Took less than 5 mins for front desk to send up extra coffee and water. The food at Opus was fantastic! Great service from front desk to F&B to housekeeping. Wonderful experience. Enjoyed thoroughly.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A few day work and pleasure
desc: A nice hotel to stay in the busy city. After reservations received a friendly email about the hotel and amenities. Upon check-in got a warm welcome from the hotel staff. The executive rooms and lounge were well maintained. Service in the lounge was personal and very friendly. I enjoyed my stay and will sure recommend the Hilton in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Limited Luxury
desc: We booked and stayed for 2 nights over the CNY long weekend. While the room was great and the hotel interior was cosy, the breakfast was a BIG disappointment. The spread was exactly the same day after day. I wouldn't recommend anyone to stay beyond 2 nights here if you want more options at breakfast. Hotel also stinge on their toiletries with teeny tiny soap and shampoo bottles. In addition, hotel bungled my room service order. Called at 8 pm for a 9 pm room service but at 910 pm, no food appeared. Called the concierge, front desk and room service with no response for the next five minutes. After 5 minutes, hotel receptionist finally took my call and promised to check on the delay and call me back to update me. 10 mins later and no call came. I was fuming mad. I called

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bachelorette Party!
desc: We had planned a surprise bachelorette party for one of the girls and we needed the room earlier then the stipulated check in time in order to decorate the room. Not only did Mahendran (concierge) assist to get the room earlier, he also arranged for a bottle of Chardonnay and some cheesecakes for us. He even helped book a table at their executive lounge so that we could have cocktails if we wanted to. He was instrumental in ensuring that the room was decorated and that we had some sustenance before our friend arrived. The room was great and the bed was so comfy! We will definitely come back, especially for the impeccable service! Thank you!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Choice for Staycation
desc: First time staying at Hilton Orchard. Great location for food and shopping. It was for a celebration for my child's birthday and hence we booked the Family King suite. The room is newly refurbished with a separate bedroom and living area. It comes with two big screen smart TVs and two toilets. The room size is huge. A big thumbs up for the service rendered, from the counter staff, to the housekeeping and personalised message to check on our stay. One night stay is definitely too short. Will definitely be back again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Valentine Staycation
desc: Selected the Valentine’s Day staycation where a fabulous lunch at Opus was included. Clean room, big gym and wonderful guest experience! Totally recommended if you’re looking for a good stay. Keep a lookout for their steakcaytion deals.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good but could have been Better
desc: Second staycation during this whole COVID-19 mess, but first time at Hilton Singapore. Have to say that the experiences was mixed, thankfully more good than bad. There was hesitation when decided to book with Hilton as there were reviews that the place was dated but these concerns were unfounded. The Family Suite was nicely done up with modern furniture and color. However, some of the furniture are already showing wear and tear. There is also a lack of power sockets in the living and dining area, which seems unusual. The sofa bed was a life-saver as we did not all have to squeeze into the king size bed and had plenty of space for own activities throughout the stay. Staff service is abit inconsistent for such an established brand. The check in at Honors counter was fast and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Very good hotel with most awesome staff, highly recommend this Hilton hotel if you are staying in Singapore. Everything worked perfectly throughout the whole stay, even though we were a group of 15 persons, staying there for several months. I would say that best hotel in Singapore considering all aspects.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic Birthday Stay!
desc: Honestly, I cannot say enough good things about this Hotel and Staff! Hilton Singapore employees are top notch from the front desk to the waitstaff and the Lounge. I booked one night reservation online to celebrate my birthday and the Staff provided me with a warm welcome. The birthday treats made my birthday stay even more special. I’d like to say a special thanks to the Lounge Staff who made my stay feel as special as it did during my long-term stay in 2019. Thank you Kenny, Claire, Ann and Sahrin!! I’d also like to thank the Opus Restaurant Staff for superb customer service, great food and birthday dessert ;)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staycation package
desc: This may be one of the older properties in orchard road, but their staycation is value for money. Especially their Prosecco High Tea set, which is really yummy. Stayed in the executive suite, ample space to run around from the living room to bedroom. 👍🏻👍🏻

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Steakcation at Hilton
desc: We went for the steakcation package and love it so much that my youngest daughter didn't want to come home. Dinner was fabulous, service was excellent. Special thanks to Manickam, Joel and Syi Ming for taking care of us during dinner. Breakfast was ok. Special thanks to our old friend Rubiah. Very nice to meet her again. From check-in to check-out everything was smooth. Thank you Hilton Singapore for the excellent service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old hotel layout but Service was great!
desc: Was here for a staycay with my family. We booked a Twin Deluxe room. This is a old hotel that I think was furbished, overall the hotel is clean and neat. The deluxe room was also a decent size, with a desk and an extra sofa and coffee desk for dining. The room is ok, but what i appreciate is that there is alot of electrical plug of different volts to cater to the different countries. If you're here for staycay, be prepared to park at opp hotel 4Seasons where there is complimentary parking too. Coz at Hilton, there is one 1 floor to park and the wait is too long. But all 3 of us didn't had a good night's sleep here as the bed wasn't exactly comfortable or springy. The pillow was also extremely flat, all of us use 2 pillow stack up but still. Luckily it is just one night,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: I'd like to compliment Ms Jasmine who was on duty at front desk on the 3 April '21 and also on duty at Executive lounge for breakfast the next day, who made my family and I feel at home with her warm welcome. Having stayed at many hotels over the world for the past 10 years, I am always a big fan of the OG hotels like Hilton. Being attended to by Jasmine feels similiar to the experience I get on the Singapore Airlines Suites class. While everything went as smooth as possible from check in to checkout, I knew that Jasmine and the rest of the staff on duty are very reliable n ever ready to lend a helping hand to me or my family members if anything went wrong. That's why I go for OG hotels only :) Shoutout to the awesome manager on duty for Executive lounge as well (so sorry

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation at Hilton Singapore
desc: I am impressed by the level of service provided by the friendly staff at Hilton. Especially during breakfast, when my wife and I ordered the breakfast set but had to leave temporarily to tend to our baby and went away from opus grill bar, back to our room to settle baby before our breakfast set arrived. 30 mins later, when we returned back to opus for our food expecting the ordered food to turn cold, we were surprised and grateful to know that waitress Jennifer and chef Ming Fatt took initiative and gave us another set of freshly cooked food when we arrived telling us that having the dish cold would not be good. We were amazed at their level of care and thoughtfulness.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Impromptu and much needed relaxation
desc: Thankyou Hilton SG for havubg special rates and promos for HCW in SG. Really appreciate it as we do need to have our breaks and definitely having it with a cheaper rate is always a plus point! Hee. Really appreciate the staffs that went an extra mile during my check in for giving me a room number thats special for me as it was my birthdate&month combine. Which was totally awesome! And also for the sweet gesture for gifting the Hilton mascott/softtoy too, despite my age. Hee. And also the staff that helped carry/pulling my luggage when he bumped into me in the lift upon my check out till i got my grab and carrying it also into my grab car. Appreciate it much. Room was spacious and view was pretty! Just dont expect much from the bathroom, its functioning well but a bit of a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Good Staycay
desc: Date of stay: 15th April 2021 Thursday. Location: Very good. It was very near to the Orchard mrt station. It is not sheltered all the way though. One would need to negotiate a 150m-ish walk to reach Wheelock Place mall to be safe from the daily rainy spell in April. Hilton is located on the left side beginning of the famous Orchard road that stretches some 1.5km. As the area is famous for, many shopping malls are within walking distance of the hotel.  Hotel room: Booked a Hilton Deluxe room for our quick staycay. The lady receptionist was kind enough to upgrade us to an executive room by enrolling my wife to the Hilton Honours membership. Room 2108 on the 21st floor was located on the executive level. Although it is smacked right outside the lift area, we were not disturbed

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent hotel that lives up to its reputation
desc: Excellent service from the staff all around. Hotel is old but well maintained. Swimming pool is small and cosy, gym looked well maintained but did not get a chance to use it as the stay was only for a night. Spa seemed really good but a little on the pricey side (as most hotel spas probably are). Breakfast was a la carte buffet by set and had a reasonable selection. Located within Orchard so dining and shopping wouldnt be too much of an issue.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Average Staycation
desc: Came here as part of the Steak-cation package and while the dinner was awesome at Opus Bar & Grill the room itself was average. The room was not very spacious and the toilet was kind of small compared to other similar rated hotels I’ve stayed in but it was all in all average. My main issue is with the breakfast, this is the first hotel I have been to in a long time that does not offer a buffet. All we had was 2 eggs (omelette & eggs benedict) and the other side dishes which were part of the set, and while the pastries were unlimited it left us somewhat dissatisfied. Facilities wise, the gym was actually pretty well-equipped, however the swimming pool will be disappointing.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton Singapore has the worst hospitality and Quality among all five stars hotels in singapore ! Don’t stay !
desc: Hilton Singapore Has worst hospitality and quality management amount all five stars hotels in singapore ! It is wasting of your money to stay in Hilton Singapore! Check in date : 18 April 2021 Check out date: 19 April 2021 It is our anniversary and birthday staycation. - staff Heung from room service told me there is no service to send ice baker or plates to room. Despite explaining it is our second year anniversary. He ask me me to go down and collect by myself. Only Hilton singapore NOT providing services such as sending plates and soup to guest room. This is only five star hotel in singapore don’t provide such services ! This hotel staff just has zero hospitality and lacking of global standard training to handle guests. - room toilet is super old. Hilton singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Enjoy the stay with good service
desc: Due to COVID, booked 2 rooms but have to be at 2 different level and almost can’t interact with the other rooms. But understand it’s the policy have to follow. the staff MR Kenny, sent sms to check for the room comfortably n satisfaction. it’s surprising me, and really appreciate. Thank you Kenny Thank you, Hilton singapore, will definitely recommend to others

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Solo staycation
desc: I needed a post cruise staycation for one night and i got the room on a Thursday. Managed to check in earlier at 11am - Brandon at front desk was amazing - everything was smooth and seamless. Enjoyed the room but i must say the path from the lift to the door to lead up to restaurant/pool could have been more decorated. At one point I thought I was going the wrong way to a fire safety exit or something.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Average Stay at Hilton Singapore
desc: Had a average stay here at Hilton Singapore! Hard product like rooms and facilities is poor. Given the age of the hotel. It truly need a make over soon. The rooms are very tired. Bathrooms are subpar. Still using bathtub-showers from the bygone era. Facilities such as pool and gym are average. Dire need of update. Service was generally alright. Smiles around but nothing to rave about. Breakfast was okay. Nothing to rave about either. Had dinner at Opus and it was delicious though. Good meal overall.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton hotel staycation
desc: Stayed with my family during a weekend and opted for their premium room with late check out at 4pm with complimentary cakes. It was a nice stay there. My family and I truly enjoyed ourselves. Nice and relaxed stay. The staff there are nice and professional too.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Leisure
desc: We spent two nights on leisure and I must say that everything was excellent and all the staff were very friendly and helpful..and this is my repeated booking. The location of the hotel is really on Orchard centre and very convenient. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others having a business trip.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Poor service and amenities
desc: It’s the worst experience of staycation I ever had. Rooms are not set up properly when they have a certain deal to promote. Front desk service is bad with poor attitude with their staff being difficult to guests. There is no ice to be send to rooms and told us to go to the bar to get , and after going to the bar, they told us they are no longer in service and have no more ice. Ridiculous for an established hotel with such services. Will never return to Hilton Singapore again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service with a smile by the staff
desc: I'd like to share the pleasant experience while checking in yesterday. I was greeted by the polite counter staff, Kenny. As I was looking at the notice, he was kind to ask if I'm interested in using the swimming pool and gym facilities. He advised me to capture a photo of the qr code to make a booking first as these are popular amenities. His execution was swift and the entire check in process was a breeze with his clear explanation on the room and WiFi login. Approximately an hour later, an sms message was received to check if everything is fine with the room. Absolutely no complaints. Finally, while checking out, I'm surprised he could still recognize me although he was at the other counter and said goodbye with a smile. The genuine sincerity was felt even for a one night

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worst Hotel ever.
desc: 1) the lack of service - the front desk staff was rude and showing attitude when i was checking in My room package indicated i wanted an extra bed and it was not setup when i was there called the front desk to request for ice, the staff told me to get it from the bar and when i wen to the bar, they told they do not provide any ice. how ridiculous is it for a hotel to not have basic thing like ice for its guest? 2) Room - the room was terrible with spoiled lights and door ( bathroom door cant be close) The tv was not digital , not able to connect to anything and worse of all no HD. 3) Breakfast was terrible and the food was bad. The scrumble eggs we had was not fresh and solid. Service staff have no time to attend to us, have to called the staff for more than 3 times to get

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Average stay, nothing worthy of note.
desc: For a 5 star hotel, I definitely expect more out of Hilton. Room felt a bit dated (premium king plus) and I can't really tell much difference between that one and others I've stayed at in less "premium" brands like Garden Inn. The breakfast was also very lacking. You could only choose one main and I could see that it came from packaged goods (muffins and turkey for eggs) Service was pleasant and friendly as you'd expect from this level of establishment. This was part of a foodie steakcation deal and I will leave a separate review for the restaurant (which was dope) I'm sad to say I probably won't be back at the Hilton, at least in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly helpful service!
desc: We booked Hilton Premium twin room at promotiona price (50% off). Check-in was professional and prompt. Thanks Peishan who is friendly, helpful and met our needs for a (renovated twin) room with very good view. Peishan followed up by sms to see if the room is all right and if we needed any help. Hilton Cleansafe sticker was on door before we enter. Room on 19th floor was clean, comfortable (rain shower too) and spacious. Nepresso coffee machine with 3 types of coffee. We'd lunch at Opus: 2-course special at a reasonable price. Karen was attentive and friendly in serving customers. Delicious cakes at D9 Cakery. Thanks to Tina who recommended the Olive bread. There is a rooftop swimming pool. What stands out for Hilton is the professional, friendly helpful service all round.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel to plan for a wedding!
desc: We have decided to plan our wedding at Hilton Hotel and thankfully, it was a good decision. The wedding packages that they offered were reasonable and on top of it, alcohol was free flow. There was even a food tasting before the event to allow us to change any of the food that we disliked. When the government announced the event restrictions take place on our actual wedding date, the hotel team, Anthony and Edward managed to secure our venue and to bring forward our event and even though it was a rush to get things done, the event was still a success. We owe it a lot to them and their team. On the actual wedding day, everything else was perfect and the food was great! Our complimentary hotel stay at night was also excellent! Room was clean and spacious. Anthony even helped us

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: average stay
desc: The hotel is pretty full despite the pandemic which is a good thing, but the level of service was really subpar. Calling for an item or service often took a long time on hold. At checkout, not a single staff from the concierge was available to help out with my luggage which is unacceptable with a 5 star property. Breakfast did not have enough options. The portion size of the Nasi Lemak was really ungenerous. The room needs to be updated, particularly when it comes to sound insulation as noise from other rooms was audible. The bed was really comfortable as is typical of a Hilton hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: In need of an upgrade but comfortable stay
desc: Booked a very good value for money deal on Klook at the last minute. The hotel itself was in serious need of refurbishment, with old-fashioned decor and visible wear & tear in the rooms and corridors. Nonetheless, the room was comfy with good AC, comfortable bed and clean. Excellent service by Pavlina and Kenny.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Booked the Hilton Deluxe room during its promotional offer. We could have checked-in early at 2.30pm and was even offered an upgrade to a renovated room with standing shower. However, we declined the offer as we wanted a bathtub and thus waited till 3pm for our room to be prepared. Check-in was quick and simple. Cleanliness wise, I had no idea why there was a half-eaten plate of cake lying on the floor outside the room. It was never cleared during our entire stay, but we did not raise it up to the hotel staff either. Perhaps the staff could have been more attentive and thorough with their clean-up before releasing the room to us. The room was clean and great! As for the comfort and room amenities, we found the pillows too soft (even with 2 pillows stacked!). TV was on the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Business Hotel
desc: We booked one night staycation and managed to check in at 2pm. Room is clean and it is a typical business hotel instead of resort style. I didn't request any birthday arrangement but i received chocolate and cake from the hotel! What a lovely surprise, right? I love the digital key and it is so cool and easy to use. We were unable to get a parking lot when we back from dinner. I approached lobby counter and they immediately released a valet parking lot for us without costs. Thank you very much and i had a great staycation with Hilton Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hilton experience conveniently located for shopping
desc: Meets the overall Hilton experience. Since I am back often, I truly appreciate the staff who recognize and acknowledge me. Love the ‘rooftop’ pool that gives a nice view of Orchard Rd. Great sized gym that Is very well equipped. It’s on the quieter side of Orchard Rd where it’s nice an quiet at night for a good sleep and not too busy directly in front. Yet when you need to go shopping, it’s perfectly convenient and close by. Hotel is old and jaded thou since Hilton is leaving the property soon. Would be helpful to give the rooms a scent spray so it does not smell old.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Attentive service
desc: Very hospitable and accommodating to our needs. As my daughter is allergic to cheese, they swapped the complimentary cheesecake upon request. Additional perks like warming the food for us also helped as we stayed in during the no dine-in period. Staff were all warm and friendly. My kids particularly liked the in-room dining and quality of food was superb.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Escape from Renovation
desc: We had to be out of our apartment for ten nights during April. Usually as Diamond Members we would choose a suite at the Conrad. From our first contact with Pei Xuan Boo at Hilton’s reservations we felt very welcome. The Hilton became our first choice. A chance meeting with the Hotel Manager, Mr. Walid OUEZINI convinced us to stay. We were not disappointed. Not only was the service excellent but the staff was friendly and helpful. We had breakfast, lunch and evening cocktails. Thanks to Edward at breakfast and Jasmine and Ann at the lounge.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staff trying hard to make an ageing property feel worthy of the brand during COVID
desc: My family visit to this prominent hotel in a prime location in Singapore was always going to be limited by the social distancing and other measures in force during COVID-19. We could use the pool, for an hour, booked in advance, but other than ordering room service there was little else to add variety to our staycation experience. It's a Hilton. With most of the facilities unavailable. The cut-down staff were trying their best to service the limited number of people who came to stay, probably like us, on an AMEX free deal. I've just got another voucher from AMEX and am not sure I would go back. It was OK but that's all.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location, Children would Love the Swimming Pool
desc: It's about 5 mins of walking distance from Orchard MRT. We managed to get an early check in and late check out. The service quality is world class. I think it's a nice gesture that they give a lion soft toy for my daughter. It can be a bit crowded on weekends, especially when it is school holiday. So it is advisable to book the time slot for the swimming pool as soon as you have checked in. Probably will come back again for another stay in the future.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional personalised service , very good staycay experience.
desc: Amazing service and customer care! Booked the staycay for my hub birthday celebration and hotel staff surprised us with birthday cake towards the end of our dinner. Received a few msgs throughout the stay in case we need further assistance, very personalise service. Good quality of food at opus bar & grill .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good service by Christine (breakfast @opus)
desc: Christine was the server at opus restaurant which we had breakfast at and the moment we were seated, we saw her working actively to ensure that things were well with the guest. It was early but she was very proactive and showed concern about the guest dining experience. Her service towards my friend and I was very friendly and she ensured that we had our fill. My friend and I was glad to have had our breakfast served by her as she made our morning great. Thanks Christine and Hilton sg for cultivating such an outstanding staff.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Dated Hotel
desc: We’ve got an early check-in but kinda disappointed for a 5 Stars hotel. 80s style of hotel decoration with bath tube. Booked this hotel at about $200 with trip.com promotion. This happens on Room no. 1101. When I am going down to the lobby to fetch my friend after checking in. While we are back in just 5min, we unable to open the door. The door being jammed from the inside. Luckily we manage to change to another room beside. Location wise is good, walking distance to Ion Orchard. Friendly front desk staff. Lastly thank you for surprising decoration on my birthday.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Family Suite
desc: June Holidays! We had a King Hilton Family Suite booked and certainly had a fantastic stay at the hotel. The Family Suite was very nice and had plenty of space. From the entrance, we have a living room with dining table + sofa bed and TV. And the other side was a room with a grand bathroom with shower and bathtub. And in all, a whopping 69 sq.m in space for us to relax n enjoy This was certainly one of the best Family Suite we have enjoyed! We will certainly return during the next school holidays! Thank You Hilton Singapore!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Short Getaway
desc: Nice and pleasant one night stay at Hilton Singapore. We booked it as part of the Foodie Staycation deals that Hilton Singapore was running. Overall package was good value and we were assigned the King Hilton Family Suite. The kids loved the space of the suite. Bathroom is a little dated and the sofa bed is not very comfortable, but overall, still a good getaway considering the current pandemic situation. As a Hilton Honors ordinary member, I was also extended a late check-out for my stay, which is always nice. I didn't feel like I was treated any less than a Silver member during my stay. Staff were friendly and housekeeping was very prompt when requests for items were made. Visible precautions were made to ensure that the room was properly sanitised before our stay. Location

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Enjoyed my stay!
desc: Staff there were nice and friendly! Asked if they could do up some bday deco, they couldn’t due to covid but they gave us a free slice of rainbow bday cake. The room was spacious and clean. There was a study table as well, managed to do some work there.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Professional and caring staff
desc: My recent stay at the Hilton Orchard Road was brief (mandatory stay on arrival) but memorable for all the right reasons. This was my first trip since the pandemic struck so I was nervous. From booking to through to check out the hotel staff were professional and caring. They ensured that I was informed every step of the way. I felt safe and confident in the knowledge that every possible precaution was being taken to keep me safe. I would highly recommend the Hilton Orchard Road to both business and leisure travelers.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Okay hardware but poor diamond treatment and strange lounge policy
desc: Price - $129.50++ = $152 under the Honors Member's Big Dream, Big Savings promotion. This is a superb value even for the aged property so figured its time to do a proper stay before it becomes a Voco. Check In - There was no queue and I was the next in line at the Priority line at 1pm on a weekday, but I still had to wait 15mins to be attended to. Once I was, the process took 10mins including explanation of all COVID related policies and the various signing of forms. I had enquired prior to arrival about any space-available upgrades to a Suite as part of my Diamond benefits but no luck. I was "only" upgraded to a King Executive from King Deluxe. Room - King Hilton Executive Room 2121 (32SqM), upgraded from the base King Deluxe, was all bright and cheery due to the liberal use

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The Hilton experience
desc: Top class service by the staff. Short waiting time to check in. Everyone was friendly. We felt very at home. Managed to accede to our request. Booking of swimming pool was easy. The rooms are dated but still charming. One of the best staycation experience.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation with Hilton Singapore, a pleasant experience
desc: I was at the hotel for a staycation last week (Fri to Sat). Overall, I was delighted with the quality of service provided. The check-in and check-out process was quick. During my stay at the hotel, the hotel staff checked with me via SMSes to ensure that it was a pleasant one. The room that I stayed in was spacious and beautiful with a city view. The room was cleaned and sanitized (you need to break the seal to enter the room for the first time 🙂). I had lunch at the hotel dining area and the food served was delicious too! I enjoyed my stay at the hotel and would recommend to others. It's accessible via Orchard MRT station.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Level of Services Varied, Poor Hardware and Poor Treatment to Diamond Member
desc: Amongst all the Hilton brandname hotel that i stayed unfortunately i have to say Hilto Singapore is considered one of the lower end of the scale in terms of hardware, software and treatment to its Diamond Member. I stayed in Hilton for a 7 days SHN and then move to my regular stay, and the hotel faculties (whether i am a Diamond Member or not, i don't see there is a difference in the room). In both rooms, the water pressure is so low that i takes me forever to take my bath (I received sms from customer services welcoming my stay etc, and i replied to give my comments, but there were simply ignored, no one care to even follow up). Unfortunately, except for the good services by some of the staff at the Opus Restaurant, I could not find any points that i can give any compliments.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A comfortable stay in a great location
desc: The Hilton Singapore has been around for a while and the building does show it. For locals doing a staycation, we see what tourists normally would not - like a dated, cramped and raw carpark. The premium king room was adequate with nice touches here and there but one feels a renovation might help with the feel of luxury of a premium brand. The new Grohe rain shower was the highlight of a dated-looking bathroom. For all the dated feel of its building, the stars of the Hilton are undoubtedly its people. They are eager to serve and experienced enough to know what guests are looking for during a stay. The updated Hilton Honors app has certainly made things more convenient for the guests - everything you want, every query you have is a text message away. As much as I believe it would

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Singapore Hilton at orchard
desc: So many restrictions during the pandemic, food for a 4 star restaurant was not up to par. Rooms were only cleaned every other day for long term guess. Pools and gym had restrictions need to book time slots but most days were not available because of early closure.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hospitality!
desc: Great hospitality and service recovery! Staff were courteous and check back daily on our stay. They were just a text away and they provide extremely prompt service! Conveniently situated in Orchard room, transport was convenient with good food all around! In-room dining steakcation was part of the deal and they serve very good steak and desserts! They also served their signature cheese cake for my son's 5th birthday! Will definitely be back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel with amazing restaurant “Il Cielo”
desc: Great hotel with amazing restaurant “Il Cielo” where Chef Sasaki, who spend several years in Italy, combines the Italian dishes with a flavour of Japan. The device from Sarah and her staff complete the Michelin star experience!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Overall rating: 9/10 Hotel room: Yes, it may not be fully renovated as you expect, however, the room and bathroom were clean. Kudos to the housekeeping team who are working hard to deliver the quality a guest may expect especially this period. Customer Service: Very pleased with the service from the front desk, to the service staff and even the after check out. Hope I am not missing out on any but Namiko, Hannah, Jasmine were the few of many staff who attended to my request and feedback during our stay and made it very comfortable. Food: Although we only tried the breakfast set and desserts, I would say I love the desserts. For the breakfast, there's still room for improvement. I guess the quality will be different if the food were to be eaten at the restaurant itself

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great desserts?!
desc: Main thing that stood out was their dessert. The rainbow cake (idk the name) was amazing. Desserts at OPUS did not disappoint as well. The breakfast pastries were shockingly good, their cakes were so pretty yet tasting heavenly 😱 I do not have a sweet tooth btw.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Service
desc: It's my third staycation at Hilton Singapore. Currently staying for one more night before Hari Raya Haji Holiday. The room allocation was perfect, directly outside the Executive Lounge and a level up to the Gym, Spa and Swimming Pool. The service crew was great as well, serving us above their line of duty. Such as the Opus Bar and Grill, with Chef Ah Seng whipping up a vegetarian option fried rice which was excellent and good Wok Hey for my vegetarian friend. And I would like to thank the Executive Lounge crew, such as Miss Pei Xuan whom served us for both nights, as well as Ann and Uncle Ali for the first night and second night respectively to attend to my friend and my selfish requests. Overall, I would definitely recommend to my friends for future staycation as it's very

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Clean room, impeccable service
desc: My staycation experience at Hilton Singapore was amazing. I was very impressed by the quality of service delivered by the hotel, especially its staff. The room was very clean and spacious, and the hotel is situated at a convenient location. I enjoyed my stay from the moment I checked-in to the moment I left the hotel. Will recommend!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Service at Opus Bar Grill
desc: The F&B staff are all very helpful and pleasant. They will try their best to accommodate our little requests. They are attentive without being intrusive. Appreciate and love their service especially from Kok Boon (captain/supervisor), Kalai and Tina.
