hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: The staff were really nice and wecloming. We received a complimentary cake upon check-in as I mentioned that it was my partner’s birthday. The cleaning staff helped to fold our stuff and left it at the end of our bed, which was a really nice gesture. Overall, I enjoyed my stay here!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pressure to upgrade room, room not available on time
desc: Was pressured to upgrade room upon checkin (+$90) for immediate availability. It was about 215pm. If no upgrade, no room available, only at 3pm. At 3pm, was told booked room Is still not ready yet. No estimate time give, have to just wait endlessly. Lobby has limited seats, good luck if you don’t get a seat.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Negative vibes as property transition out of Hilton group
desc: It was never this way - yes, the rooms are old and the building is dated but Hilton Singapore has been around since I was a kid. The people were warm, helpful and friendly whenever I do staycations, meals at il Cielo or the older restaurants and weddings. This last visit was an unpleasant experience to those memories right from check-in. It was curt and unfriendly - an episode repeated during check-out but the lady at check-out (Ms Ag) made it worse by being super rude and impatient. Dinner at il Cielo was ok but breakfast seems very all over the place. The only pleasant person was the old uncle who helped with luggage at the front. The only explanation I can think of is the fact that the hotel will be undergoing renovation and moving out of the Hilton family. With this in mind,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best experience...
desc: So we went for hotel hopping to celebrate my birthday. The first hotel that we stayed was in city hall area. Room was nice and spacious but the service was "sufficient" for 5 star hotel. So when we come over here for our 5th-7th night hotel stay, we were blown away by the service. We really can feel that they are enjoying their job and we really can feel it. From the time we check-in, We came early (1230pm). We know we are early and didnt expect the room to be ready cause we plan to walk around orchard road while waiting for the room. But Jasmine (front desk) told us that she will call us when the room is ready. Not long after (arnd 1330 someone called and when we didnt check in yet. 1500 Jasmine texted me telling me my room is ready). This is really personalised service that

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wouldn’t choose for special occasions
desc: Please refer to previous comment. Phone didn’t work half way during first day. Construction works being done woke up baby. Had to spend time moving room during precious awake window with baby and packing up everything is a hassle. Aged facilities and sad acknowledgment of anniversary with paper cut out and no signing on the card. It’s not a big deal but just rather sad compared to what other hotels do to welcome you and thank you for celebrating the special occasion with them!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old and Dirty
desc: Whole building is really old. First room had a dirty fridge and semi choked sink but front desk was quick to allow me to change room which was much better. Mattress is comfortable, had a good sleep except on my first night in the first room due some fan noise which I’m not sure was it from the aircon or the big exhaust fan outside the window. Service is exceptionally great! Staffs are all very friendly.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hygiene Level.
desc: Can't expect much of an old building in Orchard road, appliances are old (mini fridge, tv etc) but calling them self SG Cleanliness is not. Found cotton butt left behind and not cleared, holes in bath robe and carpet not properly vacuum especially with a baby whose crawling is a bit too much, lucky for me it's just 1 night. Hotel needs to hire proper cleaner. Front lobby Staff is friendly and helpful is the only star I'm giving.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable stay
desc: Comfortable stay. The beds are comfy. Water shower hot. Room very clean and staff friendly. Very central location and easy to walk to all the nearby malls along Orchard room. Need to climb some steep stairs to access the Rooftop swimming pool, which wasn't suitable for my mom with knee problems.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Relaxing & Calm
desc: There is no reluctant faces, no angry faces. Every second i see all their staff putting sincerely smile on their faces. Customer service and rendered services is excellent! Every staff are friendly. I felt warm welcome once i reached the hotel. The best check-in and check out ever. Overall i feel relax and calm during my stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 3rd Staycation
desc: 3rd stay this year. Price point now is much better given the dated hotel, got a promo price. Good for location. Bed and pillows are comfortable. Responsive aircon. Personally to me not much difference between deluxe and premium room, prefer the bathtub. Room looks bigger with king bed as compared to twin bed. Have to highlight the examplary service received! Was surprised the same personnel who checked me in (Hannah) followed up on my stay on any needs required via sms/live chat. Live chat or sms (Timothy) also prompted answered. Managed to get late check out more easily as compared to previous stay. Bonvoy Gold for reference. Housekeeping only every other day but can request for replenishment via live chat, very friendly housekeeping. Looking forward to new Hilton, having

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay at Hilton!
desc: Great stay and service by the hotel, live up to the expectations of a five star hotel. Thank you Wilson for the special arrangement made to enhance the experience for our special moment. Kudos to staff that did the check in for me, thanks for making the stay convenient for us and your good service!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Miscommunication and rude staff but room was nice and simple
desc: Check in process was a hassle. Called in few days prior to check in to confirm visitors that will be coming and staff confirmed everything on the phone. But upon checking in, receptionist told me there's nothing stated in my booking. So another long process checking in and probably staff on the phone that was handling my booking didn't update anything in the system prior to check in day. But that is okay. Not really a big issue but, i felt that the chinese male staff from the reception was rude as he shouted at me, my husband and our friends telling us that we shouldn't have more than 3 pax in a room. Which I understand thats why we all had our own rooms. Told him we all had our own separate rooms he just kept quiet right after. To me, i am okay with reminders like this,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable Staycation
desc: Booked a staycation with family and we had a comfortable stay. Spacious room with comfy beds and a decent view. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast and the overall service provided by the staff during our stay was appreciated. The rooftop pool is a little too small and the bar was ot functioning at thetime we went. Could be due to covid restrictions or otherwise. All in all, it was a good staycation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Another great Hilton experience
desc: Airy and spacious rooms coupled with a great location. Breakfast was great, served to the table and the staff were very accommodating. This was my 3rd or 4th trip to Hilton and yet another great experience. The only downside was that I couldn't have any food by the poolside, but was also unable to enter the Cafe in pool attire.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Heated pool
desc: With the covid situation, we try to do staycation at least once a quarter so we can enjoy the pool. Hilton is old but what I loved is that the pool is heated! Pool may be small but it's heated so I enjoyed it very much.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: need more improvement on your facility
desc: TV need to upgrade as the tv look old and when we on it was one line one line with can spoil our eye. Air con very cold despite turning to 8 degree. Room no sound proof can hear noise from next door type. service need to improve . when we get help the staff came so late 15-20 min

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding at Hilton Singapore
desc: I have my wedding at Hilton, due to covid regulations, theres many changes & postponed. Anthony from the sale department is amazing, he always keep us update & communicate with us that make wedding preparation at ease. At times, he even went the extra mile in helping us. On the actual day, Alvin Kee - banquet assistant manager did such a graat job. He is so enthusiastic in his job, kept track of all the wedding details & so on time of every segment. He even bring up the atmosphere if the wedding by initial all the clapping of hands at key moments. The wedding banquet food is awesome & delicious as well. All my guests were so pleased with the food and they really enjoyed so much. The wine taste so good as well. The bridal suite is so much bigger than other hotel, neat and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful family visit
desc: Had a wonderful family staycation. Staff are warmth and always greet you with a smiles. The daily breakfast choices are limited but the sides and food are delicious! The room are big to accommodate an additional rollaway bed and bed are soft and comfortable. The gym are big and fantastic and fully equipped. The pool water are warm and even a swim in the morning will not leave you with a cold feet.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Service at OPUS
desc: I went to the OPUS restaurant for dinner tonight and was blown away by their services. The staff were great especially Mr Manickam and Mr Kalai. They were bubbly and brought smiles to our faces and made our dinner experience enjoyable. Will definitely visit the restaurant again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable stay with top service from staff
desc: Enjoyed stay at Hilton Singapore with great service from top staff Raj from F&B and Indra from housekeeping. Very friendly and ensure that our stay in Hilton is comfortable. Always around to offer their service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome stay at Hilton again
desc: This is our 2 stay at Hilton using the Steakation package. Was pleasantly surprise with a happy birthday decor and a small cute lion toy for our kid. The check in was a breeze and the staff was very professional and polite. He also send a text to me which I’m not sure y I can send thru my reply to make sure everything is ok. The steakation package comes with a Wagyu n lobster set + free flow wine and it was the best steak we ever had! The lobster were a bit smaller than the previous time we came but still good and fresh. What is commendable is the service crews, Joel and his team which made us very welcome, making sure we had an enjoyable experience and topping up our glasses even before we asked for it. Thanks Hilton for the stay and I would recommend this package to anyone as

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old but well maintained
desc: Situated along orchard road, hotel location is very convenient to walk to ion and far east plaza. Hotel Room seems dated with no USB charging point but it is clean and well maintained. Service is good. No complaints. Our shower had some problem and the staff came to fix it for us within 10mins.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The extra MILE.
desc: I would like to take the opportunity to thank the following staff listed below from the HILTON hotel Singapore. On the 1st of September morning I rescued an injured Bird on the way to the hotel. I approached the front office to request for help and My Willy immediately assisted me by getting Mr Hafiz to attend to me. I had the bird with me in a box and needed them to pass it to the Acres rescue team that would come by to get it. I must say they were so professional and did a great job. My Magen and Mr Huang took personal interest and ensured that the contractor came in time to get the bird. As Acres were late we Huang assisted to contact NPARKS animals rescue to get the bird and within half hour from that call the bird was rescued. I am so thankful to Willy, Magen,Hafiz,Huang

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing birthday stay at Hilton
desc: Staying at the hotel for the first time. As it’s my friend’s birthday, we decided to stay at Hilton for 4 days. Check-in was smooth but I was disappointed to know that we are not able to get any upgrade during our stay. On my friend’s day, we were expecting a cake but nothing was sent to our room. Till I had to approach the front office to ask for it. They told me it’s because I hang a privacy tag on the door so they can’t send? 🤔 I guess a call to the room should solve the problem. The cake we received wasn’t the usual standard cake we had from D9, it’s disappointing as I always had very good impression of D9’s cake. Room is cozy but the toilet is really old. Showering at the bath tub area, the toilet door looks like it’s been through a lot. Housekeeping can only done on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic service at Opus and D9 pastry
desc: Was with family for a foodcation (staycation with great grill at Opus). Requested to buy a small cake for my gal’s bday, but Anthony/Opus and ChaiYing/D9 was extremely thoughtful and help to serve us even though D9 was already closed. The staffs at opus was totally attentive and amazing. Kudos to the management of Hilton Singapore, for inculcating in your staffs what good service is all about. Fantastic experience that all singaporean should try during this boring lockdown period 👍

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Family Staycation
desc: Had a restful staycation with family at Hilton Singapore. Rooms were clean, and the service was impeccable. Front desk officers were knowledgeable and professional. Special thanks to Raj from Opus restaurant and Cindy from housekeeping who were friendly, professional and prompt. Thanks also to the front door manager (Indian man whose name begins with "M", couldnt quite see his name tag), who kindly wheeled our family member with mobility issues. This icon of Orchard Road will be missed when it moves to a new location in Orchard in 2022. Hilton management: you have a great team, and may you continue to build upon their strengths at the new premises!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Choose Executive Suite
desc: We stayed at the Executive Suite for a week and had an enjoyable time at the hotel. There was plenty of space in the suite and we even managed to pitch a tent for the kids to have a mini glamping experience. The executive lounge staff were very attentive and prompt in serving the drinks and snacks, and would continually check in for top-ups. Even though each sitting was only for an hour, there was more than enough time to have ample snacks and drinks. Staff at breakfast were also very hospitable and attentive. The housekeeping staff were excellent too. Even though housekeeping was supposed to be done on alternate days, they were happy to clean the room when requested. The ladies were friendly and meticulous and certainly deserve to be commended! Just a little disappointed by

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worst Guest Service Experience
desc: How would you feel if 2 big guys knocked (sorry as the sarcastic staff said they did not knock, they ring a bell) on the family suite that you are staying on your 2nd night, when you were just having a zoom meeting with 3 of your friends to greet(there is no singing of happy bday nor we are playing any music) my husband and daughter for their birthdays? The 1st time my husband answer the door and inform us that our talking voice is loud, my husband apologized to the Duty Manager Joshua and to other guy and said we are just having a zoom mtg. Then within a minute after my husband close the door, they are ringing the bell again, as my husband is informing me and the 3 people in the zoom mtg to lower down our voice.. for just 1 min, really no grace period to let us adjust the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old is Gold
desc: That is the saying which best described our experience at our recent stay. Hilton has been around for a long long time, its hardware may not be as fancy as some of the newer hotels. But hack, it still gave us the “magic” feeling of being in somewhere special. I guess it is the way the staff carry out their duty. From recep, to the executive lounge, to the breakfast restaurant, one is treated with that “extra” touch. Not your usual superficial greetings or minimal response - but a casual, genuine care around the guests’ well being and needs. Being a seasoned traveller, i can pick up the subtle difference. While enjoying one of our evening cocktails, I was asking my wife whether she felt anything “special” or “different” about staying in “our very own” Hilton. She said she

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: I can't wait to checkout and leave this Hotel. Regretted celebrating my (and my daughter's) birthday
desc: Writing this review at 2am, instead of sleeping soundly in this so called "5 Star Hotel" Checked in yesterday with my wife and 2 kids. We booked King Hilton family suite. I and my wife were in the living area, in our normal speaking voice, having a Zoom conversation with 3 friends (online) to celebrate my birthday, and my daughter's birthday too. About 11pm, a duty manager named Joshua, and another guy named Magantharan knocked our door and told me that another guest complained of noise coming from our suite. I apologized and told them we were just on Zoom meeting, and after a quick calm discussion, I went back in and told my wife and my friends in zoom that it is because of our voice, thus we need to lower down our normal speaking voice. In less than 2 mins, Joshua and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Come to Eat and not to Stay
desc: I stayed at the Hilton Singapore for one night as an Honors Silver member in Oct 2021 on the Steakcation package. I had excellent experiences at Opus for both dinner and breakfast. As a significant improvement from my previous meals at Opus, the team was well staffed and responsive to guests' needs. I appreciated the flexibility to use my Opus dining credit to takeaway cakes from the D9 Cakery, especially since I do not recall the rate details specifying that the credit would only be applicable at Opus. The "stay" part of the experience was poor. I had emailed in for a Twin Room but the hotel did not make the necessary preparations pre-arrival. While I was eventually assigned a Twin Room, I noticed there was a hard bed board beneath the sheets on one of the beds (think park

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing.
desc: Amazing. I was blown away by the professionalism of the staff name Elizz (please look for her if you plan to stay there). She is well-mannered, responded well and detailed regarding the matter that i enquirer. She will try her very best to accommodate to requests which eventually she did. A place that i will definitely come again. Thank you Elizz.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Our Stay
desc: It was a wonderful experience. They wish my partner and even hand out a small cake to wish him. The check in & check out process was so fast, simple and easy. Their breakfast are good and simple although not much choices. The dinner was also extremely nice. The room is spacious. The bathtub too low and unable to fix 2 person. The bed was too soft feel like sinking in. The tv not much of a choices too.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Happy staycation time @ Hilton Orchard
desc: Booked for 2 nights - had a great time with hubby. Friendly services throughout from front desk to restaurant. High tea and breakfast are enjoyable and location is central yet quiet along Orchard Road. We watched movie, eat and shop non-stop along Orchard Rd by foot - lots to do and see...

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location, good service. Suspicious e-upgrade options
desc: The check-in process was smooth and Elizz was a joy to be served by. It was my son's birthday and Elizz was very accommodating and went out of her way to respond to some clarifications we had and provided some guidance. The room provided was spacious and the service staff was attentive. We had to pick up some additional items ourselves from the lobby but even there the service there was prompt and quick. The location is just great as there are loads nearby. The pool was Ok. What I am uncertain about was the e-upgrade option provided by Hilton hotel. I believe the other reviewers also has shared this and my suggestion to Hilton is to keep it's name and credential then to try and disappoint guests

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent customer service and cleaning
desc: Excellent service. Super Clean. Cleaning lady did a excellent job. Quick to respond to my needs. Very inviting. Reception did a great job. Located in the best place walking distance to may good places for food and fun.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Diamond members are out of luck at this “Hilton”
desc: I don’t even know where to start This is not a Hilton experience at all. The staff are quite unfriendly and don’t show any attention to the loyalty of customers. Especially Hilton diamond members. After requesting upgrades when available, the staff didn’t book the room upgrade in time with no reason given… so in the end be prepared to receive no room upgrade benefits that you are entitled to. They kept delaying this until all rooms were sold out so that you don‘t get the benefits you pay for. As an international traveller you may need to serve your self-isolation awaiting PCR result. During this time, you get brought through the staff entry via the freight lift and through the back of the hotel staff hallways filled with old laundry, vacuum cleaners and linen. So

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Cozy and convenient hotel
desc: The hotel staff provided an excellent service during my whole stay.Also,5 mins walking then you will arrive the biggest shopping mall and MRT station.Their bed is soft and comfortable.Highly recommend to all ppl staying here.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service of 1 star hotel
desc: Thank you for ruining our staycation. Prior to arrival I have already called to confirm my request of upgrade to executive suite with club access (we are willing to pay) the request was made when I was making the reservation. It was confirmed by the staff over the phone. When we arrived at the hotel to check in, we were shocked that the room was given is just an ordinary room. The check in staff said, no available suite room and cannot give the club access. It is very disappointing to encounter this kind of experience due to the miscommunication especially in a reputable hotel like Hilton. We booked the hotel as we want to enjoy the executive lounge. The e-queing system in your website also sucks. It doesn’t make sense.. the suite room was still available on the website

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hidden Gem of Singapore
desc: i had my last run staying with Hilton Singapore before the de-flag starts next year and i am still glad the team did a wonderful job provided excellent service throughout my stay. Special thanks to Front Desk team Joshua and team as well as Lounge - Peixuan, Kenny and team treated me well throughout my stay. Although i can tell the team is stretched with limited manpower, i can feel the warmth through their smile even with mask on. The breakfast was basic but the staff were friendly. Some unfamiliar faces working at Breakfast area, could be the part timers could do a better job by slowing down their pace and not forgetting the orders although it was crowded. Lastly, Team at bakery were very friendly too, and Vivien and team were so friendly as though i was treated like a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Steakation! Great food, great service!
desc: The stay wasn't amazing or great, but it was OK. Some things to note would be (1) the small size of the bathtub, and (2) the lack of direct USB ports for charging your phones. The power outlets are also not very conveniently located. Right from the beginning, I had problems with checking in, mostly due to fault of my own. What happened was that I wanted the steakation package and thought that that was what I booked. However, I used my Hilton points for redemption, which is not valid for use with the steakation package. The website UI was misleading and I honestly thought that my booking was correct and successful. After a lengthy conversation with 2 of the staff at the check-in counter, where they took the time to step through the booking process with me on my phone to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Bit Outdated.
desc: Friendly staff. Was crowded when i checked-in and the staff members did well in processing guests quickly. Hot shower was great! Air-con has a climate control BUT, does not seem to do anything when temperature was adjusted. It was cold! I slept with the air-con switched off. A bit outdated. The interior needs to be updated, especially since it is along the shopping belt with other establishment of its class spotting a modern concept. The bathroom for example, is way outdated from the tiling to the sink counter and still uses shower curtain. The room gives a 'beige' feeling probably due to the colours. The wall paper is bubbling at certain parts. The only modern and trendy in the room is the work desk. The TV is bad. Still in the 'mono, B/G mode'. Probably since its old, the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hilton’s service level made our stay unforgettable
desc: The Hotel Room incl bathroom was old and worn, desperately in need of a makeover. We were expecting that since the building is one of Orchard Road’s earlier buildings. What made up for the poor “hardware” was the excellent “heart ware”. The service provided by the Executive Lounge folks were excellent, on par with that of Ritz Carlton and Capella. To name a few, Pei Xuan and Agnes. Their response to our requests for additional room amenities was immediate. We loved the message feature in Hilton Honors Mobile App. They even asked us for feedback mid-stay and tried to rectify issues raised immediately. Kudos to the Hilton’s service staff.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 1 night family staycation
desc: We had 2 interconnecting deluxe plus rooms. We enjoyed our stay. Check-in staff Joshua was friendly and served us well. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast was average but sufficient. Only minor problem was one of the toilet door has squeaking sound when opening and closing. As it was 1 night, we did not ask for fixing. Overall, it was a very good stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not recommended
desc: We were in utter shocked when entered the room. Feels like we're being rewinded back to the 90s. the TV is super old school in the 90s. Went over to celebrate my birthday and it was definitely NOT RECOMMENDED. disappointing celebration ever. period. Parking, WORST. small and u had to climb up the steep slope to go to their lobby cos they closed their basement lobby. Basically u have to walk all the way up like how a car would, just to go over their lobby. No mini Mar in the fridge cos they said its "covid". we've been to various 5 star hotels in SG this yr and all provides mini bar drinks. So basically if u want some drinks, u need to order via room service = CHAREGABLE. There is only 1 switch. switch on all the lights, or switch off all the lights. So i had to switch on

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Kind Gestures from All Staffs
desc: Hotel staffs embraced kindness culture in many aspects of this hotel operations. Early Check-in request was fulfilled without any issues on the day though fully booked for the holiday season and a memorable birthday wishes deco as a surprise after returning for the day! Thank you Hilton Sg team. Thanks Pavlina for kind help.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 2 nites Staycay
desc: Overpriced. Bathroom not properly cleaned - mildew around the shower tap and holder area Spoon felt sticky Top of cabinet door housing the fridge n felt sticky. No printed instructions/manual with QR code for in- dining. Below average room facilities - instant Nescafe for a 5-star Hotel?? where is the Nespresso machine? Self collection of additional utensils at the coffee house (closes at 10pm) or a delivery fee to the room will be chargeable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Graceful and friendly right up to the end
desc: We had a continual rush of nostalgia during our week-long December stay at the Hilton because it would close at the end of the month. We assume the same management and service team will move to the new location, Hilton Orchard, in the location of the former Orchard Mandarin (the Hilton logo already decorates the top of the new building). The same care and concern continued to the end: when my wife was sick for a day, Mr. Prasad and staff very kindly sent her breakfast up to the room. The housekeeping staff were extremely helpful with supplies and the every-other-day room cleaning. The Assistant Manager seemed to be everywhere, resolving problems, and helping at the reception desk. We enjoyed the two remaining restaurants: Il Cielo for lunch and Opus for dinner. Hilton's Grand

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing stay
desc: My wife & I stayed here for 5 nights, & found the service standards poor. The interiors seemed basic compared to other 5 star hotels. The toilet was small, shower screen/bathtub inconvenient & bathroom sink counter too small. One positive is they’ve an efficient concierge/bell captain team in particular an individual named Megan who was friendly & very efficient in calling taxis.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good “old” Hotel
desc: Maintain its name despite being an old hotel. The room was standard, however, since I had to stay in the room while waiting for the PCR test result (mandatory upon arrival in SG), they basically do not provide anything, nothing inside the fridge, no coffee or tea, only 4 bottles of water. Once I was cleared to go out (results around 4-5 hours), they still did not restock them. Not a major issue for me as I can buy them from outside, however, it somewhat still makes you treated as a quarantine guest. Unto the good part, the entire building has a non-smoking policy, which is a huge plus point for me. Despite being at orchard road, one of the busiest street/area, it is relatively quiet there, maybe due to its location. Which is a good thing if you are looking for that.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Relaxation
desc: Hotel wasn't up to our expectations. 1. Carpark was full. They told us that the lots are on first come first serve basis and advised us to park at four seasons hotel (imagine us carrying our luggage and stuffs walking from four seasons back to the hotel). They also said that only one complimentary carpark if you park at four seasons hotel. 2. Requested for glasses to be sent up to the room and they told us to come down to collect them which it totally doesn't make sense coming from a 5* hotel. 3. Water pressure was low. 4. Could hear noises from the corridor and the main road in the middle of night.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not a 5 star Hotel neither 1 star dont deserve it
desc: Horrible stay, "5 star hotel" poor service, old room with lots of scratches on the wall. Tv is from 1990s. No enough towels in the bathroom, shower will take you 60 mins. Requested for cutleries you have to get it yourself. Requested microwave they are not reheating outside food and the list will go on 🥴 Not giving a 1 star neither. Totally lack of service. Disappointing, hilton

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Service!
desc: My friends and I had a wonderful stay at Hilton Singapore Steak-cation. This is my second visit for the Steak-cation and I planned a birthday surprise together with Hilton Singapore. The front desk receptionists namely, Hanna and Brandon, were super helpful making our check-in process without a hassle. They also checked with me on the surprise arrangement (to send up the cake & bouquet of flowers at a specific time). The Steak at Opus Bar & Grill was very delicious, my friends and I enjoyed the meal and would like to thank the staff who served us on that night. Sorry did not catch the names, but it was a Tall chinese male & Tall Causasian male. Breakfast service was good, a Chinese female lady served our food efficiently, I think she works at D9 bakery as well. Timothy at

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Experience at Hilton!
desc: It was a great stay. From the time we checked in, till we checked out, we were pampered by the excellent services from all staff at Hilton. I would like to specially commend the staff at the Executive Lounge - Mr Ali, Pei Xuan, Sadifin (hope I got the name right) and many others. They have made our stay pleasant, and feel at home. Wishing Hilton all the best as they progressed to the new location next year. Keep up the good work and traditions even as a new Management takes over!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fun stay. Great food and service at Opus
desc: My family had fun during our stay. Thankfully the weather was good and we enjoyed shopping and eating along Orchard Road. Checked in past 1pm on a weekday. No issue finding a parking lot at the hotel, but we should have dropped off our luggage at the Concierge before proceeding to the carpark as the carpark lift wasn't accessible. Booking via Hilton website and confirmation of details over emails was a breeze, many thanks to Chae In Park and Tina Lum who arranged our hotel room and Opus Grill reservation. Checking in was okay. The guy at the Reception was less welcoming than what we would normally encounter at 5 star hotels abroad. He told us to pay up our whole hotel and dinner package charge upfront. It wasn't an issue, but most times hotel reception would only ask for a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: We were pleased to be greeted by the friendly staff, Mr Zaki. The check-in was a smooth process & he makes us feel warm and welcomed. The ambience of the hotel makes the stay a pleasant one. Mr Zaki go the extra mile to check on us to be a assured that we are satisfied and comfortable with our stay. Very good service!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing
desc: Extremely well located property, but their standards are low. The cleaning is poor and often one has to call the reception and ask for the room to be serviced. Today I returned at 7 pm to find my room unserviced, and was told by the duty manager that they normally service rooms every other day - and this is supposed to be an IHG five star property! When I checked in there were whorls of hair on the carpet and paper shreds in a number of places. Despite being promised a thorough cleaning, there are still some filthy corners. See photo. The shower fittings are old and don't move smoothly. Socket plates come off when trying to remove plugs. This was the old Hilton before it became a Voco. Looks like a cheap and hasty paint-over was done rather than a proper refurbish. Stay here if

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Superb stay
desc: Had a 3d2n stay there, check in staff is very welcoming, explains things I thought of asking before I actually asked. Room is VERY clean and cozy! U can walk on the carpet without it feeling sticky or such. Opus bar and grill staff is excellent! Very prompt, welcoming and patient (my friend asked a thousand and one questions but the service staff took time to explain)!!!!!!!! Would stay there again just for this factors!!! Breakfast spread is ok! The only downside is the tv isnt a smart tv, thus no YouTube Netflix screen sharing etc. Probably could bring your own cables or laptops since tv shows are on repeat (HBO etc)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Customer Service
desc: Stayed at Voco Orchard Singapore for the first time as its 1 of IHG newly opened hotel. The receptionist was very friendly and check in was smooth. not only that the Asst Chef Concierge, Zaki was very friendly and helpful. and he also made us feel welcome! :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Highly Recommended
desc: Tried this new IHG hotel on their 2nd day of opening, and it turned out to be one of our best staycation. The room was spacious, big enough for a family of 4. Check in and check out were smooth, and all request were accommodated. Shout out to Zaki, your Chef Concierge! He is very friendly and professional! Cheers. We’ll definitely come back and recommend this hotel!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Service
desc: First time visiting Voco hotel Singapore and I was blown away by the amazing service. All the staff are super warm and welcoming the moment we start checking in. Kenny and his team is super friendly and making sure we feel comfortable during our stay. Kenny make the check in process super fast and smooth for us. The lounge staff are super friendly as well. We will definitely be back once again all thanks to the amazing first experience at Voco. THANK YOU KENNY AND TEAM!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely and polite staff
desc: We checked in on the 1st day of operation and it took about 45mins just for the check in process. Thankfully, the staff were nice and polite. And we also were upgraded to the premier room, which was nice. The room was big and it had a nice toilet with walk in shower. Room service was ok. A bit slow and needed second call for reminder not so bad. I think what made up for slow service and slow check in plus room being a bit outdated, is the staff. Will come back.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Could have been a better experience
desc: Chose to stay at Voco to celebrate my birthday. Decided to give it a go as it is under the IHG brand name. However, the experience is less than satisfactory. Confusing check-in service. Christina didn’t seem to know what’s happening. Neither does she have good knowledge of Intercontinental Ambassador Programme. Being an Intercon Ambassador, I would be given guaranteed room upgrade and late checkout at 4pm. Firstly, she said that Voco has upgraded me to a 1-King Bed Club Room with Balcony (which is on #22) for my stay. When I corrected her that this was what I have booked, only then she mentioned that the suites (that’s the category above the room I paid for) are all fully booked. Totally confusing! I don’t need the suite as I prefer the balcony. Next came the late check

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bad service, disrespectful staff and poor room cleanliness.
desc: I stayed at the hotel on 1 Jan 2022 and below is my review. Disrespectful staff by the name of prahbu. I tried to enter voco hotel carpark and got stuck at its gantry entrance as the instruction of the gantry requested me to insert cashcard but the machine jammed when i inserted my cashcard and i was unable to remove it. I then proceeded to enter the carpark by a side gap so that i dont block other vehicles who wants to enter the carpark. Afterwards, i walked back to press the intercom button for help. A Staff by the name of prahbu who came to help, i can see that he is displeased and unhappy, who did not even greet me and my spouse, and straight away spoke as if we purposely make the machine jam. I dont know if it is because we are riding a motorcycle and not driving a grand

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Rest Amidst the Chaos
desc: Rebranded from the Hilton Singapore, I was excited knowing that IHG was bringing another upscale brand into Singapore. Using technology to its fullest, I was pleased to receive a text with an offering of an early check in, which suited my schedule just fine that afternoon. I had been to the Hilton Singapore several times in the past, and was familiar with the decor. There were some changes to the lobby colour scheme, such as the striking blue paneling behind the front desk and I liked the subtle touches, such as the little wooden birds placed at the front desk counter. I read that these birds, three species to be exact; describe the voco brand. The food and beverage outlets retained their original names. Kenny, the team member who checked me in, was quick and thorough. He

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thanks Kenny!!
desc: Great chat with Kenny during stay cay last week. He’s being very informative of Orchard area, super friendly and professional when we were at the Lounge. Definitely top service! We have a wonderful stay at the property, the room is old but the customer experiences that provide makes the different.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel & Location
desc: A Great hotel and location. close to the train station and mall's like ion. Very friendly and professional staff, room are specious and clean. It is the first VOCO hotel i stayed as a IHG member for 15 years and it didn't failed to live up to my expectation. Their D9 cafe at the lobby are also known for it's cake which i could not resist and had to try some myself and found my self returning to purchase more cakes from them. Looking forward for more stay's at the VOCO singapore

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great wedding lunch held here!
desc: Held my wedding here, and it was fantastic. Anthony was extremely helpful as a Sales Manager, acceding to our every request and managing our queries even during this hotel’s transition from Hilton to Voco. My guests raved about the food and wine served during the lunch, and it was all round great service from the team! (Alvin as the Banquet Manager in charge that day)! Would strongly recommend people to consider this hotel for their wedding :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent experience, great location.
desc: Stayed in the hotel for a period of two months, on the lounge floor. High standards are set which the staff on this floor continually excelled. Big thank you Ann, Kenny, Ali & Sahrin. Staff are very attentive & provide excellent guidance for both the hotel facilities & the surrounding area restaurants etc. Hotel services were also excellent room service, laundry reception staff. Rarely ate breakfast due to leaving the hotel prior to opening when I did utilise the facilities the only down side was early breakfast @ 07:00 in the morning the facility was understaffed & overworked for the volume of guests. Now coved restrictions have been relaxed a buffet service would be beneficial. Surrounding construction work more so a5 the back of the hotel for myself the noise was not an

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Nice place to stay. It’s located in the heart of Singapore. Easy access to everywhere. Room is big and have a comfy bed. A good choice for staycation despite of Covid limitations. Breakfast is ok. Friendly and accommodating staff as always. Thumbs up to Zaki for making sure that our stay will be one of the most memorable one! We’ll definitely see you again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Repeat guest
desc: I love the feel of Hilton/Voco Hotel room. It's clean and the staff are all polite and knowledgeable. Kenny at front office was very understanding and allowed us early check in. The breakfast at the hotel is one of the best that I have had and I love the fact that the range is wide catering to different taste buds

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thanks Magen.
desc: The two connecting rooms I booked were not ready at 3pm as the guests before checked out late. When I enquired with Magen from the concieage, he personally checked on the status of the rooms and kept me updated regularly. When one of the rooms were ready about half an hour later, he personally brought my family and baggages to the room and also extended my late checkout to 4pm. Although the initial delay was unpleasent, Magen's service prevented our holiday mood from being dampened, and ensured that we enjoyed the stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Impressive ! Thanks Kenny
desc: Have a short stay at voco Ochard previously under VTL flight. The club lounge access team was friendly & service was impeccable despite only operate 2-hours for their evening cocktail. The staff were friendly very knowledgeable. Especially Kenny the Asst.Club Manager, he went extra miles to offer us a few packet of Chamomile teabags for a better sleep in the evening & mint tea for morning, such a great touch of service. Will definitely be back again.. Thank you Voco Club Team.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thanks Kenny & Ali
desc: Club Lounge service is excellent. Shout out to Ali & Kenny for the warmed hospitality during the stayed. Despite the hotel room layout is dated, need of revamped.. but the staff & customer service make up to it. Look forward to be back again in future at Voco Ochard with my family.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Banquet + Staycation
desc: Held our wedding banquet at Voco Orchard Grand Ballroom and it’s certainly a choice with no regrets! (among more than 10 venues selection) Special shout-out to Mandy (Sales Director), Anthony (Sales Director) and lastly Alvin (Banquet Manager)! Mandy ensure that all our contract matters are well coordinated and prompt follow up before handing over to Anthony. We had the most awesome coordinator (Anthony) that is able to accommodate to ALL our request, greatly appreciated it. Anthony is very prompt in his follow up to address all our enquiries, regardless the time/day that we dropped him a message or even email! He ensures that all our doubts are clarified and guided us throughout the past months of preparation, despite that we’re in the pandemic period that we are

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not for those who cannot stand second-hand smoke
desc: This is the former Hilton (Hilton has moved to the former Mandarin Orchard/Mandarin Gallery building). For the Orchard area, this will be a somewhat more affordable option as it is not in a very "prime" location within the Orchard area. It is still a reasonable walking distance away if you are a walker. Everything was average from room size, housekeeping, and value for money. The only thing to note is there is a designated smoking space outside the hotel that you will need to walk past on your way to Orchard. I found this annoying and this is probably the one reason I will prefer not to come back for a return stay. If you are particularly sensitive and abhor secondhand smoke, you can consider the nearby Orchard Hotel (Milennium) or Four Seasons or Orchard Rendezvous under Far

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: VERY NICE STAY AT THE VOCO ORCHARD SINGAPORE
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Voco Orchard Hotel Singapore for one night recently. I initially booked for 5 nights, however, after some poor communication with the hotel I changed our reservation to one night. On arrival our check-in was overwhelming, very professional, and we were given a couple of welcome gifts in the form of a little plush tiger, some local cookies, and upgrade to a Club Room. Unfortunately due to our evening arrival, we did not get the visit the Club Lounge. The room was very comfortable. Breakfast at the hotel was very nice and due to Covid was served by the staff after taking your order. There is no self service. The hotel is close to all things, shopping and transport. Check-out was very quick and easy. We would stay here again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service good :)
desc: Started off not so good, with some issues with the first room, but Namiko went over and beyond to help us switch rooms (with better amenities), and was apologetic with a note and 2 cakes sent to our room. Great use of the business whatsapp, I requested for additional items and it was promptly delivered. Different staff replied, but knew what the previous request was, so they followed up promptly. Good tea/coffee offered in the rooms, even requested for cold milk and they sent to the room! The first room didn’t have Nespresso machine, they provided Bacha pour over coffee instead! Not an expensive stay, yet service is good :) Can give the pool a miss- it’s small and abit old. Keep coming up with good corp deals, Voco- had late check out at 3pm and $30 dining voucher! Totally worth

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly and helpful staff
desc: Staff is friendly & helpful.Thank you for the wonderful suggestion Kenny the Club Manager (I suppose) for encourage me upgrade to the Club Floor during check in. The services from Club cocktail to morning breakfast was amazing.. despite the school holiday crowds. The Club menu varieties were great. FYI: hotel convert from previously 5* Hilton to IHG,voco 4* hotel, but that does not make me regret choosing this hotel. I enjoy my stay so much.. thank you club team & Kenny.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing Stay
desc: The stay was planned to be a casual stay until the hotel had to verify my name and email address over the phone to allow other people to access our room before our arrival. Yes, so that was how I found out my partner was planning for a proposal (otherwise why would there be other people right). I cannot put into words what my partner felt and how sad he looked at that point with his proposal revealed but i wanted to do something to at least make him feel better. Wrote in to enquire on room upgrade options and paid for an upgrade to suite after hearing from influencers that their stay were amazing and suites are equipped with steam room. The suite upgrade also includes access to club lounge. I willingly paid for an upgrade to suite because i wanted to ensure that there is an

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Vivacious VOCO
desc: The warm hospitality that greeted us was extended throughout our stay. The rooms are fairly large and functional. The main reason for our stay is our obsession with OPUS grill’s food and desserts. We love them with a vengeance and that explained why we were there on 2 consecutive weekends. Please keep up your awesome work and we will certainly be back for more VOCO vivacious times!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Family Staycation during School Holidays
desc: We stayed 14-16th March, though it was school holidays the hotel was not overcrowded and We enjoyed our stay very much. I feel most full service hotels are similar with facilities but its the service that sets them apart and for the 3 days most interactions we had with your team was pleasant, it is unfortunatel i missed taking down names! Check in was smooth, everything was clearly explained. Receptionist lady was so sweet and gave cute tiger plushies which obviously was a win with our 2 kids. She offered us a late check out too but sadly we had errands and didnt get to use it! But thanks! Another occasion the bellman at the safe entry noticing it was about to rain came and offered us umbrellas as we were heading out. Housekeeping lady on 12 floor was always friendly full

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Banquet on 5th March
desc: My whole experience with Voco was awesome! Anthony the director of catering was prompt, proactive and rendered good service. He was flexible, accommodating and ensured that our banquet and stay was a good one. The banquet manager, Xin Hui, was exceptionally detailed, helpful and has a lot of initiative. She was really passionate about her job. Although it was our wedding, it feels more like it was her own wedding. Prior to the march in, she helped me to arrange my gown properly etc. making sure it was perfect and orderly. She was flexible, willing to go the extra mile and has a pleasant vibe!! (: Thank you so much Anthony & Xin Hui. It was a pleasure coordinating with you guys and you make wedding preparation fuss-free (:

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My 1st stay fantastic hospitality
desc: It was an impromt booking made a week ago before our staycation while passing by VOCO hotel, Zakie assisted us and we were very pleased with his service. He was very accomovdative and we made our reservation for our stay without much hesitation. Upon checking in, Muzammil assisted us on Zakie's behalf. He was friendly and was willing go an extra mile to accomodate to us. In addition, our stay was included with club access, we met Shahrin, Ali and Ann. They were welcoming and made us felt comfortable during our stay too. We were pleased with the people we met during pur first stay at VOCO hotel including Naven from OPUS bar and grill. He advised us to dine-in for our supper too. We would like to say that we are very delighted to have connected with the mentioned staffs well and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fresh take for Orchard Staycations
desc: Fantastic stay and meal at Opus grill. Tried the famous Tomahawk steak and it was a top cut as expected. Service was great as well. Voco is definitely a must visit if you are looking at visiting singapore. Desserts from D2 are a great option for celebrations as well

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service!
desc: We would like to extend our appreciation to the staff from FO and lounge Kenny and Dorothy during check in he introduced the areas in the hotel like the pool , the lounge , the gym and the restaurants. We did enjoy our refreshments and evening cocktail. The ambiance was so good! from OPUS during breakfast Jeffrey and Vivian introduce the breakfast spread and have a very good service . The food was delicious! During our Dinner , we love all the food that was serve ! It is amazing! Prasad and Patricia makes our dinner more special because of the excellent service . Your warm hospitality make our stay more memorable. Thank you ❤️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Staycation for Two (Babymoon)
desc: We stayed in a premium room at lvl 17 for one night. There was a late checkout promo so we got to checkout at 3pm. Check in process was smooth and quick. You are given QR codes to book access to gym/pool/room services. Room is very spacious and has a nice executive desk for work purposes. There are blackout curtains if you wish for more privacy. Bed is huge and pillows are super comfortable - soft and fluffy. The bathroom has a shower, no tub, and strong & hot water pressure on the rain shower. Sadly, as it’s not a new building, the tile of the bathroom was cracked. The pool isn’t huge but has nice lounging spots. There are no lifeguards at the pool and access is by stairs one storey below (lvl 23). Overall, we enjoyed the peacefulness and accessibility of the hotel within

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Staycation
desc: Was at Voco for 3D/2N with my family. Not much to say but want to highlight that service was awesome. Was assisted by Zaki during check in and he was accomodating and checked on us via sms if we need anything daily. Will be back again. Thank you Voco for the hospitality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Horrible Proposal Experience at Voco Singapore
desc: The pre-arrival experience was horrible, I am planning a proposal for our staycation but the front office/reservation team insisted they need to authorise the stay with my girlfriend before they can allow an external vendor to come in to set up the room. (the surprise was ruined). An email has been sent to the Voco Singapore General manager. My girlfriend felt bad that the surprise was ruined, she paid an extra $250++ to upgrade our room to a suite category. and guess what... when we arrive in our room, the duvet (blanket) was soaking wet... We had to inform them to have the duvet changed... When we arrived at the executive club floor which we paid extra for, hoping to get refreshments and to explore the club. But after we told the host on our room number (which is a suite

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel with long-standing employees, you feel right at home again.
desc: In addition to being a Platinum Elite at IHG, I'm also a Hilton Lifetime Diamond Member. The Voco in Singapore was a Hilton Hotel for many years until recently. Since staff often work for the owner and don't change with the hotel group, I wanted to see if the service at Voco is as good as it was at the Hilton and if I still see old staff there that I remember from previous stays at the Hilton Singapore knew. You feel more at home when you see familiar faces again. So I have Ali, Kenny, Rubia, Raza, Sahrin, Pavlina and others again. encountered there. The service was excellent, all the employees were always helpful and very friendly, whether at reception, at breakfast, at the concierge and especially in the executive lounge. I was kindly given a free upgrade to a room with

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 4 stars Hotel w great amenities
desc: Checked in this Thurs at 430pm at this 4 stars Hotel. was served within 5mins given 2 nice looking wooden hotel cards and proceeded to 20th level. Was given a complimentary upgrade to Club Deluxe King room and a slice of birthday cake was a nice touch. Rooftop Swimming pool on the 24th and huge quiet gym on the 23rd was great to spend some quality time with loved ones. Special mention that within e gym there's separate steam and also a sauna room to complete one's detox session after e gym and was a pleasant experience. Steak and wine dinner and also breakfast inclusive in our Staycatīon at the Opus bar and grill was medicroe in taste execution w lukewarm service though. it was an otherwise good stay with great hotel amenities and clean room with coffee espresso and Twg tea.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing New Hotel Along Orchard Road
desc: Despite being housed in the former Hilton Orchard's building, voco did a good job in giving the interior a facelift. The colour palette, in-room amenities, and hotel's facilities (except the pool) were fresh and modern. Enjoyed our stay. Wanted to compliment Ms Ann, who ensured a smooth and seamless check-in for us. We met her again at the hotel's lounge, where she again was professional and friendly at the same time. Staff like Ms Ann would make a difference between a good and memorable stay. Needless to say, we had a memorable time at voco and will highly recommend the hotel to anyone who is considering a hotel in Orchard Road.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An underrated gem of a hotel in Orchard Road.
desc: We love how VOCO is centrally located, it is just a few walk away from Ion mall. My family booked the suite and deluxe connecting rooms. I understand that they were full because of the Holy week season, the check in was fast and we were given immediately the suite room with early check in. Upon check out, we were also given the late check out consideration for the deluxe room till 3pm. We really appreciated this that they went beyond to extend this courtesy to our family. But what made our stay memorable was the housekeeping, they really kept our rooms clean and really made sure we were comfortable with extra pillows and blankets and clean towels. We love the housekeeping crew. Thank you and we will surely come back with our family and will recommend VOCO hotel to our extended

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Visit on Good Friday
desc: My husband and I were very impressed with the service staff in Voco Singapore! From Kenny, who was so warm and attentive to us at the Front desk, to the restaurant and housekeeping staff... we were so glad to have stayed with Voco. Definitely a memorable stay. Thank you!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Daycation
desc: This is actually my first time staying at Voco. And i really love it. Check in process was fast and seamless. The room is spacious. Bed pillow and duvet is feel so comfortable and it really helps me and my sisters to feel so at ease and relaxed. I will come back again in the near future.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly staff, comfortable stay and great hospitality
desc: Stay been great, room is clean but dated. Service provided by the Front Desk was top-notch! Super friendly & helpful reception staff Kenny upon check in & check out.. his professionalism, friendly attitude very well present the hotel brand. Knowing he’s from former Hilton staff, but his knowledge to IHG brand so well equip despite just short period of opening. Thank you for the wonderful service, I will be back for more staycation deal.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding dinner banquet at Voco Orchard
desc: We held our wedding banquet dinner on the 28th May 22 at Voco Orchard Hotel and it was seamless and perfect and we are very pleased with the outcome of the wedding!We were very impressed with the professionalism and excellent service displayed by the team; especially from our coordinator, Anthony and XinHui (banquet manager) who ensured that our dinner event was executed perfectly from the start to finish. From the very first day we visited Voco Orchard hotel to view the ballroom till the end of the wedding day, Anthony has been extremely proactive and helpful in everything that we need. He always go to the extra mile to accommodate to most of our requests and provided us a progressive timeline and reminder of what we need to do/provide. He was very professional and responded

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good service
desc: Aloysius is great asset and has such amazing customer service at check in. He provides a lot of additional information and makes you feel welcome. Will return back again. The room is excellent and clean and is new.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Warm Stay
desc: The rooms and the amenities provided really make you feel at home and this is an amazing place even for long terms guests! The staff makes sure you are well taken care of and ensures everything is in order too! Great place with a lovely vibe!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staff need to be coached on hospitality
desc: Reserved Voco for a week. Check in experience very average. Unfriendly front desk staff, cut to the chase kinda guy. Room was super jaded, no changes from the erstwhile Hilton which I stayed in 2015 and cramped for double occupancy. But all of this was yet OK. The main challenge was the attitude of the staff and service... At sometimes they were rude, sometimes ignorant or indifferent and rarely attentive. Whether at breakfast table, the restaurant or the front desk. A mail to the GM pointing the same out also didn't elicit a response, which was a first for me. Its a definite no repeat for me!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Stay in Suite and perfect wedding venue
desc: Had my wedding at voco Orchard's Panorama Ballroom and was really satisfied with the service and offerings. Great hotel lounge, amazing staff and spacious clean suite. Really big thanks to the voco team for making my stay and wedding a memorable one. We even booked another 6 rooms for our families and they enjoyed it too.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location
desc: Great hotel in great location. The staff went out of their way to make us feel special. We enjoyed the tranquility of the club lounge and the very special treatment we received from Sahrin and Ali. They made us feel so welcome reminiscing with my wife about old Singapore. We also wish to thank Vivien for looking after us at breakfast. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. The only thing we were disappointed with was the swimming pool closed at 7pm. When you have fair skin we choose to swim after dark. We would not hesitate to recommend this hotel and hope to return in the future.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Anniversary Stay
desc: Stayed at Voco on our anniversary on 25-May, stay was excellent. Janet amazed us with this stay by arranging surprise amenities. Breakfast spread was great and Anne,Kok Boon, Manikam, Yabez served well at breakfast today. Lastly Zaki from concierge meet us at departure and thanks us for our stay. Overall great experience from arrival till our check out.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hospitality by voco staff!
desc: We booked a staycation with Voco for our first year wedding anniversary on the 20th of May. We were really appreciative that Voco arranged a ‘surprise’ in the form of a cheesecake & wine and folded heart shaped welcome towel upon check in for our celebration :) Food for breakfast and dinner under the staycation package was awesome. We would even like to compliment one particular service staff working at Opus bar and Grill, Mr Manickam. We were served by him for 2 consecutive days, and his service was impeccable, going the extra mile not just for us and also for other customers. His positive attitude and awesome service let us felt that the restaurant was worth revisiting. Service at the concierge was great too with fast check in and out, and all the staffs we have interacted

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 2 days with 5 rooms booking for wedding
desc: As my hotel is not open for public to stay, we searched for this hotel to stay for 2 nights with 5 rooms. Even though the receptionist service is good, but they did not gave clear instructions of the type of early take away breakfast available, before 5 am to 6am is simple bf, 6am onwards can takeaway a full western bf set. Also even though i have make it clear that i will like all rooms to be near to each other, its only after reminders, that we are allocated mostly on the same floor, and they are not rooms beside of each other. My room had a wet carpet and after that it started to smell, and luckily we can change to another room. There were no housekeeping for 2 nights. Also only after repeated requests, we are then able to get a slice of cake to celebrate our wedding. Overall

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional customer service
desc: Fantastic location and delicious food. Exceptional customer service, especially the Club Room. Location was centrally located in the heart of Singapore’s main shopping district with very close access to MRT.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Stay!
desc: Went back to Voco hotel once again and we never regretted it. Its our return stay and this time round with club access. Fast check in and amazing service! Special thanks to Kenny and Ann for the amazing service during the stay. Will definitely be back again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 1 day staycation
desc: Booked 1 night deluxe room. Stayed with wife and 2 kids (2 and 4 yo) Room: Basic but comfortable. Service: Great service. Friendly staff. Breakfast: Good selection. Location: In the heart of orchard road. Easy to walk to malls. Abt 300m to orchard mrt.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Memorable experience
desc: Experienced a warm welcome from the team. We stayed at Voco for our 6 weeks vacation in Singapore and we felt like home instantly. Great location and clean. Special shout out to Elvis reservation officer, Aloysius, Mil, Namiko and Janet at front desk who went out of the way to accommodate our needs. Push, the restaurant manager at Opus, he personalised his attention to each guest. Special shout out to housekeeper Heleenn who cleaned our room every 2 days due to covid which is understandable. She was friendly and thorough. And Ravii who was also hard-working delivering housekeeping items with no hesitation. Thank you Voco team. See you soon.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome place and an amazing staff.
desc: I had a fantastic experience while my stay at this hotel. Food, ambience and hospitality staff was just amazing. Especially, not to forget about push the most friendliest, dedicated and caring person i’ve ever known. He has all the qualities of a good host. He befriend customers in such a pleasant way. Beautiful place and absolutely lovely staff. Highly recommended!!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bussines visit
desc: Nice hotel. Well located close to subway, bus stops and shopping malls. It is good place for business trip and for tourist stay as well. Good breakfast with wide range of food of different cuisines. Flexible booking. Hotel staff immediately response to any question including e-mails.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great location, great staff!
desc: Had to arrange a booking last minute and found the Voco, great location and priced competitively to those around in the same area. Close to the transport systems of Singapore and shopping centres. Staff were very helpful on arrival and throughout the stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A fantastic base when in Singapore!
desc: An amazing stay at Voco Orchard, we absolutely loved it here! The neighbourhood of Orchard is the perfect base for a stay in Singapore too - only a few MRT stops away from the Marina Bay area but also plenty to explore in Orchard itself. The buffet breakfast was AMAZING - so much choice and all different types of food to choose from too. We also loved the breakfast staff - they were sooo friendly and would have a lovely chat to us each morning. The room was so comfortable and was like sleeping on a cloud - we slept so well here. The shower was super powerful and hot, and it was all such a perfect place to return to after busy days exploring Singapore! The rooftop pool was also incredible and such a wonderful place to take a dip in the Singapore heat! We couldn't recommend

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Dinner at Orchard Voco Hotel
desc: My wife and I just had our wedding dinner at orchard Voco Hotel over the weekend and we must say we are very pleased and happy with the service that the team had provided for us and our guest. From the booking confirmation of our wedding package , Anthony had been very proactive in reaching out to us in different timeline to give us reminder and advise on what we need to do and what we need to be careful of. This had make our wedding process to go smoothly without any hiccup and Anthony was very accommodating to our request as there was a few changes nearer to the date but Anthony was able to settle for us. The banquet manager in charge for my dinner was Xin Hui , and she had given us great assist and had communicate well my team of brothers and ensure that the dinner goes

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location and Excellent Services
desc: The location is great and the room size was large compare to most 5 stars hotel in Singapore especially in Orchard Road. The services and staff are very helful and attentive to your needs. Was totally a pleasent stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome Location
desc: Set on a great part of Orchard Road with lots of shopping, activities, gardens in the neighbourhood. Hotel is warm and inviting with lots of things to see and discover. Team were great and helpful, room size is large does need a little updating but was very clean. Breakfast was great with live stations. Look forward to returning.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First stay at Voco Singapore
desc: The bed is absolutely fantastic!! It was so comfortable, we didn't want to leave it! The breakfast buffet spread was good too! Staff was welcoming and helpful too ☺️ will definitely be back again soon!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing stay
desc: I really liked the experience. The best part of the whole hotel were the employers, they were very nice, specially Push, he works in the restaurant for breakfast. The gym was also very good and with a lot of machines and dumbbells. I had a very good experience in voco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay with Family
desc: Enjoyed our stay, we had fast check in upon arrival. Reception staffs are friendly, as well as staffs from the restaurants. Location is conveniently near to Orchard MRT and bus stops. They also lend us bicycles to do tour around orchard. Such a lovely stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay at a great location
desc: Stayed at voco Orchard Singapore on a family wedding occasion. Room is super spacious and the bed was fluffy like marshmallows (never expect it when you see from photos). Overall friendly staff and the lounge is great to chill. Would highly recommend this venue for wedding and events too!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable bed, cleanliness and awesome service
desc: Stay in June 2022, the check-in process was quick and the staff were friendly. When entered the room, it was luxurious. The bed was so comfortable and the TV was huge. The toilet was clean and the entire room was spacious.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Service especially Club Lounge
desc: Excellent service from check in till check out. Check in was fast and preferences were noted by Ann. She arranged the perfect room and thanked me for my platinum member as well. Hotel is very service orientated and everyone at the club lounge greeted me by name. Full of warmth and joy. Special thanks to Kenny, Ann and Ah Lee for making me feel at home

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Commendation to staff of VOCO hotel @orchard
desc: Pleasant experience for a 3d2n stay in Voco, prompt service and assistance throughout the stay with great amenities within quality hotel. Special shout out to Mr Zaki from the Concierge service, greeted us well even remember us throughout the whole stay everytimenwe passes by the lobby, entertaining my kids with soft toys etc. Well mannered and polite answering to 10001 queries with well verse knowledge of the hotel and surrounding vicinity. Kudos to him and all great staff from Voco! Will come again definitely!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Family Trip
desc: Amazing customer service skill, friendly & charming young guy at the club lounge. Standard never drop. Thanks Kenny Thank you for the personalize service during the cocktail. We can feel the club was busier then our previous trip, with 2-staff only during the operation but this does not stop him from delivering the customer service. Very friendly & genuine staff. Recommended friend to stay there again.. no regret!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good
desc: Good overall. Stayed here for one night and can say the hotel is overall quite good, especially for Singapore standards. Very comfortable and well appointed rooms, good breakfast and friendly service. Amazing location! It’s a bit sterile in personality which is why I gave 4 stars

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Famly Trip
desc: Return stay in Voco Ochard Singapore once again after 2-weeks. The hotel in great location and stay is fabulous as always. Very Impressed with Kenny, the same guy check me in previously. I was expecting he will forget me after a few week since since the hotel seems busy & given that the lobby is crowded, with so many different guest check in and out daily, however Kenny remember my preferences of the room and even get things done before I even request. You truly have a brilliant star in your property.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Family reunion since January 2020
desc: We had our family reunion after more than 2.5 years of not being with each other and decided to stay at VOCO ORCHARD SINGAPORE. Awesome stay!!! Special mention to our concierge SITUAH for arranging for us even before our stay. He took really good care of us before during and even as we left. Definitely recommend. Clean and spacious rooms, friendly and helpful staff and delicious breakfast buffet. Center of everything, Walking distance to everything we need.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staff make this hotel a return to hotel
desc: This was a special occasion stay so we booked the club access rooms. Shari, Ali and Natasha went out of there way to see that we had a most enjoyable time. The Front counter staff were always helpful and smiling and a big thank you to Natalie who came to my rescue on more than one occasion. The hotel is a little dated and some of the back end administration was clunky but there was always someone their to rectify. It’s the staff that shine here and that makes up for the odd administration glitch.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stephen Goulart
desc: I would like to say that I stayed here from July 28 till September 25! I was very pleased will the hotel itself! I was well known by most of the staff! They made my stay incredible! The staff at the club lounge ( Ann , Kenny , Natasha and Sabrina made my long hard days so much better! It was like coming home after work! The staff in the morning going out of their way every morning to make sure my taxi was on time was outstanding! Thanks to Ibnu and the rest of the head working people there ! I can only hope to go back soon!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Stay!
desc: Stay at Voco for a weekend in July. We get an upgrade for our room, and fruit bowl because of an IHG member. The room and facilities are fantastic in my opinion, including the gym and pool. The bedding is really comfortable in my opinion and had a clean room. We enjoyed the breakfast during our stay and the excellent choice of food selections. I was happy to have a great host during check-in, Aloysius, who provided great service and accommodations. I want to congratulate the team during my stay here. Would recommend this hotel and I would stay here again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
