title: Perfect base for a visit to Singapore
desc: One of the best city hotels we have stayed in. My wife and I spent eight nights at Voco Orchard Singapore, and were more than happy with our stay. Location, at the top end of Singapore's most famous road, is perfect whether you're in town on business or as a tourist. Check in process was super smooth. Our welcome cookies were so delicious we were a bit cheeky and asked for more. Room was very spacious and comfortable. Bed, furniture, coffee machine - all excellent. We had access to the Club Lounge which I used for working on quite a few days, and took advantage of the food and drink included most evenings. Fantastic views of Orchard Road. Quality and choice of food at breakfast was very high. Staff - all incredibly helpful and friendly, especially the team in the Club Lounge who

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Hospitality for Guests and Event
desc: voco has provided a splendid service for our company event! The management went above and beyond to ensure our event run smoothly! We appreciate the hospitality and services provided by the team. We enjoyed the food and catering as well!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing staff, comfortable room, great location
desc: The staff at Voco Orchard in Singapore is amazing. Sahrin and the team in the club lounge, along with the breakfast crew: Push, Janifer, Raj and Yoges, and the front desk staff, all took really good care of me during my week-long stay in Singapore. Combined with very comfortable rooms, well suited for remote working with lots of plugs in the right places, and an excellent location on Orchard Rd, this is a superior hotel that I would highly recommend to other travelers.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Push was awesome!
desc: Stayed for a week. Breakfast was one of the highlights. Push was helpful everyday and greeted us with a smile and always accommodating. Will definitely stay at this hotel when I’m in SG again. The whole staff was excellent.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fabulous hotel on Orchard Road.
desc: Customer service at this amazing hotel is superb. Room upgraded to a suite for an extra charge was well worth it, giving breakfast and lounge access with complimentary F&B including alcohol. Fabulous breakfast buffet with vast choices. Lovely dinner in the evening with food of the highest standard. But the best and most memorable aspect was the staff. They took customer service to a new level. Friendly, courteous and always with a smile. Nothing was ever too much trouble.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mr. Bijesh K V
desc: We were well taken care by house keeping member Indra. She was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay in the hotel. Her presence was really comforting to my family members. As we stayed in Voco Orchard hotel for 14 days, it was important for us to have a very good house keeping support. Thanks to Indra for all her support.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing warm welcome and care when you need … morning time !
desc: Look for Mr Push at Voco IHG Orchard, he took care of my mornings for more than a week, serving me with real italian espresso, far away from home I found a spot of Italy in his care , thank you. bravo

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing hotel with wonderful staff
desc: My family and I enjoyed a fabulous stay at the voco orchard Singapore. In a time where many hotels globally are suffering from staff shortages and service quality is suffering as a result, the voco Orchard Singapore is a shining example of how to operate a hotel despite these challenges. The exceptional service was seamless, from the warm welcome right through to the courteous departure. The staff could not do enough to help and were always present with a cheerful greeting. The quality of the food and beverage offering was also exceptional. We dined in 2 of the 3 outlets and also had room service. Could not recommend this property enough. Well done to the voco team, you should be proud of the experiences you are creating.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hotel and Staff Especially their "GOLDEN KEY CONCIERGE MR. ZAKI
desc: My brother booked the hotel for 2 nights for my son and my family to celebrate in advance for his 3rd birthday. Check in: He was check in By Mr. Zaki who is very nice. he had a small conversation with us and we mentioned that we are celebrating my son 3rd birthday in advance. While chit chatting and all we managed to give us a room that is a bit away from the lift and higher level room. Room: When we enter the room its so nice and clean. We are also surprised as we didn't expect with a short conversation with Mr. Zaki (Concierge) he managed to give my son a small surprise with a happy birthday greeting with a cute elephant towel and a cute tiger toy which my son loves it. (i will share the picture here) after a few minutes the room service (Mr. Wilson) came and gave us a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 1st visit to Voco Hotel
desc: Great service! Thank you Kenny from the Club Lounge for the exceptional service. Definitely a great gem & asset for the hotel. Very personalise service & nice guy. Very friendly! Thank you.. will be back again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Home away from home
desc: The Voco has literally been our home away from home. We have been staying here when it was under Hilton management and continued our stay through the IHG management change. Our morning breakfast start with the amazing Mr Push a valuable recent addition to the service team. His enthusiasm is infectious. He has many long timers amiably supporting him. Christine and Rabia come to mind but there are many more that make the breakfast experience extra special. Then we have our wonderful hosts at the lounge led by Kenny along with Ann, Mr Ali, Sharin and the latest addition Natasha. They make our everyday experience at this hotel extra special. I don’t want to forget the bell desk and a special mention goes out to Das. So all in all, while there are many choices of hotels in

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Singapore trip
desc: Excellent place and friendly team, push, Raj, yojes, razak, manicam, and liha thanks for your hospitality. Loved everything about the hotel. I will certainly come back and recommend the place to my friends and workmates. Thanks again and see you soon

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A GREAT STAYING AT VOCO HOTEL 581 ORCHARD RD.SINGAPORE IHG GROUP
desc: Staying in Voco hotel in Singapore more than a week I got an excellent hospitality from Voco hotel staffs Here staff is good of quality and loyalty. I really miss Janet, Ann,Kenny ,Namiko,Mil,Jiale and including all hotel staffs. Warm Regards Tony Siddiq Kawakami JULY 24,2022

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A memorable and wonderful wedding reception and staycation
desc: We had a wonderful wedding lunch reception in Vista room and 2 nights stay in high floor executive suite. Our catering manager Anthony has been very helpful and given us insights that help us planned our wedding smoothly and also helped us upgrade to high floor exec suite. Mun Ket, our banquet manager is very experience and detailed to minute, he's also prompt to reply his messages and we have confidence that our wedding will be great. On actual event, the banquet manager has everything setup exactly to our plans and his teams made the event perfect. Overall, we enjoyed the planning, the event, the room and the exec lounge. All the service crews are warm and welcoming throughout our stay in Voco Orchard. Thank you to Anthony, Mun Ket and Voco team in making our special day

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Looking for a cosy accomodation along Orchard Road, why not try VOCO Hotel
desc: After reviewing several hotel options for our business trip to SG, we decided to try staying at VOCO Hotel along Orchard Road. The location of the hotel is ideal as we were able to meet customers either at nearby shopping malls like ION Orchard or have dinner in their in-house establishments that was pretty good as well. Upon checking in, we were greeted by the friendly staff at the Club Lounge like Ali, Rubiah and Kenny and their service level was top notch during our entire stay. In addition, the room was very well kept and house keeping was very prompt to address any of our needs. Kudo to Sandy! Will continue to stay here and would recommend my fellow colleagues to also give it a try on their next visit.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My 2nd Stay at this Hotel
desc: This is my 2nd stay at this hotel and I can say that it hasn't been the wrong decision. From the check-in, stay, checkout and lounge staff. Super nice. The lounge access is a bonus and the staff there are super friendly. Special shout out to the team led by Kenny, Ali, Rudiah and Natasha and not forgetting Sandy who really made my stay a really great one. I had breakfast at the ground floor and all I can say that the staff are super friendly and nice. I am definitely staying here for all my trips here.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Customer Service Ever!
desc: Voco Orchard had hands down, the best customer experience i have ever had from reservation straight through to check-out. From when i sent my email and webchat precheck-in requests, then walked in, the front desk team were extremely professional and helpful, hotel is extremely well located, the room was very clean even by my exacting standards and everyone there could not have been more helpful and accommodating. Special mention to Mark, the Night Manager who addressed my need for an early check-in and was also very helpful. I have stayed in this facility in years past when it was under different management and Voco is the final irrefutable proof that bricks and mortar does not a hotel make. It is all about the people. After years of bouncing around Singapore in different

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mr Abhishek Singh
desc: Like to share I have a very experience while staying in hotel, they really do good job on Room hygiene and cleaning and very nice breakfast in hotel, observe very positive person Mr Push helping to everyone as required.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional Service
desc: Stayed at Voco for four nights in August 2022. The hotel rooms do look a little dated however it all works. Good block out curtains, comfy bed, good water pressure in the shower with hot water that comes on almost immediately. And I do love a shower that gas both a handheld and rain shower head. As far as food goes, we only ate breakfast at the hotel. Lots of good western and Asian choices and an egg station. It was good without being great. The pool on the top floor was pretty good with some nice shaded seating. The gym is also really well equipped. Location of the hotel is excellent. Right on Orchard Road and a couple of hundred meters to Orchard MRT station. What was most impressive about the hotel was the service. Everyone interaction we had from the time we stepped into

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Stay
desc: Id like to give 10 stars (if that is possible) to Voco for making my stay unforgettable. The hotel has an excellent team - from the receptionist to the room attendants and supervisors. To Tom, thank you for keeping my room clean and also for the note. I appreciate it😊

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Service
desc: I am James Dmello staying in this hotel since June. While my stay observed all staff are very good But specially I will take a name of Mr. Push who is duty during breakfast welcome counter doing very good job,very friendly with all gaust , very co operative,and best smile with everyone. He is best staff ever I seen.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Voco Singapore. The room was spacious, clean and quiet. The staff were very warm and hospitable. The breakfast catered to most peoples tastes. It is conveniently located close to major shopping centres and the MRT. We would have no hesitation in staying there again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great customer experience
desc: I've stayed several years ago in the same hotel. Overall level of customer service is much better this time around though. Start from the engagement of guest service ambassador (Pavlina), all the way to the flexibility for early / late check out. Food variety is extensive. Great hotel overall.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Attended UAS Seminar/Workshop
desc: Very satisfying to stay in VOCO hotel Comfort rooms very nice Aminities are very good Breakfast is delicious Good internet connection No delays on transportation Employees are approachables Satisfactory in general.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It’s better than 5 stars, this is like a home cooked meal. In Asia nothing beats a home cooked meal.
desc: The team at Voco is great and really makes me feel that I am coming home. Cliché but it’s true the whole team from Ali, Vivian, Ray, Kenny, Sandy , Ann Natasha and Martin. Kudos and keep up the good service. If you would like to know what I am talking about, book your stay at Voco Orchard.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pleasant stay but lacking good dining.
desc: Location is perfect and the hotel staff are friendly and helpful. Front of house staff were good. Service in the bar was slow and not always with humour except for Push who looked after us. The gym is excellent and we enjoyed using the outdoor pool. The rooms are comfortable but even at 19C air conditioning on cool we felt hot at night, I think the bed coverings are too heavy and the pillows too thin. Breakfast options were rather limited as was the evening dinner menu.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel with amazing staff
desc: I’ve spent my first month in the Voco hotel ,Singapore ,and it has been a wonderful experience. The rooms are large and modern and the facilities are excellent, especially the rooftop pool area. The Hotel staff are all so very nice and helpful. In particular, I want to thank all the lounge staff for taking care of me when I show up ( which is often). Kenny, Natasha, Ann, Sharim, Ali, Pavlina……Thanks! (Sorry if I missed anyone.) Looking forward to another 2 months.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent National Day Lunch Buffet
desc: We had a wonderful meal at Opus Bar & Grill. Food was so delicious and tasty. The foie gras toppings were excellent. The fish that comes with the Thai style sauce was delicious and appetizing. The black pepper crabs were done just right. The seafood, meat and dessert sections were fabulous. Alaska crab and oyster were my favourites. We can see that the whole team at Opus Bar & Grill gone out of their way to make this Singapore National Day Special Buffet lunch a memorable one for us. We were also delighted to be introduced to the head chef of the restaurant, young and vibrant young chef with excellent culinary skills. Special thanks goes out to Mr Push, the restaurant manager..very warm personality. He took care of our needs and provided the special cutleries for the alaska

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: CLUB LOUNGE @ VOCO
desc: Very friendly and pro active staff. Kenny is friendly and outgoing, know what he is serving and he is confident with his knowledge. Nice cocktail to try. Will definitely be back if I have the chance. Natasha is a friendly and outgoing young lady who is cheerful.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome Stay!
desc: Thank you Kenny and Natasha for the warm hospitality! Both of you are a gem. We truly enjoyed our evening cocktail. We love all the food and drinks especially the ambiance! We will surely come back ! Please reserve our usual table as always 😅❤️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Business Trip
desc: VOCO Hotel located in the center of Orchard where u can get along with most of the place by walking or cycling... Many people walking around u when u sitting there and u never feels so boring.. The hotel staff are very friendly with guest Who can serve you at all time without thinking any difficulty the question are Nice staff.. Their name Prush, Yoges, Raj and Manickam... Good job guys.... See you all again in the next visit.. 💥 👍🙏

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Most Excellent Stay at VOCO Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: The hospitality is top quality. The Staff was always courteous and polite. I was here on business extended stay. I would truely like to thank Mr. Kenny and Mr. Ali along with their entire staff who greeted me and and always treated me like Family. If you travel to Singapore, I highly recommend you stay at VOCO Orchard Hotel. You will not be disappointed!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: No need to look further
desc: I have stayed in this property 5 times now. It is perfect for me in every way. The location is adjacent to lots of great shops and food outlets. The staff have always gone the extra mile to ensure everything suits me. Especially Mark who checked me in this time epitomised this. The pool is a joy. The hotel is well kept. The breakfast restaurant is delicious. The rooms have some nice touches with a coffee machine and complimentary bottled water. Comfortable bed and quality bed linen and towels. I will be back soon and cant wait.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Hospitality by Staff!
desc: Had a great stay at Voco Orchard Hotel. Thanks to Mr. Marc and Mr. Push for making the stay way more comfortable than my liking. Tremendous hospitality. Breakfast and Hospitality is the real USP of the Hotel. Truly enjoyed my stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful staff, great location, highly recommended.
desc: The Voco Orchard Hotel is located in a fabulous position in the heart of Orchard Road just a few minutes walk from the train station (MRT). The facilities are excellent and the breakfast is abundant and delicious. Best of all, the staff are wonderful and I must thank Norman, Sheh, Justin, Push, Yoges, Raj, Mancini and Cristina for their wonderful hospitality. You really did look after me so well throughout my stay. I look forward to returning! Thank you! Rose

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Holiday
desc: We have a great experience at Singapore. we stay at Voco hotel, staff are amazing friendly and helpful. great vies. Nice cocktails. Breakfast so yummy specially noodle soup. Both manager at Opus restaurant are really nice and their staff are top helpful you feel like home. thanks everyone at the Voco hotel for your hospitality. wish all the best all of you. hope come back soon. gaby

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mr. Harley
desc: The customer service is great. All the staffs are accommodating. They know their job well. Appreciated their dedication to their work. Honesty and how they care for us here are excellent. Foods are awesome. the drinks they are given to us when we get back to the hotel are refreshing from the activity that we had. continue to have an excellent customer service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Hotel Dining Experience ever
desc: Manager Push and his team Vivian , Cristin, Raj, Monica, and Joe are absolutely the best I’ve ever seen and experienced in all my many travels. I would say what separates VOCO hotel from others is this teams ability to manage all the people coming in for breakfast and other weekend nuggets. They are attentive, organized, and clean. Please make sure they are rewarded for their hard work.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The way to “Push” your team…
desc: The hotel as far as I know is a refurbished Hilton. It was modernized in a tasteful way. But what I really look forward to is breakfast. And here’s the thing, I’m not a big breakfast eater. But the breakfast team of Push, Mina, Pua, Joe, Chua, Rhim, Himan, Mankan, and Vivan makes you feel very welcome. Always making sure we’re comfy. Keep up the smiles guys!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Singapore Magic
desc: On our first trip to Singapore for Formula 1 the service was above & beyond at the voco| Orchard Singapore. The highlight aside from my daily runs to the most beautiful Singapore Botanical Gardens (just a mile away from the hotel) was our daily breakfasts. The food (you must have the fresh mangosteen & duku) and the staff blew us away with their attentiveness & warmth. A million thanks to Push, Caistin, Vivan, Maria, Pua, Joe, Chue and Paggi. We can’t say enough good about the magic of voco | Orchard Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Position Orchard Rd
desc: Great position on Orchard Road, was the old Hilton , MRT really close, as well as enormous shopping areas all around. Rooms clean, Staff very friendly, Buffet breakfast can get busy in area provided, good options for different cuisines at BF. Pool area, small but adequate & clean. Good value& position for a Singapore hol

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding dinner
desc: Held our wedding here and things went smoothly! We had a coordinator, Anthony, who took care of things for us. It made the experience super easy and carefree because things were taken care for us. Thanks！

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Wedding Lunch Experience
desc: My partner and I had a pleasant experience holding our Wedding lunch at Voco Orchard. We are grateful for the thoughtful services provided by Anthony and the staff associated throughout the event. Anthony displayed utmost professionalism to ensure our wedding lunch goes smoothly. The suite provided is also clean and spacious which we appreciate it greatly after a long day!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel for My Wedding!
desc: My wife and I had a delightful experience holding our wedding lunch at voco Orchard Singapore, held on the 24th floor of the Panorama Room. We are tremendously grateful for the wonderful service provided by Anthony. He made sure all the details of our wedding were well taken care of. He walked the extra mile to follow up with us on our concerns, needs and requests. His service is professional. The executive suite and deluxe room are top notch and clean as well, which impressed us. All the staff are courteous and provide amazing service. The hotel ambience is comfortable yet luxurious.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An outstanding hotel
desc: We have stayed in many hotels in Singapore having also lived there for a number of years. This without doubt is the best. From arrival to departure nothing was too much trouble for the staff and that to me is the epitome of a classy establishment. Check in was both quick and efficient and thanks for allowing us an earlier than expected check in. Rooms are spacious, quiet and spotlessly clean. Breakfast has everything that you would need or think of and the way the tables are laid out it is relaxing enough to be able to take your time and just enjoy. The bar area in the evening is really laid back although I would question it closing a tad too early. I would recommend getting access to the executive lounge as there are 'nibbles' served in the evening which are specially prepared

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good services
desc: Vivian and team were friendly and cheerful . Love their services . Breakfast spread were awesome .enjoy every bit of it . I specially love the laksa breakfast . The soup paste was rich and creamy 😍

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First time stay and was a delight
desc: Absolutely amazing service from the front desk and buffet staff! All very kind and helpful! This is my first time staying with this hotel and I definitely will be back, I haven’t had a bad experience yet, even the room was very lovely!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good service experience at il Cielo - Voco Orchard
desc: Food is good and the timing of serving is perfect. Their staff, Janson and Caiying are friendly and they give good recommendation of their food. We have a business meeting in the hotel and follow with a dinner in the restaurant for 27 pax. All guests are happy with the friendly and helpful staff of the restaurant.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Everything we hoped for - almost
desc: My wife and I stayed for a week after a 5 week tour of the UK. We needed to relax after visiting the elations! Check was easy and Aloysius gave us all the details needed. Kenny and his staff in the club lounge were excellent. We enjoyed breakfast in the dining room on the ground floor for 4 of the 6 mornings and the staff went out of their way to help. Western, Indian and Asian food all available. Downside - One day we wanted a rest but hammering and drilling went on all day and at 10 pm I went down to Reception to complain. Another gentleman from the 17th floor was doing the same. The young lady fixed it within minutes. Most hotels stop repairs or building work around 5. It was unacceptable at 10 pm. If you think about refurbishing the pool area think about putting in some

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Feedback From Anil Chavan
desc: Dear Voco, I have got the excellent service from Ali, Faith, Kenny, Rubiah and Sabrina during my stay at Voco Orchard Singapore. Will definitely choose Voco Orchard Singapore to stay in Singapore and would also recommend it to my friends. Thank you again. Best regards Anil Chavan

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Old hotel indeed but one with impeccable service!
desc: It is no doubt that the room's aircon and carpet have a slightly musky smell, but this hotel more than made up for it with their amazing team of staff with unrivalled service. This is our first visit since the ex-Hilton Hotel became Voco. We were there with our two little girls to celebrate my husband's birthday. Not only did different staff attending to us on separate days wished him Happy Birthday (an indication of their eye for detail in their system), staff at the Club Lounge and Reception and even those mending the live chat presented us exceptional service and did everything they possibly could to make us feel special. Their kindness and patience with our girls and the little gestures they offered - be it the kids' welcome gifts, little drinks and small chats - showed us

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thank you Kenny
desc: Thank you Kenny for the cake arrangement, knowing the family had a lot of cheesecake during the tea time in Lounge. He went extra miles to get different slices cake from D9 for our Bday & Anniversary celebration instead of having same cake again.., Attentive & exceed the expectation comparing other hotel I have visited. All the club team very friendly too.. Had a wonderful stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Impeccable service !
desc: Was only there for a simple lunch but I have to commend Push for his attentiveness and his impeccable service! He ensures that I am taken care of even though I was there alone and this really sets other establishments apart!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Alfredo Panaligan
desc: Vivian she's so accommodating and always attentive. Very hardworking staff. Always remember guest upon returning back. Continental breakfast so good, a lot of choices from Asian to western food available. Fruit selection is good. Coffee is excellent.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Hotel Breakfast
desc: Been coming to this hotel for many years on business, first when it was Singapore Hilton and now it has changed to a Voco property. Breakfast at the hotel restaurant is nice, it’s standard offerings are what you would find in many hotels in Singapore, but for me the difference is in the staff. Many have stayed on here from when it was a Hilton and they provide great service and many of them remember me. Vivien who works front of house, remembered me by name this morning even though I haven’t seen her since the start of the pandemic. It’s a nice touch being made to feel welcome when you pop down for breakfast.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Recommend
desc: It is a nice hotel with good amenities and services. The staff is friendly and helpful Good breakfast and in room dining varieties It is located in one of the hot spots in Singapore with several shopping outlets from high end to basic A mall is attached to the hotel as well. An overall good experience and will be my choice if I visit Singapore again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Extremely Disappointed Platinum Member
desc: The level of hospitality and customer service in this hotel is appaling. Booked 2 rooms (1 suite for 4 people for my family, room # 1719; and 1 twin room # 1726 for my parents). Checked in on the 3rd Oct after F1 Grand Prix was over (still staying and have not checked out yet). While the suite was ready, the twin room was not ready until 4 pm local time. Hotel check-in is supposed to be 3 pm. Not a single apology or consolation offered for the long delay. Just as a comparison: I was at Sofitel Singapore last week during Formula1 Grand Prix and hotel was at full capacity and yet, they still managed to have both rooms ready although they asked if we were ok to wait 20 mins for them to do a second check. They offered complimentary drinks at the bar while we waited in addition to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful hotel stay in Singapore
desc: Had a great stay here at the voco special mention to the excellent team from the bell and concierge team and the front office staff, housekeeping was impeccable and breakfast was great! Loved to be able to takeaway coffee at any time. Special mention Push at opus for taking good care of us throughout our stay. :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay!
desc: Rooms be comfortable and clean and peaceful! Breakfast buffet is really great too with the omelette bar and the fruit selection! Also, all the staff are super friendly! Special mention to Push at Opus!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good value hotel on Orchard Road
desc: Conveniently located on orchard road, access to multiple malls. It’s more commercial in this area but with less trendy restaurants that you get in other parts of SG. The hotel was nice and descent. Bed was comfortable. Service was good. Good value

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nothing special, but this is unusual.
desc: There's nothing special about this VOCO Hotel. Although you can reach everything you need, unless you need an experience like in a super luxurious resort. Varied breakfast buffet, rooftop pool, hyper convenient location, warm hospitality and so on. The Deluxe Room is a bit old but well furnished and wide enough for a family including 2 adults and 1 small child. Now, if you try to find the hotel that can fulfill these conditions, I think it's not easy. That is why this hotel is great. I highly recommend this hotel to all of you who have any purpose.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice place
desc: The rooms were nice and comfortable and I got a good night's sleep. The lounge was pleasant, with a nice view of the city. A decent place to stay and enjoy the view. It was a very nice hotel, but at the end of the day what really enhanced the experience for me was the obvious dedication to customer service that the staff exhibited with special thanks to Push who made sure that our stay gets more comfortable and also for complimentary muffins. Excellent service! I will definitely stay there the next time I am in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Push is a great guy.
desc: Push was great in his hospitality; he was so much helpful. He is the best since he made it sure that my boys were enjoying themselves at a new place. I'll surely visit and meet him the next time I come to Singapore!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Exceptional service and perfect location.
desc: My stay at Voco Orchard Road in Singapore was truly exceptional. The service provided at every stage was top-notch and made me feel truly welcome. The location on Orchard Road could not have been better, as it was close to all the shopping and dining options I could ask for. While the room could use some updating, the warm and welcoming atmosphere more than made up for it. I highly recommend this hotel, and I am already planning to return in December.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome place and hospitality really an wonderful experience for a business traveller's. Specially the team at Reception, Bell D
desc: The place is awesome for a business traveller's. Centrally located, staff is well experienced and absolutely courteous. Special kudos to team reception, bell desk and breakfast. Place is accessible to the shopping district and best malls. Well connected through metro links.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service from the event management team
desc: Had a wine tasting event and the staff from top to bottom could not have been more helpful, friendly and efficient. The room was laid out perfectly from the start, no small job or requirement was any trouble for the highly professional group looking after us. Great job and delicious canapés.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic service great location
desc: We loved our stay at Voco Orchard. We looked forward to breakfast every morning and seeing and chatting to the breakfast staff. Breakfast was fantastic thank you Walid and Shannon. The service from Push,Mina, Raj,Joe and Anne was very friendly and very welcoming. Especially enjoyed our chats with uncle Joe. We couldn’t have asked for anything more.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: No regret having wedding banquet here!
desc: We had our wedding luncheon at Voco in November 2022. The service was great since the beginning even though they changed the marketing person assigned to us halfway through the planning. Haze was very accommodating towards our requests and the banquet manager Wailing ran the show smoothly. The bridal suite is very spacious and comfortable. But the star of the show I think was the food. I had a few guests coming to me personally to mention how good the food was. The dinner served to us after the banquet was really nice too. Totally happy with the entire celebration!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel ! Will revisit !
desc: My stay at Voco Orchard Hotel for the past 2 weeks was amazing. Great location, professional and courtesy staff. I also would like to say thank you to Iris and other housekeeping team members for doing a great job of making sure my room is cleaned and neat everyday during my stay.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Pleasant and memorable stay at Voco Orchard
desc: After a overnight flight from India, we reached Hotel around 8:00 am in the morning, though check in time is around 3:00 PM, Namiko and Jashveen not only ensured smooth check in, they also arranged room for us right away. Generally in Singapore, it has happened to me in Sheraton towers and Intercontinental @ Robertson Quay, they don't don't give room earlier than 12:00PM. During the stay, came across various staff members which ensured we have a quality time during the stay and leave hotel with pleasant memories 1. Push at the buffet resturant's front desk 2. Manickam kept track of our needs during breakfast 3. Kim Teck's warm and welcoming nature at the soup counter 4. Pau almost everyday served us tea we needed All in all we had a very pleasant stay at Voco and location of

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great days during my House improvement projects.
desc: A great stay of 14 days with Voco hotel with great service management with great breakfast with great customer service with great housekeeping service team with great big room (we have an extra bed in the room).

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience
desc: We chose this place during our honeymoon. Amazing hospitality and great experience at the voco hotel. Special thanks to Mr. Push for the delicious food especially the masala tea. Will be back for sure. Highly recommended!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Highly recommended
desc: Had a great time at the hotel. Amazing ambience, great hospitality and extraordinary food. Special thanks to Mr. Push for accommodating us with the best of food and hospitality.. Highly recommended!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Hilton becomes a Voco, a high 3 but not quite a 4
desc: I’m a bit behind on my hotel reviews. But here’s my 0.02 cents on the Voco Orchard, formerly the Hilton Singapore. I booked a king room with a stand alone shower and got exactly what I booked. I liked my room overall. The room’s interior design wasn’t the most contemporary but it was nice enough. I liked that funky yellow-orange chair. And it was comfortable to seat in. I also had a fruit plate waiting for me when I got in. That was a nice gesture. The mattress of my kung sized bed was fine, not firm but not too soft either.Pillows were large and soft. Indeed, they sink quite a bit once you lay your head on them. The bathroon was visibly the oldest part of the room. (Bathrooms haven’t been updated since the hotel was a Hilton.) At least everything worked. I had no mysterious

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing stay and amazing staff
desc: Hubby and I had the pleasure of staying at the Voco Singapore for 9 nights over the Xmas and New Year period. Due to a late flight and delays from Australia we didn't end up checking in till 12.04 am on Xmas day and very tired after a long flight. What a joy it was to be welcomed by fantastic reception staff who made sure we were checked in as quickly as possible and all done with a smile and a welcome. Sorry I don't remember your names except for Mil, lovely smile. Bags were swiftly taken to our room and sleep was sort in the most comfortable bed I think I have ever slept in. Breakfast in the morning whilst a bit hectic as the hotel was full, I cannot commend the staff enough. At all times they were pleasant and nothing was a problem. Points go to them for putting up with some

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good for wedding and staycation
desc: Had my wedding at Voco, and it was indeed the best choice! Haze was very professional and patience throughout! Everyone who attended the wedding, complimented that the food was nice, even for vegetarian cuisine! Stayed at the suite for 3d2n, I loved it so much that I wished it could be longer! Thank you Haze, Anthony, Alvin and everyone who was part of our wedding! You guys made the wedding a big success!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing experience!
desc: The service here is incredible. We held a wedding dinner here at Voco and it was seamless. Anthony in particular did a fabulous job taking care of us and made some delightful recommendations. We highly recommend Voco!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Decent hotel on Orchard Road
desc: Located at the heart of shopping area, lots of malls and shops around. It’s about 5-10 mins walk to the MRT station, if you are going to rely on using MRT during your stay, it might not be the most convenient hotel, consider many hotels in Singapore are closer or even connected to MRT stations. Rooms are good size, very clean, with great amenities. Ben are very comfortable. Hotel staffs are helpful. Overall a good experience staying in this hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A true professional
desc: I would like to commend Ying Zhuang, a receptionist, who handled my complaint and disappointment professionally and in a good manner. She is very devoted to her duties and also sympathetic with the problem I had. She is definitely an asset to the hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Recently, we had our stay at Voco Hotel, and there was maintenance work that took place in our room. We shared the unexpected work with Mr Kenny and he assisted us promptly with the necessary while ensuring that our stay remains comfortable. We would like to further express our gratitude to Mr Kenny, Ms Sabrina and the team for the amazing lounge experience, even though the Lounge was temporarily relocated. Lastly, we are grateful to Ms Sandy (from Housekeeping), who proactively ensured that our needs are met.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Better than the previous hotel
desc: I find the refurbishments done have made this hotel better than previously Hilton. To be fair, the new Hilton is an amazing hotel but voco is genuinely a strong contender in Singapore’s busy hotel business at its price point. I hate the bathroom without walk-in shower of ex Hilton and unfortunately voco keeps them for the most basic room category. Otherwise, hard to beat the hotel at this price point with its great staffs, helpful concierge and perfect location.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Ask for a remodeled room or you’ll get a 2 star room with grime.
desc: It’s a very tired hotel and quite sad in terms of infrastructure. I met another guest, they complained he could not sleep due to the air conditioner. We both laughed that they provided us winter down comforters for our bedding! I did complain, because they sent me texts, so I was offered a new room, but I was flying out early the next day, they then offered club and breakfast, I did take their comps. If you see the pictures below, I can’t believe how Voco standards have decline and especially here in SG. I read the reviews and thought, OK, great, but nope.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding event in VOCO was great
desc: As one of the helpers, From the process of checking in to celebrating the wedding with the guests were great. Food and event schedules went in a timely manner. Coordinator has done well making sure the event was successful

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice review
desc: Voco hotel is a very nice hotel inside outside.The service is excellent,all the staffs (Pavlina,Ying Zhuang,Namiko,Haley) are nice,helpful and fast response.All the goods inside our room are complete and high quality.It is located at very strategic location,i enjoy the surrounding music and coffee and bfast with a nice wind blow and landscape of Orchard road and the traffic of peope walking. All our family are so happy ❤️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding
desc: VOCO Orchard really made the wedding we wished for come to live. They were really accommodating -and professional. Food was fantastic from the wedding till check out. My guests were all very happy and satisfied. The rooms are also spacious and their crew super friendly and professional. Needless to say we felt 100% taken care of. Haze and Wai Ling are extremely on the ball. Entire experience was seamless. 100/100 would come back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Lunch VOCO Hotel
desc: Just had my wedding yesterday in VOCO Hotel, Vista room. I would like to thank Haze, John and the aunty server that serving my VIP table 1. Wonderful team to ensure everything was smooth and able to accommodate to a lot of my last min request. Food was great, my guests were satisfied. No regrets hosting my wedding there. My wife and is looking forward to spend our anniversary yearly in VOCO hotel. Thank you once again to VOCO Hotel team.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Company Dinner Event in December 2022
desc: I would like to first mention a big thanks to Haze. She was very responsive from the start and tried accommodating as much as she could. We decided to hold our first company dinner event after 3 years after being quoted a reasonable price. Dinner buffet food selection was very good. Lots of compliments especially for the fish - big thanks to the chefs, could see them working hard in the back. Rizwan, Zack and team were very approachable, polite and attentive. They took good care of everyone. Overall, we were beyond satisfied with the value. Thank you again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My stay at VOCO Orchard.
desc: Superb Hotel, nice environment and location. Eveerything was in reach and very convenient. Hotel staffs are awesome from the restaurants to the front office. Special shoutout to Indra and Tien. These two ladies has kept my room feeling like an oasis. Everyday my room was immaculate. THANK YOU BOTH. My stay with VOCO has always been excellent. Grateful for these people who are passionate with their jobs that made my stay outstanding. Will always be coming back definitely.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Orchard - December 2022
desc: I really love the hotel not only because of the strategic location. But also the services provided, especially the ones who had been serving me for breakfast especially Mira & Push. Thank you guys so much for the warm welcome & help throughout my entire stay! ☺️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Incredible service
desc: We took a business delegation to the hotel. The sevice was outstanding. In addition to meeting space we had a cocktail banquet. The service was exceptional throughout. The food and service at the breakfast buffet was also stellar. Highly recommend the VOCO

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Event at Voco
desc: The staff were very helpful and assisted in the planning of this event with great professionalism. The event went well and the guests enjoyed the evening. The food was good and the atmosphere after the dinner, in the foyer for cocktails, was enjoyable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Events at Voco Hotel
desc: Did couple of events at Voco Hotel. All went well & smooth with the helps from event sales Grace & Hwee Ling, as well as the banquet managers. Clients were satisfied with the F&B and their service, not to mention their pretty grand ballroom and Panorama ballroom at lv 24 with superb, nice city view. Will definitely host my upcoming events at Voco Hotel!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An amazing stay at Voco
desc: My family and I had an anmazing experience at Voco, when we visited for our family trip. The hotel staff were professional and service-oriented to the needs of their guests. My family and I would like to particularly thank Indrani for her excellent service in meeting all our needs and excellent service in making our stay a comfortable one! The food was excellent and service impeccable. We enjoyed every aspect of our stay with Voco and once again, we would like to say a big thank you, to all staff for making our stay with Voco, a memorable one. From: The Perera Family

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A memorable wedding and stay with Voco
desc: My Fiancee and I had a wonderful experience at Voco, when we held our wedding there recently. The hotel staff were professional and service-oriented to the needs of their guests. The food was excellent and service impeccable. My fiancee and I, would like to particularly thank Anthony and Ginnie, for being with us throughout our entire wedding journey and also for surprising us with their great hospitality, service and attention to detail. We enjoyed every aspect of our stay with Voco and once again, we would like to say a big thank you, to all staff for making our wedding and stay with Voco, a memorable one. From: Charles & Jocelyn

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent place to stay
desc: Had the opportunity to stay at this excellent motel, where the service was excellent, the food was great and the facilities were clean, presentable and very functional. Room service was great. Excellent gym and steam room. Highly recommend the accessibility to Singapore services,And an excellent team specially Mr. Push. Recommend place to stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First Post Pandemic OS Trip
desc: Finally got to travel again (from OZ. Decided on a quick few days away in Singapore - and we'd looked at this hotel before when it was a Hilton. I've not stayed in a Voco before and in short this is a great hotel. Stayed on a upgraded room on the 17th Floor (didn't go for Club Lounge this time). Check in was seamless and they gave us a heap of stuff - upgraded room (I'm IHG Platinum), Free Full Breakfast and some cookies. It's a fairly busy hotel with Singapore now opened up with tourists, business people and weddings but they still managed to make us feel special and we even did a few back and forth text messages with their team about of experience at the Voco so far. Awesome breakfast spread with an egg station, Singapores take on Western breakfast, heaps of Asian and Indian

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Stay at Executive Suite and Wedding Banquet at Vista Room
desc: Stayed at executive suite as my bridal suite which came with executive lounge access. The suite itself was rather spacious with a living room, a powder room, and a big bedroom. The toilet in the bedroom has two wash basins and a bathtub with separate shower area. There is also a mini fridge and a coffee machine that was greatly appreciated. For the executive lounge, I only managed to try the light snacks, and the sandwiches are not bad. Unfortunately we didn’t have time to try the cocktails in the evening. Would recommend making time to try it out. For hotel facilities, the pool was great, and the gym is well maintained. For our wedding banquet at Vista Room, we worked with Ginnie (coordinator) and Xin Hui (banquet manager). Initially we have signed a package with another

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Banquet and Hotel Stay
desc: We had the loveliest time with Voco from our planning of the banquet, the day itself and throughout our 2 nights stay. Our event manager Anthony was very attentive, patient and understanding of our circumstances. He was a big help to us throughout every step of the way up to the big day. Our banquet manager Xinhui managed the entire event which went smoothly without a hitch. The staff we met during our stay were very polite and welcoming. All in all, Voco exceeded our expectations and we are very happy to have chosen Voco to be a part of our memorable day.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great base for the city
desc: This is a great hotel in the heart of the city. The rooms were nice and the beds were amazing. The staff were very helpful. We used this as a base for our activities and it was perfect for public transport and for setting out on foot. Its location on Orchard Road meant plenty of shopping and food choices.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Person Wonderful Service
desc: I come to this place for one thing, I am pampered! I stayed 1-2 weeks at the most due to business. This morning at the breakfast lounge, a man named Kim Teck, Noodle House section, amazed me. I was looking at the selections which are already outstanding, but he offered to put together a special noodle dish for me. So I said to myself, what a wonderful man and a cook, that offered above and beyong the normal. Mr. Tech indeed handed me a very delicious and tasty noodle dish. He did not stopped there, he even came to my table and delivered a soup that he said it's best taken with the dish. Wow and wow! OUTSTANDING Service. Mr. Teck ia a very very nice, friendly and caring person! I would like to give TONS of THANKS to Mr. Teck for the wonderful food and the excellent service

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Location,location,Location,VOCO is the Best!
desc: My wife and I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore before.This is her favorite one hotel that is called for shoppingholic. Hotel is in the excellent location, at the start point of Orchard Road that’s the business district with the most concentrated shopping mall in Singapore. We stayed at the hotel in renovation room(Room No.1502)very comfortable and clean. At the moment ,we step into the room finding the welcome fruit and message handwritten by GM. Mark very moving. We enjoyed the club laundry wonderful service(Special thanks to Josephine and Adriana) Sleeping in the luxurious bed was so comfortable ,we had a great night ever. If you want to stay in Singapore and experience first-class service, VOCO is the only choice. We definitely be back again. 深入人心的服務。

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: NICE HOSPITALITY FROM VOCO HOTEL REALLY SO HAPPY WITH VOCO HOTEL STAFS.I AM SO HAPPY VOCO HOTEL STAFFS AND I AM FELLING
desc: I had a great stay in voco hotel,Where I have found nice hospitality and all staffs are friendly they have nice smiling. 1.Namico 2.Kenny 3.Adriana 4.josephin 5.Rovi Tomorrow I am going to Japan by the grace of allah Next future I will be stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Our wedding dinner and suite stay
desc: The staffs did really well to help us all out with our heavy belongings meant for our wedding. The transition from checking in to out was a breeze as well. A very big shout out to the concierge team who were very attentive and help us with out luggage even before we step out of the car. We managed to get an early check in and prep for our wedding that evening as well. The suite was really huge and clean! Shout out to Haze the wedding coordinator, Alvin the banquet manager in making sure our wedding dinner went smoothly in the panorama room. The staffs were really fast in setting up the wedding tables too! The night after the wedding, the room was pretty much messy with all the drinking glasses, we called for room cleaning the next day, and they manage to clean such a big room

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed in this hotel for staycation multiple times and I really i like this hotel. Booked 1 king deluxe room with walk-in shower, it was really clean and very comfortable. The bed and pillows are really superb. The staff at the hotel are really professional, pleasant and friendly, not stuffy at all. Location of the hotel is great, easy access to everywhere, specially if you like to walk and have a mooch. Overall i would really recommend this hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not Impressed!
desc: Husband (Diamond Eilite member) was kind enough to use his points to give me two nights at Voco during my annual trip to see family. Booked from UK as it had a central location right in the heart of town. Came closer to the date and called hotel to notify them that I am the only guest checking in and not my husband. Whereby which they told me that I was not entitled to the club lounge as husband was one tier away from having club lounge access which was fair enough. I then asked if breakfast was included with my stay and the hotel confirmed that I was. Upon checking in, I was informed that because my husband was not present, breakfast was off the table and so were welcome drinks as well which was contrary to what I was told during the prior phone call I made to the hotel. The

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: First time at a Voco Hotel
desc: Hotel has a new modern vibe after transitioning from the Hilton to IHG. Very personalized check-in experience and felt like a true and sincere welcome. Staff are very friendly and say hello and acknowledge you as you move throughout the hotel. The breakfast buffet is also very nice with many choices and make importantly well staffed way helpful and friendly team members. It’s really a treat when staff make you feel welcome and appreciate that you are why the hotel is there. I stayed for 5 days and wouldn’t hesitate to stay again. Very enjoyable visit , thank you Voco!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel along Orchard
desc: First time to book this hotel with my Family. Initially, we were given the room with shower, as opposed to what I booked - which is with a bathtub. After checking with Frontdesk, they immediately sent a new key to another room with a bathtub. The hotel looks newly renovated. Very clean and fresh, there’s Big size TV (maybe 55”), city-view. The staffs are pleasant and polite. We were not able to use the pool because of the weather. Hopefuly can come back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very solid stay
desc: Voco has perfect location close to ION Orchard Mall and MRT, yet our room on the 18th floor was very quiet. The room was slightly on the smaller side but enough for us. There was a coffee maker, but not any teas. On the last day I spotted a small gecko in our room. We stayed during lunar new year and everything in Singapore was very quiet and peaceful, as was the hotel. Roof top pool stayed pretty much empty every time we were there. Breakfast was very good with several options to everyone's taste. Staff was very courteous and accommodating.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: D&D at VOCO Hotel by Happy Sparrow - 9 Jan 23
desc: Organised a Cosplay themed party at Voco Hotel on Jan 23 for a group of fun loving clients. Voco Hotel was a top choice by Happy Sparrow as the venue was rather centralise. What made the D&D a successful one was their marveliicious food too. Worked with Haze closely for this event, I must say she was very helpful throughout the planning stages which made it easy for us. Would definitely recommend my clients to conduct their D&D @ VOCO in the near future! Cheers Director Happy Sparrow Pte Ltd

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Company event at voco
desc: We had a business conference and booked opus and Il Cielo for the group of 20+ foreign traveler’s. Dave Aw and “Gee” handled our meals, room reservations and meeting rooms . We had the entire restaurant at Il cielo and a private corner. At all times, we had their attention for the many changes we had to the itinerary and participants.. thank you !

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My first stay with Voco , Orchard
desc: From checking in to the room , club lounge [ had club lounge access as I won the instant lucky draw] and breakfast the on the next day , it was above my expectations. I like that touch that I was able to communicate with the front office team via SMS . I was able to place any stay related request via this platform Even though the club lounge was a temporary one , the team over there did an excellent job .. if I have to single out the associates who did an exceptional well job , Mil who checked me in and Josephine from the club lounge . Overall experience, our first time to Voco definitely not the last !

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent , friendly service of Opus Voco
desc: Thank you to Push, Raj and Christine for making our stay so comfortable with their friendly service and professional 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Good food, big variety , delicious . Check in was quick and feiendly as well Will definitely come back again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Disappointing Reservations Experience at Opus
desc: I’m writing in to give feedback on our restaurant reservation experience via the hotel hotline for Opus Bar & Grill. Had made a dinner reservation for 10 pax on 21/1 at Opus Bar and Grill >1 month earlier, to celebrate Lunar New Year (CNY) Reunion with the family. The CNY menu was also not out at the website then, and we did not know that the restaurant does not serve buffet for dinner. Called on 16/1 12:20pm to the hotel hotline 6737 2233, since repeated try to connect to Opus via WhatsApp failed. Over the 8 minutes call, had repeatedly clarified that we would like to have buffet dining and since it’s not available for dinner, we would then change the meal to lunch instead. We even ordered an Ala-carte YuSheng. Since it’s barely 1 week from 21/1, had to get family members

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing staff and Grandball Room for a Wedding
desc: I held my wedding lunch at Voco's Grandball Room and it was amazing. The interior looks really beautiful with the decorations. My family and friends enjoyed the 7 course meal and it tasted really good. They have an amazing team that ensured that my wedding ran smoothly and they always try to go above and beyond when possible. The team made sure that we enjoy our stay with them too. Thank you Voco, Anthony and Team, for the wonderful wedding experience!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect for Wedding Banquet
desc: I just did my wedding banquet with VOCO and it was nothing short of perfect! The team led by Anthony was professional and very accommodating. Front start to finish, Anthony has been reliable, patient and extremely knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend! Alongside Banquet Manager Ridwan, they have made the whole event a memorable one not just to my bride and i but also to our closest friends and family! Thank you guys, truly appreciate your efforts!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable, great service and great location
desc: Clean and comfortable rooms. What you would expect from an IHG property. All the amenities you expect. Friendly and professional service from front of house. Kitchen is good. Superb location on Orchard road. Gym facilities are quite good too.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing stay at the club room!
desc: Amazing stay at this hotel over the weekend! We stayed at the club room which was newly refurbished - super clean and spacious, bed and comforter were so comfortable I had the best sleep in weeks, overall just really well designed and thought out. Hotel facilities wise, pool was real nice for achieving that summer girl moment, gym was the biggest I've seen in Singapore hotels, club lounge is very chill with a retro spin to the decor (food was super good here!). We also had the breakfast and tried the in-room dining, both were great experiences (: Last but not least, a huge shout out to club lounge manager Kenny who took good care of us and went the extra mile to make sure our stay was the best! Can't wait to visit again~

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thanks for your welcoming
desc: Less to 2 months in Voco, special thanks to the club lounge team : Kenny, Ali, Adriana, Ravi, Natasha, Josephine, Jia hi and the incredible chef Kevin. See you soon The renovation room at the 22 floors are fully better.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Service from an Icon on Orchard Rd
desc: Voco Singapore is a 5 star hotel with 5 star service from the entire staff. From the moment you arrive to the moment you leave, all staff you interact with cannot do enough for you. From the porters to reception, to the housekeeping to F&B, the entire team have a smile on their face and seem really happy to be part of the Voco family. While all staff are amazing, I want to call out Kenny and his team in the Executive Lounge. Kenny and his team made not only my stay memorable, but bent over backwards to ensure my guests that I hosted were looked after at all times. His attention to detail and ability to lead a team was second to none. If you are travelling for business or pleasure, the Voco Orchard should be your hotel of choice. Thanks for a great stay!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent!
desc: Experience was great ! Yummy food and great hospitality , especially push was really helpful :) will surely visit again with our families . Highly recommended!! Thank you for making our trip memorable

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Decent but not luxurious
desc: Hotel is nice and close to most of attractions. Rooms are bit small ,breakfast is great. Staff and service is good. Good enough for short business trips. Pool is smaller than it looks and in room service food is pretty average.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The Best Guest Experience ever
desc: The Best Hotel experience ever My wife loved it so much, she wants to make a return stay. Special mention to Janet and Lai for their excellent customer service. They made constant effort to check in on our comforts and requests.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay at the heart of Singapore
desc: Pleasant experience upon check-in, fast and efficient. The hotel’s premises are clean such as the lobby, lift and corridors. Room size is great for our stay and very clean and relaxing. Great staff (Josephine, Rovi, Kenny, Natasha) who provided great service to us at the lounge and made our stay comfortable and enjoyable. Many thanks.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: great stay
desc: Club Lounge services are excellent. The team been wonderful and very attentive to customer service, looking forward to visit the new club room. Kenny been outstanding and make out of my expectation .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding at VOCO Orchard Hotel
desc: Thank you VOCO for an amazing and memorable wedding. The staff, especially Haze, Xin Hui, aunty Ming Jie, and chef Wai Loon were very attentive and dedicated. They really made our wedding a wonderful experience. We received feedback from all the guests we asked that the food was excellent. This was no easy feat as the chef managed to satisfy all the guests. The ballroom decor was beautiful as well. 😍 We also enjoyed our stay at the hotel - the room was very clean and well-equipped, with friendly and courteous service from the staff e.g. Ali. The breakfast spread was delicious.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Really helpful
desc: This is an upscale hotel with all you would expect: good rooms and beds, good bathroom (ours had a walk-in shower and no bath, fine for us), excellent breakfast with drinkable (Illy?) coffee and short-order eggs, plus a range of Chinese breakfast offerings. The housekeeping was beyond reproach. My partner started getting a bad back, not helped, she said, by the relatively soft bed. The hotel promptly found a board for her side of the bed, which relieved the symptoms almost at once. Thanks again. There's a nice roof terrace with a pool. We used to work on our laptops rather than swim. We didn't use the gym. We did however sample two of the restaurants. Opus was essentially a grill, but an interesting one, with fish, meat, seafood, and marrowbone. Interesting and generally

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Had a really wonderful experience having my wedding dinner at voco Orchard. You guys set the standard for service!
desc: Held my wedding dinner reception at the voco Orchard Singapore Hotel. Choosing voco Orchard as the place to hold my wedding was a truly enjoyable and amazing experience. Their staff played a huge role in making my big day a success. I’m very impressed and grateful to them. I I would like to complement Mr Anthony Wee, Ms Ginnie Seow, Mr Alvin Khee and the wonderful team at voco Orchard for their professionalism, competence and friendliness. They were very accommodating with our requests and always made sure that my wife, Katherine and I, were well taken care of during our whole time working with them. You guys are really amazing. Also, many of my guests praised the delicious food that was served by the banquet team. They were very happy with the quality and taste of the dishes.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Successful Wedding Banquet
desc: We held a wedding banquet recently and the hotel staff service was excellent. We had family members fly in from America, one of whom had a severe nut allergy and their chef created a new menu for her with new cutlery just for the event. The head chef even curated a new menu for her room service. The event was coordinated by Haze Yong, who was always contactable and constantly checking up on us. The event went incredibly smoothly thanks to the careful attention of the Senior Assistant banquet manager Muhammad Ridzwan, he was always at the ready during the banquet to help out. The decorations exceeded our expectations, and the food was phenomenal. Many family and friends stayed overnight at the hotel and had a similar wonderful experience. We even had a private whatsapp chat with

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: It's all about Customer Service!
desc: What an incredible staff and fantastic service! From the moment I checked in until check out, I felt like the only person in the hotel (and it was quite busy!)...my every need met! They were always smiling and providing assistance to guests - even the housekeeper asked if I needed anything. The room was so clean, comfortable and spacious with really nice amenities including multiple bottles of water - this is plus after a 27 hour flight to get there! The hotel's meeting services is also TOP NOTCH - very detail oriented and excellent customer service! Great food too - huge variety/huge breakfast. I hope to return to this hotel with another meeting!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good customer service and food
desc: We had a weeklong business meeting at Voco Orchard. Th location is very accessible and the customer service was very good. The Voco team is very fast, customer centric and accomodating. The food in particular was very good from a variety and taste persepective.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Khalid Family
desc: Great hotel,excellent location, every thing u need is within walking distance, very friendly staff with follow up to make sure all is perfect, spacious room clean and good view diffently is my choice for any other vist

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good services
desc: Kenny was a good hotelier so far I’ve met. He was helpful and kind. Anything I would reach out to him. Even I ask for things like direction to places he do it so well that save my times to find it out myself. Other than helpful and kind, his smile on his face has made my day. Thank you for those few days and the services. Kenny will be a good leader in the future. Thank you kenny and the team.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome!!!!
desc: We loved our stay at the hotel. The rooms and washrooms very were clean and the hotel completely met our expectations. The staff was very welcoming, especially Push was a very good natured and hospitable host.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great spot and service.
desc: Great hotel with competent and friendly staff, behind the reception, room service and not to forget the breakfast team and chefs! Every thing is clean, works and the food tastes great. Been coming back several times and will continue to do so.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Welcoming
desc: Staff were very welcoming and helpful! We had the seafood platter on the last night, food was lovely. Had a wonderful experience with the steward Chloe Lee who provided us with some great breakfast recommendations and was always happy to help out with our questions.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very professionally accommodating and friendly environment, loved the asthetic of the place
desc: Was a wonderful trip, was suggested by one of my childhood friend, we visited from canada for some time off and refreshment. The staff was very welcoming and accommodating. Will visit again. 10/10 recommended

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Two out of Three
desc: This location was the old Hilton which I stayed at regularly when coming to Singapore and was disappointed they had moved. Decided to try the VOCO as I like the location for shopping and as I was not arriving too late evening. The staff was good on the check-in and check-out, the bedroom is a good size and the bed is very comfortable. Didn't enjoy the bathroom, the shower is terrible, struggled to get good water pressure and the liquid soap was of poor quality. The price was reasonable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: best food and masala tea
desc: singapore has always made my vacations memorable but this time I was overwhelmed with the hospitality we received from VOCO hotel especially Push who took care of our indian food and made masala tea for us which was spectacular. we had the best food. must visit Voco. special thanks to Push and Voco team for making our trip memorable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thank you Team Voco
desc: I have been staying at the Voco Singapore and keep coming back. It’s the people working here that make all the difference. While there are too many names to mention, I would like to acknowledge a few. Push and his team that make the breakfast experience very welcoming starting with a smile on his face and a welcoming healthy breakfast shot. Also Kenny and his team at the lounge as well as our bell team and let me not forget Sandy and Lea who service our room Thank you for making our stay comfortable. Robert Anthony Parker

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Another great visit.
desc: The hotel is an excellent oasis from the constant busy environment in Singapore. As a repeat guest I am always welcomed by name and assisted with care and hospitality. The rooms are a refreshing size after the smaller rooms in other properties I have visited. Overall a great experience every visit.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience at Opus Bar & Grill for Easter
desc: A big group of us brought our kids for Easter Sunday Brunch at Opus Bar & Grill and I am really amazed by their service, food and activities planned for the kids! Service crew is friendly and attentive. Push hosted us in and ensure that the big group of us are comfortable before assisting other diners. Our empty plates are cleared almost immediately by Joanne. Our many requests are also fulfilled by the service staffs promptly. (Sorry! Didn’t manage to catch their names!). Kudos to the service crew! Food is so yummy-licious! Beef Tomahawk, promfet fish, seafood by Chef Charles and Ashok are grilled to perfection. Duck confit is a hit. My kids love the fish and chips and yoghurt in mason jars. They had it for many rounds. 🤣 Chef Ming Fatt even cooked fried rice for our picky

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Hotel with an amazing staff
desc: I first booked Voco in 2022 not knowing what to expect and let me tell you I ended up booking the hotel 4 more times since then. Staff there are super friendly, Pash and his team in the breakfast area are amazing people, they make you feel like you’re family, and Miss Pavlina Fucikova did an amazing job to accommodate my stay. Great team and hotel, Voco Orchard is my to go hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very convenient location, very kind service, very efficient organization
desc: Very good and kind room service and cleaning on the 21st floor. Very good lounge on the 22nd floor. Very nice room.view on the Thai Embassy. Reception services also very efficient. Any issue with the room is immediately fixed

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent
desc: Great hotel in a fabulous location on Orchard Road. The staff were so helpful especially Ali, and the others in the Club lounge. The chef in the club lounge was also great - best breakfast. All the other staff from housekeeping to the front desk were really accommodating and always with a smile on their face.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Bad, dirty, unfinished renovation and unfriendly staff
desc: Very very bad. It's a renovated Hilton property but the renovation is still ongoing. They don't tell you this when you book until a day before you arrive in an email (too late to cancel then!). You wake up with construction sounds non-stop. We had to cancel our booking and leave after one day cause it was so loud. At 2pm the next day we told them we'd like to cancel and move to another IHG hotel due to construction. We asked for late checkout because we had a meeting at 4pm so had to come back to pack our stuff and move to the other IHG hotel. The lady at front desk phone told us we could have late checkout which was 2pm, but by then it was already 2pm essentially kicking us out of the hotel immediately. Never had this treatment at any IHG hotel ever 😂 The room was derelict

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Club Lounge
desc: We had a great time in room 2127. The room was nice and cosy. What was most exceptional about this hotel was the staff. One of the most outstanding staff member that I came across was Kenny Lee, the club lounge manager. He remembered the guests and made me felt right at home. Amazing service and he made Voco standed out of the competition.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Not matching expectations or standards
desc: I have requested a higher floor room, but I got told the hotel is totally booked. My colleagues got one. Rooms are dirty and I had to ask three times for cleaning service. The light in the wardrobe felt of and the room doors are as sound proof as paper doors. During the morning construction work is done which prevents from sleeping and all calls to get remedies of the situation are useless. It is for sure one of my worst experiences at Asian hotels I have ever had. Breakfast is good and the service really good. Bed is comfortable and rooms is big enough.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A wonderful family stay
desc: We had a fantastic 4 night stay at voco, made even better with excellent service from the staff, in particular Anthony and Vivian who went the extra mile to make us feel welcomed and comfortable. The room was very spacious and tidy and had excellent services. Food was great and the location was wonderful in the middle of Orchard. The executive suite was good for a family of our size. We wouldn't hesitate to stay again and would recommend it to our friends and family.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful experience
desc: Just completing a 2 month stay in the wonderful Voco Orchard Hotel. It is like a home from home for me. Great facilities, Large modern rooms and an excellent Club Lounge.
