All the staff in the Voco are amazing! Friendly, helpful, and always have time for you. It is a pleasure to stay there. Want to thank my friend Kenny who helps me a lot and all his team in the lounge , Natasha, Josephine, Rovi , Adrianna, Faith, Paul, Ali, and Janet in reception . Looking forward to returning in a few weeks.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful Stay at the Voco
desc: We have just spent the most wonderful seven (7) night stay at the Voco Orchard Singapore and it will not be our last. The service we experienced from check-in to check-out and everything inbetween was nothing less than outstanding. The team at the Voco from housekeeping, front desk, concierge to food and beverage were friendly and helpful. The location is great with an easy walk to the MRT and many shopping malls and restaurants. The Voco has a few high-end shops with a gallery, gym, roof-top pool, three (3) restaurants, il Cielo, Iggy's, Opus Bar & Grill and the D9 Cakery which is very difficult to stay away from. The included breakfast is very generous and had many options. A special mention to Song Hung-Yi who took the time to make our stay even more special, Situah

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Outstanding customer service!
desc: Had our wedding banquet here and it was the most amazing experience with voco Orchard! Our coordinator Haze was very hands on and accommodative since day 1. We checked in a little early to prepare for our wedding and Anthony was the most helpful in getting us food and ensuring we have our room at the earliest time possible. Our actual day coordinator Alvin guided us a lot on the process such that we didn’t have to worry about anything. Not to mention the excellence service from all staffs in voco! We would love to stay in voco again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: This is what true luxury and comfort and customer service is all about
desc: It is always nice when your service expectations are met. I have stayed at Voco Hotel, Singapore previously and this time I was back for one week and my expectations have again been met and exceeded. ALL of the staff at the Club Lounge are exceptional for their unobtrusive and attentive service. Nothing is too much trouble . The quality of the food is exceptional and the breakfast, snacks and canopies show attention to detail and freshness. They remember your name and preferences . The servicing of the room also shows attention to detail and Patsy from Housekeeping remembered my requirements from a stay in September last year ( I like three bath towels not two) Opus restaurant not just serves superb steaks but the Sunday Brunch is something special , even in a City renowned for

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent breakfast!
desc: We went to breakfast here every morning over our long stay at the Voco. Food was consistently tasty, varied, and interesting. As good as the food was, the service was even better! Christine, Push, and Maria led the way with incredibly personalized and charming service everyday. Thank you for making our stay that much more enjoyable.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding
desc: We love the bridal suite . Haze and xin Hui from Voco are professional and always give prompt reply . Overall we enjoy our stay here . We stay 2 nights in the bridal suit . Love the spaciousness and how they provide toilet

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: I have travelled to Singapore many times over the last 20 years and have settled on this as my hotel of choice there several years ago. I travel worldwide frequently and without a doubt this is my favourite of all hotels due to the staff and service given. I can highly recommend a stay here.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco in my heart
desc: Visited on a business trip and the service couldn’t be better. The staff truly makes you feel at come and take care of you and every detail of our event. I will definitely come back! Their meeting spaces are beautiful and their restaurant is cozy with a great vibe…

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good staff
desc: Good staff at concierge in VOCO I was there for my wife birthday they gave me high floor in hotel and pastry as a complimentary after all, Good service and we have enjoyed swimming as well thanks for your attention always appreciate it Will come back again Thanks 😀

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Smiles that matter🥰
desc: This was my first trip post pandemic surge. Voco Orchard Singapore Team gave me a memorable trip that would always remind me of a well deserved sense of solace amd elegance. On top of the efficient frontdesk team (there was a Filipina attendant!), the prompt and courteous assistance of Mr DAS (hugs sir!) and Mr Bob, I'd like to commend the entire team of Mr. PUSH for the warmth of their service. My friends and I would wake up super early to hit the breakfast buffet,and there they were, all glammed up, and their smiles would greet us, serving us first class! These men and women are the assets of this posh hotel. Keep it up! Will be back soon!❤ 💯!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Warm thoughtful staff
desc: My wife and I stayed for 6 nights in mid-March 2023. We booked a balcony room with club lounge access and had a great time. The lounge staff were fantastic, Kenny and his team offered true personal, professional service and made us feel warmly welcome. I must say that the club lounge option offers good value as it includes breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails and canapes in the evening. We celebrated our 35th wedding anniversary during the visit and were touched by the thoughtfulness of the club lounge staff. The hotel location is right on Orchard Road, close to all the shopping and dining options. The only let down was that the bathroom was a bit small. We loved this trip to Singapore and the hotel was a big part of that.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Hands down one of the best hotel experience
desc: This is hands down one of the best hotels in Singapore that you can stay in, the rooms are fabulous, the food is great , the location is amazing and i was blown away by the incredible hospitality of the staff, especially push , he and his team went above and beyond to ensure that I had everything I needed to make my visit comfortable and enjoyable. They were always available to answer any questions I had and provided me with excellent recommendations for local activities and restaurants. What really impressed me was how the staff anticipated my needs before I even asked . Whether it was providing extra towels or ensuring that my room was always stocked with fresh coffee , they were very attentive and thoughtful. Overall, I had a fantastic experience at this hotel and I can’t

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding @ Voco
desc: Had our wedding at Voco Singapore - the entire process was smooth sailing and all the service staff involved had been nothing but amazing throughout the wedding day itself and the months leading up to it! Our sales manager, Anthony, was brilliant! He was well-versed & accommodating towards our requests - e.g. clear directions for the actual day logistical stuffs, booking of additional hotel rooms for relatives, ensuring bridal suite & helpers room are on the same floor etc. John, the banquet manager, was also very responsive and on the ball. He also incorporated any last minute changes we had in the seating plan swiftly. Minor hiccups such as forgetting to bring disposable tea cups were also immediately handled by John.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: 4 star hotel claiming 5 star status. Managers are less than receptive to genuine concers.
desc: The room was upgraded to a renovated room for $1000USD. Shower had no pressure and the toilet didn't flush. It took 18 days (stayed for 21) to repair. Otherwise the breakfast staff deserve honorable mention. Push,Miriam, Pam, Cristian, Vikram, Jaffrey, and Joe and Alataf, work tirelessly to keep the customers needs met. Exceptional group. Hotel staff were pleasant over-all but the Managers were dismissively unconcerned. Apparently Managers are better than everyone. IHG Diamond Elite rewards customer meaningless.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding Banquet
desc: My husband and I held our wedding banquet lunch at Voco Hotel grand ballroom. Our coordinators Haze and Alvin were amazing and accommodative throughout, from the initial planning till the actual day. Our guests loved the food and drinks as well. Thank you Haze and Alvin for the top-notch service throughout and we are so glad that we chose Voco to celebrate our special day with our loved ones.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: No other like Voco
desc: We are so tired when checking in at Voco, but the staff really helpful and give my kids welcome cookies ( cinamon ginger cookies) The next morning, we have to catch up morning flight, so i didn’t get a chance to breakfast, but The hospitality especially the staff from restaurant made our day 🤍😍 The room so clean and spacious. Definately will go back to another trip!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Terriffic Business Meeting Location
desc: My company held a Business to Business Meeting at voco and it was very well executed and planned. The food served during the coffee breaks and lunch was very good and the service staff are wonderful! Chaplin and Sarah Mae helped to make the event flawless and all our clients were impressed and satisfied.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The hotel was really beautiful. The food that I was really yummy and delicious
desc: The hotel was really beautiful. The food that I was really yummy and delicious. I enjoyed every bit of it and special thanks to Mr. Pushpinder for his great hospitality. Looking forward to visit again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Had a wonderful experience visiting there. The ambience was really pretty and comfortable.
desc: Had a wonderful experience visiting there. The ambience was really pretty and comfortable. The food I ordered was very delicious. Special thanks to Mr. Pushpinder for his wonderful hospitality !!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Beautiful location, friendly team members & luxury
desc: Stunning Friendly & luxury Experience, I was so delighted to stay for 5 nights in this awesome hotel. When I check in, Bell Attendant was super friendly, I was so hungry, he told me where to go to have my late dinner. Housekeeping very friendly & efficient, Front Desk always anticipated my needs & questions. Concierge amazing. They always run to ask me it was OK. They gave me the best Bicycle. I was riding yesterday for 11 hours & Buffet Breakfasts very awesome yummy 😋 Definitely I'll come back next year

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My stay with this property was just awesome
desc: My stay was just awesome. I really enjoyed being there the property was just amazing, the hospitality is just way too amazing especially Push he helped me with my teen preferences. I would again come here.. Eagerly waiting for more stays like this.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Had a great time experiencing the food of this place , was amazing and delicious. The ambience was also very great and b
desc: Had a great time experiencing the food of this place , was amazing and delicious. The ambience was also very great and beautiful. And special thanks to Mr. Pushpinder for his great hospitality !!!!!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Brilliant Hotel !
desc: Wonderful hotel on Orchard Road. Easy to reach the main shopping areas and tourist hotspots! Level of service from the staff was exceptional . We arrived early at 9.30am and the staff (sorry I forgot the person’s name) was so kind and accommodating at the front desk that he allowed us to check in early. Push (the restaurant manager) and his team made sure that we were well taken care of and provided many gluten free options for us as well. Great variety of food at breakfast from traditional Singaporean, Indian and western options were available. The hotel had a good gym and roof top pool, with views down Orchard Road. Great hotel with brilliant staff ….I would highly recommend a stay at Voco when visiting Singapore !!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A perfect hotel in a perfect location
desc: The Voco Orchard is an amazing hotel, with a very welcoming and helpful staff, in an incredible location. I particularly liked the breakfast with a great choice of quality food incl. Asian. Just perfect

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service once again
desc: Mag was such a great bartender. The hospitality in this place and the service of staff like Mag is the reason I stay here. My late couple of drinks made a great experience even better. I’ll be coming here again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service from check-in and club lounge
desc: Booked a deluxe room with club access for 2 days. The hotel is located at the Orchard area. We were greeted by Ismail during check-in. Ismail is very friendly and the check-in was done efficiently. Our room was on the 21th floor, not much of a view (facing various buildings). Room was clean and had the basic amenities. Club lounge was located on the 22th floor and is facing the Orchard area. Comfortable area to sit back and relax. The club lounge offers breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails. A special shoutout to the club lounge team (Kenny, Adriana, Sheryl, Natasha and Jia Yi), great service and it was lovely to chat with you all. Thanks for the honey lemon drink. Finally we also like to thank Vanu from housekeeping (love the towel origami that you prepared) and

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Quality and impeccable service
desc: A great hotel, impeccable service. Comfiest duvets and pillows, amazing breakfast! Chloé at the Concierge was so helpful in ordering taxis for us. Would love to return. Rooftop swimming pool was very welcome!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A good value for money hotel.
desc: We had an exquisite stay at Voco. The staff was great, the rooms were clean and comfortable with plenty of appropriate amenities. We were really impressed by the services of PUSH and would definitely recommend it to our kith and kins.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Orchard wonderful stays
desc: I have now stayed at Voco Orchard 4 times since late March and each time has been a wonderful experience. I do not know why but Voco seems much friendlier and accommodating than when it was operated as a Hilton My most recent 1 night stay May 9 to 10 and bed was jusy wonderfully soft with beautiful pillows Staff I have encountered on all 4 stays have been wonderful - keep up the good work Team Voco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Wedding and Hotel Stay on 15 April 2023
desc: We hosted our wedding on the 15th April 2023 at Panorama room. From the moment we decided to engage Voco Hotel, Haze have been very responsive and quick to cater to our needs and enquiry. The front office personnel Ismail was very quick in checking us in, he is also very friendly and initiate to recap our guest list who will also be staying at Voco and their special requirements. He also took a step further and offered to send my Wife’s luggage to her room while she’s busy running errands to prepare for the wedding. Our banquet manager Ridzwan ensured that our special day run smoothly. He checked back with us regularly throughout the wedding and is very quick on his feet to provide the next best alternative without being prompted. Special mention to the housekeeping

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfection
desc: Just returning from a long stay at my favourite hotel , Voco Singapore. Rooms, facilities, food and location are all first class. However, the main reason i keep coming back is the people who work here. They really know how to make a guest feel special! They are more like friends than staff. I need to thank Vanu in housekeeping for looking after me for months and keeping my room like new. Janet ,Bob , Das, and David in reception , always so helpful. And obviously my buddy Kenny and his team in the lounge ( my sanctuary ). Josephine, Natasha, Adrianna, Ali, Paul, Jai Yi, Sheryl , Ruby and my little friend Rovi, who keeps me smiling. Thank you all for making my many months here so enjoyable. Hope to be back later in year 🙏 Sorry if i missed anyone.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best
desc: The location from city which makes it the best if you’re looking for tranquility. Facilities are amazing too and the staffs were amazing specially Mr. push he actually is a gem of a person.I just wish I could extend my stay little longer. Hope to see this place very soon. Thank you hotel facilities for making my trip memorable

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good service
desc: Good service especially Mr Pushpinder. Will come back again soon. The staff are very friendly and nice. Good rooms good food. Had a great time during my stay. Voco is the best hotel in singapore. The location also very good, near shopping center.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Get renovated room to enjoy your stay at the heart of Orchard road
desc: The hotel is under IHG brand where you can get standard service and proper breakfast choice. If you would like to spread most time shopping or dining around Orchard, this hotel is really for you. Please ask for renovated room so you can get the good one and if you are IHG member , there is a chance to get early check-in.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Worth to stay, convenient and delicious breakfast.
desc: A wonderful hotel in Orchard, convenient to access to public transportation, mall and hotel ‘s environment makes me feel like home. Staffs are friendly, energetic and everyone is willing to help. Room is good for traveler, with perfect equipments, and preserve the environment with fully concern about convenient living. Bathroom is super perfect, working table is big enough to feel comfortable and support working at night, lighting is suitable for eyes. Bed is soft and nice. I did not expect to have a good breakfast and coffee in hotel, but it really is, Illy coffee is available, and nice. Fresh vegetables and varieties of food make me happy to eat and start my day. I have never reviewed any hotel, but Voco. More than expectations and supreme!. Keep going staffs , you have done a

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The hotel does feel much more perky and vibrant in terms of personality as marketed
desc: Poorest service started when I had arrived at the run-way, no bell captain was there to assist with the baggage but to stick around the counter chit-chatting. Unpleasant check in took up 30 minutes and knowledge of the staff was limited. Mai was unable to answer simple questions and without excusing herself properly, she had left me waiting at the counter, she had returned with another colleague Hung, Hung was passing information with no expression while Mai was checking on her mobile and showed it to her colleague with a light laugh. Elevator was covered with 'band-aid' printed on the floor level and some event rooms. Access card was not able to bring me up to my floor after several tries. I need to walk out of the lift returned to the counter to exchange for a new card.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Had a beautiful experience.
desc: Great hotel and staff, shout out to Push for helping us finding my wallet that I lost in the bar. Would definitely recommend people to stay here. Hotel is conveniently located close to shopping malls and tourist destinations.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent voco hotel !!
desc: The service here is absolutely amazing. The staff here are extremely welcoming, friendly and helpful, the food aswell was excellent. Overall, I would definitely recommend this holiday inn for anyone that considers!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: An enjoyable Opus Brunch
desc: We enjoyed our Sunday brunch at Opus Grill. Personable and attentive service but not intrusive service team. We were given a quiet corner to enjoy our afternoon. Best of all, stations chef bring the food over you once ready. Great vibes and bountiful spread. Going again :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Relaxing stay
desc: Hotel was very relaxing with lovely, friendly attentive staff. Located very close to the underground rail system but also there were some interesting sights within short a walking distance. I would definitely come here again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Club Lounge + Opus Bar and Grill
desc: So good to be travelling again after four years of being stuck in New Zealand. Getting to see my dear friend Kenny at Voco and dining at Opus was another big plus. Before dining, Kenny and the club team welcomed my sister and I in the club lounge. The lounge itself was very comfortable and homely, the service provided was great! We then moved down to have our dinner and the food was incredible! The wagyu beef was delicious and tender, the crab cakes and calamari were crunchy and amazing, and the cakes we had at the end was the perfect way to round off the meal! Thank you to Kenny for organising, and Pat who served us that night for your impeccable service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Mag from Opus Bar is the best!!!
desc: Had high tea at Voco Hotel Opus Bar, the waiter (Mag) that served us was very patient and proactive. He will explain to us the details of the food and tea served, asked if everything was good etc. He is also very friendly and very passionate in his job! He made my day!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best high tea I‘ve had in Singapore!
desc: Best high tea I‘ve had in Singapore! Good customer service, chill and relaxed ambiance, good variety of savory and sweet items — a lot and we had to pack the rest for take away! Over all really good value for money. No price hike for weekend high tes unlike other places.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very positively surprised
desc: Although we are an IHG Diamond member, we have never been to a VOCO hotel until now. The price was about the same as the Holiday Inn in Singapore, so we preferred the VOCO, especially since it also has a lounge and we wanted to try something new. We knew that the hotel itself is not new, but it has only recently been managed as a VOCO hotel and partially renovated. The entire staff at the hotel was extremely friendly. Starting with the reception, the restaurant, the housekeeping, and the young ladies in the lounge. We would also like to emphasize that for example in the restaurant, but also at the reception, relatively many older employees were to be found. Compared to the "youth mania" of some hotels, this was very positive. Our room was in very good condition and apparently

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good housekeeping and service.
desc: Our housekeeper named Indra during our stay was very good at her work and communicates well. We’ll definitely be back and recommend this hotel. Another one was their in room dining was fast and convenient.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best food and best server Push
desc: We stayed in the orchard hotel but didnt liked the breakfast which made us to look for another breakfast venue and to our luck we found VOCO Hotel and decided to have their breakfast. It was the best experience we had as we were very warmly welcomed by the hotel staff and especially Push who served us and personally made assure that our experience should be the best. Thank you VOCO and Push for the hospitality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome place
desc: We went to the VOCO hotel and were mesmerised by the food that we had there.. special thank you to PUSH who was the best host I have seen till now. A big thank you to hotel team and especially Push. Looking forward to visit again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hospitality by Push
desc: Had a great lunch at the hotel VOCO. Special thanks to Push who helped us in choosing the food which best suited for our taste buds as Indian.. great hospitality. Special thanks to push for his tea…..

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude!
desc: Our first visit and what a great experience! Absolutely outstanding food, service, atmosphere and staff. Everything was well organised. The food were good and nicely presented. Staff attentive and polite. TWO thumbs up to Mr. Push for the wonderful hospitality. He was so accommodating, friendly and thoughtful! EXCELLENT customer service! We were truly amazed by his positive attitude. Mr. Push.. just so you know, excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude! You really go above and beyond.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco is sophisticated!
desc: Voco is a beautiful hotel. The service was excellent. The club lounge is lovely. A special thanks to Lai for his professionalism, kindness, and hospitality. The food is ok overall. The breakfast pancakes and waffles were wonderful. I’d love to see more options on the room service menu. Overall, I’d definitely recommend Voco.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Hotel!✈️❤️
desc: The pillows ate fluffiest and the bed is so big for one guest, relaxing. The bath room are clean and towels. I used shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Hope to comeback again Thank you so much my friends for taking care of us Push,Raj,Maria and Manicken, ❤️❤️❤️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best Decision Ever to host our wedding at voco Orchard!!!
desc: Haze was the sales in charge for our wedding and I have to say it’s the best decision I have made to choose voco orchard as a venue for the special day of my life. Thank you Alvin, Hasan and David for all the assistance and support for our wedding! Things would not have gone so smooth without every single one of your help and hard work. I would totally recommend my friends and family to hold any kind of events at voco orchard. Thank you once again to Haze, Alvin, Hasan, David and every team members that was part of our journey in voco orchard! ❤️❤️❤️

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Our stay at the Voco Singapore
desc: We have been staying at the Voco for the last two years whenever we are in Singapore. It has been our home away from home. We have got to know the staff and find this place welcoming and comfortable. Three areas of outstanding service are at Breakfast @ the Opus led by Push and his team. His cheerful manner and service is par excellence. The other area is @ the lounge on level 22. We enjoy our interactions here. Kenny and his lovely team always go out of their way to make our stay comfortable. Lastly I give a shout out to all at the bell desk. They know who they are and we are thankful for their service. It this feeling of coming home that’s brings us back to the Voco time and time again when in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: excellent
desc: I and my husband stayed at a hotel on orchard road. We didnt liked the lunch over there so we decided to eat out. We came across Voco hotel and thought of trying their food and to our luck we got the best food. Initially we were lil confused about the order but Push vanished our confusion by recommending the best food for us. The whole staff was so gentle and welcoming. The restaurant was clean and lively. Definately will be staying here for our next trip and thanks to Push for his hospitality and masala tea which he gave us as complementary. Highly Recommended.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: CLUB Lounge Excellent!
desc: Stayed was great, service excellent and most important GREAT LOUNGE with kind heart staffs. Kenny is amazing, seeing his passion and smiles daily make my day goes from great to excellent. Thank you for the great hospitality and your team being looking after me very well. Looking forward to visiting you all soon!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Easter Lunch over at Opus
desc: Had an Easter sunday lunch over at Opus with my friends and my family as well. Very impressed with the thematic set up on the food selection as well as the goodie bags for the kids. I was surprised my 3 year old son enjoyed the whole buffet experience. He loved the food as well as the small details of goodie bags, balloon sculpting and cartoon show on the television. Needless to say, the adults enjoyed the food thoroughly too! Not only it looks good, it tastes good as well! And also the Greatest hospitality ever thanks to the service team and chefs, naming some of them who left a lasting impression to us like Joanne, Push, chef Ming Fatt, chef Charles, Chef Ashok. We will be back again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best service ever 💙
desc: This hotel always has a special place in my heart. It always feels like home. The club manager, Kenny, and the club lounge staff, Ali Adriana Josephine Rovi Natasha, they are always very helpful and they treat our family really well. I have a 3yrs old son and they dont only pay attention to adults, but also to my son. During check in Kenny gave a bunny soft toys and coloring activity for my son and during our stay he gave him tiger soft toys and one day before Easter he gave my son bunny cookie. The attention given to my son is just unbelievable. Voco is so lucky to have you guys. Voco has my heart because of all of you. Thank you for always giving your best for us and treat us like a family 💙

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience in Voco
desc: I've always enjoyed my stay in Voco. The hotel is strategically located and within easy walking distance to Orchard and also to botanical garden where I do my morning runs. More importantly their staff are friendly and helpful. Especially YZ who is extremely cheerful and helpful

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay
desc: We had a wedding lunch here including a few additional nights stay at voco orchard. Staff were all nice, attentive and prompt in our request. Food was great. Hotel is at a convenient location with peace at night.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Superb experience Excellent service
desc: Absolutely one of the best hotel I ever stayed. Very nice ambience. Had a comfortable stay. Special Thanks to Push. Staff were friendly and helpful the room was clean and comfortable . Highly recommended.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great hotel, very friendly!
desc: Stayed in a King Suite room in April 2023, with my wife and two daughters. The room was a very generous size, and had a separate bathroom (toilet area) for the children. The kids shared a fold out sofa bed (in a separate room), which was fine for the three nights we were there. The hotel is in a great location on Orchard Road, and is within walking distance to all the major shops along this street, plus MRT etc if required. Breakfast had an excellent selection, and we also tried the Sunday lunch buffet which was also very good. Pool area is also very inviting. All the staff were very friendly, and were only too willing to help out with extra towels, umbrellas and power adaptors etc. during our stay. The only small drawback I had was that because this is a refurbishment

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A wonderful experience
desc: After a bumpy start, (the hotel is under renovation) we had the best stay ever, mainly because of the customer service we received from hotel staff, in particular from Front Office manager, PF. The buffet breakfast was superb; a great range of food. The facilities are terrific. Our room was highly acceptable as we understood the difficulties of running a hotel while renovations are carried out is straining for anyone. The friendly and amenable service means we would happily return. And, the location is ideal.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great food, better service, wonderful expwrience
desc: Had Easter Brunch at Opus Bar & Grill. Service manager Push was welcoming and friendly when he showed us to our tables. He ensured there was ample space for highchairs for our group with several young children. Food selection was great. Love the charcuterie and cheese spread and the concept of individual salads. Western carving station was absolutely delightful. Special mention to the grilled local catch whole fish by Chef Charles! Service staff Joanne was prompt in clearing our plates and kept checking in if we had sufficient water. Overall an enjoyable experience and would highly recommend here for the delicious food accompanied by great service! Kid-friendliness: Children had a fun time during Easter brunch where they were entertained by balloon sculptures and magic show.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Easter Celebration at Opus, Must try their food!
desc: Amazing Easter Day with Opus! Love the varieties and unique dishes. Love the desserts spread the most, wasn’t expecting much from buffets’ chocolates, but the chocolates I tasted yesterday were one of the better ones, with good quality and appealing outlook! Special mention to Ming Fatt for accommodating to my pregnant tastebuds, Joanne for taking care of our big group and helped my son out when he wasn’t feeling well and Vivian for the goodie bags! :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good stay
desc: It was great staying at Voco. Breakfast is delicious. Breakfast team is really helpful always. Mr.Push is really great in helping and taking care always. I appreciate Mr.Push for his assistance and warm welcoming always.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Unhelpful and rude staff
desc: Rude staff upon check in. Was not given a room even at close to 2pm even though room was pre booked. Was told in a hostile tone that check in is strictly 3pm. Well I guess it’s on me for booking such a low end hotel

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: a "BIG Thank You" to Fazli and the team for an amazing experience!
desc: We want to say a "BIG Thank You" to Fazli and the team for an amazing experience! We have been to Optus Grill last time but were disappointed with the service, so decided to give it another chance, and we were very impressed with how Fazli and the team made our birthday night special! They also gave us a card with wishes from all the team and a birthday drink from Fazli! We will come back again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Thank you a wonderful 44th wedding anniversary stay.
desc: Thank you so much to our amazing housekeeper HK Unau, nothing was too much trouble and we certainly appreciated the attention to detail. We would also like to thank Josephine and Kenny in the Club lounge, they made us feel very welcome and looked after us very well.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Enhance your checkin services
desc: Worst experience ever, the check in staff at their worst possible behavior. Not hospitable, specially Pavlina. Hotel knew our arrival date and timing still didn’t do anything about check. They just want to milk the early checkin opportunity.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: "VOCO Singapore: A Smooth Check-in, Delicious Breakfast, and Prime Location Await!"
desc: Our stay at VOCO Singapore from the 10th to 13th of May 2023 was an overall pleasant experience. The reception was exceptional, and the check-in process was smooth and efficient. As a family, we opted for a room with n extra sofa bed, which unfortunately was in need of refurbishment. The comfort of the sofa bed was compromised, and it would greatly benefit from an upgrade. However, the breakfast provided by VOCO Singapore was outstanding. The variety of options and quality of the food exceeded our expectations. The staff members were attentive and ensured that our needs were met throughout our dining experience. We were also impressed by the cleanliness of the rooms. When we requested extra pillows and blankets for our children, the staff promptly provided them, which was much

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Awesome 😎
desc: Thanks to this beautiful hotel facilities and great food for making my trip so memorable. It was my first trip to Singapore and it was so so good. Thanks to Mr.Push who actually helped us with his happy face. Overall ambience was just waao

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding banquet
desc: Alvin (banquet manager) and Haze (sales AD) have been super helpful, understanding and just a pleasure to work with! Thank you for making my wedding perfect on such short notice! Highly recommend!!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Comfortable and clean
desc: The hotel was really comfortable and specially Mr.Push helped me with Indian food.hotel rooms were great and spacious. It is near the main area which I wanted to explore. Hotel Ambience was great along with cleanliness.thanks for making my trip great

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent Corporate Event At Grand Ballroom
desc: Organised a full day corporate event at the hotel in the Grand Ballroom and the staff and sales team were exceptional. The team helped us to evaluate and adjust our logistics and even went out of the way to ensure we had enough time to setup. The event attendees also absolutely loved the food and the catering team also delivered exceptional quality for our VIP luncheon on event day. Special shout out to the Sales (Guek Peng) for getting us great rates for the booking and our event manager on site (Grace) for helping us to arrange all the necessary logistics. Looking forward to host our next event at Voco Orchard!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hotel staff we have ever seen
desc: We booked voco hotel due to its central location by Orchard Road. The facility is showing some aging but it was maintained very well. We found the staff were always friendly and willing to help, even managed to switch rooms for our two college juniors in the middle of the night. We checked out the next morning but realized something was missing in the afternoon. The hotel staff immediately contacted room service but they didn't find anything during cleaning. Aida and Gamazzi didn't stop there but rather spent a long time to help us searching the room. Eventually, a laptop and contact lens were retrieved from a drawer. They demonstrated the highest standard in this profession and provided the best service to the customers. Thank you Aida and Gamazzi!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: If you love shopping, best hotel and location.
desc: Great location, right on Orchard Rd. Wonderful service, great rooms, decent sized pool area. Hotel cafe/bakery, mmm, so good. Close to all public transport. No request was any trouble for the staff, very friendly and made you feel so welcome.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Superb customer service by Push
desc: Excellent customer service offered by Push! Thanks a lot for going an extra mile for us. Really appreciate! Thanks for getting paranthas made for us even when it was not a part of the menu. The hotel is lucky to have you .

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Go to hotel in SG
desc: Location was perfect, steps away from ION Orchard/Orchard Station and in a quieter, less hectic part of Orchard Road while still being a stone’s throw away from the best shopping centers. Service was excellent, rooms are a good size, modern and clean. Breakfast buffet was superb!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Service, Grill and food !
desc: Great place for a date ! Amazing food, especially grilled beef. The waitresses provided very good services and shared suggestions on the chef menu. Recommended, will come back again to try other options from the menu !

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great place to stay
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Voco Singapore for almost 2 weeks. The hotel is very well located and the staff are super friendly, efficient and always eager to support you. I would like to make a special mention to a number of staff that made our stay special - in the lounge Paul, Kenny, Josephine, Rovi, Adrianne, Natasha and Sheryl Thanks to the duty Manager Paulo for organising our room. Also, fantastic were Push, Cristine, Ah Teck the chef, Mina and Ratana. Great work everyone, we had an awesome stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again and we would h highly recommend this hotel for a truly enjoyable stay. Christine and Dan Berry Australia

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The most memorable and delightful experience we ever had of all the hotels we've visited before.
desc: When we were first still considering and surveying from hotel to hotel to confirm where to hold our wedding, we met Haze from Voco at the hotel for room viewing. We were impressed by her professional and amazingly friendly services, and we decided we would hold our wedding at Voco Orchard. On the actual day of our wedding at Voco Orchard, Alvin from Voco was assigned to assist us with the whole event. We had so many hiccups, but Alvin patiently and professionally resolved each and every of the issues for us! Lastly, the Executive Suite provided by the hotel we stayed in was so spacious and clean, comfy and luxurious! The room service helpers a longer the corridor will always greet you with smile whenever you pass by. The overall experience we had with the Hotel and its staffs

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good stay because of PUSH
desc: So I stayed here during my trip to the local places and I must say I had the best service I could ever receive in Singapore and that had just been possible because of Push. I mean he is an incredible guy with excellent hospitality and great customer service.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Will definitely stay again
desc: Warm welcome at the reception (Ms.Ying) Very friendly staff More than enough international and tasty choice (Thanks to Chefs: Eddie, Alvin, Edward, Chee, Gile and to the Breakfast Team: Push, Vivien, Raj, Jeffrey, Christine, Altaf?, Maria, Manni, Razak who made our day). Great location You should try the cakes from D9 cafe!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great evening meal
desc: Opus restaurant has a great menu and friendly atmosphere, Fazley took care of us and made the whole experience enjoyable, I really appreciated his attitude and attention. He took time to explain the importance of the sustainable herb garden, which is a great feature the food was really good.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Dinner Night, Great Service!
desc: This is my absolute favourite restaurant in the city for dinner!!! The food is fantastic and no matter what I order, I am always delighted with my meal! Alvin, Fazli and the rest of the team are great and always efficient, happy and polite. Can’t wait to return and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to anyone looking for somewhere to eat in town. Looking forward to visiting again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Definite attitude issues
desc: This place has staff who definitely have attitude issues whether it’s the reservation staff or the staff on webchat. They have no pangs to lose out on their customers and make no efforts to win their business or loyalty. I fail to understand how this property can be a part of the IHG group

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wedding
desc: Wedding planning was made easy with Voco. Haze Yong our POC, helped us with the accommodation of various requests, John Madrigal, our main coordinator on actual night made it easy for us, in which he settled the coordination, all we did was to show up. Highly recommend Voco! Plus room is clean, bed is very comfortable. Enjoyed the stay in here.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great business conference, tasty food, good coffee!
desc: Just completed hosting a business conference at Voco Hotel Singapore attended by 30 international company guests from around the globe. Conference room was spacious and comfortable, food during breaks sumptuous and tasty, all conference facilities worked well. We even had an extra room Vista 1 + 2 which made the experience truly spacious and luxurious. Just want to convey our deep gratitude and appreciation to the team at Voco Hotel Singapore for an amazing conference experience 😊 So very impressed by the level of service and professionalism, particularly John (Banquet Manager). Your professionalism is truly world-class!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Always great to be back at Voco
desc: Manager Vivian’s service was really out of this world. She recognised me and made me feel like I was coming home. Vivian is an awesome leader with a wonderful team !it’s always great to be back at Voco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Haley, the Reflection of Voco's Finest Hospitality
desc: Front desk services by Haley was splendid! Excellent hospitality with warm smiles and greetings, going the extra mile to accommodate my preferences, and with sincere follow-up checks. She was polite, genuine, and friendly. These traits and actions are the hallmarks of the hospitality industry, and definitely will warm the hearts of any travellers away from home. Thanks Haley! :) you have my sincerest gratitude. Credits to Voco for retaining such a splendid employee.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Unpleasant and unwelcoming check in staff
desc: Unpleasant attitude from check in staff at reception. Was refused an early check in at 2pm. 3 star hotel disguised as a 5 star When asked for assistance to ensure a smoother check in experience , was simply ignored and told off

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Another great stay
desc: I have visited this hotel on numerous occasions and am always please by the recognition and friendly service on each trip. Ying Zhuang checked us in and was, as usual bright, cheerful and friendly. Push, Raj, Christine and Maria from the Opus were as friendly as always, helpful and caring, and as I have recently been though some medical procedures they were understanding in my limited food intake. Overall another great stay and looking forward to my next visit.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great food and service
desc: We had an amazing stay with great food at the restaurant and special thanks to Push for the wonderful service. I would recommend this hotel to all friends and family for their next visit. Thank you to all the staff and team for the service and hospitality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Convenient and Excellent Service
desc: It has been a convenient and comfortable stay at Voco. Location’s great with varied restaurant and shopping choices. Kudos to Indra for being a helpful housekeeping host in my entire stay, she has been warm and accomodating. Cheers to Voco team.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Everything was perfect; I will be back.
desc: Everything was perfect. Check-in was a breeze. Pavlina was very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet. Dinner in restaurant and at rooftop was excellent. Quick and friendly service. Staff was very helpful in getting taxis each day. Checkout was easy.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice,big room,good smell and so hospitable staff
desc: I am enjoying so far staying at Voco Hotel Singapore with the excellent service of David he is the one welcoming me and assisting me upon check in and even gave my son a cutiee rbbit stuff toy.And he is not forget to alway check on my stay by texting and even calling all is good with me.Thats very impressive with me.And I would also mentio to DM Paolo and Ruby who also take chance to check on us and being hospitable too.Im so delighted with all of their warm welcome.Cheerd to the team and keep it up.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A wonderful experience with Voco Breakfast
desc: The breakfast manager Vivian is very friendly and the service is very attentive! I can feel that the hotel's management system is very strict, and almost all the employees are amiable. In particular, Vivian would have a chat with us passengers to learn about our accommodation and dining experience, talking and laughing, which made us feel very comfortable and let us start a wonderful day. Will come back to Voco and the breakfast here again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good venue for meetings
desc: Hotel service team are friendly, helpful and efficient. Refreshments and food at hotel outlets are very good. Guest room spacious and clean. All good feedback from participants. Very good experience overall.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great stay on Orchard Road
desc: Beautiful hotel on Orchard Road right in the centre of things. Loads of pubs, restaurants and shopping malls nearby. Staff are wonderful and extremely helpful. Service in the breakfast room is a bit rushed - they clear away your plates before you are finished! Lovely roof top pool which we had all to ourselves - bliss!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Staycation
desc: Room was pretty decent but not much of a view. We could hear the sound of the trolleys at the corridors. Pool was fun as there’s a children’s pool but we saw a toothpick floating. Staff were friendly right up to the engineers whom greeted us. Sheryl processed our check-in and was quick in assisting us on the little hiccup we encountered when our key cards didn’t work.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Home away from home
desc: Great arrival and check-in experience, large well appointed rooms, wonderful housekeeping team and most of all the Executive Lounge and its friendly and attentive staff made Voco as our home away from home. Looking forward to being back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful team and special stay
desc: The Club Lounge team of Kenny, Rovi, Natasha, Adriana, Josephine, and Ali made our stay special and unique. They attended to our every need, helped us celebrate our anniversary, and accommodated for various appointments and other activities we had scheduled throughout our stay. We would come back again and again, and we would recommend the Voco Orchard Hotel for anyone coming to Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect wedding venue
desc: Held my wedding at voco hotel’s panorama ballroom and had a blast. The ballroom was an intimate setting and all our guests were raving about the prata station we got. The staff are also super experienced and welcoming and make the process stress free. They are so responsive and accommodating of even unconventional requests. Thank you so much Haze and John!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Outstanding Events Team and Hotel
desc: I had the pleasure of working with voco for a recent client program in Singapore. The staff on site was simply amazing, promptly assisting with all requests - Grace, John, Ashok, Jing and everyone they managed were truly great and professional. Food on site for both banqueting and in-house restaurants is excellent!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Stay At Voco Orchard! Will be back!
desc: After contacting several hotels to consider their venues for our wedding, my wife and I chose Voco Orchard because of the prompt replies from their event team and their central location. Had our wedding in June 2023 and looking back, we definitely made the right choice! We have an amazing stay in Voco's suite, the hotel breakfast is great with decent selection, and the staff were very helpful throughout our stay. Amenities are great as well, even their choice of hairdryer surprised us as it was of such good quality. If you stay in a suite room, do checkout the lounge; it's a very nice place to chill and relax (literally lounging lol). We are glad we got to experience Voco by choosing to have host our wedding here. Highly recommend getting their breakfast if you are staying at

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Short Staycation
desc: Had a short staycation with my husband because our house was on renovation, chose Voco and it did not disappoint. Comfortable stay, had the opportunity to be assisted by Ismail upon check-in, a really friendly helpful associate! Room was really clean too! Would definitely be back for another staycation 😊

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Memorable Concert Stay to be Repeated
desc: I came to Singapore to attend a concert and looked for a hotel that was convenient to walk and access the MRT. Voco's location fit exactly that, with a 5-minute walk to the ION Orchard mall and MRT connections within that mall. I ended up spending everyday of my stay at that mall and still didn't get bored. The hotel itself is really something, with a spacious, clean room and coffee machine, a high rooftop overlooking Tang Plaza, a very well-equipped gym (one of the best I've seen), and very friendly staff, especially Mr. Push who was nice enough to give me a stuffed rabbit to remember my stay. Will definitely be checking-in again whenever I find myself in Singapore next.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staycay. Will come again.
desc: Great location in orchard road. Had stayed here when it was the Hilton. First time since it’s become Voco. Was met by cheerful, warm welcoming reception. Checking in by Paolo was delightful and was done speedily and efficiently. Thank you Paolo for the breakfast which was amazing at the Opus. Room was on high floor facing Orchard Road, warm and relaxing. It was nice and new, with Illy coffee machine and coffee. Thoroughly enjoyed the tomahawk steak dinner at Opus Bar & Grill too. Memorable staycay for our wedding anniversary, Voco team made it more special for us. Would love to come again to stay longer and enjoy your wonderful hospitality.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Stay June 2023
desc: Stayed at the Voco Orchard 23-27 June. This was my first time ever staying in a Voco property and great to experience the 1st one in South East Asia. The hotel is in a perfect location on Orchard Road, perfect for shopping and also public transport to explore Singapore. The rooms are clean spacious and very comfortable, stayed in room with a balcony on 22nd floor and access to executive lounge. A massive Thank You to all the staff in executive lounge Ali, Adriana,Kenny,Josephine,Rovi and Natasha you made us feel very welcome and looked after us very well, you guys are all an asset to the property and customer service is exceptional. Thank you also to Elvis in reservations, who was always available to help with all requests and making the booking, you are awesome. Also Thank You

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very successful stay in hotel !
desc: Excellent service... Front desk was great concierge was great.. house keeping was great.. Time to time you meet one of the staff in the elevators or lobby and they are pleasant and intelligent.. Of course, i must say the breakfast buffet is great!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great service
desc: Thank you for the hospitality from you (kenny) & the team Jo, Adriana, Rovi, Ali & Natasha. You all have been an amazing dream team for the property. Feeling like home each time we went to the Club Lounge. Your food & alcohol drink knowledge are outstanding. Never forget about all the tips & trick about Singapore. We truly experience the 'Local Lifestyle' during this visit. Thank you Kenny!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good costumer service
desc: I would like to give an enormous and gratefull thank you to Mr Push from the front desk of the restaurant. Unfortunetly because of my work i spend my birthday away from home and from the ones who are important to me. Mr Push made my day much better with all his dedication, humanity and comercial skills. I would like to thank him for everything and i would like to point out his natural way of being a huge professional doing his work with the costumers. Gratefull. I trully recommend the hotel to everyone. Everything was perfect.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good room and bed size!
desc: First time staying at the rebranded voco and was really impressed by the service level, room and bed size! Upon check-in, was very kindly assisted by Paolo who gave us an upgrade at the highest floor. 😊 Although our room was not ready yet, we went to shop nearby and was notified by WhatsApp when the room was ready which I thought was a very efficient system. The super single beds were very comfortable and room and bathroom were a very good size. One downside is that the walls are quite thin so we could hear the other room quite loudly. Overall, a very good and comfortable stay and will be back again 😊

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Top Quality Service
desc: We had a wonderful stay at voco Orchard Singapore. The staff were fantastic at all points: bell staff, check-in desk, cleaning, and especially Mr. Ali and Ms Josephine in the Club Lounge. Our room was large with nice views. Orchard Road has all kinds of shopping and the subway is a five minute walk. We will definitely stay here again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco on Orchard is excellent
desc: What makes a hotel great are its employees & the management team. Mark the GM is grooming the team well. Customer service seems to be the number one focus. From check in to departure we felt like family. The staff goes above & beyond. An amazing breakfast spread. The gym is perfect with not only free weights but treadmills as well. The location can't be beat right in the heart of Orchard Road. I highly recommend this IHG property. Once again thank you to Mark, Janet, Sandy, Paolo, all the club lounge staff, Push, Vivian, Christine, Razak, Raj, Maria, Jeffery, Fauziah , Chef Alice, Nicholas & Eddie. Sorry if I missed anyone. I wish the property & its employees success. See you all in February. Mr B & D

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience
desc: a Fair price of stay, the new rooms are really comfortable.And also, the lounge services are great with Kenny supervise. The team are AMAZING! I will definitely come back again on my next trip in Singapore.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Quality Event Experience at voco Orchard
desc: The team of Mandy, Grace, Ashok, Nino and Jessica deserves appreciation for the service and efficiency in handling our two-days premium conference run at their venue's Level 3 Ballroom. Well done team!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely staycay
desc: The staff were really warm and friendly. What touched my husband and I the most was the unexpected birthday card and a slice of cheesecake dropped off at our room while we went out for dinner last night. It was 4 days until his birthday so we weren't expecting anything at all. The personalised card by the Front Desk team was indeed a heartwarming gesture. Our room was really clean, comfy and cosy. Breakfast spread at the Opus Grill & Bar was quite yummy as well. A lovely spread of choices and it was certainly a wonderful, short recharge needed. Thank you!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great staff and really nice hotel
desc: Just the 1 night stay at Voco as we were in transit but worth a review, checked in with Josephine who was great and all the staff from start to finish were helpful and very nice. Used the facilities in the evening after checking out earlier to freshen up, before heading to the airport,

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Customer Service
desc: The room are clean & comfortable. Amazing customer service skill, friendly and nice. It's my second time here, the standard never drop. Thank you, Kenny for the arrangement at the lounge. It was awesome 😎 Very friendly and genuine staff ☺️ Voco Orchard Singapore is always the best option✌🏻

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing
desc: Really nice stay! Best breakfast I had in a long time with amazing staff! A special thank you to Mr Push who welcomed me and my crew during the last month always with a big smile and sympathy! Looking forward to return back to Singapore and Voco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Nice staff
desc: Very good hotel with really nice staff, particularly at the hotel restaurant. A big thank you to Mr Push who is a wonderful human being, very kind and always smiling. He has the ability to make your day better only with a few words. I will miss staying at the hotel.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Friendly Hotel in Singapore
desc: Very good experience, the hotel staff are 5 ⭐️ very friendly, attentive always ready to help in any situation. The room is very clean and the bed is super comfortable. The breakfast is wonderful, and the staff are very sweet, a special thanks to Mr. Push who made us feel at home. Good location, near everything. The experience was very positive and if I return to Singapore for sure this hotel will always be the best option.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Greatest wedding we can ever have
desc: Very thankful and grateful to the banquet team for their attention and the service they provided to us during this time. Haze, Alvin and their team were very accommodating to our last minute request and did their very best to ensure that everything went smoothly. Food and rooms were great too. Thanks to all!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Wonderful 3 month stay
desc: The maid service was outstanding. Iris was such a joy. She was always smiling and very nice. Always returned to clean and neat room. She consistently went above and beyond to make sure my stay was enjoyable. The entire staff I'd very customer oriented, they are always available and willing to address any issues or concerns. I will definitely be returning

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic stay as a couple and family
desc: We stayed overnight and had a wonderful time. Having stayed in many hotels before in Singapore, the new Voco is a winner! Super comfortable beds, nicely renovated room, and great breakfast spread! We also had dinner at Opus and Chef Ashok’s tomahawk was beautifully cooked and one of the best steaks I’ve had in Singapore. Also shout out to Patricia for exceptional service in the dining room. Very attentive staff who made us feel very welcomed! We will be back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Location with Excellent Hospitality
desc: Great location in orchard, staff were friendly and helpful. I was checked in to the hotel by Janet and she display hospitality that I will always remember. Not only does she checks me in patiently, she also extend her hospitality to check if all is good for my stay even after the check-in process.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very nice hotel excellent service
desc: We are 4 of friends we got suite room the room is excellent with 2 bathrooms one with shower and tub big living room . We were impressed as we reached such a warm hospitality from GM …the club lounge was excellent service by Natasha she was so helpful and front of lounge by Mr Kenny and the breakfast room was excellent service by GM PUSH he was so kind looking after us with food … we all are so happy with hotel food services… Recommended for anyone who is planning to come Singapore as it’s very much walking place to every where branded shops and department stores

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: I would recommend the hotel to others.
desc: We have chosen Voco Orchard Hotel for our team building on 21 Jul. Not only it is a convenient location, the quality service provided by Guek Peng, Grace, John and the rest of the banquet employees were commendable. The attentiveness and efficiency contributed to the successful event. My team members like the vibes of the meeting room as well as the international buffet lunch. I would recommend the hotel to others.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great help and service from the voco team
desc: Held a 2-day company event at voco Orchard Singapore and will definitely be back! The team led by Guekpeng was superb, rendering their prompt assistance to us from the very start when we enquired to the end when we concluded the event successfully. Considering the short timeline we had to work with, the team's prompt and dedicated help made it all possible. Not forgetting Corina who helped with the event logistics once our event is confirmed, as well as the banquet team led by Ashok who were so professional in what they do. All our guests had high praises over the service rendered! Special mention to the few staff who helped to find a lost phone for one of our guests. We then had dinner at Opus and the service staff there were prompt, helpful and friendly too. We were

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: My home
desc: It s a very long long time i stay in this hotel The reason i go back is simple to explain : is like home and i feel the care of all the people there from management to housekeeping I travel for work from 40 years more so i guess i have a wide experience of hotels around the entire world Care of people even with a simple smile is precious to find when tired of planes , airports , arrogant noisy people and various useless controls here and there I love this hotel yes is true and i wish other people will experience the same feelings i got Try it is worth every cent you will spend believe me

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: The most pleasant place to stay
desc: We came to Singapore for a holiday to celebrate our wedding anniversary. It turned out to be a memorable and fabulous experience. We were impressed by Singaporean's hard working and charming. Voco is a good example of it. Staff (Catherine, Christine, the young Vietnam girl cleaner and her manager ...) were always willing to help and they did help! The bed was made very comfortable, cleaning was well done, sufficient hot water pressure, effective air conditioning, quiet room... We were also surprised by the towel swan with rose they made for us. All in all, Voco is a good place to stay. Although it is not in a brand new building, it is homelike of high standards. Some info may be useful: *The room has universal power sockets and USB socket. *A 7-Eleven shop is next to Voco where

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday staycay
desc: Returned to this beautiful hotel since our last visit and were warmly welcome. There are some changes to the designs and layout of the hotels ghat enhanced the total 'look' of the brand. Our room is beautiful and clean and surprisingly, it came with a tub 😍 Had a celebratory dinner at our fav steak restaurant, Opus. The food were yummilicious as usual especially the oysters, calamari and of course the steaks. Patricia and team were there go make it a memorable experience for us. Breakfast was extensive and it was great experience as we were there early and not much crowd. But it gets super busy from 9.30am and Push and team were great in managing the operations. Kudos to the team for a wonderful staycay 🙏😍

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing hotel with great service.
desc: The people make this place so much more amazing. The rooms and facilities were amazing can’t fault it. The suite we have were updated with classy decor. We went to the lounge area on 22nd floor and the people demonstrated what feels like when come to luxury hotel and services. Big shout out to Kenny and team. Location can’t be better. 3min walk to Orchard MRT n surrounded by malls n restaurants We will be back again.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Very good hotel. Could be better.
desc: A very good hotel located on Orchard Road. Reception staff very welcoming. Rooms clean and fresh design. One small downside of the rooms is that no toilet bidet water spray fitted. Executive lounge very nice but no buffet selection, only canopies. Breakfast is outstanding, high quality food and a good selection for all. One downside at breakfast is that the staff are over keen, over hurried to collect your plate while you are still eating at the table. All in all a very good stay at a fair reasonable price within this area.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Birthday staycay
desc: Decided to stay here for a birthday statcation and we (A&A) were not disappointed. We were warmly welcomed and our room was clean and beautifully designed. The hotel seemed to have gone a transformations for the better. Had a birthday dinner at Opus and food and service were not disappointed. The oysters, cqlamaries and steaks were sublimed. Special mentioms for patricia and team for the great service. Breakfast was extensive and luckily we were there early cause as it startes to get super bysy by 9.30am... hint hint. Pushand team were attentive and great in their service. We will definitely be back!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Happy newlyweds
desc: Recently held our wedding lunch banquet at voco Orchard Singapore. We picked voco due to its prime location, what was included in wedding package, 5 star rating and affordability. We were delighted with how it all turned out. Haze Yong (asst. director of catering sales) walked us through from day 1 of booking our wedding banquet with them almost a year before our wedding, constantly communicating with us, answering our queries, booking our food tasting etc. On our big day, our banquet manager, Xin Hui, was more than accommodating, serving our needs and explaining step-by-step the processes and what to expect. We were so grateful for that as we were both anxious about it (as most newly weds would be). The executive suite was amazing, the fixings seemed a little dated (voco

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Enjoyable stay at Voco
desc: The room is very clean and comfy. We had an enjoyable stay and staff are very friendly and always willing to help whenever we have a request. Hotel is accessible to many shopping malls. Will definitely come back for a staycation.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Room allocation disappointment & lack of safety concerns at VOCO ORCHARD
desc: Our check-in experience at the Voco Orchard Hotel in Singapore left us feeling disappointed due to the hotel's inability to accommodate our special requests. Despite requesting adjoining rooms or rooms on the same floor for our elderly parents and their grandchildren, we encountered difficulties that raised safety concerns. Upon arrival, we were informed that our rooms were located on different floors. We expressed our concerns to the hotel staff, emphasizing the importance of having our family together for convenience and safety. However, despite our efforts, a suitable solution could not be found. This situation created inconvenience and unease for our elderly family members, who faced challenges navigating between floors. We had hoped that the hotel would prioritize the

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Weekend staycation in the heart of orchard road
desc: Excellent service and attentive staff to meet all our requests during our stay and will definitely return again. Friendly and professional staff from the Concierge(Aqid), Reception(Sheryl & Catherine), Housekeeping(Ying Zhuang). Thank you for the experience.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Local stay and wedding
desc: Held our wedding there. The staff were very attentive and we could not ask for better service. Food was great too. The bakery D9 at level 1 has great selections. The hotel suite had great views and was well equipped.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Construction noise !!
desc: We come regularly to this hotel because we have no choice for work and are in contract with them. But I do not recommend it because they are systematically under noises construction so didn’t allow us efficient sleep ! If you are looking for quiet, this is not the hotel for you. Between construction noises and doors slamming and low soundproofing because you hear your neighbors in the hallways! I strongly not recommend this hotel !!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Personalised and friendly service
desc: Here at voco for 1st time for a full day workshop. I am very impressed with their service. They have been very accommodating towards our various requests. In particular, Jessica, who is assigned to the coffee counter for our event, is a gem. She actually socialises with us and is very engaging. I don’t take coffee and tea so I asked for hot honey. Although it is not available for our event, she actually went to the hotel restaurant to get the honey for me!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Singapore’s hidden treasure
desc: Brand new IHG hotel in Singapore. Great location and wonderful staff. Ms Ann Koo is the hotel superstar. Always ready to help with a big smile. Highly recommend this hotel. There are supermarkets, malls and movie theater near by.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good business hotel and for stay in Singapore for leisure
desc: After the initial problems with the room, everything was quickly and effectively solved by Catherine and her colleague at the reception. Kenny, Ali, Natasha and the Lounge team were very helpful and it was a pleasure spendning (also short) time in the Lounge. Excellent Breakfast, excellent bedding, excellent staff and services. The only (minor) drawback are the bathrooms, which are relatively small and a bit outdated. Recommend booking of room with balcony - excellent!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best brunch experience
desc: We were greeted by a very friendly Concierge with a golden keys, Aqid. He even went above and beyond, arranging a coloring kit for my son in the restaurant. Which was really helpful. Buffet spread was amazing. I love the seafood selection. Their flaming oyster was absolutely crazy delicious. The bbq quail was sooo nice, by the time I wanted to try it, it was finished. So sweet of the Chef with the brown hat, he came to deliver it to our table. I really appreciate his kindness. Lovely experience, definitely will be back. Thank you team for a lovely Sunday brunch.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lunch Appreciation Corporate Event Aug 2023
desc: We recently hosted a company lunch event at Voco Orchard Hotel, and it proved to be an excellent venue for our annual gathering. Located conveniently near Orchard Road and a mere 3-minute walk from Orchard MRT Station, its accessibility was a major plus. The hotel staff displayed exemplary service from the moment of our initial inquiry to the event's conclusion. Their attentiveness and regular check-ins with us ensured a smooth experience throughout. Moreover, the hotel staff went above and beyond to accommodate our needs. They allowed us to set up our ballroom ahead of schedule and even assisted in moving bulky items from the lobby to the ballroom, which was greatly appreciated. The lunch buffet was a culinary delight, with a constant replenishment of food to ensure our

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Business trip
desc: Not very cozy, not business friendly, poor pool area, and over priced eg 11dollars for a canned coke! The staff was friendly and helpful but it’s not something I’d go for again in future. Singapore has so many options to chose from and same price range which are better.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Brilliant star Kenny
desc: Great service from Club Lounge team. Thank you Kenny for the birthday surprise advanced arrangement in Club Lounge during the last night of our stay. We have been IHG membership since back in the 90's till present. It was our first stay in voco Orchard Singapore for us. It is definitely not disappointed yet full of surprises along the weeks. Thank you Kenny for such a thoughtful arrangement, very very pleasant experience with you. Brilliant Star

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Corporate Event at Voco Orchard
desc: Held a corporate D&D event at Voco and the experience was smooth and pleasant, especially with Ms Grace (Catering Sales) and Ridzwan (Banquet) who were helpful and efficient, alleviating the stress of our team. Food was good and every guest enjoyed themselves!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Anniversary getaway
desc: Check in was a breeze and reception was very friendly. We managed to check in earlier than expected. The room was big and spacious as it was an older refurbished property. When we went out, it started to rain and we borrowed some umbrellas from concierge. When we came back and returned the umbrellas, we told the concierge our room number and he immediately asked me if it was our anniversary! He then asked if we were going to be in the room later that afternoon and came with some cake and wished us happy anniversary. The only small issue which has nothing to do with the service is the bathroom which is a tad small and old school with the bathtub. There is nothing they could have done when IHG took over from Hilton. It was a good weekend getaway for us and we will defintely stay

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best ever
desc: I had the best sleep every single night of my 10 nights here at Voco. The staff, everywhere here at Voco have been so pleasant helpful and overall wonderful. I can come back anytime and have already nominated Voco to my friends back home and on social media to look it up when plan holidays here at Singapore. Thank you for your hospitality. Until next time.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Voco Singapore - My All Star Review
