desc: The hotel and the staff are amazing and the best I have encountered in many years of world travel. The room, the room service personnel and the Club Lounge staff treated me so very specially. Ali at the Club Lounge along with his team mates made a very long stay very pleasant and also made my birthday 🎂 away from home and loved ones feel special. As an IHG Silver Elite member I highly recommend this hotel as I will be back

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great place, great staff! 7 days 6 nights Executive Suite!!
desc: Pre-arrival: I booked an airport transfer through the concierge of Voco and they explained in details the options that I have since me and my mom will be arriving on a different date. Of course, they gave me the best deal! Arrival and Check-in: I arrived in Singapore from Japan on time and the driver is already waiting at the arrival belt and helped with my luggages as I stepped out from customs. The trip from Changi Airport to Voco took for more than 30 minutes because it was Sunday and traffic was heavy. I originally have 2 reservations, the first one is for 6 days for Executive Suite and the second one for a smaller room for 1 day because some of my friends will be coming over. During check-in, Noora (if I remember her name correctly) was very generous and upgraded my

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent short stay in Sinagpore
desc: Had a great stay at Voco Orchard. Staff across the board really helpful and friendly. Prompt service at all times. Club Lounge team, especially Rovi, were attentive and open for a chat and always a smile. Very clean and well located at the top end of Orchard Road.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing service
desc: Fantastic service from start to finish. Room was spacious and very comfortable. Leisure facilities are really good and we were particularly impressed with the incredible service in the Club. Sheryl looked after us so we’ll - thank you so much Sheryl!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Excellent service!
desc: 5, wonderful experience and service from Kenny , Ali , Josephine , Rovi , Adrianna , Le Xuan , Rubiah , Sheryl and Natasha from the Club Lounge and Push from Opus Bar. Hope to return back soon to my second home. Always Happy to be staying in Voco singapore. - Rahman

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good stay
desc: Just came back from a short 1 night stay friend of mine had told me about this place being a Hilton before converting into a Voco so it would be dated rooms… I guess he was right, anyway it was only for that one night didn’t really bother me much but I’ve stayed at the Voco Seoul if i were to compare I would choose Seoul over orchard on any given day I emailed the property few days before I check in asking for an early arrival but never received a reply, nonetheless I got an early check in due to my elite status plus a double room upgrade which was great. The phone in my room didn’t work but they use WhatsApp to communicate so that’s easy. Location wise it’s just amazing. All the way down along orchard road on the quiet end. I booked this place using my points (32000) just to

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Service for Staff
desc: We threw an event for about 200 guests at the Voco Orchard Grand Ballroom and everyone enjoyed themselves! Supporting me from Voco was Haze who was very helpful and understanding. She is quick to reply to my queries and did her best in providing help to make the event a success!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing Wedding Reception
desc: We held our wedding lunch reception at voco Orchard Hotel and the experience was amazing! Special shout-out to our wedding coordinator, Anthony, who is extremely pleasant, experienced and proactive! He ensured that we met the required timelines and was very accommodating to many of our requests all in the thought of creating our perfect wedding so we are truly appreciative of his efforts which was essential in the success of our wedding event! Also big thank you to the banquet manager, Ashok, and the rest of the banquet team for having everything under control and briefing us every step of the way! Everybody was very polite and kind during the entire event which was great. In addition, our stay was great and the service team made sure that we had everything we needed to enjoy

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Lovely
desc: Room is lovely. Simple yet elegant I really love the club lounge. Service is really good. Food and cocktails are good too. The staffs were extremely helpful, polite and attentive. Place is cosy, spacey and very suitable for working. A lot better a lot of other lounges I've been to.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Best hotel service you can ask for!
desc: Leaving a review after having the most wonderful wedding and stay at voco Orchard! Living up to voco’s reputation, this is the best service we have ever experienced in any hotel :) Our search for a wedding venue was short and sweet because of Anthony’s service and sincerity. He brought us around the ballrooms and answered our queries with utmost transparency and honesty. He provided valuable advice, given that he is well-experienced with weddings and helped us plan for a pleasant wedding experience. We really liked that in the end, we were confident of voco’s ability and Anthony assured us that he would be there to help if there are any changes we needed. Leading up to the wedding, Anthony followed up with us thoroughly and ensured all our discussions were documented and taken

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Clean and kids friendly hotel
desc: Room cleaning was perfect. Cleaning crew INDRA was so kind. She gave us extra water and coffee that we needed and toys for kids! We had small talk with her and that is a good memory for our stay in Singapore. It was a nice surprise that they gave us fluffy rabbit toys when checking in. My kids really love them.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Opus experience enhanced by good staff
desc: Opus bar and Grill Experience was fantastic Food was paced well Tomohawk Steak was tender and juicy Conaq glass and portions were generous Manager Yoges tuns a tight ship He was always covering our table when our waiter was overwlmed Someone was at our table im 3 secs 7/7 times Will definitely go again

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Perfect stay
desc: Overall a wonderful stay. Very good food! I was also very pleased by the cosiness of the room and the cleaning service! A big thank you to Vanu for making us feel so spoiled by impecably cleaning and arranging the room and adapting to our schedule!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Fantastic choice in Singapore
desc: I’ve just had four fantastic nights at the voco and I thoroughly enjoyed it for many reasons. Firstly I think it is excellent value and offers one of the most premium locations in the city. It is great for business and leisure as my trip was a blend of both. It is walking distance to so many moles and taxis are within easy reach if you want to explore further. It is also a great location for Singapore nightlife with many restaurants and bars in the immediate area. The club lounge team Throughout the day are absolute superstars. They went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and at home. The breakfast was superb, high-quality fresh well presented and not over the top. I hate wasteful expensive buffers and this was really on point. The room is comfortable, quite

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Would definitely come back!
desc: The room is very spacious and facilities are great. Hotel staff are very friendly, especially the housekeeper Indra, who is extremely detailed and attentive - she never fails to have a huge smile on her face when greeting guests.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great experience and good food!
desc: Came back for a second time after my meal in Jul. Today’s service was great! Special shout out to Patricia who was so helpful with her recommendations and great service recovery when we feedback that the wagyu ribeye was slightly too rare for our liking. Thanks for making our dinner a memorable one!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: EXCELLENCE
desc: We were booked here at Voco fir business training..from the moment we stepped into Voco we were greeted with excellence...polite, well mannered, amazing and immaculate service, one happy family/team willing to serve, to please, to go the extra mile...from conceirge, front desk, hospitality, housekeeping and restarants. Special thanks to the team in Club lounge..who waited and served with excellence and took great care of you....and especially for Ali, Rubi my jar of Kaya to take home. I highly recommend booking and staying at Voco..you will thoroughly enjoy your stay. Kind regards Gloria & Lindy

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great food, wonderful experience
desc: We celebrated my parents anniversary there and had a wonderful time. Food was great, service was excellent and ambience was fantastic. The manager, Fazley was charming and accommodating as always. Highly recommended!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: A Fantastic Second Visit to the Grill Bar!
desc: I recently had the pleasure of revisiting the Opus Grill for the second time, and I must say, it was even better than my first experience! The dishes which we ordered were delightful (especially steak) and as always thanks to Fazli and his excellent service! We were happy to see you again and taste new cocktails menu.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Just a beer night ended up as an amazing dinner.
desc: A casual beer evening among friends was transformed into an amazing dinner. Thanks to Manager Fazli for our gastronomic adventure. We also liked the Guinness, and will definitely come back to try brunch.

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: great food and service!
desc: the food was really great and the service staff were very nice and always willing to help! special thanks to patricia and gugan for their excellent service! when i didn’t want a fizzy drink patricia specially gave me a non-fizzy version of a mocktail which was very good too! would definitely recommend and will definitely be back :)

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: There's lots of good service in Singapore - but this hotel adds the personal touch
desc: I can chose to stay wherever I want on my regular business and leisure visits to Singapore. I chose to stay at Voco for the genuine friendliness of the staff and the quality and value of the rooms. The hotel GM Mark leads by example by valuing guests with attention to detail. The Club Lounge on level 22 managed by Kenny is a haven of great breakfasts, afternoon tea and evening canopies and friendly attentive staff who have the balance right in delivering a personal service that is never intrusive. If you want a superb steak the Opus is the place to go- they know their meat and also how to cook and serve it. Book one of the Suiyes and you et a steam room in the bathroom- its awesome and very effective . The location on Orchard road is perfect for business, shopping and touring

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Amazing team and Great Experience at Ballroom
desc: We had our dinner and dance at VOCO ballroom. The Sales Manager Grace Lum, Banquet Manager Ridzwan and the team are all very helpful and glad we made this party successful together. Kudos to the team so much and they are all well experience. We will highly recommend. Thanks once Again!

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Good houskeeping

hotelname: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel
title: Great Entertainment
desc: Went out for a meal at the Opus bar and grill, meet the greatest waitress ever, couldnt do enough for us, recommended food and drinks. Full on bubbly. On to the food well what an amazing meal, from the starters of squid and soup, to the nice big and tasty Tomahawk, steak was perfectly cooked, well supplement by the cauliflower cheese and the biggest bowl the specials fries. What topped it all off was Patricia, fantastic evening. 👏
